lg.l: abaśya mr̥tu āmbhe ḷabhiḷu yugate
ati bhāgye se bhīrata yuddhe mr̥tuhiṁ prāpate | 64 |
hanumata haruṛadhvaja kapiketana rihna
nandighoṣa rathare śrī jagannāthaṁkara dekhibā badana | 65 |
baḍāi pabitra se ye kuruṣetra bhūmi
ẏe schāne mr̥tyu hoiḷe hoibu svargagāmī | 66 |
puṣyeka catiṇa labhibā deba schāne
moṣa hebā dekhi śrī jagannāthaṁka śrīmukha daraśane | 67 |
bhurisarbaẏe boiḷe tu abaśya āmbhanta badhibu
ẏehāuṁ sulabha kāhuṁ pāibu kire bābu | 68 |
bhurisarbaka ṭhāru ẏesaneka dr̥ta bākyaśuṇi
tahuṁ caḷigale yujheṣṭhi deba nr̥pamaṇi | 69 |
bināśa kāḷe dekha nāśanta buddhi mora
rājya gcchara pāiṁta hoiba samara | 70 |
mane bichāanti karme mo yāhā acchi
bidhātā āṇi tāhā mote baḷe ghaṭāucchi | 71 |
bho bidhātā puruṣa muṁ lagaiṁ paẏare
thare basatu ho mānagobinda kaṇṭhare | 72 |
kaṇakalpe deu paḍā ye khaṇḍiẏe
nohu nohu yuddha c bonṅaśa heba ṣaẏe | 73 |
māṇagobindaku māgibi muṁ grāma
na kari nāstiṭi bolanti dharma, dharma | 74 |
ẏemanta bicharante bheṭile rāẏeguru śalya
bijaẏe bhīrata yudhare bhīrei mahāmalla | 75 |

div.note: lagaiṁ–oḷagai |
kaṇalpe–kāṇichaẏe bā aḷpa parimāṇe |

lg.l: sākalya maṇḍaḷara se aṭanti adhipati
tāhāṁka caraṇe pujā kale dharmarāẏe nr̥pati | 76 |
śalye boile re bābu parama kalyāṇa hou
pañchu kaṭake rājā hua sabu śatr̥ ṣaẏe yāu | 77 |
śalyaṁka bacane bolanti pujheṣṭhideba dhātikāre uṭhi
tote kemante jiṇimi muṁ ṣatriẏe jagajjeṭhī | 78 |
tuṁpuṇa aṭu mora sahodra mauḷā
mādrīṁkara brātha paṇḍuṁkara śaḷā | 79 |
bho mātuḷa ṣatriẏa baḷabanta tote nāhiṁ samasari
tohora dhanu dhaile trāsa karanti deba hari | 80 |
īśvara kubeta surapati tote sari nohanti hāde yuddhe
muhiṁ kemante tote jiṇimi raṇa maddhe | 81 |
ẏe kauraba baḷaku muṁ bujhai gcchagaḷa pala
tu se raṣa pāḷeka rāẏe guru śalya | 82 |
muhiṁ se siṁgha kaurabe aṭanti ajāpūtha
tu ye raṣāpāḷaka hoi rahiacchu ẏetha | 83 |
tu mohora mātuḷa muṁ tora bhignijā
mohora thāṭhe ẏebe yibā chala debarājā | 84 |
mohora thāṭhe ẏebe hoa tumbhe rājā
pāñcha bhāi āmbhe tote karibu pādapūjā | 85 |
śalye boile bābu re nohai ẏemanta
ẏe asamaẏa kāḷe prāṇīṁki gcchaḍibā nohai bihita | 86 |
muṁ yebe kurupatiki gcchaḍibaiṁ ẏetebeḷe
dharma gacchiba ki ẏe mahī maṇḍaḷe | 87 |

div.note:
{śalya boile bābu parama kalyāṇa hoasi |
śatr̥ māri pañchu kaṭake aiśuryya bhmañjasi | (jha,ka,ṅa,gha,ṭa,ṛha)}
māhrīṁkara bhrītha aśvinī kumāraṁkara śiḷā | (bahu pāṭha)

lg.l: śalye bāile bobu na kara kicchi cintā
āmbhe kahuacchuṁ śuṇa ādi antara bāratā | 88 |
kheḷūthiluṁ huḍa kari bāḷūta kutūhoḷe
mahātīrtha ye citropiḷā nadīra kūḷe | 89 |
phimpi mārante se nadī hoẏe pāri
phiṁmpi phuṭai ye triśākhā nāme giri | 90 |
ẏesana sādhana mora bāḷta kāḷahuṁ
anuṣṭup boḷi rūṣiẏeka mahāprahu | 91 |
se triśākhā sac bonṅatara uttara kaigcchaḍe
anuṣṭup rūṣi tapa karantu ati gāte br̥ṣamūḷe sañpoḍe | 92 |
phimpi māili nadī daṣiṇa āḍu uttara kūḷakaiṁ
giri phuṭi rūṣara dehe nikiḷilā yāiṁ | 93 |
uttānaśāẏī hoiṇa paḍile brahmacharī
rūṣiṁkara dehu rudhira bahe nadī yāẏe pūri | 94 |
dekhiṇa āśriye ḍeiṁ gali se nadī goṭi
rūṣiṁka deharu ye rudhira bahe phuṭi | 95 |
aneka baikulya muṁ hoiḷi tāhā chahiṁ
rūṣi boile bābu mohora bartti nāhiṁ | 96 |
muhiṁ ye boiḷi svāmī muṁ brahmahatyā doṣī
ẏethaku bho muni mote kāraṇa kahasi | 97 |
anuṣṭup boile bhīratha yuddhara samare
tuhi senāpati hoibu kauraba thāṭhare | 98 |
aṣṭādaśa dina ye hoiba mahāyuddha
yujheṣṭhiṁka kopante tu naśibu raṇamaddha | 99 |

div.note: ẏethaku mahātmā mote mukati gati kahasi | (gha,ṛha,ṇa)
yujheṣṭhiṁka hāthe tu hoibuṁ prāṇe badha | (gha,jha,ñja,tha,na,)

lg.l: brahmahatyā doṣa tora ẏeṇu yiba pāra
ẏe nyāẏaṁ kari bhīratha yuddhe mote acchiṭi pratikāra | 100 |
tu ẏehā kicchi bichara na kara mahīpāḷe
mohora kāryye muhiṁ paśili mahāre?ḷe | 101 |
samare muhiṁ ye nāśa yibaiṁ tohora yoge
brahmahatyā doṣa pāri kari basibaiṁ amara svarge | 102 |
śalye boile mohora kathāku na bhīḷa yujheṣṭhi
kāhāri kārrya nohai ẏe mohora kārrya heṭi | 103 |
yujheṣṭhi parama sānanda śalyaṁka bacane
tahuṁ yāiṁ bije kale hroṇaṁka sannadhāne | 104 |
bhīradvādaśaṁka nandana kaicchā jagajjeṭhī
pādārgha deiṇa praṇamita karinti droṇaṁku yujheṣṭhi | 105 |
droṇe boile tote parama kalyāṇa hou
bidyālābha hou tora śatr̥ ṣaẏe yāu | 106 |
muṁ ye guru āmbhara āiṣa gheni brata
śatr̥ māri pañchukaṭake dharāa daṇḍacchatra | 107 |
yujheṣṭhi boile tumbhe mohora parama guru
ẏesaneka kalyāṇa yebe ailā tumbhara śrīmukharuṁ | 108 |
tote jiṇimāku āmbhe nohu sāmaratha
tohora bidyāre sinā āmbhe bolāi baḷabanta | 109 |
tuta āborilu ẏebe kaurabamānaṁku
tote jiṇile sinā prāpata rājya muku | 110 |
tumbhanta kemante ho jiṇimi guru droṇa
tebe se prāpata hoiba tumbhara kalyāṇa | 111 |

div.note: mohora kāryya muhiṁṭi acchaiṁ kurubaḷe | (jha,ñja,tha,na

{tote jiṇimāku muhiṁ nohai sāmarathā
tohora bidyāre muhiṁ aṭai śakatā | (gha,kha,ṭha)}

lg.l: droṇe boile mohora hāthe śahasra thile
jiṇantā nāhiṁ brahmā īśvara hoile | 112 |
mote śahasra cchaḍāi kehi yebe pāri
tebe se ātmā mohora hoiba apahāri | 113 |
yujheṣṭha boile tu daṇḍe na gcchaḍibu dhanuśara
dibārātre dhanu thāi tumbhara hāthara | 114 |
droṇe boile ramaṇa snāna bhojanara beḷe
putra aśastamā bhmaje bīra neta bādhai
se putra hataboḷi śuṇile śasra muṁ gcchaḍai | 115 |
tu mote yebe māripāribu ẏeheneka chāribeḷe
nohile mohora mr̥tu nāhiṁṭi kahili dharmabāḷe | 116 |
ramaṇabeḷe māile liṅgabhagna doṣa
taraṇa pramāṇe yama kāṭai tāra māṁsa | 117 |
ramaṇabeḷe māile liṅgabhagna doṣa
tiraṇa pramāṇe yama kāṭai tāra māṁsa | 118 |
srāhānara beḷe yebe māriba brāhmaṇa
koṭiẏe yuga thiba se rauraba narkeṇa | 119 |
bhojanara beḷe yebe māriba nirāśi
brahmahatyā pātekī ye hoiba mahādoṣī | 120 |
bābu aśastamā trijībī se na mare kebehe
nāhiṁṭi jiṇantā mote kahili sandehe | 121 |
yujheṣṭhira haraṣa pāiṇa mr̥tubheda
aśastamā hate droṇaṁku paḍiba pramāda | 122 |
ẏehā śuṇi yujheṣṭhira tahuṁ caḷigale
aneka kalyāṇa kale maharuṣi deba svāmī | 123 |
aśastamā caraṇe ye yujheṣṭhi pariṇāmi
aneka kalyāṇa kale maharuṣi deba svāmī | 124 |
lg.note: nāhiṁṭi jiṇantā mote kahili saẏaḷe | (tha,ñja)
lg.l: aśastamā boile āẏaṣa bardhuta ye hou
śatr̥ māri rājyakara tote jiṇantā kehi nohu | 125 |
bābu śatr̥māri pañchukaṭake hoa tumbhe rājā
pr̥thīre śreṣṭha hoa tu mahata biḍojā | 126 |
yujheṣṭhi boile yebe anugraha kalu mote
ẏe kuru sāgare tote muṁ jiṇimi kemante | 127 |
kaḷpa kāyā yoddhā aṭutu ṣatriẏa trijībī
tote na jiṇile kejne rājya muṁ pāibi | 128 |
aśastāmā boile jagannāthe yāra sakhā
jāṇi kurupatiki hari kaleṇi nirekhā | 129 |
mote kurupati yebe karantā senāpati
ẏetebeḷa parinte thāānta ki brati | 130 |
driyodhana boilā tu maraṇaku bhaẏe kalu
cchatrī hoi nisate trijībī bara ye māgilu | 131 |
kaicchābanta rājā se māna ye gobinda
mote senāpati se na kalā duṣṭa manda | 132 |
bāu thile thiḷi gale gali ye mohora icchā
pañchukaṭaka bhogakara tora pūru manobāñchā | 133 |
aśastamāṁka pāśe acchantu kr̥pāchāryya
tāhānta praṇapatya yujheṣṭhi rājā debe | 134 |
kr̥pe kalyāṇa kale pūruṁ to manobāñchā
śatr̥ māri ẏe pañchu kaṭaka śubhe kara raṣā | 135 |
yajheṣṭhi boile tumbhe sugyaṁ brāhmaṇa hoi
samare paśila kampe śrībatsa cihna bahi | 136 |
lg.note: tote na jiṇile kehne ẏekacchatrī hoibi | (gha,jha,ṭa,ṭha)

{aśastamā boile jagannāthe yāra sāhā
jāṇi nārāẏaṇa niśodhana kalāni tāhā | (gha,ṭa,ḍa)}
lg.l: biśeṣe droṇaṁka śaḷā tumbhe āmbhara mauḷā
chāri beda cchaḍa śāsre mantreṇa achārgaḷā | 137 |
śasra dhari samare paśile ẏeṇe deba baḍa doṣa
tumbhanta nāśa kale apāra apayaśa | 138 |
kr̥pe boile bābu tumbhe ye brāhmaṇa
byāsaṁkara nāti tumbhe aṭa ye āpaṇa | 139 |
somabaṁśa tumbhara aṭanti rājarūṣi
brāhmaṇa hoi tumbhe sāṁgrāme kimpe paśi | 140 |
ādi cchatrī brāhmaṇa ye aṭanti deba praśurāme
ẏekabiṁśa bāra cchatrīṁki māile sañgrāme | 141 |
chāri digara chatrī māri hoile madārājā
dharma baḷeṇa sehu ye pāḷile jana prajā | 142 |
ẏesaneka bacana kahile brahma kr̥pe
āmbhanta cintā na kara tumbhe yujheṣṭhi deba nr̥pe | 143 |
samara bhūmi bābu re aṭai yagyaṁ scchāna
ẏethaku āchāryya āmbhe brahmā bidyamāna | 144 |
ẏethakaiṁ cintā na kara ho dharma rāẏe
prāṇī nāśa yāānti ki dhoṇḍoa sarpa ghāẏe | 145 |
kr̥paku tejyā kari caḷanti yujheṣṭhi |
kareṇa argha gheni karṇṇaku yāiṁ bheṭi | 146 |
pādārgha deiṇa ye binaẏa bhagati
karṇṇa rājā kalyāṇa kalā yathā ye yugati | 147 |
dhana godhana suta āṣya bardhuta ye hou
pañchu kaṭake cchatra dharāa śatr̥ ṣaẏe yāu | 148 |
badaẏanti dharma nandana mahāgyāṁtā
kointāṁkara ye jyeṣṭhi tanaẏe tu āmbhara sama pitā | 149 |
āmbhara thāṭhaku āsi bijekara debasvāmī
pañcha bhrātha thibuṁ tora caraṇe pariṇāmi | 150 |
āmbhara thāṭhare tu hoasi deba rājā
laṣeka nr̥pati tumbhanta karibe pāda pūjā | 151 |
śrīhari samāne bhogakara ẏe sampada
kaureba baḷe thile tumbhanta paḍiba paramāda | 152 |
karṇṇa boilā muṁ jāṇaiṁni ẏemāna
sac bonṅadākāḷe kaurobe tote nuhaṁnti samāna | 153 |
bābu rādheba pratipālilā mote agyāṁna bāḷakāḷe
mānagobinda maitra mora hoilā śiśukāḷe | 154 |
bābu re na jāṇai pitā ye na jāṇaiṁ mātā
driyodhana rājā mora iṣṭa ye debatā | 155 |
bhīṣma droṇa bhūrisarba ẏe acchanti yadyapi
mohora bāhāku āśa karicchi adyāpi | 156 |
śuṇi kisa kahibe mote nr̥pati samasta
samara beḷe karṇṇa ye hoilā nisata | 157 |
ādyahuṁ āśa kari acchi se mora bāhāku
dharmahiṁ gacchiba ki upeṣā kale tāku | 158 |
brāhmaṇa hoiṇa yebe jaḷaku karai bhaẏe
starī hoi yebe agnirena samarpai kāẏe | 159 |
cchatrī hoiṇa yebe sāṁgrāmaku bhaẏe kari
ẏeteka loka amoṣa huanti ye na pānti svargapu??rī | 160 |
ẏehā śuṇi pujheṣṭhi stuti kale ākāśaku dekhi
candra sūryya daśa digapāḷe hoibā mote sāṣī | 161 |
sahodra gcchaḍi samare paśilā bīra karṇṇa
dharma tejyā kalā ẏehāra buḍilā yahuṁgyāṁna | 162 |
lg.note:
{atianta śāsti kaṣṭa āmbhe pāilu birāṭe
gopya teji ailu ẏece tohora nikaṭe | (ka,ṭa,gha)

{sodarimā paṇa na pāḷile bīra karṇṇa
samare paśileṭi hoiba sañchaẏe nidhana | (ṭa,ṭha)
lg.l: ẏehuṁ nirāśa kalā bīra karṇṇa senāpati
bije dharanandaa yāiṁ driyodhana kati | 163 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa śateyutra gheni bije mantrī ye śakuni
yujheṣṭhibijaẏe yāiṁ ẏemantara samaẏe kare jaẏemāḷā gheni |
pitā dhr̥tirāṣṭaṁka sannidhe deiṇa pādya arghya
binaẏa bhāba hoiṇa pitāṁkara paḍile pādalāga | 164 |
parama kalyāṇa ye bāñchanti dhr̥rāṣṭa
kalyāṇa hoa manobāñchā hou parāpata | 166 |
badaẏanti yujheṣṭi śuṇa deba putā
muhiṁ tohora nandana sac bonṅadā bhacatā | 167 |
aneka daita tāta māilu ghora bane
dugati bañchilu ye tohora parasane | 168 |
atianta kaṣṭa muṁ ye pāili matsadeśe
agyāṁta banabāsa sāri ailuṁ tora pāśe | 169 |
ẏe tora nandana māna ye gobinda
sodaranta na sambhāḷi bhiāicchi dvanda | 170 |
indraprasta yamaprasta hastinā jaintā bāruṇā
ẏe pañchu rājya tāta jamvu dvīpaku dhāraṇā | 171 |
ẏethuṁ māgiḷi muṁ pañchukhaṇḍi paḍā
nirāśa kalā mote se mānagobinda mahābīrā | 172 |
dhaumya purohite ye śrīhari bidure sañjaẏe
madhyapātra ẏemānanta muṁ kali debarāẏe | 173 |
ẏemānaṁka bola meṇṭi lā māna ye gobinda
dharma tejiṇa se icchi lāka dvanda | 174 |
lg.note:
{atianta śāsti kaṣṭa āmbhe pāilu birāṭe
gopya teji ailu ẏece tohora nikaṭe | (ka,ṭa,gha)}
dharmabāṭa gcchaḍilā tāta aśre kalā dvanda | (ka,ṭa)
lg.l: bhe tāta nicaẏe somac bonṅaśaku gcchaḍilāka dharma
prānta kāḷaku āsiṇa hoilā sāṁgrāma | 175 |
c bonṅaśa nāśa kathāku paśilu deba tāta
tohora thāānte āmbhe bhiāilu ẏeḍeka anartha | 176 |
yujheṣṭha boile tāta ẏebeheṁ kahani buddhi
pramāda na paḍu tāta kathāẏe kara sadha | 177 |
yujheṣṭhiṁka bacane dhr̥tirāṣṭa kicchihiṁ bacana na bhāṣi
tuhuṁ driyodhana āpaṇe bacana prakāśi | 178 |
āho yujheṣṭhi ādyahuṁ kimpe na samarpilu dui rāśi
bahuta dharma nāśa kalu manda kr̥tyanta aryāsi | 179 |
bahuta tīrtha bulilu rūṣamānaṁkara saṅge
asambhāḷa kari manda cintilu ati bege
baddha ta dharma nāśa karicchu kiñchita bairāge | 180 |
rāga sañgrahaṇa kiṁke na kalu bābu |
brahmachāṇḍāḷa ki ẏekatya maṇu sabu | 181 |
aneka tiārilu semānaṁkara tule
dharma pratipāḷilu paṇilu śatr̥ meḷe | 182 |
ẏebe duṣṭaṁkara saṅge hoilu āsi prīti
ṭasakara tule ki sādhuṁkara śuddha mati | 183 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile śuṇa bābu mānacatrabratī
tu mohora sodara muṁ tote hoili abhyarthī | 184 |
paḍā pāñchakhaṇḍa mote dia ho kurupati
lodha kadha mahlāra śabara pacchake hou kati | 185 |
āho mānagobinda kiñchita kari paḍā pāñchakhaṇḍi pāile
tohora mohora bhāinta prītire dina piba bhale | 186 |

div.note:
{yujheṣṭhiṁki dhr̥tirāṣṭa aneka bākya bhāṣi |
āho yujheṣṭhi ādyahuṁ tote muṁ samarpili duirāśi | (ṭa,ṅa,ga,ccha,dha}

lg.l: kurupati bolai ho mote tu na bola ẏemāna
binā yudhe tote muṁ na diai ẏeka grāma | 187 |
yuṇa mānagobindaku bacana prakāśanti konte
paḍā chārikhaṇḍi bābu deu kinā mote | 188 |
badanti mānagobinda śuṇa he yujheṣṭhi
sāṁgrāma nohile na diai ẏena grāma goṭi | 189 |
puṇa puṇa yujheṣṭhi deba bahuta kārpuṇyare bacana prakāśi
bābu tohora mohora dvanda nohu paḍā tinikhaṇḍa desi | 190 |
tote aprāñjaẏe mote hoiba baḍa byathā
mote aprāñjaẏe tote ayaśa sac bonṅathā | 191 |
driyodhana boilā ye samara nohile
sūra mune pr̥thī nohai mora bole | 192 |
yujheṣṭhi bolile muhiṁ pr̥thīki dhāraṇa
ẏe pr̥thīpāka muhiṁ karai raṣaṇa | 193 |
driyodhana boilā ye samara nohile
grāmaru arddheka nei nuāru mohora na boile | 194 |
yujheṣṭha boile tu sodara mora hāde
prārthanā nimante paḍā khaṇḍe mote de de | 195 |
mānagobinda boilā ho samara na kale
sūcimūne dei nohai tohora bole | 196 |
yujheṣṭhi deba puṇa bacana prakāśi
sodara nimante mote paḍā khaṇḍiẏe desi | 197 |
mānagobinda boilā sūci mūnara arddha yete
samara na kale muṁ na diai kadācite | 198 |
yujheṣṭhi boile kuṭa mva rakhibāku yebe buddhi
uibāca hoilā ẏebe kathā hou sādhi | 199 |

div.note: aprāñjaẏe–parājaẏa arthare |
kathā hou "sādhi" scchānare "saddhi" pāṭha acchi |

lg.l: driyodhana boilā samaraku yadi hoilu nisata
dantare tiraṇa gheni śaraṇa paśa pañchubhrātha | 200 |
tebe ẏe pañchukaṭake hoasi ādhipati
śatebhāi gheni banaste paśibi ye mohora satya satya | 201 |
tu madhu piṅgaḷa karkaśa aṭu manda jāti
kuḷaṣaẏe mantrī tule batāilu prīti | 202 |
mānagobinda boilā śuṇasi yujheṣṭhi
bāchā dr̥ṛha mora muṁ kaicchā jagajjeṭhī | 203 |
āho nārāẏaṇa madhyapātra hoi aile yetebeḷe
dr̥ta bākya kari muṁ kahili sabhāscchaḷe | 204 |
yudha binā pr̥thī na diẏe sūci bhede
tihiṁka sāṣī hoiacchanti gobinde | 205 |
yujheṣṭhi debe śuṇi bacana parakāśi
samarakaiṁ ye icchākalu dharmakaiṁ nāśi | 206 |
driyodhana boilā tu jiṇimuṁ yebe mote
ẏekacchatrī hoibu tu ẏe pañchu praśaste | 207 |
muṁ yebe tumbhara pañchu bhāinta pārai māri
tebe pañchu kaṭake hoibi adhikārī | 208 |
yujheṣṭhi debe boile yebe ẏe tohora sata
sanya senāmānanta bāhāra kari dia samasta | 209 |
tohora mohora yebe hoibā bibādī
adoṣī lokanta kimpe samare hāde cchedi | 210 |
tumbhe śate bhrātha ubhāra kurupati
āmbhe ye pañchubhāi heu ẏekamūrtti | 211 |

div.note: tumbhe śate bhrātha katike hūa kurupati | (gha,ṅa)

lg.l: ābara adhu lokanta nāśibā kisa arthe
ẏete loka nāśaṁgata hoibe kemante | 212 |
tohora mohora yebe jiṇimā sañāgrāme
jāṇimā pāpa puṇya kāhāra udita dharma | 213 |
driyodhana boilā ho nohaiṭi ẏemanta
thāṭha sanya na thile yuddha nohai bihita | 214 |
mānagobinda tahuṁ yujheṣṭhi ẏesanekabākya śuṇi
uṭhile āstāna teji ye dharma nr̥pamaṇi | 215 |
āmbhe kuruṣetra madhye acchuṁ pete yodhī
muṁ kathāẏe pucchibi kahibā hou mote buddhi | 216 |
ẏeka pitā ẏeka mātāuṁ jāta paṇḍu dhr̥tirāṣṭe
tāhāṁkara nandana āmbhe abhinna ẏeka chāṭe | 217 |
yagate bhāga mote yogāi pañcha stalī
na dei mānagobinda mote ārambhilā kaḷi | 218 |
aneka yodhaẏe ye paḍibe ẏehu yuddhe
brāhmaṇa ādi kari paḍibeṭi raṇa madhye | 219 |
doṣī adoṣī ye aneka nāśayiba
ẏe hatyā doṣa yuṇa kāhāku lāgiba | 220 |
kauroba thāṭhare śubhīlāka śaṁkha dhuni
sahodra bhāiṁki bhāga na dilā kurumaṇi | 221 |
āho dharma nandana ye doṣa nāhiṁṭi tumbhaṁku
sañsāra jiṇilu tu dharma āśritaku | 222 |
ākāśaru bāṇī ye kaleka debaloke
sādhu sādhu yujheṣṭhi boli praśaṁsā kale br̥ndāarke | 223 |

div.note: āho kuruṣetra madhye acchuṁ yete yodhī | (ṅa,ḍha,tha)
kauraba thāṭhare ye śubhīlā mukhadhuni | (ka,gha,ñja,na)
āge ye dvandakalā doṣa lāgiba tāhāku | (ṅa,ccha,jha)

lg.l: kaureba thāṭhe yujheṣṭhi ye toḷile beni bhmaja
accha tumbhe ye samasta deśara mahārāj | 224 |
riyodhana rājā ye upeṣā kalā dharma
mote bhāga na dei icchilā sāṁgrāma | 225 |
beni thāṭhare mote na paḍu manda bāci
apabāda mote na debā kehi kicchi | 226 |
driyodhana thāṭhe na āa yāra jīranaku acchi āśa
dharma āśre kari mo bāhu taḷe śaraṇa āsi paśa | 228 |
dharma āśre kara jībanaku acchi yāhāra kāryya
ẏete boli yujheṣṭhi toḷile beni bhmaja | 229 –1450 |

div.head: {@durddaṣa śaraṇa@}

lg.l: durddaṣa boli kari driyodhanara sāna bratha
tini sahasta yoddhā ye gajā tini ahibrata | 1 |
driyodhanara thāṭhare se hoithilā āgiāṇi
yujheṣṭhiṁka bhmajataḷe śaraṇa paśilāka jāṇi | 2 |
dharmara nandana ye dekhi sānande kr̥ta kr̥ta
durddaṣa mastake yujheṣṭhideba dile pahmahātha | 3 |
yujheṣṭhi deba boile tora pūru manobāñchā
dhr̥tirāṣṭa kuḷe hoilu tu raṣā | 4 |

div.note:
{ohobaḷa thāṭha bhitare yujheṣṭhi yoḍile beni kara
accha tumbhe sanya senā aneka deśara nr̥pabara | (gha,ṭha,dha)}
{yujheṣṭhiṁki śaraṇa paṇilā jībanaku āśa jāṇi | (ṅa,jha)}

{dhr̥tirāṣṭa c bonṅaśaku bābu tuhi se kalu raṣā | (gha,jha,ṭha,ḍha)
dhr̥tirāṣṭa c bonṅaśare ye hoibu tu raṣā | (ñja,tha,na)}

lg.l: yetekāḷa paryyanta mora āṣya thiba bābu
benikuḷa madhe tu tri jībī hoibu | 5 |
dūreṇa dekhile pāṇḍaba baḷa senā
śatr̥jita śaraṇa pañjara boli rathe uḍāile bānā | 6 |
darpa maḷiṇa hoile kaureba saini
sādhu sādhu pāṇḍabe boli śibhilā mukhadhuni | 7 |
śakuni boilā ho śuṇimā mānacatrabratī
kemanta prāẏe maṇilu bhīi durddaṣara prakr̥ti | 8 |
siṁghaku gcchaḍi yāiṁ śrikāḷa āśre kalā
yuṣkariṇī pāiṁ se sāhera tejilā | 9 |
jāẏaśaṁkha śabada ye kaleka catrapāṇi
śuṇiṇa mānagobinda hr̥daẏa hoi hāṇi | 10 |
roṣabhare āgyāṁ dilāka śakuni
durddaṣaku goḍāi dharare ẏehiṣaṇi | 11 |
mantrīra bacane yoddhāẏe bege uṭhi
gaja konta nārāja kare asipatra pāṭhi | 12 |
yesaneke bārānidhi praḷaẏe uloḷi
durddaṣa māra boli dhāmanti śahasranta toḷi | 13 |
ratha gaja aśvadhāmanti ye ẏekamukhe
durddaṣa yujheṣṭhiṁki beṛhile yoddā laṣe | 14 |
dūreṇa dekhilā rājāmānacatrabratī
yujheṣṭhiṁki māra boli ḍākilā kurupati | 15 |
bekhiṇa āśriya ye hoile dharmarāẏe
bāraṇa bola na meṇṭili paḍilā apacaẏe | 16 |

div.note: sādhu sādhu pāṇḍabe boli śubhilā śaṅgadhuni | (ṭa,tha,ñja)
gajabr̥nda tejilā śri kāḷabr̥nda āśre kalā | (ta,ca)
śrikāḷa–śr̥gāḷa, 9|2 sāhera–sāgara |
ḍiloḷi–ulloḷi, baḍa ḍheu uṭhibā |

lg.l: sādhu re bhīmā mote bārilu āsante
murkha boḷi muṁ ye abagyāṁ kali tote | 17 |
āhe budhajane jyeṣṭha hou ki kaniṣṭha hou
bāraṇa bola meṇṭile apabāda paḍai ḍhahuṁ | 18 |
yujheṣṭhiṁki birasa dekhi gādhārīra batsi
mohora āthānte tumbhara kāhāu bhaẏe acchi | 19 |
gādhārī nandana ye kare dhanu dhari
kauroba thāṭhaku dhamaiṁ āga sari | 20 |
tuleṇa acchanti tāhāra tini acibrata yodhī
ẏekamukha hoiṇa se abicchanne bāṇa bidhi | 21 |
yujheṣṭhi deba sumaraṇā kale śrī sac bonṅa maṅgaḷe
tu mote prasanna hoasi ẏetebeḷe | 22 |
jaẏa jaẏa hiraṇya nisūdana kāmāṣī
praḷaẏa uddhāraṇī mā go tuhi se sac bonṅa sāṣī | 23 |
maḷaẏa basanta pabana rucira śarada śaiḷa
tribhmbane bijaẏa go karu sac bonṅakāḷa | 24 |
ḍāji umvaru śabade mā go sac bonṅadā mati bhoḷa
siṁgh piṭhire bijaẏe karu sac bonṅakāḷa | 25 |
parama sādhabī go paradukhe dukhī
tohora prasanne sinā bratanti nirimākhī | 26 |
parama māheśvarī mā go prasanne hiṅgaḷā
sac bonṅasiddha kara mā go tu ye sac bonṅa maṅgaḷā | 27 |
jagata jana tāreṇī go bhagata jana bandanī
mahābhaẏa nibāriṇī go durgati nāśinī | 28 |

div.note: jaureba thāṭhaku dhāmaiṁ yesane bitramakeśarī | (ṅa,ccha,jha,)

{jagata jana mohinī bhagata jana mana rañji |
saṁkaṭa tāriṇī go durānteka baḷagañji | (ka,ñja,ṭa,)}
rucira–manoñṅka,manohara, sundara |

lg.l: duṣṭa jana nisūdanī go sancchi jana pratipāḷi
paṇḍita janamānaṁkara hr̥daẏe puṣyāmāḷi | 29 |
samara sambharbe go mātaṅgī abhaẏā
saẏaḷa sañkaṭa pheḍu go mātaṅgī mahāmāẏā | 30 |
śrīcaṇḍī sāroḷā go jaṅkhera pura bāsī
durgati kāḷe pheḍu go moha kāḷaphāśi | 31 |
bhiṣuka nirdhana mā go yebaṇa dukhī jana
tohora prasanne kaṣṭa pāra yāiṭi bahana | 32 |
dhanajana sampada ye āṣya deu tuhi
tohora padmapāde yebaṇa jana dhyāẏi | 33 |

div.note: "paṇḍita janamānaṁkara hr̥daẏe puṣyamāḷi |" pāṭha pare ’gha’

lg.l: pothire adhika pāṭha:-
śaraṇa sambhāḷaṇī go mātaṅgī abhaẏe |
saẏaḷa jananī go pāḷeṇī mahāmāẏe |
śrīcaṇḍī sāroḷā go jaṅkhera pura bāsī
durgati kāḷe pheḍu go moha jaḷaphāśi |
ayutriki putra deu adhare cacchudāna
rājyakaṣṭa pheḍu go khaṇḍu apamāna |
brāgha dātaru mātā go neu pāri kari
bhīsilā bheḷā goṭi bāmakare dhari |
duba karu dāru go tr̥ṇa karu meru
apacaẏa kāḷe prāṇīki tuhi se uddharu |
kanakābatī pāṭaṇā candrabhīgā nadī tīra
se scchāna sukha dekhi ye basilu nirbhara |
mahā yogeśvarī go sac bonṅade maṅgaḷe
teṇa nāma goṭi go cintili muhiṁ bhale |
śrīcaṇḍī sāroḷā caraṇe muhiṁ dāsa
bolanti śūdramuni kabi sāroḷadāsa |
badaẏanti br̥dhakāḷe sāroḷa caṇḍī dāsa
śū dramuni sāroḷa dāsa janne janne abhyāsa | 34–1484 |
lg.head:
{@koraba baḷa saha durddaṣara yudda o tārāṣī
paṣīra ṛimva ghaṇṭataḷe raṣā@}
lg.l: śuṇa baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
śubha maṅgaḷa dekhile yujheṣṭhi nr̥pati | 1 |
sac bonṅa maṅgaḷā nāma yahuṁ hr̥dagate abhyāsi
jaẏa jaẏa śabada ye kale svargabāsī | 2 |
adabhūte śabada sahuṁ śubhilā huḷahuḷi
śribhmaje kanyāẏe gheniṇa ye arghyathāḷī | 3 |
śūnyeṇa uḍilā ye uddāḷeka paṣī
uttareṇa dekhile debī ye kāmāṣī | 4 |
ohobaḷa thāṭhare śubhalā śaṅgadhuni
yujheṣṭhi āgyāṁ dile uṭha re thāṭha gheni | 5 |
yujheṣṭhiṁka bacane durddaṣa kopa mana
saturi sahasra baḷa dhanu bahai gādhārī nandana | 6 |
troṇe śaṅgacilā paṣī nārāja tīṣamunā
bidhanteṇa giribara phuṭipānti sehnā | 7 |
aśi sahasra nārāja durddaṣa pūroi beni troṇe
kauroba thāṭhaku se ghoṭilā ẏekā jaṇe | 8 |
tini ahibrata yoddhā tāhāra piṭhi raṣā
pracaṇḍa baḷīra prāẏe diśai gādhārīra batsā | 9 |
lg.note: ohobaḷa thāṭhare śubhilā mukhadhuni | (kha,dha,ñja,)
bidhante giribara nikaḷanti paḍanti sanya sehnā (ṭa,gha)
lg.l: madanikā bibāde yehne askanda bikāśi
durddaṣara mahimā tesane parakāśi | 10 |
biddhile nārāja ye hoile ẏekamukha
aśi sahasra yodhā ye lāṁkiā teja tīkha | 11 |
karamaṇḍaḷa deśara rājā mādhaba ye sena
tāhāra tule maitra rājā driyodhana | 12 |
maitra badhāi hoicchi se prayāga baṭa tīrthe
pr̥thīre abhinna tāku na dekhai kurunāthe | 13 |
marbhmateka yoddhā ye catile mattanāga piṭhi
bāmakare asipatra ḍāhāṇa kare yāṭhi | 14 |
jaḷadhara se yehne bijuḷi teja jhaḷi
agnibāṇa nārāja māranti śīghre toḷi | 15 |
āgiaṇi thāṭhe mādhabasena nr̥pati
durddaṣara tuḷe samare miḷilā taḍati | 16 |
re re kāra śabade durddaṣa bīra uṭhi
mādhabasena rājāku prahāra kalā yāṭhi 17 |
se mādhabasena rājā ārehi thilā lohita barṇṇa gaje
kaṇaẏa bhūṣaṇa śarīre ḍāḷimvā | chāmara tihiṁ sāje | 18 |
se gaja kumbha sthaḷare paḍilā tīṣa munā
ẏekā prahārake paḍile māhunta gaja sehnā | 19 |
bhuja darpe karīki toḷilā antarīṣe
kurāḷa catra prāẏeka bulāilā prataṣe | 20 |
mādhabasena dekhilā durddaṣara mahimā
dekhi āśriya hoile bhīṣma droṇa kr̥pabrahmi | 21 |
lg.note:
(karṇṇa mantaḷa, kaṇḍaḷa deśa, kauṇḍaḷa, kanāuja prabhiti deśa-
mānaṅkara nāma pāṭhāntara acchi |)
lg.l: 21|1 ohobaḷa thāṭhe dekhile durddaṣara māhimā | (gha,ṅa,ccha,jha, ḍa)
antarīcche gadā dhari se uṭhilā gaḷagāji
kurupatira yoddhāẏe dekhi paḷāile bhīñji | 22 |
mādhabasena rājā catithilā yebaṇa matta hāthī
se hāthīki durddaṣa phiṅgi dilāka taḍati | 23 |
bulāi phiṅgi dilā gaja māhunta sahite
mānagobinda gcchamure yāiṁ paḍīlā naranāthe | 24 |
dekhiṇa bismaẏe hoilā kurupati
sodara chaḍi śatr̥re śaraṇa paśilu tohora mandagati | 25 |
buḍi na malu kimpe tuhi re kuḷamalla
durddaṣa hoilā mora c bonṅaśaku hāde śala | 26 |
āho daiba boli se bolai kurupati
kāḷe sodara mote pāñchilā agati | 27 |
mote chaḍiṇa śatr̥re paśilu śaraṇa
baḷa bīyya mora ẏebe galā akāraṇa | 28 |
mohora kāryya arthe mitra mora malā
ẏekā hirddaṣa mote ẏeḍeka kr̥tya kalā | 29 |
aneka bisarile karṇṇa śakuni sahite
sahodara chaḍi śatr̥tahiṁ śaraṇa paśilā kemante | 30 |
śaraṇa paśiṇa kalā keḍe kr̥tye
bahuta jhiṁghāsa bacana bolanti samaste | 31 |
durddaṣara saini ye paśile gaḷagāji
mādhabasenara sanya pāḷāile bhīñji | 32 |
siṁgha dekhiṇa yehne paḷābanti gajayuthe
durddaṣara prahārante loṭanti gaja aśva rāute | 33 |

div.note: antarīṣe bulāi piṭilā gaḷagāji | (ṅa,ṭa,ḍha)
śala–bādhā, bighna,śatr̥,kaṇḍaka, aniṣa??jārī byakti |

lg.l: asambhāḷa hoiṇa ye paḷābanti saini
puṇihiṁ durddaṣa prahāre paḍile senāpati tini | 34 |
mādhabasenara putra jaẏe ye bijaẏe
ābara harihara boli beni ye tanaẏe | 35 |
ẏehu chārijaṇa aṭanti sahodara abhinne
bahuta samara kari se bidhale gahane | 36 |
durddaṣara mahimā ye ohobaḷe kahi
keśarī chamure kāhiṁ ye gaja yūthe rahi | 37 |
beni kunta dhari ye kulāi beni kare
dhātikāre piṭilā se duhiṁkari upare | 38 |
kunura bighāte se duhiṁkari kāẏe phuṭi
gaja māhunta yodhāẏe paḍile mahī loṭi | 39 |
puṇi prahārake ye paḍale harihara
beni śata yoddhā paḍile bāhāṁkari saṅgatara | 40 |
rudhire kardana hoilā sabuṁkari kāẏe
śarīra diśilā ye kiṁśuka yuṣya prāẏe | 41 |
baḍāi durāpada ẏe kaurac bonṅaka bhrātha
dec bonṅaku dulabha ẏe yebaṇa samara apramita | 42 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭara nandana dirddhaṣara dusaha ẏe kathā
dekhiṇa āśriya hoile svarge sakaḷa debatā | 43 |
pabana gati kari bidhante śara ghāẏe
paḍile mahīloṭi aneka deśa rāẏe | 44 |
saini bhagna dekhiṇa māna ye gobinda
bahuta bisarilā rājā kapāḷe kara dhinda | 45 |

div.note: dhinda,danda,dvanda prabhr̥ ti pāṭha acchi |

lg.l: prathama yuddhahuṁ aprāñjaẏe naśilā sac bonṅa kāryya
dharma apacaẏe hoilā mote āja | 46 |
prathama yuddha biartha dekhilā yahuṁ raṇe
aśilaṣa yoddā gheni uṭhilā āpaṇe | 47 |
durddaṣa sannidhe bijaẏe mānacatrabratī
āre āre sodara hoi mora, mote kalu ẏeteka anīti | 48 |
āja tora pāñji pocchilā nāśakara
iṣṭa debatā tora sumara re pāmara | 49 |
dirddaṣa boilā tumbhe paramānanda svāmī
somac bonṅaśa uddhāraṇa rājyaku kāreṇī | 50 |
yābata jībara jagannātha svāmīhiṁ se mūḷa
tāhāṁkara prasanne bratanti ẏe tini saẏaḷa | 51 |
pāṇḍaba kuḷaku se āboricchanti sabu |
śūrabanta hoiṇa tu kisa ye karibu | 52 |
kaṁsa keśī aṣṭamalla tule jārā nārakā nāśi
tāhāra tule kimpe bibāda kalusi | 53 |
śālu bajranābha hiraṇya hiraṇāṣa
rābaṇa kumbhakarṇṇa indrajita rāṣasa | 54 |
māẏāsura moḍhāsura ābara bailocana
aneka datya nāśi thāpile sanchajana | 55 |
rūṣiyañṅka raṣaṇe se nāma hr̥ṣīkeśi
yete asura nāśiḷe ke kahu biśeṣi | 56 |
ati senehe hari pāṇḍabanta ābori
ẏehāṁkara tule kinā tumbhe sañgrāma kari | 57 |

div.note: aprāñjaẏe–parājaẏa arthare praẏāga hoiacchi |

lg.l: arjunara kare tu śaṅga catra cihi dekha
dhvaje hanumanta yāhāṁkara sākha | 58 |
tetiśa koṭi debe acchanti yāhāra rathe
tu tāhāku jiṇimāku kebaṇa śakate | 59 |
ẏebeheṁ mohora kathā śuṇa driyodhana
pañchugrāma dei pāṇḍabanta karibā samādhāna | 60 |
jagannāthaṁku sebā ye karithābā śate bhāi
susteṇa thibā pañchu kaṭake rājā hoi | 61 |
yadyāpi pāṇḍibanta karibu āmbhe bibāda
aneka hatyā paḍiba tohora paramāda | 62 |
durddaṣa kahuṁ kahuṁ kopita mahārāẏe
kopeṇa garjai rāẏe mattanāga prāẏe | 63 |
tule mānagobindara daśalaṣa yodhī
dharma upeṣa dudda ṣaku ẏekamukhe śara biddhi | 64 |
dekha ho pratagyāṁ se durddaṣa śasradhārīra kathā
daśalaṣa yoddānta se ẏekā hoiacchi śakatā | 65 |
aneka śara ādhyāna karai kumara durddaṣa
bhājele kuruthāṭa hoiṇa nirekha | 66 |
samare goḷa yahuṁ bājilā cahaḷa
jagannāthe boile hanu,thāṭhe hoilā kisa goḷa | 67 |

div.note:
{arjunara hāthe muṁ śaṅgacatra dekhili
rathare basicchi hanumanta mahābaḷī (tha,dha,na)}

{arjuna rathe sārathi paṇe śaṅgacatra cihni dekha |
dhvaje hanumanta ye hoiacchi sāṣa | (jha,ḍha)}

{arjuna rathe sārathi paṇe śaṅgacatra cihna dekha |
dhvaje hanumanta ye hoiacchi sāṣa | (jha,ḍha)}

{60 {he svāmī muhiṁ tumbhanta ẏebe karuacchi daini
arddha gajya dei tāṁku karibā samādhāni | (ṭha,ḍha,ṅa)}}
kopeṇa garjai rājā śarada megha prāẏe | (tha,ñja,dha,na,)

lg.l: hanumanta boile deba gale ye yujheṣṭhi
thāṭha gheni tāṁku se betiacchi dhr̥tirāṣṭi | 68 |
baḍāi samareka deba houacchi ye goḷa
yujheṣṭhiṁki dhara dhara boli śubhmaacchi ye cahaḷa | 69 |
arjuna boilā deba śuṇimā gobinda
yujheṣṭhi deba ṭhākure hāde bahuta kale manda | 70 |
śarīra baikulya mora baḍāi biṣāda
sañchaẏe ṭhākuraṁku paḍilā paramāda | 71 |
svāmī tu mo rathe sārathi sac bonṅadā mote rakhi
tohora thāānte āmbhe hoibu nirimākhī | 72 |
tu deba jarujana sodara jagunāhā
bahana kari kuruthāṭhāku ratha mora bāhā | 73 |
sañsāra tāraṇa nātha ẏe saẏaḷa anādi
tohora thaānte yujheṣṭhi deba heucchanti bandī | 74 |
gobinde boile pātha nuhaiṭi ẏemanta
samaste abhinna tohora sodarare pātha | 75 |
bhīṣme tohora ajā droṇe tohora guru
śalya mātuḷa karṇṇa tohora bhrātha kimpe mane antara dharu | 76 |
kurupati bhāi tora śakuni mauḷā
aśastamā tora bhrātha kr̥peta droṇaṁkara śaḷā | 77 |
tume samasta abhinna aṭa ẏeka kāẏe
se kimpe yujheṣṭhiṁki cintabe apacaẏe | 78 |
arjuna boile deba śuṇimā hr̥ṣījkeśa
ẏe kaṭu bākye mote na kara jhiṁghāsa | 79 |
na puṇa yujheṣṭhiṁki nianti deba dhari
bega kari ratha mora bāhā kinā deba hari | 80 |
mahiṁ agyāṁne svāmī boiḷi na bichāri
kaurabe dharma āga laṁghile dvandaku icchā kari | 81 |
ẏebeheṁ samara karibaiṁ deba muhiṁ
māribi kaurobanta rakhantā kehi nāhiṁ | 82 |
arjuna mukharu ẏesaneka bākya śuṇi
pañchujanya śaṅga śabada kaleka catrapāṇi | 83 |
dhātikāre aśvanta ye chāḷile śrīraṅga
pabana gati hoiṇa uḍaḷe tucaṅga | 84 |
kurubaḷa sanya sāgara hāde boḷi
se sāgare bihaḍanti ki chāri aśva haṁsa paḷḷā | 85 |
nārāẏaṇaṁka āgyāṁẏe uḍanti haẏebara
mahā anaḷa jāṇi ye arjunara śarīra | 86 |
garjiṇa haẏebara kauraba thāṭhe paśi
nandighoṣa ratha bhīṣme ogāḷile āsi | 87 |
gobinde boile tu śuṇa brikodara
yujheṣṭhi debaṁku gheni āsa he dhātikāra | 88 |
śuṇiṇa praṇapatya karai bhīmasena
binaẏa bhikati hoi śrīhari caraṇa | 89 |
ẏeteka thāṭha beti acchanti deba hari
samasta māri āṇibiki yujheṣṭhi daṇḍadhārī | 90 |
svāmīra āgyāṁẏe caḷe kāḷadaṇḍa pāṇi
yojana bāhu prāẏe ṭekilā beni gadā gheni | 91 |
bāuna bāuna bhāra beni gadā hāthe
yesaneke mandara giri uṭhai praḷaẏa ante | 92 |
yesane nāśakara kāḷadaṇḍa gheni kare
tesanaka ārambha diśai brikodare | 93 |

div.note:
{yāare aśve boḷi āgyāṁ dile śrīraṅga
pabane bitrama hoi uṭhile turaṅga |(jha,ṭa)}
tu yāiṁ miśa yujheṣṭhi ṭhākuraṁka saṅgatara | (gha,jha,ḍha)

lg.l: kauroba thāṭhe yāiṁ paśai kopa mane
bhīmasena ḍākai kāhiṁ acchu kaḷiṅgasene | 94 |
mahāteja brikodara ghoṭilā baśvarūpa
dekhiṇa bhāñja lā ye kaurabaṁka darpa | 95 |
kāḷacatra prāẏeka bulāi beni ākhi
trāseṇa bhāñji le ye bhāmara bhīṣma rūpa dekhi | 96 |
aneka tola damā niśāṇa bīratūra bāje
kr̥tāntaka jāṇi brikodara thāṭhare yāiṁ bije | 97 |
dhānaiṁ māruti ye samare abhaẏā
raṇaraṅga dhandoḷe ghoṭilā tāra kāẏā | 98 |
samare paśilā ye nirddaẏā kāḷa yama
ratha gaja aśvanta dhari kachāḍai bīra bhima | 99 |
ohobaḷa madhye māruti dhariṇa maẏematti
antarīṣa mārge bulāi phiṅgi lā beni dantā | 100 |
raṇaraṁkā sohaḍa se kaicchā jagajeṭhī
beni gadā bulāi se rathare nei piṭi | 101 |
bhīñjanti ratha ye paḍanti paẏematti
kuruthāṭha manthibāku ẏekā bhīmasena śakatā | 102 |
kāuṁrī deśara ye kāmapāḷa nr̥pati
tāhāra tule cchanti tini sasra rathī | 103 |
ẏeteka yoddhā gheni nr̥pati kāmapāḷa
bhīmasena āge yāiṁ karai raṇagoḷa | 104 |
bhīmasena mūratiki jāhiṁnā sahantā
tāhāra gcchare miḷilā kāmāḷa mahārathā | 105 |

div.note:
{raṇa raṅga sohoḍa kaichā jagajeṭhī
beni gaja bulāi se rathare nei piṭi | (ka,jha,ñja,ṭa,ḍha,tha,na)}
kuru sāgara manthi bāku pāṇḍabeheṁ śakatā (ka,ṭa,)

lg.l: dhāmaiṁ pāṇḍaba sohoḍa kaurababaḷa dhvaṁsā
kāmapāḷa rājāku ye kiñchita aṭai bharasā | 106 |
dhāiṁṇa bhīmasena gadābara piṭi
kāmapāḷa nr̥pati ye paḍalā mahī leṭi | 107 |
kope prahāra kalā pāṇḍaba bajra muthe
guṇḍā hoigale māhunta gaja sahite | 108 |
rathe ratha nei bhīmasena kachāḍi
dekhiṇa sanya baḷa bhaẏe paḷāile apasari | 109 |
samare anibāraṇa se yebaṇa pāṇḍaba
daẏā sneha nāhiṁ tāra bhāca ye abhāba | 110 |
kaureba senāẏe samare mahābaḷī
bhīmasena upare piṭanti gadā toḷi | 111 |
biśeṣe brikodarara aṭai bajra bāma aṅga
paḍante mudugara gadā śūḷa guruja huanti sac bonṅa bhaṅga | 112 |
pādāgati brikodara mārai se yāhāku muthe
bhāñjiṇa guṇḍāẏe hoile sac bonṅa rathe | 113 |
bikaṭa daśana yahuṁ adhare bikāśi
narakeśarī rūpa prāẏeka bhīmasena prakāśi | 114 |
surasidha deśara rājā bitapāḷa
pāñcha sahasra yoddhā tule naba ṣauṇī baḷa | 115 |
bahuta pratagyāṁ se kariṇa mahābaḷī
daśa sahasra yoddhā gheni bhīmasenakaiṁ ogāḷi | 116 |
bahuta saini tāra na yāi kaḷaṇā
pr̥thī ghenimāku se samartha mahāraṇā | 117 |
yesaneke parabate diśanti baraṣāra kāḷe
sehimati diśai ratha māḷe māḷe | 118 |

div.note: kāma narapati kāhiṁ bhīmasena āge rahanti | (tha,pa,na)
sehi prakāra diśanti ratha gaja gahaḷe | (tha,ñja,na)

lg.l: gahaḷa dhandoḷa thāṭha se na yāi bāraṇa
ẏekā bhīmasenake hoilā bahuta āboraṇa | 119 |
bahuta sambhara se dekhiṇa brikodara
bhaẏa bhīti nāhiṁ tāra nikampa śarīra | 120 |
kopeṇa prahāra se karai māruti
ẏekā prahārake paḍile daśa biṁśa mahārathī | 121 |
puṇihiṁ prahāra karai bīra gadā toḷi
paḍia aneka ratha gaja yoddhā houcchanti dhūḷi | 122 |
raṇa raṅga dhandoḷa kalā pāṇḍaba baḷabantā
gcchamure rahibāku kehi nohile śakatā | 123 |
uṭhanti phuṭanti garajanta bhīñjanti sac bonṅa
ẏeka mukha hoiṇa nārājanta biddha | 124 |
abicchanne nārāja bidhanti mahāreṣe
jalūjuḷā poka prāẏe diśanta ākāśe | 125 |
loha śara prāẏeka diśai yāhāra remābaḷi
nārājamāna paḍiṇa ye houcchanti dhūḷi | 126 |
beḷa asta huante sanya pāile bimukha
bhāñjile durānteka baḷa hoiṇa nirekha | 127 |
kehi na rahile bhīmasenara āgara
beni bhāga hoileka kuru ye sāgara | 128 |
kāḷa rudra jāṇi se bhīmasena uṭhi
dhāmante bheṭilā yāiṁ dharma rāẏe yujheṣṭhi | 129 |
durddaṣara rathare bijaẏe dharmabāḷa
dhr̥tirāṣṭa nandana samara karai roḷā | 130 |
ujāṇi nagra rājā nāma ketumāḷi
daśa laṣa yoddhā gheni se yujheṣṭhiṁki ogāḷi | 131 |

div.note:
{beḷa udyāne bīre hoile bimukha |
paḷābanti sainamāne hoiṇa nirekha | (kha,ṅa,jha)}

lg.l: tāhāṁkara tule yudda karati durddaṣa saini
yjheṣṭhiṁki māra boḷi śubhai mukhadhuni | 132 |
dūreṇa dekhilā tāhā pāṇḍaba pañchāṇa
dhāiṇa māruti ogāḷilā tāra baḷa puṇa | 133 |
kr̥tāntaka rūpa dekhi nohanti kehi āga
bhāñjiṇa saini ye hoiḷe benibhāga | 134 |
ujāṇi deśara saini yujheṣṭhiṁki beṛhiṁthile
bhīmasena raḍi śuṇi sabhiẏeṁ paḷāile | 135 |
ohobaḷa thāṭhe māruti gaḷagāje
yujheṣṭhiṁ sannidhāne bhīmasena bije | 136 |
bīrabara sundara se bacana prakāśi
buḍāilu nā sampada sakaḷa dharma nāśi | 137 |
svāmī badhira śuṇai ki kamvu rasa bāṇī
taskara sabhīre ki dharma purāṇa bakhāṇi | 138 |
pādeṇa ṭāḷilu nātha arjilā sampradhi
naśanta kāḷaku kala biparīta buddhi | 139 |
karkaśa madhu piṅgaḷa rājā driyodhana manda jāti
karṇṇa śakuni tule dhuśāsana manda mati | 140 |
svāmī bāraṇa bola meṇṭi ailu naranāhā
puṇye tu uburilu dharma baḷa hoilā sāhā | 141 |
sañchaẏe rājya tu buḍāilu narapati
ẏekā durddaṣa raṣā kalā pāṇḍabaṁka bibhūti | 142 |
bodha manāiṇa ailu ho dharmarāẏe
manda kāḷara baśe paḍilā ẏeteka aprājaẏe | 143 |
bhīmasena pādataḷe durddaṣa pariṇāmi
bīrabara sohoḍa tu raṣā kara deba svāmī | 144 |

div.note: ẏekā durddaṣa rakhilā ẏe tora jībati | (ñja,tha,na)

lg.l: bhīmasena koḷa kari dhailā durddaṣaku
tu se uddārilu bābu dhr̥tirāṣṭa kuḷaku | 145 |
bābu tu daẏā kalu mote sodara bhība gheni
bhabiṣya bujhilu bābu beḷakāḷa jāṇi | 146 |
bābu āmbhara jībana thiba yete kāḷa pariyante
debe dānabe pramāda na cintibe tote | 147 |
durddaṣa boilā svāmī māḍi paḍuacchi driyodhanara thāṭha
ẏehānta bhīñji le se āmbhanta acchi bāṭa | 148 |
nārāẏaṇaṁka agrate kahanti binaẏe phālaguni
hari he mohora hr̥daẏa biṣāda kiṁke ṣpha rai caṣu beni | 149 |
locana prakharatā ye phurai ghana ghana
keuṇa utapāta paḍiba āja dina | 150 |
svāmī yujheṣṭhiṁki dhara boḷi śubhilāka goḷa
samaste thira hoileni nāhiṁta cahaḷa | 151 |
yadyapi bije kari galeṭi hīmasena
yujheṣṭhi na dekhile thira nohe mora mana | 152 |
svāmī bahana kari ratha mora bāhā hr̥ṣīkeśa
naẏane dekhile yujheṣṭha phaṭai hr̥daẏara prāsa | 153 |
bhīmasena ṭhākuraṁkara ta na śubhai mukhadhuni
ẏethu abā yujheṣṭhiṁki kaurobe gale gheni | 154 |
bega kari ratha mora bāhā nāroẏaṇa
kapaṭe durddaṣa na pr̥ṇa paśi thāi śaraṇa | 155 |
arjunara bacane deba cauhāthe
dhātikāre dhuāṁile nandighoṣa rathe | 156 |
ākāśagāmī gamanti sehu haẏebara chāri
thāṭhara bhitare ratha paśilā āga sari | 157 |
yesaneke ārata honti bāsabhagna pacchī
bhīñjile kauroba baḷa arjunaku dekhi | 158 |
bhīrābhara sañharaṇa yeuṇa jagannātha
sārathi paṇe rathe baje jagabhūta | 159 |
dutī jagannātha arjunara teja dekhi
bhīñjile kaureba baḷa bhaẏeṇa baḍa dukhī | 160 |
baḷa bhagna dekhi śāẏantanura bacchi
bijeketana rathe ār??hi acchanti gāṅgeba bīra cchatrī | 161 |
nandighoṣa ratha āsante ogāḷile gaṅgā debīra tunu
nau sahasra baḷara śrībhmaje ratna dhanu | 162 |
bhīṣme hāka dile kāhiṁji yāu re pātha
mohora gcchamureṇa āṇi ṭeka nandighoṣa ratha | 163 |
arjuna boilā tumbhe ye gūru parama guru
kehu sāmaratha hoiba ṭāḷibāku meru | 164 |
ohobaḷara sodara aṭa tumbhe gāṅgeba
tumbhara thāānte ẏekā sahodre upujai abhāba | 165 |
bhīṣme boile āpaṇāra kalā kr̥ta
tāhā se karma boḷi ḷihilā bidhāta | 166 |
arjuna boilā tāta ẏebe acchi buddha
hāde hatyā na paḍu samara kara sadha | 167 |
duddaṣa boḷi kari yujheṣṭhiṁki raṣākalā
bhīṣme boiḷe bābu samarahiṁ sarilā | 168 |
dharma laṁghi sahodre nāśibāka yāra buddhi
ābara kathā bābu kāhiṁ loḍu sadha | 169 |
bhīṣme boile sadhaki āśā na kara bābu
kebaṇa buddhire āmbhanta jaṇibu tāhiṁ se loḍuthibu sabu | 170 |

div.note: dutī jagannātha arjunara nandi ghoṣa ratha jyota dekhi | (ṅa,ṭha)
sañraṇa–saghuraṇa |

lg.l: āmbhe brata kalu karṇṇa aśastamāṁka jhiṁghāse
daśa sahasra rathī māribuṭi prati dibase | 171 |
bābu samare yebe badha kari pāribu mote pātha
tebe se āmbhara pūribanā satyabrata | 172 |
rathuṁ olāi āsai pāṇḍaba dhanañjaẏe
bhīṣmaṁkara caraṇe praṇapatya binaẏe | 173 |
badaẏanti gāṅgabe tohora pūru manobāñchā
ẏe pañchuscchaḷī bhoga kara ye tohora icchā | 174 |
gaṅgāra nandana ye parama kalyāṇa bhīṣi
bhīṣmaṁka mukha chāhiṁ arjuna bacana prakāśi | 175 |
svāmī praṇahuṁ adhika kari pāḷilu āmbhanta
tumbhanta māribāku kemante baḷiba āmbhacitta | 176 |

div.note: ’gha’ pothire–"ẏe pañchustha??ḷī bhogakara ye tohora icthā"

lg.l: pāṭha pare adhikā pāṭha:-
gaṅgāra nandana parama kaḷyāṇa bhīṣi
śatr̥māri nikaṇṭake rājya tu karasi |
riyu ṣaẏeyāu parama hou teja
diga dhabaḷi tumbhe bhmañja aiśuryya |
bhīṣmaṁkara bacane badanti arjuna
svāmī dhāryya hoibaṭiki ẏe tohora bacana |
mahatara bacana ye pāṣāṇa rekha gāra
naṭaḷai rekhā yehne bāchā ye tohora | (gha)
lg.note:
"svāmī prāṇahuṁ adhika kari pāḷiḷu āmbhanta" pare ’gha pothire
adhikā pāṭha |
lg.l: ẏebe nāśibu boḷi hoicchu upagati |
śahasra dhari ye niẏama kaḷu tuhi
māriba daśasahasra rathī dineka roṣa bahi |
ẏe bidhi daśadina karibu sāṁgrāma

mote kāhiṁ rājya prāpata hoiba gaṅgāranandan |
(abaśiṣṭa para pr̥ṣṭhāre)

div.note: olāi–ohḷāi |

lg.l: bhīṣme boile pātha ẏemanta nohoi
ẏetebeḷe bābu re ẏemāna na śohai | 177 |
sahodara māribāku yebe tohora nāhiṁ icchā
banabāsa teji jimpā rājya kalu manabāñcchā | 178 |
bhīṣme boile bābu kuḷe kaḷaṁka hoi abaśya thāi jaṇe
tāhāra doṣa sahibā aṭai hāde dharme | 179 |
paṇḍita hoi kari gcchaḍila tumbhe dharma
lobha ācaraṇe rañchila sañgrāma | 180 |
bhīṣme boile tu ye bādhaba krodhakārī
rājya apeṣā na kari ẏethu yāa yā apasari | 181 |
tebe se jāṇimānā tohora sohodarimā paṇa
tumbhara burdhire ye c bonṅaśa hoiba raṣaṇa | 182 |
arjuna boile svāmī hoilu āmbhe baḍa doṣī
paḍā khaṇḍiẏe na dei kimpe āmbhanta na poṣi | 183 |
bhīṣme boile bābu ẏe tohora nohoi kalā
ke dei malā ke na dei malā | 184 |
ke pāiṇa malā ke napāi malā
kehu dekhi malā kehu na dekhiṇa malā | 185 |
ẏe saneka nirbāṇa acchai hāde pūrbe
ke tāhā anyathā bābu kari pāribāka ẏebe | 186 |

div.note: pūc bonṅa pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara:-
tote jiṇimāku trailokye ṣama kāhiṁ
hoicchu amara tu icchāmr̥ta bahi |
tote samare kāhiṁ jiṇimā kaha sata
tote jiṇimāku mohora trodha citta |
poḍu poḍu sampatti nohu nohu ẏe rājya bhoga
sodara bināśibi yāhā hoibi rājya āga |

lg.l: āho dekhi malā kaṁsa na dekhi malā daśaratha
pūrbe śuṇiacchi ẏesaneka ukata | 187 |
dei malā baḷī na dei malā rābaṇa
na pāi kīcaka malā na dei mariba kururāṇa | 188 |
arjuna boile se na dei nāśayiba
kimbhuta kāraṇe ẏebe tumbhemāne mariba | 189 |
bhīṣme boile bābu āmbheta ẏehā jāṇu
bhīratha yuddhe āmbhe maribu boḷi śuṇu | 190 |
arjune bhīṣme ẏesaneka kathā honte
yujheṣṭhire gheni bhīma dhāmai ẏekā rathe | 191 |
bhīṣmaṁka tule acchi pāñcha ahibrata rathī
bhīmasena kachāḍi mārai sabunti | 192 |
paḷābanti saini ye hoiṇa nirekha
uisvare śabada śubhai bhīṣmadeba rakha rakha | 193 |
gobida boile pārtha tu kimpāi śara na bidhu
ābara pāṇḍabe kaurebe kāhiṁ badhu | 194 |
bhīṣme boile bābu śuṇasi re pātha
mānagobinde jiṇimāku ke acchi sāmaratha | 195 |
bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa śalya yāhāra se piṭhi
trailokya ẏeka hoile ke jiṇima dhr̥tirāṣṭi | 196 |
icchā mr̥tu bānā aṭai āmbhara
droṇaṁku ke jiṇima śahsra thile kara | 197 |
karṇṇaku ke jiṇaiṁ se aṭai ajaẏe
śalya śara bidhante pac bonṅata na rahe | 198 |
aśastamā nārāja pracaṇḍa hutāśa
amara bara tāhāku dile kamaḷa kośa | 199 |

div.note: bhīmasena ātreṣi teṇe piṭai sabunti | (ñja.tha,na)

lg.l: jadyaratha kathāta ati alokita
abhaẏe bara tāhāku dile śūḷa hasta | 200 |
muṇḍa kāṭile tāhāku nohiba maraṇa
kr̥ma bhūrisarbaẏe ye karibe mahāraṇa | 201 |
khac bonṅa khac bonṅa yoddhāẏe acchanti baḷīẏāra
saturi sahasra ẏeṭhi acchanti nr̥pabara | 202 |
nārāja baḷe jiṇi pāranti sidhu bāri
ke tāhāṁku pātha,samare jiṇi pāri | 203 |
arjuna boile sahasre bhīṣma dui sasra droṇa
chāri sahasra śalya āṭha sahasra karṇṇa | 204 |
ẏeteka tula hoi yebe kauroba thāṭha dekhi
tathāpi mānagobindaku na pāribe rakhi | 205 |
arjuna boile sahodramā paṇaku mora guru parama guru
niṭhara samara kale arjuna gcchamure ke śasra dharu | 206 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ reṣita se bīra phālaguni
bhīṣmaṁka uparaku ye pūroilā śahasra gheni | 207 |
kauśika mantreṇa se nārāja gheni saddha
namaskāra kariṇa se pañchubāṇa bidhi | 208 |
bhīṣmaṁka caraṇa taḷe paḍai pañchuśara
guru bandanā nimante ārādhai paẏara | 209 |
binaẏa bhāaba śara dekhiṇa gaṅgā śiṣa
pañchu nārāja gāṅgabe bidhile kariṇa āśiṣa | 210 |
arjuna mukhare cumvana dianti pañchubāṇa
kāḷabaśe uprodha chaḍile bhīṣmarāṇa | 211 |

div.note: bolūta uprodha gcchale bhīṣmarāṇa | (ñja,tha,na)

lg.l: kaṁka pacchī nārāja lohaśara tīkhamunā
trodhe biddhale bhīṣme arjunara sehnā | 212 |
garjiṇa nārāje ye āsucchanti āge
gobinde boile arjuna nibāra ẏehā bege | 213 |
tri śākhā nārāja pātha bidhilā śara tini
bhīṣmaṁkara sapata śara cchedilā phālaguni | 214 |
puṇa gāṅgabe mahābhīṣma rūpe byāpa
pañchabiṁśa nārāja pūrei bege ṣepi | 215 |
beluṁbeḷa gāṅgabe kopeṇa prajyaḷi
abiṣaṇe nārāja bidhanti jāḷābaḷī | 216 |
śāẏentanura nandana kaicchā jagajeṭhī
ghoṭile raṇaraṅge tuṣāra yehne br̥ṣṭa | 217 |
bhānumanta gotrī tārāṣī nāme pacchī
nandighoṣa rathe basi se samara dekhuacchi | 218 |
aṣṭādaśa dibasa mahābhāratha yudha dekhibāku
uḍai gagane se mahā mukata labhibāku | 219 |
bhīṣmaṁkara śara ghoṭai gagana pathe
nārāja paḍilā yāiṁ tārāṣī hr̥dagate | 220 |
nārāja paḍante se hoilā beniphāḷa
garbhare chāri ḍimve thile se??paḍile bhūmitaḷā | 221 |
kuruṣetra maṇḍaḷare beni thāṭha madhyabhūmi
tahiṁ paḍile se chāri ḍimve mahābrahmi | 222 |
bhīṣma arjunaṁkara gahina śaraghāte
paḍile yoddhāẏe gaja aśva rathe | 223 |
yamanika deśara rājā śibapāḷa nr̥pati
śveta mandara boḷi tāhāra bāhāna matta hāthī | 224 |
bhīṣmaṁkara thāṭhare se hoithilā āgiāṇi
marbhmateka mattanāga tāhāra thāṭha ye palāṇi | 225 |
kope ye bāṇa yuṇa bidhai bīra phālaguni
hāboḍā śare yoddhānta māilā kare gheni | 226 |
śibapāḷa nr̥pati paḍilā asāṣṭame
śveta mandara hāthī paḍilā matibhume | 227 |
se gajara ghaṇṭā dauḍi paḍilāka cchiḍi
se chāri ḍimvaku ghnaṇṭā paḍilāka māḍi | 228 |
se chāri ḍimvaku ghoṭilā gaja ghaṇṭā
majhere ābori basilā amvuniṣṭhā | 229 |
se ghaṇṭāku māḍi basilā śveta mandara mattahāthī
tāhāra upare paḍile rathī hāthī pādānti | 230 |
bhīratha yuddhakai se ādi īśāna
tārāṣī pacchīra ẏesaneka bidhāna | 231 |
agastiṁki pucchākale ye baibasuta manu
sañsārau parama gati mahābhīratha śuṇuṁ | 232 |
janne janne bhajiḷi tumbhara padmapāde
parama gati labhiḷi muṁ tumbha prasāde | 233 |
pitāmaha nandana tumbhe pratyaṣe brahmabetta
mahākaḷpa taru tumbhe durānteja mahāgyāṁtā | 234 |
praḷaẏa uddhāraṇa nātha kāḷakāma bhegi
jagujana jībana tu paramānanda yogī | 235 |
yaśobantī nanda tu mahā analūṁ abatari
śateka candra brataḷu sādhane yoga kari | 236 |
tohāra nābhiru nirjeta pañchughaṭa
ndrekaḷā kāma ananta ye ẏeka bāṭa | 237 |
āẏara jyota dhanu śasra śiśumanā
ẏekādaśa deba ẏe tora mukhare sādhanā |238 |
svāmī jāta anta madhya abasāna jāśu
praḷaẏeka hoile tu dibasa prāẏeka maṇu | 239 |
janne janne bhajiḷi muṁ tohora pahmapāde
parama gati pāiḷi muṁ tohora parasāde | 240 |
brahāra nāti tu prataṣe brahmabetta
mahattva kaḷpataru muṁ tote āśritā | 241 |
daśadvāra nirodha sādhiḷu brahmagyāṁna
praḷaẏa kāḷa tu deba bujhiḷu ẏekadina | 242 |
svāmī bāḷa arka prāẏeka birāje taba tanu
tohora ẏeka laẏake tuṭilā śatamanu | 243 |
yāhāra mahiṁmā svāmī kahante na sarai
muṁ kisa kahibi muni he mānaba deha bahi | 244 |
agastiṁkara caraṇe śaraṇ muṁ nitye
śūdramuni sāreḷa dāsa bhībai anubrate | 245 |–2729 |

div.head: {@bhīṣmaṅkara prathama dina yuddha o tārāṣī paṣī bbaraṇa@}

lg.l: baibasuta manu pachārile śuṇimā agastiẏe
ẏe chāriḍimva kathā ta baḍāi sandehe | 1 |
se tāgaṣī pacchī pūrbe kebaṇa aṭai
kebaṇa abhiśāpe bhāratha yuddhe peṭa tā phāṭai | 2 |
muni he ẏe kathā śuṇite mohora baḍa icchā
to mukhuṁ śuṇi mora pūru manabāñchā | 3 |
kahanti mahāmuni pitāmaha bāḷakhiḷā
śuṇa ho manu puruṣa tohora mati anargaḷā | 4 |

div.note: śūdramani sāroḷa dāsa caitana mahābhīrate | (ṅa,ṭa,gha)
śuṇa baibasuta manu se mahiṁmā anargaḷā | (ja,tha)

lg.l: satya yuge śvetakaḷpa boḷi ẏekai narendra
samaẏeke ākāśe se hoilā asakanda | 5 |
śutra boli kari ye tāhāra santati
padma hdvīpare se aṭai ādhipati | 6 |
baḍāi bikhyātase śutra nāme mahārājā
brahmabatī boḷi ye tāhāra bhīriyā | 7 |
patibhaktā stirī aṭai mahāsatī
daẏāẏe jagatabodhinī āchāreṇa satyabrati | 8 |
satyahuṁ mithyā se kahai sac bonṅa kāḷe
chāri putra upujile tā garbha maṇḍaḷe | 9 |
sāra, sura, sara, sia ẏehi chāribaḷā
parśu rāma sāriṣe tāhāṁka teja kr̥ṣṇa barṇṇa kaḷā | 10 |
śveta hīpa trauñcha dvīpa śākalya ye kuśa dvīpa
ẏe chāri dvīpe chāri bhāi hoileka nr̥pa | 11 |
padma dvīpe se ye śutra mahārājā
āpaṇā icchāẏe se pāḷai janaprajā | 12 |
śutra rājāra rājye janaprajā sukhī
subarṇṇara kaḷasa neta saburi pitāreṇa dekhi | 13 |
se mahārājyare samasteheṁ mahāchāṣī
ẏ yisa arjai se niai duirāśi | 14 |
thāṭha saina nāhiṁ se śutra rājā tule
ẏekeśvara pañchadvīpa raṣā karai se bhale | 15 |
ābharaṇa hoithāi se byāghracarma goṭāẏe
kaṇaẏa mr̥ga cchauṁrī kaṭire kāchāṭāẏe | 16 |

div.note: samaẏeke sarge se hoilā rāja indra | (cha,ñja,ḍha,tha)
parśurāma sāriṣe tāhāṁka teja barṇṇa kaḷā (ṅa,dha)
kr̥ṣṇājina mr̥ga gcchala tāhāra kaṭire kācchaṭāẏe | (tha,dha,na,ñja)
asakanda–indra |

lg.l: bhasma bilepana aṅge,māthe tāra ẏeka jaṭā
pañchadvīpakai tāra nārāja pāñchagoṭā | 17 |
ẏekā dibaseka nr̥pati pr̥thibī karai paẏāṇa
se padmadvīpara āẏatana ye pañchalaṣa yuṇa | 18 |
kanyāmāsa śukḷapaṣa paurṇṇamīra dina
ḷiā naṭīkāḷa ẏekābeḷe se karai bhojana | 19 |
bāhuḍi se dina paryyante se āhāra kari na thāi
bhaṇḍāra dhana pāda reṇu prāẏeka maṇaiṁ | 20 |
se padmadvīpa īśāna koṇe ude nāme giri
tahuṁ se bhīskara debatā udaẏe gagana bihārī | 21 |
se śutra rājāra teralaṣa pañchatiriśi sahasra aṁke
anusara boliṇa ẏeka samvatsareke | 22 |
se śrīdī kanyamāsa śukḷapaṣa paurṇṇamī
br̥haspati bāra aśvi nī naṣatra ye bhrarma | 23 |
taitiḷa nāme karaṇa āẏaṣmāna nāme yoga
sapata dibasa kanya sañkrāntiki ye bhoga | 24 |
se dina nr̥patira habiṣya pāraṇāra kāḷe
ati anīti hoilā pacchima samudrara kūḷe | 25 |
merunābhi khaṇḍare mandara boḷi grāma
baiśyānara boḷi ẏeka baśyara ye nāma | 26 |
se baiśyānara bhīriṣā nāma ye māḷatī
atianta sundarī svatī se svāmīre bhāgati | 27 |

div.note: dhanabhaṇḍāra sampada dvanda prāẏeka maṇaiṁ | (ka,jha,ṭa)
se śūtra rājāra tera sahasra, pañchatiriśa aṁke | (dha,ccha)
bhīnusara boliṇa ẏekai samvatsarekereke | (ka,gha,ta)
se dina nr̥patira hibirbhāga kāḷe | (ṅa,jha)
se baiśyānara bhīriyā nāma ye māḷābatī | (ṅa,ñja,dha,na)

lg.l: baiśyānara bhīriyāra pākāśudda kāḷe
snāna kari galā padmābatī tīrtha jaḷe | 28 |
snāhāna kari sāri se bāḷī bāhuḍi āsante
beḷa udyāna hoilā ye sadhyāra yugāte | 29 |
se padmābatī nādī tīrare śāhāḍā banikā
tahiṁra bhitare bāḷī gamana karai ẏekā | 30 |
biśikesana boḷi ẏekai śūdra jāti
baḷaktāre dhailā tāku prathama ghaḍi rāti | 31 |
peḷi pakāi tāku boilā ye māḷatī
śutra mahārājā rājye tora ẏeḍeka anīti | 32 |
puṇi sundarī ye abhībe tāku lecchi
tu mote dharu boḷi śutra mahārājā āna tote acchi | 33 |
biśikesana śūdra tāku baḷe dhari āṇi
madana āratuṁ mote rakha go sañghātuṇī | 34 |
se māḷatī śutra māhārājāṁka nāma dhari ḍākilā
boilā śutra mahārājā jībante nāhiṁ āja malā | 35 |
naṭīkāḷa khaṇḍaḷiā muāṁ ye goṭiẏe
kautuke bhejana karai śukra mahārāẏe | 36 |
udaẏa giri nikaṭuṁ padmatoḷā ghāṭa
chāḷiśa sahasra yojana dūra nikaṭa nuheṁ bāṭa | 37 |

div.note: baiśyānara bhāriyāra pākāpparśa kāḷe | (ñja,ṭha,tha,na)
baiśyānara bhāriyāra śuddha srāhānara kāḷe | (gha,ccha)
snāna kari galā padmatoḷā nadī kūḷe | (gha,jha,ṭa,ṭha,ṛha)

{se padmatoḷā kūḷe baḷī gamana karai ẏekā
matta gaja ṭhāṇi jāṇi caḷai se nāẏikā | (ṅa,jha,dha)}

lg.l: tete dūre paradārā haraṇa paḍilā
śutra mahārājāṁku se dr̥śahiṁ hoilā | 38 |
bhejanara beḷe rājā peṣilā śara goṭi
ke kāhāku baḷaktāre harucchi tāra indra pakā kāṭi | 39 |
chāḷiśa sahasra yojane paḍilā sehu bāṇa
biśikesana indra kāṭilā tataṣaṇa | 40 |
agasti boile śuṇa baibasuta manu
jība janu usadraba nāhiṁ śutra mahārājā gyāṁnu | 41 |
upascha thile se harai nā parastirī
tāhāku cchedi nārāja galāka bāhuḍi | 42 |
ẏesaneka mahiṁmā se śutra nāme nr̥pati
tāhāre chāridige nāhiṁ laṁghantā anīti | 43 |
ẏesaneka tāhāra rājye nāhiṁ bhiṣābāsī
parajā yāhā arakai se niai dui rāśi |
batiśa yuga bhega kalā rājā hoiṇa sanyāsī | 44 |
se rājāra dharma dūṣibā nimante
indra kubeta bena bhīḷanti anubrate | 45 |
indra boḷai na pr̥ṇa indra pada gheni casai amara svarge

kobera boilā mora aḷakā bārānidhi
bhaṇāra ghenai bairāge | 46 |
ẏesaneka bichāri se beni digapāḷe
daridra abaschā hoilā tanu khinna atihiṁ abaḷe | 47 |
lg.note:
{indra bolai na puṇa mora indra pada ghenai
kobera bolai niki mora aḷakā pura niai | (ñja,tha)}
upascha–indra |
kobera–kubera |
lg.l: keśa bāsa maḷiṇa ye hoi mahā dukhī
śvetabaṭa taḷe śutra mahārājā bheṭi | 48 |
śutra mahārājāra ye uḍilā sāhasa
boilā ẏehāṁkara kaṣṭa dekhi mora sakaḷa dharma galā nāśa | 49 |
mohora rājye ta nāhiṁ ẏeheneka kaṣṭi
āja ẏehāṁkara muṁ pūreibi abhīṣṭi | 50 |
māga he brāhmaṇa tumbha mane yāhā icchā
pūreibi manoratha tumbhara mana bāñcchā | 51 |
beda ādhyāna kaiṇa kare dile śaṅga
taḷahātha kariṇa śutranta māganti cchadrama bipra raṁka | 52 |
brāhmaṇe boile śuṇa śutra ye nr̥pati
upara hāthe pāṇi dia kara satyabratī | 53 |
śutra rājā boile ye mohora satya satya
yāhā māgiba tāhā debaiṁ niẏata | 54 |
upara hātha kari rājā śaṅge kuśa pāṇi
mahu māṁse bhejana tu debā ho nr̥pamaṇi | 55 |
śutra mahārājā boilā brāhmaṇa janna tumbhe nuhaṁ
dijabara hoile ki ẏemanta kathā kuha | 56 |
muhiṁta jāili tumbhe aṭa ye rāṣasa
asure bhaṣaṇa sinā karanti mahu māṁsa | 57 |
bolanti benijane brāhmaṇa hou athabā rāṣasa hou
satya laṁghibu ki tu hoiṇa mahāprahu | 58 }
āmbhe na māgilu tu prārthanā kalu yāci
na dile dharma rājā nāhiṁṭi tora kicchi | 59 |
lg.note:
{mora rājyareta nāhiṁ dukhī kaṣṭi
māga beni bipre tumbhara daridra yāu phaṭi |(ñja,tha,na)}
śaṅge pāṇi bhari rāye kara satyabratī | (ka)
lg.l: śatrahiṁ boile mora jībane āśā nāhiṁ
ẏeḍeka durāpada bhiāila kāhiṁ pāiṁ | 60 |
śutra mahārājā boile muṁ jāṇita nuāriḷi
bhaṣa mahu māṁsa mora deḷi | 61 |
brāhmaṇa boile tora apāra kāḷara māmbheṁsa
tāhā bhmañja le tahiṁre acchiki svādu rasa | 62 |
tohora prāẏa rājāku bheṭilu subeḷe
sarbehiṁ triputi hoibunā ẏe tohora puṇyabaḷe | 63 |
śutra mahārājā boilā br̥ddhamāṁsa boḷi mote yebe na bhaṣi
ceḷika baẏase mora chāri goṭi putra acchi | 64 |
apāra kaṣṭhora mote dāna māguaccha
yāa yā brāhmaṇe tumbhe chāri putranta mora bhaṣa | 65 |
dui putra duiputra neiyāa gharaku
brāhmaṇe boile koṭi kaḷpa āiṣa hou tuku | 66 |
śutra maharājā bacane gele dijabara beni
śutra putranta bheṭile kāḷānaḷa bahani | 67 |
sāa, sura, sara, sira, chāri putraṁkara nāma
celika sukumāra se abhinaba kāma | 68 |
mane bichāranti beni digapāḷa
bābu dhanya dhanya śutra mahārājā tohora puṇyabaḷa | 69 |
kāhiṁ nāhiṁ narendra yetraneka mahattva
ẏe putranta gcchaḍibāku baḷiba kāhāra puṇa sata | 70 |
kamaraṁka agrate kale beda dhuni
chāri kumare āsi kaleka binaẏe daini | 71 |
lg.note: ceḷika–khelūāḷa bā kambaẏasa |
lg.l: kumāre bichārani bubhmaṣita dijabara
anne ṣīṇa dāridra ṣudhāre ātura | 72 |
mahāmantra pati kari kalyāṇa hāde bāñccha
bābu śutra mahārājāṁkara tumbhanta āgyāṁ acchi | 73 |
pitāṁkara āgyāṁ se ye nibeśita śire
praṇapatya hoi ubhā hoile chāri ye kumare | 74 |
brāhmaṇe boile āmbhe nahu māẏeṁsa bhoji
śutra mahārājāṁkara āgyāṁreṇa bhmañji | 75 |
satya pāḷilā āmbhanta bhejana nimittu
mahu māṁse āmbhe sac bonṅadāẏe bratuṁ | 76 |
āpaṇāra satya nimitteṇa kari
chārijaṇa mānilā ḍāhāṇābrateka śaṅge jaḷatiḷa bhari | 77 |
tumbhe puṇa śutra mahārājāṁkara chāriputra goṭi
tumbhara māẏeṁsa āmbhe bhmañjibu sukhe bāṇṭi | 78 |
āmbhe duijaa duijaṇaṁku bhmañji bu
duijaṇaṁkara māẏeṁsa dui bhāriyāṁka pāiṁ nemuṁ | 79 |
śaucabanta hoi sumara iṣṭa debatā
bikoti kāṭibu tumbhara māẏeṁsa āgyāṁ dile tumbha pitā | 80 |
bubhmaṣita nimante bahana kara boli
ādhārī bhitaru kāḍhile niśimaḷi | 81 |
kumare boile ho rahi raha biprabara
pitā hoi ẏemanta dekhilā acchi ki tumbhara | 82 |
lg.note:
{kumāre bichāranti ẏe bubhmaṣita abhyāgat
tanuṣīṇa daridra ẏe ṣudhā ārata | (gha,jha,ḍha)}
pitā hoi ẏehene acchi ki dekhilā saṁsāra | (jha,tha)
niśimaḷi–tīṣṇa khaḍga |
lg.l: pūrbeṇa śuṇilā acchi śibi nāmeṇa nr̥pati
āpaṇā māẏeṁsa kāṭi dei rakhilā kapotī | 83 |
āreka rājāẏe thilā jīmūtabāhāna
śarīru māẏeṁsa dei toṣilā garuḍara mana | 84 |
yayapi sugyānī hoibanā pitā
putra jāta nimante deba pitr̥re bhagatā | 85 |
c bonṅaśa raṣāra nimante yebe pitāra manabāñchā
aneka jaṣṭhore ye santāne karai raṣā | 86 |
pitā hoi yebe putranta nāśa kari
nicaẏe jāṇilu bīryyahājā se nohai āmbhari | 87 |
āmbhe ta sāmartha jagujana jitā
se gcchara āmbhara nohainā pitā | 88 |
pitā hoi putranta yebe na bāñchai bhala
āmbhe kimpā karibu se duṣṭa pitāra bola | 89 |
yāa yā brahmaṇe tumbhe ẏeṭhāru begeṇa bāhuḍi
se tumbhanta triputi karu āna māṁsa dei kari | 90 |
nirāśa bacae tahuṁ caḷigale dijabare
baḍāi aśakate miḷile yāiṁ śutra mahārājāra gcchamure | 91 |
lg.note: "śarīru māẏeṁsa dei toṣilā garuḍara mana"
lg.l: ehi pādara pāhāṁśa pare ’ccha’ pothira adhikā pāṭha–
ābara rājāẏe thilā haricandana nr̥pati
putra bhārijā biki toṣilā biśvāmitra yati |
jānughaṇṭa nāme pūrbe rājāẏeka thilā
bhiṣā māgiṇa tāhāra sukr̥ta rakhilā |
mahā dhārmika rājā pūrbe yete yete thile
putra marāi kehi dharma na rakhile

div.note: se tumhanta triputi karu tāhāra māṁsa dei kari | (ñja,tha,na)

lg.l: ṣudhārttī hoiṇa se bolanti brāhmaṇe
etralokye śubhilā tohora sādhupaṇe | 92 |
tohora bīryye pūtre nohanti ye jāta
bhīryyā tohora dārā cauryyapaṇe jātakalā tāhānta | 93 |
nicaẏe yebe putra tohora hoithānte
pitāra āgyāṁ se kemante laṁghante | 94 |
putrahiṁ se bratanti sinā pitāra dharmabaḷe
bhīriyāra mandapaṇe dūṣita hoilu ẏetekāḷe | 95 |
āhihuṁ aniryyāpa jāṇantu yebe tote
toteheṁ prārthanā āmbhe karantu kemante | 96 |
gurastara āgyāṁẏe yebe na caḷai gr̥habāsa
se putra bratibāre praẏojana kisa | 97 |
bahuta jhiṁghāsi boile brāhmaṇe
satya bibeka tu bolāu keuṁ guṇe | 98 |
aneka jhiṁghāsa rājā nuarilā sahi
rāgeṇa śutra rājā khaḍaga gheni kahi | 99 |
bhāriyāra muṇḍa ye kāṭibi ẏeṣaṇa
hatyā doṣa labhibi hoibi adharmiṇa | 100 |
bhīriyāku bolai śutra ye nr̥pati
paradārāẏe jātakalu ẏe santati | 101 |
kopeṇa śāpa ye daai mahārāẏe
dārā cauryya yebe jāta kalu ẏe tanaẏe | 102 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ mahārājā boilā mahārāge
pacchiṇī hoi jāta hua tu ẏehi yage | 103 |

div.note: tohora bacana kimpe meṇṭaṇa karante | (ñja,tha,na)

lg.l: ye chārigoṭi kumāra ḍimva huantu tora garbhe
kāḷa bañcha tu tārāṣī pacchī hoi mattagarbe | 104 |
ẏe mohora bacana bhraṣṭa kale tora putre
aṇḍa ḍimva hoi thāāntu tohora garbhagate | 105 |
bharbhe thibe tohora ḍimva chārigoṭi
durāpaa śāpa yahuṁ dilā śutra taponiṣṭhi | 106 |
binaẏa hoiṇa bolai tāhāra bhīriyā
durāpada śāpa mote dila ta mahārājā | 107 |
putraṁkara hoṣe mote dila ābhiśāpa
kemante khaṇḍaṇa ye hoiba ẏe mohora pāga | 108 |
śānta bhanilā rājā bhāriyā bacane
āśvāsi bacana ye kahai toṣa mane | 109 |
putra hoṣe bihiḷi muhiṁ śāpa tote
mohora śāpa meṇṭaṇa nohiba kadācite | 110 |
satya tretaẏā dvāpara aḍhāi puga pariyante
ẏe chāriputre chāriḍimva hoithibe tohora garbhagate | 111 |
dvāpara pugare mahābhāratha yuddha ye hoiba
kuru pāṇḍabaṁka samare laṣe nr̥pati miḷiba | 112 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa sārathi hoithibe arjunara rathe
bhīṣmaṁkara tule samara karuthibe pāthe | 113 |
dibya gyāna hoi tu karithibu hetu
prathama dina samara dekhita yibu tu | 114 |
duṣṭa putra jātakalu tu ẏehi garbhagate
ẏe peṭa ciri hou tohora bhīṣmaṁka śarāghāte | 115 |
udare thiba cohora ḍimva chāri goṭi
samara maṇḍaḷe paḍu tohora peṭa phāṭi | 116 |
se raṇaraṅka madhye piñji hou tohora māẏeṁsa
bāhaḍi moṣa hoi tu mo mandiraku āsa | 117 |
se chāri ḍimva paḍiba raṇa sthāne
hāthīra ghaṇṭi ābori paḍiba ḍimvara uddyāne | 118 |
tahiṁra upare paḍibe mattahāthī
tahiṁra upare paḍibe rathī ye pādānti | 119 |
aneka yuddhi tahiṁ hoiba apāra
kurubaḷa thāṭharu aneka sanya yibe māra | 120 |
aṣṭādaśa dibasa ye hoiba māra | 121 |
ẏehā mote sañchapi kahibā mahāmuni
kehumāne rahibe ẏehu anyāanyi | 122 |
ẏehā mote bujhāiṇa kahibā tayoniṣṭhi
ẏe mahā kaṣaṇuṁ tu mbhe pāri karibaṭi | 123 |
ẏemante bahuta stuti kalā se sundarī
ẏethuṁ uddhāraṇa kara prabhma catradhārī | 124 |
muhiṁ dīna pāmarī aṭe durāchārī
ẏe kaṣaṇuṁ mote pārikara narahari | 125 |
nabatāḷa uccharga ye paḍiba mr̥tupiṇḍa
sātatāḷa uccharge rudhara nadī bahiba pracaṇḍa | 126 |
bhīṣmapac bonṅa beni dina uttare ḍimva phuṭi
ghaṇṭa bhitare thāi samara dekhibe ḍimva chārigoṭi | 127 |
pitāra bacana yahuṁ meṇṭile chāriputre
bharathiā nāma sehu bahibe yugate | 128 |
śuṇa baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
se tārāṣī pacchīra carita ẏesaneka rīti | 129 |
satyayuge śutra rājāra bacana putre meṇṭa
tada doṣa kariṇa tāhāra peṭagalā phāṭi | 130 |
śuṇi parama sānanda hoile mahārājā
agastiṁkara caraṇe kale dibyapūjā | 131 |
bho muni taba mukhuṁ śuṇili dibya kathā
sañchapi pāili se mārkaṇḍa purāṇa bāratā | 132 |
bhīṣmaṁkara samara se baḍāi dukabha
tārāsī mukata hoilā śāparu sulabha | 133 |

lg.l: sājare sājare boli śubhai beni thaṭha
maṇḍanti ratha gaja śva ye muraṭa | 1 |

rīra dāḍaṇḍi bīra marddaḷa dāmālu bīra kāhāḷi

lg.note: ṭha o ṛha re dvi tiẏa dina yudda ārambhare jagannāthaṅka sṇati acchi:-
lg.l: jaẏa tu jagannātha nīḷa kandara bāsī
kaḷikāḷa dukha taba daraśane nāśi |

kāḷandī hra dare kāḷi nāga darpa daḷi |
bhagata jana bādhaba tuhi jagannātha
bhaba dukha khaṇṭantā tu aṭu sāmaratha |
parama brahma mūrati tumbhe jagannātha jyoti
ye cintanti koṭiẏe janma dukharu taranti |
jagujana nāẏaka tu jagata śāsaka
jagujana bihantā tu rakhantā trailokya | (ṭha,ṛha)
rahile yoddhāmāne ye yāhāra lāge

pūrbeṇa pāṇḍabe pacchime kurupati | 5 |

dibya abatāra hoi mānagobinda piṭhibhāga | 6 |
ubhā??rile pāṭacchatra ālamva pañchuluṣī
tārakā badha kāle yehne kārttikeśvara dekhi | 7 |

āgeṇa sidhudeśa baḷa ye daśa sahasra ratha | 8 |

bāme bāji mahābāji ye ẏekādaśa ṣauṇi | 9 |

lg.l: ’gha’ pothire adhikā pāṭha:-
śarada megha jāṇi diśai tāra prabhī
ki abā airābrata c bonṅaśa kuḷa abā |
ratna toḍara ye bājai ruṇa jhaṇa
gharghara ghaṇṭa nāde sidhu ki ucchanna |
ratnakara jyoti jāṇi ki dahi abā
jaḷada meghe yehne bijuḷira prabhī |
se hāthī upare bijaẏe kurupati
ratha gaja aśva aneka lāgicchanti |
laṣeka rājā yāhāra aṭai parichāra
dutī kāmadeba jāṇi dhr̥tirāṣṭara kumara |
ratha gaja pāśe cchatrī ye biśeṣa
pañcha patha yojana gahana aśeṣa |
bimāna pātāṅga ye kahaṇā na yāi
koṭiẏe śagkha dhunī āgare phurai |
māhā sambharbe thāṭha gheniṇa rājā dhr̥tirāṣṭa
bije guñjagaḷa adhipa īśānye dei dr̥ṣṭi | 10 |
birūpāṣa saini ye akaḷita kāṭhi
mahā anakūḷe bije dharmarāẏe yujheṣṭha | 11 |
yujheṣṭhiṁka bāme dr̥pada ḍāhāṇe birāṭa
nirjhara deśara rājā gaṇapati āgiāṇi | 12 |
samaste dūre thāi dekhanti ye hanumantara mukha
dadhibābana sumari dadhi maccha śaṅkha catra śirībatsa | 13 |
kaṇaẏe niribāṇa se śveta nāgara piṭhi
ārehaṇa karicchanti dharmarāja yujheṣṭhi | 14 |
agasti muni bakatā baibasuta manu śrotā
piṇḍa prāṇa ẏekatva hoibāre mana houcchi bakatā | 15 |
caitana bolai mana karithāa hetu
bhīṣmaṁkara dutīẏa dina śuṇa sāṁgrāmara tattu | 16 |
dibya abatāra gāṅgaba mahārathī
makara māsa śukaḷa paṣa dutīẏāra tithi | 17 |
paṇḍi bāra aṭai ye yugati
śāẏantanura nandana nidāgha arka mūrtti | 18 |
nirdhūma agni jāṇi birājai tāhāṁkara kāẏe
beni recana bramai kāḷa catra prāẏe | 19 |
sahasrāarjunara prāẏeka teja bikāśi
ubhaẏa baḷa saini ẏekā bhīṣmehiṁ se ātreṣi | 20 |
dekhiṇa praśaṁsā karai rājā mānacatrabratī
bāsabara prāẏe diśai bhīṣmaṁkara mr̥ti | 21 |

lg.l: nicaẏe gāṅgeba āji pheḍibe durgati
pāṇḍaba baḷa nice āja dahiba sabunti | 22 |
pannagā nārāẏaṇa gheniṇa ratnamāḷā
āpaṇe lamvāile nei bhīṣmaṁkara gaḷā | 23 |
ẏe mabhī maṇḍaḷe tuhi ẏekā rathī hāde
labhibi pañchurājya tohora parasāde | 24 |
śubha maṅgaḷa anakuḷa gheni caḷi bege yāsi
pañchu koti turaṅgama chākhāra saṅge nesi | 25 |
gaṅgāra nandana rathe nīḷada sārathi
śāẏantanura nandana jagujitā mahācchatrī | 26 |
chekhāra turaṅgama harita jāḷa meghā
pabanuṁ cañchaḷa se caḷanti ati beguṁbegā | 27 |
aśi sahasra baḷa śrīkare kaṇaẏa ratna dhanu
anirbāraṇa bidyā yāhāku śikhāile śāẏantanu | 28 |
beni koṭi nārāja pūrei beni troṇe
śveta keśarī dhvaja uḍai gagane | 29 |
dinakara nātha ratha prāẏe khegai ākāśuṁ
nandighoṣa ratha bheṭilā bhīṣma deba āsu | 30 |
dekhiṇa gāṅgeba dhaile ajaṅga dhanu hāthe
boile kālira prāẏe āji nohoi kāhiṁ āsu pāthe | 31 |
durddaṣa śaraṇa ye paśilāka kāli
samara sadha prāẏe maṇi muṁ uprodha yudda kali |32 |
arjuna boile tāta kāli tohore uprodha
nicaẏa sampada tāta āja buḍāilu raṇa madha | 33 |

div.note:
nilendi, basanta,niṣāda,baśikha prabhr̥ti sārathira bibhinna nāma
pothimānaṅkare dekhāyā e |
nicaẏe śira ccheda hoibu āja raṇa madhya | (dha,ñja,na)

lg.l: driyodhana aśastamā droṇa karṇṇara dekhante
gādhārī nandanaṁku āja ke pāriba rakhite | 34 |
arjunara ẏesana bacane śāẏantanura suta
kampāi arjunara ātreṣile ratha | 35 |
yesane rāhu ātreṣai śaśāṁke
pārthaku ghotile ṣatriẏa raṇaraṁke | 36 |
kopeṇa nārāja se pūreiṇa dhanu
sahasre nārāja pūreiṇa badhale śāẏantanura tanu | 37 |
puṇa nārāja ye pūrei ahabrate
bidhale nārāja yahiṁ acchanti kr̥ṣṇa pāthe | 38 |
puṇa cchaḍa daśa nārāja bidhale ātreṣi
nandighoṣa ratha upare śara se baraṣi | 39 |
hari arjuna śaṁkale ye bhīṣmaṁkara bāṇa dekhi
āditya lucile ye gagana upeṣi | 40 |
anirbāraṇa śara ye bidhale rīra pātha
ẏekā ghāntake bidhale nārāja ahibrata | 41 |
bhīṣmaṁkara nārājanta cchedilā phālaguni
dekhiṇa gāṅgabe dhāiṁle dibya śasranta gheni | 42 |
pañchamunā nārāja pūraile beni śata
aśvaṁkara uparaku bidhale mahāmatta | 43 |

div.note: puṇa sahasre nārāja bidhale ātreṣi | (ka,gha,ṭha)
hari arjuna upae śara acirate baraṣi | (tha, ñja, na)
aniryāpa śara ye bidhale bīra pātha | (gha,dha)

{ẏeka ghantike cchedilā se śara naba ahibrata | (ñja,tha,na)
ẏekā ghāntike bidhalā nārāja tini ahabrata | (ka,gha,ṭa,ccha,ḍha)}
pañchamunā nārāja pūroilā pañchaśata | (ñja,tha,na)
arjana uparaku biddhale mahāmatta | (kha,jha,ṅa)

lg.l: trailokye asañkhya ta se bhīṣmaṁkara mahiṁmā
bīrabara sundara sohaḍa se ṣatriẏa uttamā | 44 |
ratheka ārehiṇa bīra bhīmasena
nairūta nāme sārathi ratha bāhai śūnye ghana ghana | 45 |
kaureba thāṭhare yāiṁ paśilā bīramaṇi
bidhai nārāja ye baraṣā rūtu jāṇi | 46 |
koṭiẏe kāma jiṇi bhīmasena rūpa barṇṇa
bhīmasenara kaḷebara śobhī ye laghui subarṇṇa | 47 |
citra pratimā jāṇi se bhīmasena rūpa parakāśi
dhanu guṇe nārāja bhīmasena pāñchaśata dhari kaṣi | 48 |
lohasāra dhanure lohāra guṇa khañji
rathe aṣṭaratna māṇikya puñji puñji | 49 |
dhanura koṇe jhalakanti ratnamaṇi
jaḷadhara meghe yehne bijuḷi teja jāṇi | 50 |
tīṣamunā nārāje kaṁkapacchī rañji
jhalakanti nārāje dibākara teja gañji | 51 |
āre āre boliṇa ye hākai māruti
chāmure bheṭantā nāhiṁ nāhiṁ kehi rathī | 52 |
aniryāpa bāṇa se ye bidhai māruti
paḷābanti sainya kehi na rahanti kati | 53 |
naḷeba pramāṇe yāra lohaśara aṭai
bidhanteṇa hāthī yoddhā jaḍita hoi phuṭai | 54 |
āraṇa lāgante ye ṣepanti maẏematta
dhāmaiṁ brikodara apramita baḷabantā | 55 |
thāṭha bhagna dekhiṇa dhāiṁlā somadatta
bhīmara āgare ṭekilāka nei ratha | 56 |

div.note: āraṇa–aṁkuśa |
raṇa raṅga dekhiṇa dhāilā somadatta | (ṅa,dha)

lg.l: tiniśata nārāja pūrei mahārathī
bhīmasena uparaku bidhaleka jhāti | 57 |
nārājaku nārāja paḍitāḷa karanti duheṁ mahārathī
jhaṇa jhaṇānti nārāja tāhāri agni jyoti kānti | 58 |
ratha tejyā kariṇa bīra bhīmasena
gadābara bulāi se dhāmaiṁ kopamana | 59 |
rāgeṇa nārāja bidhai somadatta
paḍilā nārāja bhīmasena hr̥dagata | 60 |
lohaśara prāẏeka yāhāra remābaḷī
nārāja se dehe ki pāranti ye gaḷi | 61 |
bhīñja ṇa rūnā ye hoilā sac bonṅa śara
dhāiṁṇa somadatta rathe piṭilā gadābara | 62 |
sac bonṅata samāne yāra bāḍana bāḍana bhīra gadā
piṭante kaureba saina sac bonṅa kalā padā | 63 |
somadatta rājāra rathare gabābara paḍi
bhīñjiṇa rahubara hoilāka śate cūri | 64 |
aśva sārathi ratha ādi kari
samasta cūra ralā rathī galāka apasari | 65 |
lohāra gadā ẏeka dhailā somadatte
dhātikāre piṭilā nei se bhīmasenara gātre | 66 |
dekhiṇa pābeni ye pātilā bāmaaṅga
brikodara aṅge paḍi gadābara hoilāka bhaṅga | 67 |
gadā pakāiṇa se hoilā śūnya hātha
samare ghuñthiṇa se hoilā nisata | 68 |

div.note:
{rathara upare agni uṭhilāka jhalakāi jhāti | (dha,ṅa,jha)
raṇa jhaṇa nārāja diśai yehne baḍabānaḷa jyoti | (gha)}

lg.l: pacche goḍāiśa se kāḷadaṇḍa pāṇi
raha raha somadatta hākai ucche bāṇi | 69 |
paḷāi somadatta na chāheṁ leuṭi
ki abā nāśakara januku acchi ghoṭi | 70 |
somadattakaiṁ kaṭāḷa dekhiṇa kr̥pāchāryye
bhīmasenaku bidhale sahasre nārāje | 71 |
nārāja paḍanteṇa ye garjai pābeni
kr̥paṁka uparaku dhāmaiṁ gadā gheni | 72 |
gajapūtha dekhi yehne dhāmaiṁ keśarī
kr̥paṁka uparaku piṭilā gadābara gheni kari | 73 |
kr̥paṁkara rathare ātreṣiṇa piṭi
bajra bighāteṇa kr̥ṁpaka ratha galā phāṭi | 74 |
bicitra gati kari ḍeiṁ paḍile kr̥pa yahuṁ
sārathira muṇḍa bege moḍilā bhīmasena tahuṁ | 75 |
raṇa raṅga dhandoḷa karai ghotai ghora rūpe
kāḷānaḷa rūpa dekhi bhāñji le sac bonṅa darpe | 76 |
pabana nandana samare abiredhi
yābaḍe beḍhile kaureba laṣe yodhī | 77 |
ke śate ke sahasre ke koṭiẏe bāṇa dhari
bhīmasenaku bidhale ākarṇṇa sari kari | 78 |
samara ghora adhāra dekhiṇa durddaṣa
bhīmasenara tule prākarma samakaccha | 79 |

div.note:
{bhīmasenaku bidhile sapata nārāje | (ṅa,jha,ṭa)
bhīmasena upararu biddhile saturi nārāja | (gha,ṭha)}
kālebara gadā bāji kr̥paṁkara ratha galā phāṭi (ñja,tha,na)
ẏekā bhīmasenaku ye bidhale kopa kari | (ka,ṭha)
bhīmasenaṭharu adhika baḷa tā prataṣa | (ñja,tha,na)

lg.l: cauṣaṭhi cauṣaṭhi bhīra lekheṁ gheni gadā dui kare
raṇaraṅga manthi ẏekā thāṭhara bhitare | 80 |
dudda ṣaku dekhiṇa saina hoile beni bhāga
bijaẏe durddaṣa yāiṁ bhīmasenara āga | 81 |
bhīma durddaṣa duheṁ ye hoile beni sakhā
kaureba sainiṁku se na karanti lekhā | 82 |
laṣe baḷa gheni se aḷamvuṣa rāṣasa
saburi byāghra bāhāna rūrddva khāṁkara keśa | 83 |
byāghracarma senehe ye ṭopara kāccheṭi
bāma kare mūṣaḷa ḍāhāṇa kare yāṭhi | 84 |
kaḷiṅgasena prāẏe tāku maṇilā māruti
duddaṣaku paccha kari dhāilāka dhāti
mahā bhaẏāṁkāra se kāḷānaḷa mr̥ti | 85 |
beni ahibrata yoddhā gheni dhāmaiṁ dhuśāsana
durddaṣara gcchamure āsi miḷilā bahana | 86 |
bikarṇṇa sārathi dhuśāsanaku pucchai
dekha tohora sahodara durddaṣaṭi ẏehi | 87 |
sahasreka yoddhā pāḍilāni ājara yuddhe
ranta māṁse karddana hoi kabadha nācanti raṇamadhye | 88 |
dhuśāsana boilā susañḷa ājara dina
duddaṣaku māri āja pheḍibi driyodhanara abhimāna | 89 |
śaraṇa paśibāra kāraṇa pāu mora bhāi
jībante dharidaṭi prāṇe na māriba kehi | 90 |
dhuśāsana tiārante durddaṣa kumara uṭhi
yoddāmānaṁka upare prahāra kalā yāṭhi | 91 |
lg.note: kaureba thāṭhare bihaḍanti kāhāku nāhiṁ śakā | (ccha,ṭha)
lg.l: bajra mudugara ye ābara kareṇa gadābaḷi
giribara sāriṣe ye prahāra karai toḷi | 92 |
rāhu dekhile yehne paḷābanti br̥ndāarke
na rahanti yoddhāẏe ye śata sahasrake | 93 |
re re kāra kariṇa durddaṣa rīra bege uṭhi
bajra mudugara neiṇa dhuśāsana rathe piṭi | 94 |
durddaṣara ghāẏe paḍilā ratha bhāñji
gādharī nandana kope dhāmaiṁ gaḷagāji | 95 |
ḍāhāṇa bhmaje antarīṣe dhailāka ratha
thāreka rathe nei piṭilā turita | 96 |
rathaku ratha bāji uṭhilā anaḷa
prataṣe pracaṇḍa ki se gādhārīra bāḷa | 97 |
nidāgha āditya jāṇi durddaṣara mr̥ti
beni daṇḍe nāśa kalā beniśata rathī | 98 |
śuṇa ho caitana dharmabaḷara kathā
pāṇḍaba āśreke durddaṣa ẏeḍeka baḷabantā | 99 |
bahuta samaraku se na karai śaṁkā
rāmāẏaṇa yuddhe yehne hunu bidhaṁsilā laṁkā | 100 |
beḍhaṇa yoddāẏe prahāra karanti tā aṅga
śahasre upuḍanti gadāẏe hoanti ye bhaṅga | 101 |
durddaṣa prahāra kehi nuāranti meṇṭi
ẏekā prahārake ratha gaja aśva paḍanti mahīloṭi | 102 |
samare yoddāẏe se pāile cimukha
paḷābanti apasari kehi na ṭekanti mukha | 103 |
lg.note:
{ceḍhiṇa yoddhāẏe prahāra karanti ye konta
śahasre na phuṭanti gadā sahite huanti bhaganasta | (aneka pothi)}
paḷābanta apasari kehi na rahanti tāhāṁkara mukha | (ka,jha)
lg.l: saini biartha dekhiṇa bīr dhuśāsana
pāñcha rathī tule āsi milil durddaṣara sannidhāna | 104 |
pāda gati durddaṣara, rathe kumāra dhuśā
āre bābu kebaṇa abhībe hoilu ẏeḍeka nirāśā | 105 |
goḷakuṇḍā pāṇḍabe aṭanti jāra jātakā
biśeṣe hīna bhiṣābāsī se brahmacyā pātakā | 106 |
kaḷpataru teji re bhajiḷu ẏeraṇḍa
pāṇḍabaṁka dekhante āja kāṭici tora muṇḍa | 107 |
gādhārī nandana bacana kahai bikaṭi
svāmī dhuśāsana tumbhe sabhiheṁ āja yama bheṭi | 108 |
svāmī maribāra loke se kahanti duṣṭa bāṇī
prāṇa yānte yehne rubai duc bonṅaḷa prāṇī | 109 |
svāmī pāṇḍaba pañchāḷa se jagannāthe thile
mote jiṇantā ke huai tumbhara ye bole | 110 |
svāmī tumbhe laṣe rājā muhiṁ ẏekā jaṇe
ye pāra mora tule kara kinā | 111 |
svāmī dhuśāsana tora pratagyāṁ biradhū
dekhai kinā pratagyāṁ śara kimpe na bidhu | 112
śuṇiṇa dhuśāsana garjai baḍa rāge
jāḷābaḷī nārāja bidhalā ati bege | 113 |
dhuśāsana nārāja paḍante durddaṣa kāma rūpī
bhīñjibara bulāi nei dhuśāsana rathe khepi | 114 |
bhāñjiṇa rahubara hoilā śate rūnā
bhumire paḍilā kumāra dhuśāsana jenā | 115 |
gadābara ghāte dhuśāsana paḍilāka mr̥cchā
tataṣaṇe durddaṣa karai tāku pucchā | 116 |
lg.note: dhuśāsana nārāja paḍante durddaṣa biśvarūpi | (ka,ḍha)
lg.l: uṭha uṭha svāmī boli durddaṣa koḷa kari
durjaẏaku boilā re ẏehāku gheniyāa apasari | 117 |
sāṣṭama hoiṇa ye uṭhilā dhuśāsana
durddaṣaboilā svamī samara yāke tumbhara ẏesaneka bidhāna | 118 |
bhiṣma droṇa karṇṇa ye pratagyāṁ bahuta karithile
apacaẏe kāḷaku kehi rakhi nuāle | 119 |
durddaṣa boilā svāmī tumbhanta māguacchi ẏete
ābara beḷe samare na paśibuṭi kadācitte | 120 |
svāmī dropatīṁki jhiṁghāsa ye kalu tu sabhī taḷe
bhīmasena ṭhākure thā ḷihicchanti baṣasthaḷe | 121 |
tera baraṣa satāṇoi dina galā
kaicchābanti satī se keśa na bādhalā | 122 |
ẏe tohora daṣiṇa bhmaja opāḍibe samare
se rudhara niuḍibe pāñchāḷi śirare | 123 |
tebe se keśa bādhabe satī ye aparṇṇā
pratagyāṁ apāraṭi pāṇḍaba bhīmasenā | 124 |
bhīmasena ṭhākure karuacchanti aḷambhaṣa tule yuddha
ẏehiṣaṇi dhāiṁme se mote na dekhi raṇa madhya | 125 |
dinā kete bratithāa kinā ho dhuśāsana
na rahani samare paḷā yā bahana | 126 |
lg.note: dina chāripāñcha jīiṇa thāa dhuśāsana | (na,tha,ñja)
"na rahani samare pāḷāyā bahana" pāhānta pare na,tha,ñja,
pothimānaṅkare adhikā pāṭha–
yadyapi tote muhiṁ karāimi samādhāna
dropatī keśa dhari tu karicchu bibasana |
yujheṣṭi debaṁkara tu ye aṭu rāja dorehā
dropati bhīmasena tote chāḍileni senehā |
lg.l: sāṣṭāma hoi dhuśāsana basilā yāiṁ rathe
bāhuḍai kaureba bimana hoi samare biarthe | 127 |
dhuśāsana bimana dekhi durmukha durākarṇṇa
beni laṣa yoddhā gheni dhāiṁle bahana | 128 |
māra māra boḷiṇa ye pāḍanti ghora bobi
pādabhare heḷa ye ghenaiṁ mahī debī | 129 |
dhuśāsanaku āborile beni bīre āsi
durddaṣaku nārāja biddhale ātreṣi | 130 |
#śuṇa ho manurāẏe pachārai caitana}
aḷamvuṣā tule samara karai bhīmasena | 131 |
samare bhīmasena pratagyāṁ garu reṣa
ẏekā byāghra yehne chāgaḷa pala kare dhvaṁsa | 132 |
kaureba baḷa thāṭhe bhīma prahāra karante
aḷamvuṣā ogāḷilā āsi tini ahabrata gheni rathe | 133 |
ẏekā rathake yociacchi aṣṭa aṣṭa byāghra
dekhiṇa sānanda se pāṇḍaba brikodara | 134 |
raṇa raṅge crikodara dusaha abhaẏā
kaṇaẏa giri sāriṣe bikāśilā tāra kāẏā | 135 |
candrakiraṇa jāṇi beni kare yāra gadā
yama debatāku ye jaṇante sāmarathā sadā | 136 |
lg.note: "kaureba baḷa thāṭhe bhīma prahāra karante "pāṭhapare ’gha’
pothire adhikā pāṭha
kehi rahi nuārile bhīmasena agrate |
badha bhīñjante yehne jaḷa khepi yāi
kaureba baḷa paḷānti temanta prāẏe he??i |
kaureba baḷa bichāi bhīgante
aḷamvuṣā miḷilā tini ahibrata rathe |
lg.l: bakapala dekhiṇa yehne dhāmai śāmaḷa pacchī
dhāmaiṁ brikodara durānteka baḷa dekhi | 137 |
bhīmasenakaiṁ dekhi asura baḷathāṭha
śatepura kari beḍhile mahāghoṭa | 138 |
luhāra gadā śate śate bhīra gheiṇa ye hāthe
giribara sādriśe se diśanti durānte | 139 |
ẏekā pāṇḍabakaiṁ tini ahibrata yodhī}
kehu śate kehu sahasre na rāja abiṣaṇe bidha | 140 |
kakaḍā māsare yesane karai jaḷa br̥ṣṭi
ākāśe adhāra hoile dinakara teja ghoṭi | 141 |
asuraṁkara prahāra dekhiṇa bīra bhīma
belūṁbeḷa adhara kampāi garutama | 142 |
gadā mudugara guruja konta yāṭhi
āre āre boli ẏekamukha hoi uṭhi | 143 |
ẏekā bhīmasenakaiṁ beḍhile ahibrate kontakāra
brikodara upare āsi kaleka prahāra | 144 |
dekhiṇa māruti ye bāma aṅga pāti
paḍiṇa cura galā gadā mudugara śakati | 145 |
guruja konta nārāja cchela mudugara
samasta paḍiṇa cūragalā bhīmasena upara | 146 |
garjiṇa yodhāẏe māranti konta yāṭhi
paḍi upuḍai tāhāra śarīre tiḷeheṁ na phuṭi | 147 |
leuṭiṇa dhāmaiṁ se pāṇḍaba sundara
gadā prahāra kalā asuraṁka upara | 148 |
ẏeka prahārake kehi nuāranti meṇṭi
rathī yodhā sārathi sarbe gu ṇḍā hoi uṭhi | 149 |
rakate bilepana bhīmasenara aṅga
hiraṇya bidāraṇa kāḷe yesane narasiṁgha | 150 |
asure trāsile bhīmasenara bhīṣmarupa dekhi
paḷābanti bimukhe se samara upeṣi | 151 |
ratha gaja aśva teji keśa bāsa asambhāḷe
bhājile saine ye hoiṇa bikaḷe | 152 |
bhīñji le saini kihi na chāhiṁle leuṭi
kāḷebara gadā gheni bīra ākreṣiṇa piṭi | 153 |
sainara biartha dekhiṇa aḷamvuṣa
pāñchaśata yoddhā gheni dhāiṁlā raṣasa | 154 |
dantabatra subatra aḷāẏadha tini putra
ẏeke ẏeke jiṇi pāranti indra candra debatānta | 155 |
kuṭhāra āẏadha ye dharicchanti kare
dhātikāre piṭile nei bhīmasenara upare | 156 |
dekhiṇa māruti asura bighāta
ātreṣi dhailāka aḷāẏadha ratha | 157 |
antarīṣa mārge bulāi tāra ratha daṇḍa
aḷamvuṣā upare prahāra kalā ratha hoilā beni khaṇḍa | 158 |
lg.note:
"antarīṣa mārge bulāi tāra ratha daṇḍa" pare adhikāpāṭha–
gha o ta re
aḷamvuṣa upae nei piṭilā pracaṇḍa durddaṇḍa |
lg.l: bhijiṇa ratha ye hoilā sac bonṅa dhūḷi
triḍā karai tahiṁ crikodara mahābaḷi |
ratha bhagna yahuṁ hoilā daitara
aḷamṭhu aḷāẏadha paṛḍhile bhūmira |
beni cchatrī yahuṁ hoile pādagati
bhimasena upare nei piṭile śakati |
lg.note:
{aḷamvuṣa upare piṭilā se pabanara suta
śatakhaṇḍa hoi bhīñjilā se aḷamvaṣara ratha | (ñja,tha,na)}
lg.l: aḷamvuṣa aḷāẏadha duheṁ pādagati
bhīmasena upare nei piṭile luhāra śakati | 159 |
bāma aṅga pātilā se bīra bhīmasena
bhīñjiṇa śakati ye hoilāka sac bonṅa cūrṇṇa | 160 |
biśahasra gadā prahāra kalāka pābeni | 161 |
āho caitana dantabatra boli kari aḷamvuṣara jyeṣṭha putra]
gadā bighāte se uḍilā gagana patha | 162 |
puṇi prahāra kalā bhīmasena gadā toḷi
aloẏadhara śarīre paḍi rakate karddana remābaḷi | 163 |
paḷābai aḷamvaṣa dui putranta gheni
goḍāi bhīmasena mākalā aneka saini | 164 |
daṇḍa bhagna kariṇa bāhuḍai brikodara
leḍaṭi miḷilā yāiṁ durddaṣa saṅgatara | 165 |
durddaṣa bhīmasena beni ẏeka saṅga
ketu maṅgaḷa prāẏe daśanti raṇa raṅga | 166 |
śalya somadatta karṇṇa aśastamā kr̥pa
koṇake āujile dudiṁkari dekhi ghora rūpa | 167 |
asanamāna yodhāẏe pīcati suhr̥de nāhiṁ
śaraṇa boile bhīma duguṇe mārai | 168 |
adharma paṇa dekhi yodhāẏe āḍe hoigaḷe
chāre rahibāku kehi bharasā na kale | 169 |
bhīmasena durddaṣa duheṁ āsanti cāhuḍi
ye mukhe paḍanti jaṇe se na pānta uburi | 170 |

div.note: aḷāẏadhara śira bhīñji rudhira bege gaḷi (nikiḷi) | (na,tha,ñja)
chamure rahite kehi bhījana nohile | (kha,gha,ccha,jha)

lg.l: raṇaraṅga dhandoḷa samare baḷacante
nandighoṣa ratha diśilā duhiṁkari leuṭi āsante | 171 |
bhurisarbaṁka chāmure ubhī hoi acchanti yujheṣṭhi
bhīmasena durddaṣa duheṁ yāi tāṁku bheṭi | 172 |
gādhārī nandana yujheṣṭhiṁki kalā pūjā
bhurisarbaṁka tule samara āborilā durddaṣā | 173 |
yesaneke rāhu candradebatānta ātreṣi
śāẏantanura nandana durddaṣaku dekhi bahuta praśaṁsi | 174 |
sādhu sādhu durddaṣare cohora pitā mātā
dhr̥tirāṣṭa kuḷaku tuhi se pāṇi dyantā | 175 |
aneka praśaṁsā kale bhīṣme durddaṣaku dekhi
bidhale nārāja ye kaurebanta upeṣi | 176 |
durddaṣa meṇṭilā bhūrisarbaṁka nārāja paḍante
puṇihiṁ bidhale loha nārāja ye śate | 177 |
gādhārī nandana ye bulāi gadā beni
nārāja bañchāilā se bicitra gati gheni | 178 |
aneka samara kale bhūriṣma gāṁgabe
durddaṣaku jiṇi nuārile bahuta samare ẏebe | 179 |

div.note: biddhi nārāja ye gaureba uprodha upeṣi | (dha,ṅa)
"nārāja bañchāilā bicitra cati gheni" pāṭha pare, ’na,tha,ñja,
pothimānaṅkare adhikā pāṭha |
puṇa ṣāṭhiẏe bāa ye māile bhīṣma bīra
ghāẏeṇa mohacate se durddaṣa kumaca |
reme reme nārāja gaḷi bahilāna śroṇi
mūrcthā yāi durddaṣa ye paḍilā dharaṇi
aneka yudda kale pitā oprodha tāku chaḍi

lg.l: durddaṣaka jiṇi nuārile āga biḍhi| ’gha’
bidhaṇa bimukha yahuṁ hoile kururājā suta
sahasraśirā śahasreka bidhale mahā baḷabanta | 180 |
yesaneka bimvare gopya huanti sarpe
reme reme gaḷile śoṣile kumārara darpe | 181 |
raṇe asāṣṭama ye gādhārīra baḷā
kurunāthara nandana dekhi teja anargaḷā | 182 |
ratharu ḍeiṁ paḍile bhūri tye sarbaẏe
ākreṣi dhaile yāiṁ gādhārī tanaẏe | 183 |
durddaṣaku toḷi nei basāile rathe
batsa droha lāgiba se māribaiṁ kemante | 184 |
rathare pakābante dekhile yujheṣṭhi
āre āre durddaṣa mora prāṇara bhīi goṭi | 185 |
yujheṣṭhi ḍāka dile āre dhāuṁkinā bhīma
durddaṣa bandī galā āmbhara kisa dharma | 186 |
sehi se sodara hāde jībana dāna dilā muku
āre mohora dekhante dhari neuacchi durddaṣaku | 187 |
pāṇḍabaṁka thāṭhe śubhilā ghora dhuni
bhūrisarbanta māra boḷi dhāiṁle saini | 188 |
svāmīra āgyāṁẏe ye nibeśita śira
raṇa dhandoḷa pāṇḍaba se dhāiṁlā brikodara | 189 |
bhīsenara tule ye kumāra śrīkhaṇḍī
kubera sāriṣe se śrīkhaṇḍīra ratha maṇḍa | 190 |
pāṇḍaba baḷa yahuṁ beḍhile raṇa ghoṭi
durddaṣaku bhūrisarbaẏe gheni yāucchanti leuṭi | 191 |
raṇe sohoḍa sundara bi kodara thāṭha manthāna jenā
bhurisarbakara pacchakati bijaẏe bīra bhīmasenā | 192 |
lg.note: kurunāthara nandana dekhi teja mahākhaḷā | (jha,ṅa,ḍha)
lg.l: re re kāra śabanda kari bīra pāṇḍaba pañchāṇa
bhurisarbaṁkara rathe piṭilā giribara cūḍaṇa | 193 |
anamite giribara yahuṁ piṭilā paracaṇḍā
bhūrisarbaṁkara ratha bhāñji hoilā masīguṇḍā | 194 |
ratha bhāñji gadā paḍilā bhūrisarbaṁka upare
asāṣṭama hoiṇa se paḍiḷe bhūmire | 195 |
puṇi saceta hoi bhūriboṅgāẏe ārehile mattanāga
thāṭha bhitare yāiṁ paśile ati bega | 196 |
tahuṁṇa durddaṣaku rathare basāi śrīkhaṇḍī
śrībhmaje kumāra catra kāti ye bhuṣaṇḍī | 197 |
bhīma durddaṣa ye śrīkhaṇḍī tini yodhī
arjuna sannidhe āsi śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁ pāda bandi | 198 |
lg.note: "re kāra śabada kari bīra pāṇḍaba pañchāṇa" pāṭha pare
lg.l: tha,ñja,na re adhikā pāṭha |
giribara goṭāẏe upāḍiṇa bhīmasena
kāḷacatra prāẏe locana adhare danta chāpi |
bhurisarbaṁka upare bhīma piṭilā nei kopī |
196 durddaṣaku rathe nei basāilā śrīkhaṇḍī
tinirathī ẏeka hoi dianta ghora raḍi |
197|2 yujheṣṭhi padmapāde durddaṣa yāi bandi | (ñja,tha,na,dha)
198|2 arjuna caraṇe durddaṣa āsi bandi | (ka,ccha)

198|2 bhīmasena śrīkhaṇḍī durddaṣa tini yodhī:–ehi pādānta pare ’gha’re
adhikā pāṭha |
praṇapatya hoi ye pujheṣṭhiṁka pāda bandi |
dekhiṇa haraṣa hoiḷe dharma sute
durddaṣaku koḷāgrata kaleka turite |
lg.note: (abaśiṣṭa para pr̥ṣṇāre)
lg.l: āho caitana bhīṣmaṁkara tule arjuna karai yuddha
ākāśa ghoṭilā ye duhiṁkari śarabadha | 199 |
śahasra dhārā br̥ṣṭi gahaḷa dhandoḷa jāṇi
daga amvara na diśai ghoṭilāka caẏaṇī | 200 |
śahasra śahasrake paḍi houcchanti paḍitāḷa
uṭhai bahani jāṇi baḍabā anaḷa | 201 |
lāghaba śareṇa aneka bāṇa bidha
nārāje nārāje paḍitāḷe huanti cchandācchandi (sadhāsadha) | 202 |
occha nārāje yahuṁ nuārile jiṇi
śatedhārā śahasreka bidhale bhīṣme bege ṭāṇi | 203 |
baśvāmaitra mantreṇa nārāja ādrābaḷī
kr̥tāntaka anaḷa prāẏa śara hāde jaḷi | 204 |
ātreṣi gāṅgabe nārāja bidhaleka pārthibe
deba śahasra bidhaleṭi bhīṣme sambhāḷa boile bāsudebe | 205 |
nārāẏaṇaṁka bacane pātha timvura śara gheni
bhīṣmaṁkara nārājanta ye cchedile phālaguni | 206 |
puṇa gāṅgabe ye kuhukāśara peṣi
ghoṭilāka kuhuḍi ye ākāśa na diśi | 207 |
arjunara agrate ye gobinde boile
dekha ho gaṅgabe ye āja kapaṭa yudda kale | 208 |
lg.note: pūc bonṅa pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara:-
