lg.l: bābu mohora ye prāṇara ballabha goṭi bhāi
chāḍilu kaurebe mohora pāde dhyāẏi |
tohora bandi śuṇi mohora mane trāsa
phiṭilā bipada muṁ pāili sāhāsa |
śuṇa ho caitana bolanti manurāẏe
bhīṣma arjunaṁkara samara ghora hoẏe |
nārāẏaṇaṁka bacane drahasita sac bonṅasācī
suryyābrateka nārāja arjuna āma~chi | 209 |
ādityaṁkara teja yahuṁ ākāśeṇa ghoṭi
kuhuḍira drocchanā ye galāka hāde phāṭi | 210 |
puṇihiṁ gāṅgabe ye pannagā śara peṣi
garjuṇa panaṅga ye pheru ṭeki āsi | 211 |
sarpanta dekhiṇa ye arjuna mahābaḷī
khagabara nārāja bidhalā bīra pātha toḷi | 212 |
samare teja yahuṁ bikāśilā bainetra
dekhiṇa pannage ye hoile mr̥tugata | 213 |
bāṇa jvāḷābaḷī jāṇi baraṣāra kāḷa
tisirā pahara āsi hoilāka beḷa | 214 |
dinakara samara sambhabara kāḷe
pacchime teja bikāśile ādatya digapāḷe | 215 |
dinakara samara sari āreka dina caubiṁśa daṇḍa
raṇaraṅge teja duguṇa ye ākāśe mārataṇḍa | 216 |
pāṇḍabanta piṭhi kharā dinara adhapariyante
lāgilā mukha kharā teja pacchi maku leuṭante | 217 |
abiṣaṇe bāṇa ho bidhanteṇa beni
jhāḷeṇa tripaṇḍa ye hoilā phālarāni | 218 |
ādityaṁkara teja, śahasra ḷvāḷābaḷī
arjunara kapālūṁ śrama jhāḷa gaḷi | 219 |
chāri aśvaṁku ye chāriśate bāṇa
arjuna uparaku biddhale bhīṣma mahārāṇa | 220 |
nandighoṣa ratha dhvaje bijaẏe hanumanta
tahiṁki sahasre bāṇa bidhale gaṅgāsuta | 221 |
lg.note: dekhiṇa pannagamāne paḷāile cthinnacchanā | (gha,jha,ṛha)
lg.l: ratha chārikhamvaku chāri sahasra śara
beni sahasra bidhale ye arjuna upara | 222 |
leuṭiṇa pāthaku pratibākya dianti banamāḷī
asambhāḷa helā bābu pāribuṭi ki sambhāḷi | 223 |
sabuṁkuhiṁ uprodha gcchaḍilā śāẏantani
begeṇa pāru yebe nibāra kara ho phālaguni | 224 |
jhāḷeṇa gaḷita ye paḍilā beni ākhi
abalokane chāhiṁ se nuārai dekhi | 225 |
arjuna boilā nātha kimpāiṁ kara bhīti
ẏehiṣaṇi bhīṣmaṁkara nārāja kāṭibi bikoti | 226 |
apāra tiraṇa yebe hoiba ẏeka rāji
kiṁcita anaḷe tāhā pāraiṭi dhvaṁsi | 227 |
ahibrateka nārāja arjuna bidhalā
kaṣaṇī aṅguṣṭhare lalāṭa pocchidilā | 228 |
ẏeteka cchidra pāi bhīṣme śara sadha
dhātikāre pāḍile se daśa sahasra yodhī | 229 |
sāṁgrāma rahu boḷi kaḷeka śaṅkhadhuni
jaẏa kari bāhuḍile kaureba saini | 230 |
arjuna binoẏī kari pucchai śrīkr̥ṣṇe
jaẏa śagkha śabada kari bāhuḍile kuru sainye | 231 |
gobinde boile bāma ḍāhāṇe chāhaṁ pātha
bhīṣme pāḍale tohora daśa sahasra ratha | 232 |
ratharu bāhāra hoi chāhaiṁ jirīṭī
ratha gaja aśva yoddha ẏe beni khaṇḍa hoi paḍicchanti mahīloṭi | 233 |
nārāẏaṇa mukha chāhiṁ arjuna kalā pucchā
nicaẏeṁ pāṇḍaba baḷa deba nuha??nti āu raṣā | 234 |
lalāṭuṁ gharma yahuṁ paśilā naẏane
ahibrateka śara peṣile lalāṭa pocchuṁ bahane | 235 |
ẏeteka cchidra mohora bhīṣmadeba pāilā
daśa sahasra yoddhā pāḍa bege galā | 236 |
ẏeḍeka dvanda hari ārambhilu anamite
āmbhanta raṣā hari karibu kemante | 237 |
kaureba saini ye aneka ānande
hastināre yāiṁ paśanta aneka sānande | 238 |
yaśa kaḷasa pātāṅga bīre uḍāile rathe
pratagyāṁ sārthuka kale śāẏantanu sute | 239 |
biṣāda pāṇḍaba baḷa saini samaste
pādānti rathī yoddhā rājāra sahite | 240 |
bikaḷa phāḷaguni yoddāṁkara kaṣṭa dekhi
aruṇa ulloḷa jāṇi bahai beni ākhi | 241 |
arjuna boilā hari maraṇa nohilā ẏehāṁkara āge
mohora pāiṁ paḍile ẏehā muṁ dekhibi keuṁ bāge | 242 |
mandara deśara rājā bhīma cakrabratī
se rājāra tule paḍile daśa sasra rathī | 243 |
yojaneka āẏatane paḍile pādānti
rebai phālaguni dekhiṇa tāhāṁkara śāsti | 244 |
aneka baikulya ye hoile dhanurjaẏe
ābara jīcana mora kisa ye upāẏe | 245 |
jībantu maraṇa ye aṭai baḍa sukha
jaintā kaṭake yāiṁ chāhiṁmā kāhā mukha | 246 |
jagate śubhilā pāṇḍabe jagujitā
rājusī yāge dekhile sampada baḷabantā | 247 |
sehi sampada prāẏe bujhi aile āśa kari
yudde paḍale āja adoṣe hoile apahārī | 248 |
lg.note: jībantu–bañchabā apeṣā |
lg.l: āmbhara nimante aile samara karibe
badhutā laṣaṇa thiba śatr̥nta māribe | 149 |
aneka baikulya hoi rebai bīra pātha
arjuanaku samvodhanti prabhma jagannātha | 150 |
āho rāga sahi nuāriṇa ārambhilu yudda
ẏetebeḷaku tu kāhiṁ karu trodha | 151 |
sampada bipada ẏe āpaṇāra kalā karma
jini ki hāri ki ẏe cchatrīṁkara dharma | 152 |
oprodhi yoddāmāne paḍile puṇa āja
sāṁgrāma pramāda bhūmi āpaṇe hoi prāṇatyāja | 153 |
jāta hele debatā hoile abaśya hoi mr̥tu
abichāre yama nāśa na karai janajantu | 154 |
māhā yāgathāna ẏe aneka puṇye pāi
ẏe mahābhāratha yudde paḍale baikuṇṭhe ṭhāba hoi | 155 |
ākāśaku tallera tora yete saina paḍile
śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁka bacane pārtha śūnyaku chāhiṁle | 156 |
dekhile samare paḍile yete yoddāmāne
samaste ārehiacchanti puṣyeka bimāne | 157 |
aneka ratna ye śarīreṇa hoicchanti maṇḍi
āge bīratūra kaṁsāḷa marddaḷa bājai dāuṁṇḍi | 158 |
aneka pāṭacchatra hoḍacchi puṣya br̥ṣṭi
ohobaḷa yeteka paḍile dekhilā kirīṭī | 159 |
arjuna praṇapatya śrībāsudebaṁ caraṇa taḷe
biṣāda trodha pārtha gcchaḍilā tetebeḷe | 160 |
lg.note:
{biarthe yoddāẏe paḍile raṇe āi??
āpaṇe samare ye hoi prāṇatyāja | (ñja,tha,na)}
trodha–śokā 257|1 tallekara–talaẏe kara |
lg.l: tu deba śaṅgacakra dhāraṇa madhuhārī
śaẏaḷa jana cintāmaṇi dukhī jana nistārī | 261 |
ẏe tohora śrīmukha goṭi dekhiṇa adyāpi
pābanti parama gati taranti sac bonṅa pāpī | 262 |
chāṇḍāḷa ḍama ye thile bādyakāra
sabuntu dekhili muhiṁ aṣaẏe svargapura | 263 |
sārthaka jībana mora muṁ dekhili śrīpati
jīibāḍaṁ maraṇa ẏe sādhu parama gati | 264 |
arjuna aneka ye krodha karuthilā
jagujana mohana nātha tā manu bhrānti cchaḍāilā | 265 |
jaẏa tu hr̥ṣīkeśa jagata jana cintā
jaẏa tu yogeśvara nātha parama gati dyantā | 266 |
śveta pīta kuṁkuma barṇṇe tini mūrtti
mahā naraka uddāraṇa prasanne parama gati | 267 |
sac bonṅajana cintāmaṇi cintai mama hr̥de
yamadaṇḍa khaṇḍaṇa nātha tohora prasāde | 268 |
svāmī asañkhya mahābhāratha ẏe munijana bākye
debe agocara yāhā sañchita kāhāra śakye | 269 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa prasanne mote bara dile abhaẏe piṅgaḷāṣī
gicijāra prasanne muṁ lekhana karuacchi | 270 |
nohoi paṇḍita muṁ na paḍhili bāḷakāḷe
hr̥dagate biśrāmile mora śrīcaṇḍī sāreḷe | 271 |
na paḍhi paṇḍita muhiṁ bidyā śāsra prāpata adabhmate
śūdramuni sāreḷa dāsa śrīcaṇḍī hr̥de cinte | 272-2231 |
lg.note: saẏaḷa jana cintāmaṇi pratyaṣe abatari | (tha,na,ñja)
jībara sukr̥ta mora sādhu parama gati | (ñja,tha,na)
nohai paṇḍita muṁ na paṛḍhili dhīra mele | (jha,ṭa,ṅa)
lg.head: {@bhīṣmaṅka nikaṭare purehitaṅkara annadāna kathā barṇṇana@}
lg.l: baibasuta manu āge badaẏanti agasti
arjunaku samārjanā kari āsanti śrīpati | 1 |
bijaẏe dharma nandana indrapraśastare
birase paśile yāiṁ ye yāhā mandire | 2 |
srāhāna nityakarma sāriṇa deba pukā
pitr̥ āhānika sāri muṇohire bije debarājā | 3 |
śuṇa ho baibasuta manu kaureba saini
sādhu sādhu bhīṣme coli śubhilā mukha dhuni | 4 |
aneka arghya bandābanti bhīṣmaṁkara māthe
laṣe ratna gheni srāhāna karāile kurunāthe | 5 |
ẏemante samara karante daśadina niti
pāṇḍaba saina kāhiṁ ābara thibe brati | 6 |
srāhāna nitya karma sāriṇa trikāḷa
muṇohire bije kale rājā sūryya beḷa | 7 |
dāneṇa dātabya se śāẏentanura tanai
hatyā dosa biocana nimante dharma prohita rāiṇa bhāḷai | 8 |
bhīṣme boile prohite āmbhe aneka kalu hatyā
ẏethaku mane mora lāgilā garu cintā | 9 |
dharma purehite boile bhīṣma annadāna dile
hatyādi bimocana hoiba ho jana sustha hele | 10 |
bhīṣme boile ẏemanta acchiṭiki pūrbe
taba mukhuṁ śuṇile sañprate pibi bhale ẏebe | 11 |
lg.note: "taba mukhaṁ śuṇile sañprate yibi bhale ẏebe" | pāṭha pare
lg.l: ’gha’ re adhika pāṭha |
keuṁ dāna dile kebaṇa puṇya pāi
ẏe kathā dharma prohite kaha tu bujhāi |
pūrbeṇa kebaṇa rājā deiacchi anna dāna
pāpa yaẏe kari ki nasicchi puṇya thāna | 12 |
dharma prohite boile śuṇa pūc bonṅara ye kathā
siddhaudeka boli satya yugara bāratā | 13 |
purarabā c bonṅaśe śvetakaḷpa boli rāẏe
dāneṇa śūrabanta se bitaṣaṇa svaẏeṁ | 14 |
aneka yāga yagyaṁ kalā mahīpatye
gaja aśva kaṇaẏa dāna dilāka apramite | 15 |
jaḷadāna bhūmidāna dilā ohomukhī | (ubhaẏa mukhī)
tuḷā puruṣa gajaghaṇṭa śakaṭa dāna biyuḷa laṣmī | 16 |
ẏe bidhi laṣeka dāna dilāka sāgare
samasta dāna dilā śvetakaḷpa mahīdhare | 17 |
sucitte dāna dilā sapata dvīpā mahī
brāhmaṇe bhejana se na dilā kicchihiṁ | 18 |
satyayuga sāta laṣa nau sahasra bacaṣa brati
kāḷeṇa prāṇa tyāja hoilā śvetakaḷpa nr̥pati | 19 |
bichāri boile rājāku yama dharma yurāṇe
trāseṇa pāśaku kehi na gale yamagaṇe | 20 |

div.note: pubonṅa puṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara:-

lg.l: bhīṣmaṁkara bacane kahanti prohite
sābadhāne śuṇa tu ho kahai muhiṁ tote | (gha)

18{bhaṇḍāra yāka dāna dilā śvetakaḷpa rājana
brāhmaṇe bhejana se na dilā annadāna | (jha,tha,ñja,ḍha,ṇa)}
lg.note: trāseṇa pāśaku kehi na gale yamagaṇe | pāṭha pare ’ccha’ pothire
adhikā pāṭha |
dāna anarūpe kaleka sanamāna
dibya āsane basāile prāsāde aṣṭaranta?? |
śarīre ābharaṇa kale aneka ranta koṣa
palyaṁke supāti candrātapa jhīnabāsa |
lg.l: āstāne basāile nei yama dharma loke
aneka ratna bhūṣaṇa kale br̥ndāarke | 21 |
ṣudhāẏe dagadha ye hoilā nr̥pamaṇi
svargeṇa naraindra ye loḍai anna pāṇi | 22 |
dineka bije kale bidhātā kuśapāṇi
tāhāṁu bikaḷe ye kahai nr̥pamaṇi | 23 |
bho pitāmaha mora ṣudhāẏe śarīra ākuḷa
ẏetheṁ kimpāiṁ mote na miḷai annajaḷa | 24 |
ẏe ratna ābharaṇa hoilā mote biṣa
ẏethakaiṁ kāraṇa mote kara jagatara īśa | 25 |
pitāmaha boile tu ye na dilu anna dāna
dile se pāi ẏe kathā śāhāsra bidhāna | 26 |
āgyāṁ hoilā yebe lagilā baḍa ṣudhā
annadāna debāku ye mane na kalu śradhā | 27 |
piṇḍa ye dahile tora śamaśāna bhūmi
se dhuḷi pāuṁśe tohora pratimā kale āṇi | 28 |
se mr̥tupiṇḍa pituḷira yeteka māṭi ye māẏeṁsa
tāhā bhaṣuṇa thile tora piṇḍa prāṇa hoiba toṣa | 29 |
āho pitāmahara bacane se śvetakaḷpa mahārāẏe
se pituḷi māṭi māṁẏesa bhaṣi triputi karai tāra kāẏe | 30 |
ẏe bidhimate śate baraṣa pariyante
tāhā bhaṣaṇa se ye karuthāi anubrate | 31 |
lg.note: puc bonṅa pr̥ṣṭhāra pāṭhāntara:-
lg.l: yāhā dāna deithilā śvetakaḷpa rāẏe
śateguṇa svarga bhoga se ṭhābare pāẏe |
kāhiṁ ratna kuḍha aneka sampada
ẏekai leśai na milai anna khāida |
lg.note: yamadharma boile tu ye dei nāhuṁ annadāna | ñja,tha,na)
na dilu annadāna bhaṣite kalu śraddā | [ñja,tha,na
lg.l: āho bhīṣma dhanu śukḷa paṣa paurṇṇamīra dina
bhrigūbāra puṣyā naṣatra bidyamāna | 32 |
bāḷaba nāme karaṇa brahma nāme yoga
pitāmaha bije kale yāiṁṇa madhya svarga | 33 |
pitāmahakaiṁ dekhi śvetakaḷpa pāḍilāka bobi
bho pitāmaha kemante muṁ kāraṇa pāibi | 34 |
pitāmaha boile satyapuge agasti boḷi āmbhara hāde śiṣi
se tote bheṭile mukati gati pāasi | 35 |
tretaẏā yuga galā dvāparahiṁ tuṭilā
kaḷiyuga yāiṁ satya yuga prabeśa hoilā | 36 |
satyayuga chāriḷaṣa aṭhāśi sahasra baraṣe
makara māsa śukaḷa paṣa pañchamī dibase | 37 |
āditya bāra uttaca bhīdra naṣatra base
śiba nāme karaṇa sādhya nāme yoga ye gaṇitā | 38 |
sedina agasti bije ākāśa gaṅgā srāhāne
haribrahma deśe bāhijya śamaśāne | 39 |
daṇḍa kamalū muni kaṣā kaupunye
caḷanti mahāmuni nityakarma bidhāne
mr̥tu śamaśāne miḷile mahāmunye | 40 |
dekhile śamaśāne śvetakaḷpa rājāra abastā
mr̥ttikā pituḷi ye āhāreṇa śakatā | 41 |
agasti boile mahāmtā mr̥ttikā pituḷi kimpe bhaṣu
amr̥ta tejyā kari ẏehā kimpe icchu | 42 |
kisa kāraṇe tohora ẏe pāpa prakr̥ti
tohora nāma kisa bolinti mahāyati | 43 |
agastiṁki bacane se bolai bacana
muhiṁ ye śvetakaḷpa śuṇa ho mahāmunyā | 44 |
aneka yāgayagyaṁ kali muhiṁ dāna
brāhmaṇe annadāna na dili bhejana | 45 |
samaẏeke prāṇatyāja hoili yetebeḷe
annakaṣṭa pāili muṁ gagana maṇḍaḷe | 46 |
agasti boile aneka ratna ābharaṇa tora kāẏe
rūpa guṇe diśuacchuṁ kubera suja prāẏe | 47 |
pitāmaha boile tu na hilu annadāna
ẏe tora mr̥tupuṇḍa pratimā karuthā bhaṣaṇa | 48 |
muhiṁ boili ẏethakaiṁ pratikāra karasi ye mote
ẏe durāpada kaṣṭaru pāri hoibi kemante | 49 |
pitāmaha boile tu agasti yebe bheṭu
tāhāṁkare mukati tu hoibu ẏe kaṣṭuṁ | 50 |
ẏehā śuṇi ẏe pathe muṁ basicchi nibeśi
agastaṁki bheṭile mohora kaṣṭa hoẏe dhvaṁsi | 51 |
āhe paṇḍāẏe ẏehirūpe pāñcha yuga galā bahi
agasti mahāmtāṁku na dekhiḷi muhiṁ | 52 |
bhe paṇḍāẏe tumbhe agastiṁki bheṭile kahiba
se mahāmtāṁka prasanne mora kaṣṭa pārayiba | 53 |
śvetakaḷpa rājāra ẏesaneka bākya śuṇi
nityakarme gale muni tāhā hr̥de guṇi | 54 |
mekhaḷā gaṅgāre muni srāhāna sārile
ẏe bidhi nityakarma jaḷare se kale | 55 |
bāhuḍanti mahātamā nija ye āśrame
śvetakaḷpa rājākaiṁ bheṭile śamaśāne | 56 |
śuṇa ho mahārājā badaẏanti agasti
āmbhe ye bāḷakhilā pitāmahara apatya | 57 |

div.note: anna aśakate ṣudhā (dukha)muṁ gagana maṇḍaḷe | (ṅa,jha,ḍha)

lg.l: brāhmaṇa bhejanakaiṁ pāṇi chāḍasi āmbhara hāthe
ẏe pāpa kaṣṭuṁ pāra hoile dia pacche mote | 58 |
ḍāhāṇabrateka śaṅkhe jaḷa tiḷa bhari āṇi
agastiṁka hāthe jaḷa toḷi dilā nr̥pamaṇi | 59 |
athabā dei ye nuāribi tote
tri puti bhaji nahāmtā kāraṇa karibāka mote | 60 |
satya satya bākya kariṇa śvetakaḷpa nr̥pati
agastiṁka hāthe dei hoilā triputi | 61 |
yāa yā mr̥tu piṇḍa na bhaṣa ho śveta
bāhuḍi satakarma tote hou parāpata | 62 |
idaṁ bākye agastiṁkara ẏesaneka kathā
tahuṁ pāri hoiṇa se rājā hoilā annadātā | 63 |
chāṣī dāẏi niai yebaṇa dhāna kiāri
tahiṁ goṭiẏe goṭiẏe paḍiacchi dhāna bireḷeṇa jhaḍi | 64 |
goṭiẏe goṭiẏe kari tāhā khuṇṭilā naranāhā
tiriśi dine agastiṁki bhejana dilā tāhā | 65 |
śuṇa ho gāṅgabe boile dharma prohite
anna dāna na diḷe kaṣaṇa paḍaiṭi ẏete | 66 |
athabā bahuta yebe dei nuāriba anna dāna
dukhe paḍi ẏekābeḷe debu ye bhejana | 67 |
bhīṣme sānanda hoile puāṇa bākya śuṇi
laṣeka brāhmaṇanta se bhojana diai nitye āṇi | 68 |
sehi srasvatī tīre bhiāile anna cchatra
yete cchacchā ẏe bhojana pābanti samasta | 69 |
anna cchatra basra cchatra ābara pāṇi cchatra
yudde śrama pāi bhojana pābanti bhuñjanti samasta | 70 |

div.note: anna dāna dile kaṣṭhāra hoai ẏete | (jha,gha,ṭa,ḍha)
daridra loka yekābeḷe debu ye bhogana | (ñja,tha,na)
ghr̥ta bya ñjana sadite bhmañjanti samasta | (ñja,tha,na)

lg.l: laṣa laṣa koṭi koṭi śakha padma saini
ye yetebeḷe loḍanti dibā ye raẏaṇī | 71 |
dāna dharma karante prasara hoilāka rāti
makara māsa śukaḷa paṣa tr̥tīyāra tithi | 72 |
śauribāra naṣatra śatabhiṣā kumbha
yudda karibāku se ye karanti ārambha | 73 |
kistughna nāme karaṇa byāghāta nāme yoga
makara sañtrāntiki ūṇeiśa dina bhoga | 74 |
tr̥tīẏa dibasaku mahābhāratha yudda lekhā
pāṇḍaba baḷanta bhīṣma na karanti śaṁkā | 75 |
bīratūra bijighoṣa bīra marddaḷa dāuṇḍi
aneka ratne bhīṣmaṁkara ratha maṇḍi | 76 |
uḍanti pāṭacchatra ālamva udaṇḍa
jhaḷakanti pañchulaṣi yesane mārataṇḍa | 77 |
ananta anarghya maṇi mukuṭa yesane candra cūḍa bikāśi
birājanti hr̥daẏare maṇi timiri bidāraṇa niśi | 78 |
tāḍa toḍhara bāhuṭi mukuṭa karṇṇāñchaḷa gajadaḷā
bida muhi kaṁkaśa saraḷa gaḷāẏe ratnamāḷā | 79 |
dibya beśa abatāra hoiṇa śāẏantani
rathe bije kale ye śrīkare kodaṇḍa gheni | 80 |
śrībhmaje aghya gheni mānacatrabratī
bhīṣmaṁkara śire nei bandāilāka taḍati | 81 |
dadhsibāmana anakūḷa ye samasta sandeha
ẏe mohora abhimāna pheḍasi pitāmaha | 82 |
svāmī kaureba baḷaku tihi se kāreṇī
tuhi se mohora c bonṅaśa uddāra kara puṇi | 83 |

div.note: tu se c bonṅaśa mohora karibu uddāraṇa | (ṅa,ccha)

lg.l: tuhi se mahāliṅga muhiṁ se śiba bhagatā
anāsta janaku tuhi se karu uddārantā | 84 |
bhīṣmauṁ śaraṇa muṁ na jāṇaiṁ āna
somac bonṅaśa uddāraṇa raṣaṇa tāraṇa | 85 |
aneka purasari ye kahilā kurupati
kārttikeśvara prāẏe diśai bhīṣmaṁkara mūrtti | 86 |
pāñcha sahasra ratha biṁśa sahasra hāthī
chāḷiśa laṣa yodhā tule bhīṣma mahārathī | 87 |
gagana ucchuḷai bīratūra bāṇī
sambharbe saja hoile sakaḷa nr̥pamaṇi | 88 |
ratha gaja saini ye samare palāṇi
samadaṇḍa gheni bhīṣma āgare āgiāṇi | 89 |
droṇa karṇṇa śalya jadyaratha aśastamā
bhūrisarba somadatta bāhla ka kr̥pabrahmā | 90 |
driyodhana rājā y subarṇṇamaẏe rathe
śārddoḷara carme maṇḍita susañche | 91 |
netara pātāṅga ye uḍai pharahara
cchatra chāmara ye bimaḷa apāra | 92 |
śateka sodara bāma ḍāhāṇe śobhībana
yuddaku gamana se hastinā rājana | 93 |
maṅgaḷa ārati kale prohita bidujana
bhīṭe kaẏebāra tusta karanti mārgeṇa | 94 |
nagrara yabatīmāne dianti huḷāhuḷi
mānagobinda rājā madhya thāṭhe caḷi | 95 |

div.note:
{bho deba samare tumbhanta muṁ na māgai āna
somac bonṅaśara candra tu śaraṇa raṣaṇa tora cihna | (ṅa,tha,ñja,na)}
aśi laṣa yoddā tule bhīṣma mahārathī | (ñja,tha,na)

lg.l: aneka bīratūra bājai bikaṭāḷa
prabeśa kuru saina kuruṣetra maṇḍaḷa | 96 |
pāṇḍaba baḷa samaste bhīṣmanta praśaṁsi
nicaẏe āja ho bhīṣma dhaṁsiba ẏehu baḷarāśi | 97 |
pāṇḍaba baḷa tahiṁ bismaẏe bhāḷante
śveta nāme rathī ye birāṭai sute | 98 |
saṣṭikara ratha kanaka haẏeṇī
upilā marakata jāṇi diśai dinamaṇi | 99 |
hīrā nīḷā moti māṇikya puñji puñji
rathara chāri pākhe troṇāmāna khañji | 100 |
ratha dhvaja ypare subarṇṇa kalaśa
keśarī lāṅgaḷa cihna dhvajāre prakāśa | 101 |

div.note: "nicaẏe āja ho bhīṣma dhaṁsiba ẏehu baḷarāśi" pare ’ccha’ pothire

lg.l: bhinna pāṭha:-
ẏethu anantare śuṇa ho manurāẏe
pāṇḍaba baḷa thāṭhare ye lāgilā mahābhaẏe |
nicaẏe bhīṣme āja nāśibe samasta
pāṇḍaba sainamāne bhāḷanti bhaẏa citta |
ẏethu anantare debakī nandana
nandi ghoṣa ratha sājanti nārāẏaṇa |
ye yāhāra nityakarma samasta rāẏe sāri
bājai sadāuje niśāṇa bādya bherī |
ye yāhā anarūpe maṇḍi le ratha gaja
yuddakaiṁ samaste hoileka saja |
yujheṣṭhira mahārājānta karanti draśana
śaṅkha śveti uttara birāṭa rājana |
yujheṣṭhiṁka chāmure se hoile pariṇāmi
uṭha uṭha boile yujheṣṭhi deba svāmī |
śveta kumara kahai yoḍiṇa beni kara
bhe deba āja mote senāpati kara |
pharahara pātāṅga uḍai gagana
bijuḷi teja jāṇi diai śobhībana | 102 |
se rathare bijaẏe kumāra bīra śveta
śaṅkha śveta uttara birāṭara tini suta | 103 |
tini bhāi tini ratha hāde sāji
chekhāra turaṅgama ye yocilā acchi chāri bājī | 104 |
māhā mahā aśve ye acchanti pracaṇḍa
ṣaṇake leuṭāi se pāranti brahmāṇḍa | 105 |
dhasāiṁ ratha ye ṭekiḷe tini rathī
yujheṣṭhiṁka pādataḷe praḷamva karanti | 106 |
śveta praṇamita ye yujheṣṭhiṁkara padmapāde
mote senāpati kara muṁ jiṇimaiṁ hāde | 107 |
kiñchita kaureba tiraṇa hāde prāẏe
muhiṁ se dābānaḷa tāṁku pracaṇḍa teja hoẏe | 108 |
ṣaṇeke bhīṣmaṁku muṁ kari pārai tr̥ṇarāśi
pūc bonṅara bidyā muhiṁ ye acchai abhyāsi | 109 |
nabakoṭi bidyā ye mohora garbhagate
nimiṣeke bhīṣmaṁku muṁ jiṇaiṁ turite | 110 |
biśvāmitra bidyā muhiṁ pāiacchi bhale
nimiṣeke bhīṣmaṁku jiṇimaiṁ mote senāpati kale | 111 |
yujheṣṭhi sanamata kale tāhāra pratagyāṁ hāde śuṇi
arjuna gcchamure ubhāile śveta kumāraku āṇi | 112 |
badaẏanti yujheṣṭhi bābu śuṇa sac bonṅasācī
baḍāi pratagyāṁ ye śveta karuacchi | 113 |
arjuna boilāka śuṇimā deba dharme
ẏehāra jyeṣṭha bhrātha nelā mote godhana haraṇe | 114 |
samadaṇḍa dekhiṇa se hoilā kātara
boilā mote kimpe āṇilu tu ye samuda bhitara | 115 |
muṁ puṇi kahili yoddāmānaṁkara kathā
mote gcchaḍi paḷāilā hoiṇa aneka abasthā | 116 |
gopyāna banabāsa kathā kahili tā pāśa
aṭhara ṣeuṇīki muṁ ẏekā deli jhāsa | 117 |
ẏehāṁka mahimā muhiṁ jāṇiacchi bhale
rājyara āśa chāḍa ẏehāṁkara āśa kale | 118 |
svāmī atianta prakhara ye prasiddha paṣībara śuā
jāhārira bole nāge bhaṣi pārai ki tāhā | 119 |
svāmī acyanta sohoḍa ye daśanti naṭakārī loke
tāhānta āśakale bheḷā buḍāntiṭi thoke | 120 |
svāmī yaubane kale prāṇe hoi prābhabī
tāhānta āśa kale prāṇe hoi prābhabi | 121 |
svāmī dhanabanta hoiṇa ati kr̥paṇa hoile
kīrtti dharma nāśa hoi tāhāre āśre kale | 122 |
svāmī atianta ārambhe yebe samara ārambha karai ccheḷi
byāghrakaiṁ dekhile sañkorai remābaḷi | 123 |
svāmī teja gāte preta bistāra karai tuṇḍa
tāhāra baḷe kigiḷi hoiba bhūakhaṇḍa | 124 |
svāmī yāhāra yuddaku ḍarai śacīnāhā
ẏehāṁkara baḷare ẏe hoibaṭi kāhā | 125 |
lg.note:
svāmī atyanta utsarga ye pac bonṅatara śiḷā
pāśaku gale diśanta kebaḷa br̥ṣa māḷā (ñja,tha,na,)

{ati sohoḍa sundara diśanti yeuṁ loke
se lokaku āśa kariba kimpe abibeke | (tha,ñja,na)}

{svāmī kāmārthī huantiṭi yebaṇa cidhabā sti rī
tāhānta āśre kale tuṭai tapa dharma śirī | (ñja,tha,na)}
māribāra beḷe na caḷai remābaḷi | (ka,ṅa,jha,ñja,ṛha,tha,pa,na)

{svāmī teja gāṛḍhe bistāra preta bhūta tuṇḍa
giḷi pāranti se ye sapata brahmāṇḍa | (tha,ñja,na,ṅa,ṭa)}
lg.l: svāmī kāḷe sata nohaiṭi ẏehāṁkara kathā
sapana phaḷaku āśa karanti mūrkha jane yathā | 126 |
yajheṣṭhi debe śuṇi hoileka tūṣṇī
nārāẏaṇaṁka mukhaku chāhiṁṇa praṇamya kirīṭī | 127 |
ajāyūtha gheni kare ki byāghra gcchamure sāṁgrāma
tumbhe anugraha karibā puruṣaṁka uttama | 128 |
sahasre bhīṣma dui sahasra hou droṇa
chāri sahasra aśastamā pāñcha sahasa hou karṇṇa | 129 |
śalya bhūrisarba hou daśa sahasra ratha
jagannāthaṁka parasane jiṇima rīra pātha | 130 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ pratyagyāṁ ye karai bhārei malla kirīṭī
jagannāthaṁka pādapadme bīra yāiṁ loṭi | 131 |
tu mote sāhāpaṣa hoithāa jagannātha
sāṣa mātra hoiṇa bāhasi mora ratha | 132 |
yābata rathe mora sārathi bāsudeba
ẏe tini trailokye kehuṁ acchai mote se jiṇima | 133 |
brahmā indra rudra candra kubera hou yadi
brahmāṇḍa yāka hoile ke jiṇima manabhedī | 134 |
tu deba jagata mohana saẏaḷa jana cintā
tu deba māna uddāraṇa cirāẏaṣa diantā | 135 |
svāmī bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa śalya ye pratyaṣa bārānidhi
mānaba janneṇa kehu śara pārai saddha | (biddha) | 136 |
svāmī praẏāge jhāsili muṁ śate sahasreka janna
tote teṇu sañpaṣa yāiḷi puruṣaṁka uttama | 137 |
akāraṇa janaku hari kāraṇa karantā tuhi
to tahuṁ bhe nātha mora āśre nāhiṁ kehi | 138 |
134|2 manabhedī–arjana arthare praẏoga |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa caraṇe śaraṇa mora nitye
śudra muni sāreḷā dāsa caitana śrī mahābhārathe | 139–1370|

div.head: {@bhīṣmaṅkara tr̥tīẏa dina yuddha o caturthadine@}

lg.l: śveta senāpati pade niyukti
śuṇa tu mana ho kahai caitana
pratagyāṁ kari arjua ye bije kalā nandighoṣa yāna | 1 |
śribhmaje śaṅkha catra śāraṅgadhara pāṇi
rathare sārathi hari abheda āmtā jāṇi | 2 |
śaṅkha śveta goṣīra ye ābara aśva kāmapāḷa
haṁsapanti prāẏeka bihaḍanti sanya mahājaḷa | 3 |
ohobaḷa saini sāhera prāẏe aṭanti
tahiṁki chāri aśve haṁsa prāẏe trīḍanti | 4 |
yajheṣṭhi mahārājā kaṇaẏamaẏe ratha
tahiṁre uḍāiṇa ālamva pāṭa cchatra | 5 |
durddaṣa bhīmasena nakuḷa sahadeba
sātukī abhamanya birāṭa dr̥pada | 6 |
ghaṭauktiṭa dhr̥ṣṭadyumana śrīkhaṇḍī
śaṅkha śveta uttara kaṇaẏa ratha maṇḍi | 7 |
nr̥pati bāma ḍāhāṇe caḷanti mahārathī
āga pacche paṭothāra aneka ghoḍā hāthī | 8 |
sambharbe caḷanti ye nr̥pati dharmarāẏe
bīratūra nāde kuruma ucchuḷaẏe | 9 |
indra praśastaku raṇa bhūmi dvādaśa yojana
tin daṇḍa madhye yāiṁ bheṭile kuru saina | 10 |
lg.note: śrīkr̥ṣṇa caraṇe śaraṇa mora anubrate | (tha,ñja,na,)
rathare sārathi hari abheda kāyā jāṇi |(ṭa,dha)
lg.l: dekhile kuruthāṭhe ye bhīṣme āgiāṇi
samudra āboriacchi setubadha jāṇi | 11 |
jagu mohona nātha bhīṣmaṁka āgare yāiṁ bheṭi
dehiṇa gāṅgeba rathu ohḷāi caraṇe yāiṁ loṭi | 12 |
śate sahasra daṇḍabata bhīṣme hoile pariṇāmi
taba mukha chāhiṁ raṇa yāga debā svāmī | 13 |
gicinde boile tora pūrṇṇa hou manobāñchā
yāhā māgu tāhā bhegya kara tora icchā | 14 |
bhīṣme boile deba ohobaḷa thāṭha
arjuna mahārathī tumbhe sārathi puṇyataṭa | 15 |
bāñchā siddhiku yebe hoilu prasanna

ẏe raṇa yāge tora mukha chāhuṁ chāhuṁ

mote cchedu ye arjuna | 16 |
gobinde boile bhīṣme ẏehā se kala icchā
#arjuna bairitā hoi tora pūru manabāñchā | 17 |}
kahuṁ kahuṁ reṣita bīra phālaguni
kokopeṇa bidhale bhīṣme sahasra bāṇa gheni | 18 |
bhīṣme puṇa nārāja bidhale sahasra chāri
chāri aśva sārathi śrīkr̥ṣṇa ādi kari | 19 |
puṇa ahibateka gheniṇa nārāja
ātreṣiṇa bidhale kapiketana ye dhvaja | 20 |
hāthara byagratā hāde dekhita nuāri
jakaḍā br̥ṣṭi jāṇi bāṇa baraṣai jāḷābaḷi | 21 |
nārājaṁka teje ye āditya teja phāṭi
śāẏantanura nandana karai śara br̥ṣṭi | 22 |
lg.note: arjuna mahārathī tumbhe sārathi puṇya bāṭa | (gha,ccha)
kakaḍā māsare yehne baraṣai bāri | (ccha,ṭha)
śāẏanunara nandana śanya bhubana ādi kari ghoṭi | (ṅa,gha,ṛha)
lg.l: chāri aśva sārathi śrīkr̥ṣṇa ādi kari | 19 |
gobinde boile ho sambhāḷa bīra pātha
bhīṣmaṁkara nārāja ghoṭilā ẏe tohora ratha | 23 |
nārāẏaṇaṁka bacane gāṇḍīma dhanu pāṇi
pāñcha ahibrateka nārāja bidhalā bīra ṭāṇi | 24 |
puṇi bhīṣme aneka nārāja bege bidha
ẏekā prahārake arjuna tāhā cchedi | 25 |
gaṅgāra nandana dekhiṇa aneka praśaṁsi
dhanya dhanya pārtheba re pāṇḍaba guṇarāśi
śare śara paḍitāḷa nāhiṁ nā biśrāma | 26 |
diba bhmabi ghoṭilā bhīṣmaṁka sāṁgrāma | 27 |
śaṅga śveta uttara śrīkhaṇḍī dhr̥ṣṭa ye dyumanu
arjunara nandana kumāra abhimanyu | 28 |
dibya abatāra hoiṇa kumāra cchaḍa rathī
śveta kumāra āge āborilā droṇa mahārathī | 29 |
nārāja pūreiṇa kumāra śrīkhaṇḍī
aśastamāṁkara tule raṇa raṅge maṇḍi | 30 |
dhr̥ṣṭadyumana se ye cchatriẏa uttamā
ratha chāḷanteṇa āsi ogāḷile kr̥pabrahmā | 31 |
śaṅganāme rathī ye birāṭara suta
śalyaṁkara tule samara apramita | 32 |
karṇṇa chāmure uttara kumāra miḷi
somadatta rājāku ye abhimanyu ogāḷi | 33 |
bhūrisarbaẏe samara dr̥padara tule
birāṭa gcchamure kūpa āchāryye miḷile | 34 |
pāñcha sahasra rathī tuleṇa jadyaratha
āsiṇa miḷilā se bhīmasenara agrata | 35 |

div.note: ẏekā prahārake pātha tāhānta nirodhi | (jha,ñja)
caudiga ghoṭilā bhīṣmaṁka sāṁgrāma | (ccha,ṭha)
birāṭa agrate yāiṁ bāhmike miḷile | (tha,ñja,na)

lg.l: jadyarathakaiṁ dekhi bhīmasena hasi
ẏete dine jadyaratha gcchamure paḍilu re āsi | 36 |
dropatīki harilu ye kāḷebara bane
se dinuṁ bheṭābheṭi nāhiṁ bheṭilu ẏete dine | 37 |
sāta beṇṭi kari kāṭiluṁ tohora bāḷa lobi
dekhibā re jadyaratha ho kemanta hoiacchi | 38 |
gaḷi palīilu mohora beni jānu taḷe
pāsorāilā kathāre sumarāilu ẏetebeḷe | 39 |
daśanahe bidāri bikotibi tora gaḷā
ājahuṁ bidhabāre hoilā dr̥śiḷā | 40 |
jadyaratha boilā re bhīmā kalu mote sātabeṇṭi
sehi abhimāne sāta baraṣa khaṭiḷi dhūrjaṭi | 41 |
prasanne bara mote dile paśupati
yujheṣṭhi bhīma nakuḷa sahadeba āja jiśimi sabunti | 42 |
sandehe mote bara dileka deba trilocana
ẏekā mātra samare muṁ na jiṇimaiṁ arjuna | 43 |
hasaṇa bacana ye boilai brikodara
ẏebe nicaẏa prāṇa tora hariba nāśakara | 44 |
īśvara sebā yebe kalu jadyaratha
arjune jiṇimāku kimpe nohilu sāmaratha | 45 |
jadyaratha boilā muṁ jiṇimāku boili arjunaku
īśvare boile samare muṁ sari nohai ye tāku | 46 |
iśvare yahuṁ tāku nohile sāmarathā
muhiṁ mānaba mātra jiṇimāku kāhiṁ hoibi śakatā | 47 |
bhīmasena boilā re ẏemanta yebe jāṇu
driyodhanara āge kimpe tu na bakhāṇu | 48 |

div.note: dropatīki harilu ye tāḷa bane | (tha,ñja,na)
gaḷāi deli re tote beni jānu taḷe | (gha,ṛha,jha,tha)

lg.l: īśvara debatā yāku samare nohe samasari
tāhāra tule tumbhe kemante dvanda kari | 49 |
jadyaratha boilā mote bara dile hara
tohora mr̥tu acchi bhīmā mohora hāthara | 50 |
tumbhemāne male re ẏekā thiba arajuna
bhīṣma droṇe ābori ghenime tāhāra jībana | 51 |
bhīsena boilā yebe tote bara dile hara
tohora mr̥tu nicaẏe mohora hāthara | 52 |
jadyaratha boilā bhīmā kahai muṁ tote
mohora maraṇa kāhiṁ loḍu tora hāthe | 53 |
laṣe baḷa dhanure ye nārāja pūrei
ẏekā prahārake yebe mora śira hāde pāribu cchināiṁ | 54 |
se muṇḍa cchiḍi yebe bhūmire paḍai
bāhuḍi cchiḍilā muṇḍa mora lāgiba kadhe yāiṁ | 55 |
kadharu cchiḍi muṇḍa mora yebe bhūmire na paḍiba
antarīṣa māreṇa uḍāi gheni yiba | 56 |
mohora pitā tapa karuacchi uttarāṁkura tīrthe
se muṇḍa paḍiba yāiṁ tāhāṁkara hāthe | 57 |
adha paṭaḷa bādha basi karuacchi tapa mora tāta
muṇḍa paḍante boḷiba hou bhasmaṁgata | 58 |
pitāra bhasma boile jaḷiba mora śira
ẏete bāge mora mr̥tu śuṇa re brikodara | 59 |
bhīmasena boilā re pratyagyāṁ mohora dekha
mohora prahāre tu hoibu nirekha | 60 |
ẏete boli gadābara bulāi piṭilā rathare
jadyaratha rathuṁ ḍeiṁ paḍilā bhūmire | 61 |

div.note: tumbha chāri bhīiṁkara mr̥tu mohora hāthara | (gha,na)

lg.l: gadā prahāra yahuṁ kalāka bhīmasena
ratha aśva sārathi sabu hoilāka cūrṇṇa | 62 |
bhīmasena hākai re jadyaratha raha raha
harabara pāiacchu bāre yudda mora saha | 63 |
paḷāilā jadyaratha na chāheṁ leuṭi
rathīmānanta bhīmasena goḍāiṇa piṭi | 64 |
mandara pac bonṅata jāṇiṇa bhīmasenara kāẏe
gadā beni diśanta pac bonṅatara prāẏe | 65 |
ẏekā prahārake daśa biṁśa rathī bhāñji
raṇaraṅga dhandoḷa pāṇḍaba samare gaḷagāji | 66 |
na rahanti yoddāẏe paḷābanti ḍare
bīrabara yoddāẏe yāiṁ gadā piṭanti upare | 67 |
gadā paḍanteṇa bhīma pātai bāmaaṅga
paḍa gadā mudugara honti sac bonṅa bhaṅga | 68 |
lohasāra nirbāṇa yāhāra aṅga goṭi
bidhante śahasra tāhāra dehare na phuṭi | 69 |
dukarṇṇara tule ye durddaṣara samara
kāḷaagni jāṇiṇa diśanti beni bīra | 70 |
mudugara bulāi kope bolai bikarṇṇa
āja re duddaṣa tora pūrilā jībana | 71 |
giribara gcchaḍi āśre kalu br̥ṣamāḷi
āpaṇāra kuḷe tu re lagāilu kāḷi | 72 |
āja tu mohora hāthe hoilu nidhana
pāñji tora āja pocchilā nāśakara yama | 73 |
samara mukhe ẏebe paḍilu mora āga
tote māri kurupatira cchaḍāibi māna rāga | 74 |

div.note: (dukarṇṇa-bikarṇṇa sthānare sāraḷā kahicchanti )

lg.l: dukarṇṇara pratagyāṁ dekhiṇa bīrabara durddaṣa
boilā re bhāi mohora āge paḍi hoilu nirekha | 75 |
gadā bulāi boilā sambhāḷa sambhāḷa re bhāi
ātreṣa prahāra kalā gadābara bulāi | 76 |
bajra prahāre yesane kampai brahmāṇḍa
duhiṁkara gadā bāji hoilāka masīguṇḍā | 77 |
sañjiẏara nandana ye pādagati hoi uṭhi
durddaṣa upare nei gadā ātreṣiṇa piṭi | 78 |
durddaṣara gadā dukarṇṇara gadā beni
jhaṇa jhaṇānti hoi ye uṭhilā bahani | 79 |
duhiṁkara gadā bāji hoilāka masīguṇḍā
garjai samare se kaureba kuḷa ṣaṇḍā | 80 |
karanti sañāgrāma se lāganti māḷabadhe
muthe mutha prahāranti karanti mahāyudde | 81 |
reme reme gaḷiṇa bahai śoṇita
duheṁ ẏekatva deha jāṇiṇa jaḍata | 82 |
yāmaḷā br̥ṣa yehne na yāi bāraṇa
durddaṣa aprāñjaẏe pāilāka raṇa | 83 |
durddaṣaku māḍi basilā dukarṇṇa mahābaḷī
hr̥dagate māḍi bisilā mālabadha oḷi | 84 |
ḍāhāṇa kare mutha uñchāi bāma kare māḍi basilā tāra taṇṭi
bidārai baṣasthaḷa re maribu ẏehiṣaṇi bhāi goṭi | 85 |
durddaṣa abasthā dekhiṇa śrīkhaṇḍī
dhāiṁ yāiṁ dukarṇṇara upare piṭilā bhūṣaṇḍī | 86 |
śirare paḍilā tā bajraghāta jāṇi
ghāẏeṇa paḍilā ye dukarṇṇa bīramaṇi | 87 |
samare paḍilā bīra uttanaśāẏī hoi
durddaṣa sañhari ubhā helā tahiṁ | 88 |
85|2 bidāribi baṣa re paḍilu bhāigoṭi | (ka,kha,ccha,ṭa,ṭha)
dhāiṁṇa kumara ye dhailā kr̥pāṇa
dukarṇṇa upare nei piṭilā tataṣaṇa | 89 |
beni khaṇḍa hoiṇa paḍalā dukarṇṇa
jaẏe śaṅkha kaleka dhr̥ṣṭa ye dyumana | 90 |
agasti boile śuṇa ho baibasuta manu
tri amvakara tule yudda kalā abhimanyu | 91 |
samare anibāraṇa paṇḍu rājāra nāti
ẏekasara hoiṇa sehu laṣe baḷa mañcchi | 92 |
tini sahasra rathī se badha kalā heḷe
dutī arjuna prāẏe diśai mahāreḷe | 93 |
yesaneke sidhu manthi rāẏe baḷī
tesane sañjāta birāṭa kumara śveta mahābaḷī | 94 |
kāśī rājāra tule samara bahuta
anibāraṇa bāṇa bidhai ye bīra śveta | 95 |
sahasreka rathī ye nibārilā samare
gaja yodhā dui sahasra paḍile sehiṭhāre | 96 |
aśva yoddā māilā tini sahasra raṇe
akaḷita samare śveta thāṭha nanthi ẏekā jaṇe | 97 |
puna sahasre nārāja se bidhalā gaḷagāji
bāhlika yoddāra se ratha gaḷā bhāji | 98 |
rājāra biarthare saini paḷāile bhāñji
aniryāpa bāṇa ye bidhai gaḷagāji | 99 |
pāñcha sahasra rathī sahasreka gaja yodhī
ẏekā śveta kumāra aneka bāśa bidha | 100 |
beni ahibrateka pādānti paḍileka ẏekaṣaṇe
kanāuja deśara saini kehu na uburile ẏeka jaṇe | 101 |
lg.note: tri garttara tule yudda kalā subhadrāra tanu | (kha,ṭha)
nidāgha bāṇa ye bidhulā bīra śveta | (ka,kha,gha,ṭa,ṭha)
lg.l: sādhure birāṭi ẏe tohora mahiṁmā
sañāgrāme śubhila śveta kumāra gārimā | 102 |
kārttikeśvara prāẏeka teja tāra diśi
sādhu śveta boliṇa ye ohobaḷa bhāṣi | 103 |
bhīṣma arjunara samara garu ghora
bāṇa jāḷābaḷire ye gagana adhakāra | 104 |
bhīṣmaṁkara samara ye kahite agocara
cchatrī hoi kehi ubhārantā nāhiṁnā gcchamura | 105 |
kāmapāḷa boḷiṇa kāuṁri deśara rājā
śādduḷa bāhāne se pratagyāṁ mahātejā | 106 |
ẏeka kare konta āreka kare karāñchaḷi
anaṅga abatāra prāẏe rūpa goṭi jhaḷi | 107 |
bhīṣma arjunaṁkara samara madhya sthana
bhīṣmaṁkara agrate āsi ogāḷilā se bahana | 108 |
āre āre āḍho āḍho samare na raha mora dr̥ṣṭi
arjunara upare muṁ karai śara br̥ṣṭi | 109 |
śuna ho gāṅgeba boilāka kāmapāḷa
daṇḍe mātra tumbhe mora samara sambhāla | 110 |
pachāruṁ pachāruṁ ye bhīṣme hoile kopa agni
tīkṣamunā nārāje binddhale kare gheni | 111 |
lg.note:
“tīkṣamunā nārāje binddhale kare gheni” pare ‘gha’ potire
bhinna pāṭha |
kāḷānaḷa agni bāṇa dhanure pūroi |
roṣabhare hīṣme ye binddhale tuhāi |
rudrara teja prāẏe-diśai agni śara |
pracaṇḍa agni prāẏeka ghoṭilā saṁsāra |
karāñchaḷi–eka prakāra khaḍga bā churikā |
lg.l: yesaneke bikāiśilā kāḷānaḷa bahai
rudrara teja prāẏe diśile śāẏantani | 112 |
kāmapāḷa ārohi thilāka śārddūḷa
bhīṣmaṁkara nārāja paḍilā ye bakṣasthala | 113 |
śira cchiḍiṇa ye hoilā beni khaṇḍa
kandharu cchiḍi taḷe na paḍilā tāra muṇḍa | 114 |
kandhara upare ye rahiacchi tāra śira
se muṇḍa bulacchi ye kurāḷa catrara ākāra | 115 |
adhare danta chāpi bikarāḷa beni ḍoḷā
nācai kabandha se samara kutūhoḷā | 116 |
bhīṣma arjna dekhi āśriya beni yodhī
kutūhoḷa dekhi samare nuāranti śara binddha | 117 |
agastiṁki pucchā kale baibasuta manu
śira cchiḍi kimpe bhūmire na paḍilā tāra tanu | 118 |
kebaṇa mahātmā se aṭai puṇa pūbonṅ
raṇa raṅge kabandha nācai kimpe ẏebe | 119 |
śuṇa ho mahārājā badaẏanti agasti
satya yugara rājā biśvābasu nāme dakṣa hāde nr̥pati | 120 |
biśvābasura putra ye mārakaṇḍa dakṣa boli
digabije karai tāra kare ghenina karāñchaḷi | 121 |
kārttika kr̥ṣṇa pakṣa amābai dine
paṇḍitabāra svātī nakṣatra bidyamāne | 122 |
biśvābasu dakṣe boile putrakaiṁ hakāri
bābu anastaru gaṇḍā goṭiẏe re āṇa bege māri | 123 |
lg.note:
jaḷi oṭhilā bāṇa kāḷānaḷa agni
pabonṅ samāne lāgilā ahani | (tha, ña, na)
gaṇḍasthaḷa chiḍiṇa ye hoilā beni khaṇḍa | (ka, gha, ṅa, ṭa, ṛha)
biśvābasura putra ye mārataṇḍa dakṣa boli | (ṭa, na)
lg.l: kāmya śrāddha āja karibā pitr̥ kāryya
pitāra āgyāṁẏe ye caḷai ātmaja | 124 |
aśveka ārohi tāra kareṇa kodaṇḍa
bana ḍohala nimante se caḷai mārakaṇḍa | 125 |
aneka bana giri kandara ādi kari
banaste gaṇḍā jība ye na pāilā loḍi | 126 |
nirāśī upabāse bhramante mahāśrame
keśīgaṅgā kūḷe yāiṁ bheṭilāka ārame | 127 |
bāḷakhiḷā bonṅśe ye kr̥pājaḷa maharuṣi
yābata kāḷe gaṇḍā goṭiẏe se ruṣi thānti poṣi | 128 |
ruṣi yāichanti jala sandhyāku yugata
gaṇḍā goṭi carai bīra sundara pabonṅte | 129 |
dekhiṇa dhāiṁlā mārakaṇḍa bīramaṇi |
goḍāi kari khaṇḍāẏe gaṇḍāku pakāilā hāṇi | 130 |
kumāra prahārante gaṇḍā helā beni khanti
dhanuhuḷe se bhāra kariṇa muṇḍa gaṇḍa | 131 |
sandhyā snāna sāriṇa yāuchanti ye kurpājale
gaṇḍā bhāra dekhile se ruṣi mārakaṇḍa bakṣa sthaḷe | 132 |
kr̥pājaḷe boile ẏeta āmbhara gaṇḍā goṭi
kimpāiṁ re pāmara āṇilu ẏehāra muṇḍa kāṭi | 133 |
bidyādhara hoiṇa re ẏeḍake manda aṭu
mahābhāratha yuddhare bhīṣma tora śira kāṭu | 134 |
bhīṣma arjuna duhiṁkari samarara madhye
khecara bhūcara hoi tu nācare kabandhe | 135 |
ẏe mohora śāpa tote hou re pratakṣa
śuni gaṇḍā bhāra pakāilā biśvābasu batsa | 136 |
lg.note: gaṇḍā goṭi carai bhīrasura pabonṅte | (gha, jha, ṭha, ṛha)
ḍohaḷa–dohala |
lg.l: binaẏa hoiṇa tahuṁ mārakante kahai
ẏe śāparu ki prakāre mukati hebi muhiṁ | 137 |
kumārakaiṁ boile kurpajala maharuṣi
ẏe gaṇḍā nei tora pitāku re desi | 138 |
pāāntu pitr̥loke amābai śrāddhe
tu yāiṁ mukati hebu mahābhārtha yuddhe | 139 |
śate bāra mahāhāratha yuddha pariyante
bhīṣmahiṁ śira chedana karibāka tote | 140 |
pāibu sadagati śate janma antare
biśvābasku bheṭa pāa amara svargapure | 141 |
se mārakaṇḍa dakṣa gaṇḍā bhāra gheni galā
pitāra āgare yāiṁṇa sakaḷa kahilā | 142 |
gaṇḍā banastare deba na pāili buli
kr̥pājala maharuṣiṁka gaṇḍā muṁ māili | 143 |
kopeṇa śāpa mote dile maharuṣi
madhya svarge yāiṇa muṁ hoibi mānuṣī | 144 |
boile bharatha yuddhe paśa anamite
kobandhe nācibu tu bhīṣmamka śara ghāte | 145 |
ẏehimate śiraccheda hua śate ghānti
tebe se āsibu nā amara bārasvatī | 146 |
kr̥pājaḷa maharuṣi śāpa dile pūbonṅe
se mārakaṇḍa dakṣa kāmapāḷa rāẏe ẏebe | 147 |
bhīṣmaṁkara nārāja ghāte se mukatiki pāilā
amara br̥ndāarke se biśvābasuṁku bheṭilā | 148 |
he budha janamāne hr̥dagate ẏehā bhāba
ẏehuṭi mahābhāratha yuddha samara sambhabonṅ dulabha | 149 |
lg.note: kandharu śira tora chiḍa re hīṣmaṁka śara ghāte | (ka, cha, ña, tha)
lg.l: kandharu śira chiṇḍi kabandha nācilā yetebeḷe
tahiṁki talaẏe kale nr̥pati sakaḷe | 150 |
nārāja bindhante se pāṇḍaba dhanurjaẏe
kabandha nāante tahiṁki kalāka talaẏe | 151 |
samare chidra pāi bhīṣma mahārathī
daśa sahasa yoddhā pāḍile tatakṣaṇānti | 152 |
rathī hāthī pādānti aśvamāna paḍile mahī loṭi
samara bhuiṁre rakata māṁẏesa karddana hoi uṭhi | 153 |
tretaẏā yugare rāma rābaṇa yuddha ye hoilā
laṁkāra aṣṭa caṇḍī śoṇita pāna kalā | 154 |
se āsi miḷile ye kurukṣetra maṇḍaḷeṇa
śoṇita meda māẏeṁsa ye karanti bhakṣaṇa |
ratha gaja aśva yoddha paḍanti yete beḷeṇa | 155 |
jaẏeśaṅkha dhuni kale bhīṣma mahārathī
ratha bāhuḍāi hele pachima mūrati | 156 |
arjuna boilā deba śuṇimā jagannāthe
jaẏaśaṅkha bajāi bhīṣme samara bhagna kaleka kemante | 157 |
gobinde boile ho śuṇa phālaguni
bhīṣme pāḍile tora aneka saini | 158 |
rathara bāma ḍāhāṇe chāhāṁsi bhīra pātha
pādānti asaṁkṣepa paḍile daśa sahasra ratha | 159 |

div.note: kabandha nācante se kalā haẏe talaẏe | (ṅa, ca, tha)
“kabandha nāante tahiṁki kalāka talaẏe |” pāṭha pare adhikā pāṭha
samare dekhile ye bhīṣma mahāyodhī
kabandhaku dekhi arjuna śara ye na binddha |
dhanure nau sahasra bhīṣme takṣaṇe binddhale
daśa sahasra yoddhā bhīṣme takṣaṇe pāḍile | (tha, ña, na)

lg.l: chāri sahasra gaja yoddhā aśva yoddhā sahasra tini
pādānti paḍile pāñcha ahibrata saini | 160 |
dekhiṇa buddhi kichi na phurai sabonṅsācī
trailokya madhye hari pāibi muṁ bahu bāci | 161 |
bandhu sodara mānanta marāili samasta
ābara jībane mora kisa puruṣārtha | 162 |
nillaja ātmā mora yāikina phāṭi
lalāte karadei robai kirīṭī | 163 |
ta ye jagujībana āndhaba jagannāthe
nirekha hoili nātha tohora dekhante | 164 |
hari raṇa jaẏe kari ye gale karobe
paśile hastināẏe baḍāi sambhabonṅe | 165 |
gobinde boile t na roba phālaguni
dekha ho dhanurjaẏe pāṇḍaba saini | 166 |
tu ye jaṇeheṁ jiṇi nuārilu raṇe
śveta śrīkhaṇḍī dhr̥ṣṭadyumane abhimanyu jane jane | 167 |
aneka yoddhāẏe rathīmānanta pāḍile
dekha ho dhanurjaẏe boli gobinde dekhāile | 168 |

div.note:
“tu ye jaṇeheṁ jiṇi nuārilu raṇe |” pāṭhaparebonṅ, tha, na re
adhikā pāṭha |
tu ye jaṇaku jaṇe jiṇi nuārilu raṇe
asaṁkhya saini māile śveta śrikhaṇḍī dhr̥ṣṭa ye dyumane |
abhimanyu saṅgate ye uttara kumāra
kuruthāṭe paśi aneka kaleka prahāra |
aneka ratha gaja aśva yoddhā pāḍile
deha ho dhanurjaẏe boli gobinde dekhāile |

lg.l: kauroba thāṭhare pātha paśiṇa dekhanti
tāḷeka utsarge rudhira bahai tini yojana prati | 169 |
dekhiṇa sānanda ye bhīra phālaguni
debadatta śaṅkha dhuni kale cakrapāṇi | 170 |
atyanta sānande yoddhāẏe prabea bhmabane
srāhāna bhojana se kaleka yoddhāmāne | 171 |
aneka utsaba se hastinā praśaste
bhīṣmaṁku purasari bolanti kurunāthe | 172 |
sañjaẏara agrate pucchai dhr̥tirāṣṭa
bhīṣmaṁkara prasāde mora pārayiba kaṣṭa | 173 |
śāẏantanura nandana mote ẏeḍeka sadaẏe
tāhāra prasāde muṁ hoibi nirbhaẏe | 174 |
dineke pāḍile yebe daśa sasra rathī
daśadine āu pāṇḍabe ki thibe brati | 175 |
nārāẏaṇaṁka bacanaku kaleka pratiāśe
pāṇḍabe nāśa galeṭi kr̥ṣṇara biśvāse | 176 |
aneka praśaṁsā bhīṣmṁku kalā kururāẏe
ẏebe āsilā mohora sampadara samaẏe | 177 |
sañjaẏe boilā śuṇimā dhr̥tirāṣṭa
mora bichāre ta tote achai baḍa kaṣṭa | 178 |
bhīṣmaṁku praśaṁsā ta karucha bidyamāne
dui ahibrata yoddhā pāḍile tinidine | 179 |

div.note:
“tāḷeka utsarge rudhira bahai tini yojana prati”
pāṭhapare tha, ña, na re bhinna pāṭha |
dekhiṇa sānanda bhānumatira sāīṁ
ye yāhā bhmabane yoddhāẏe prabeśa hele yāiṁ |
nārāẏaṇaṁka bacanaku kaleka sāhāse | (cha, dha)

lg.l: āho dhr̥tirāṣṭa durddakṣa tohora suta paśilā śaraṇa
naba sahasra yoddha se māilā ẏekā jaṇa | 180 |
dr̥padara nandana śrikhantī maharathī
pañcha sahasra yoddhā se māilā ẏakā ghānti | 181 |
birāṭara nandana śveta nāme bāḷa
bāra sasra rathī pāḍilā ẏekābeḷa | 182 |
samare paśile dhr̥ṣṭa ye dyumane
tera sahasra yoddhā se pāḍile śara mune | 183 |
arjunara nandana kumāra ahimanyu
āṭha sahasra rathi pāḍilā bāḷuta hāde tau | 184 |
hiḍimbikīra nandana ghaṭa ye utkaṭa
pañcha ahibrateka yoddhā pāḍilā murāṭa | 185 |
asaṁkṣepa saini tora kaḷaṇā na yāi
ke keṇe paḍileka anta kalā nāhiṁ | 186 |
sa~jaẏe bacana śuṇi rājā dhr̥tirāṣṭa
harasa chaḍi bismaẏa citte pāilā baḍa kaṣṭa | 187 |
sañjaẏe boilā śuṇa bhīmasenara mahimā
koḍiẏe sahasra yoddhā pāḍilā ẏekā bhīmā | 188 |
yujheṣṭhi debe māile tini sasra yodhī
pañcha sahasra nakuḷa sahadea sādhi | 189 |
sañjaẏara mukharu ẏesaneka bacana śuṇi
robai andharājā digāmbarī jāṇi | 190 |
srāhāna bhojana se sārina śāẏantani
śara sandhane ādhāne ye pāhlā raẏaṇī | 191 |
daṇḍa sāja boliṇa śubhila cahaḷa
ratha gaja aśva pādānti sājanti samadaṇḍa baḷa | 192 |

div.note: robai andharāḷā nirmākṣī jana jāṇi | (tha, ña, na)

lg.l: bājai bīratūra ṭamaka niśāṇa ye bherī
bīra marddaḷa bijighoṣa kāhāḷī mahurī | 193 |
ubhāranti pāṭachatre uḍanti ālambe
tarjanti garjanti bīre samara sambhabonṅe | 194 |
aneka aḷaṁkāra gheni se mānacatrabratī
bijaẏe mānagobinda bhīṣmaṁkara kati | 195 |
aneka aḷaṁkāra bhūṣaṇa sabonṅkāẏe
diśanti gāṅgaba tripurāntaka prāẏe | 196 |
bhīṣmaṁka pratagyāṁ kāḷānaḷa rūpa dekhi
haẏeṇa digapāḷe ujile beni ākhi | 197 |
śrībhmaje gāṅgea ye gheniṇa kodaṇḍa
guṇa ghoṣa nāde ye kaṁpilā brahmāṇḍa | 198 |
jaẏe śaṅhanāda ye kariṇa maharathī
makara māsa śukaḷapakṣa cauṭhīra tithi | 199 |
uttarabhodo nakṣatra ye śubha lagna beḷā
paramānanda puruṣa samare śasra kalā | 200 |
ẏethu anantare ye pāṇḍabaṁkara kathā
dekhiṇa biṣāda yujheṣṭhi sanyaṁkara abastā | 201 |
pāṇḍabaṁka sanyabaḷa bhāḷanti biṣāde
bhīṣmaṁkara samare ke sammukhe miḷu hāde | 202 |
birāṭara nandana ye śveta maharathī
yujhesṭhiṁka pādatale binaẏa bhagati | 203 |
svāmī ājira yuddhe senāpati kara muku
māribi kaurobanta jiṇimi gāṅgabaṁku | 204 |

div.note:
“māribi kaurabanta jiṇimi gāṅgabaṁku” pādāṁśa pare
gha o jha re adhikā pāṭha–
śuṇiṇa mauna ye hoile dharmara nandana |
kahai caitana śuṇa ho manu rājana |

lg.l: dhr̥tirāṣṭa pachārile śuṇa he sañjaẏe
kālira samara heba kebaṇa upāẏe | 205 |
tu mohora mantrī bhūta bhabiṣyata gyāṁtā
gata āgata kathā jāṇibāku tuhi se śakatā | 206 |
jaẏe ki ajaẏe mote kālira samare
śuṇite śaradhā mora hochi hr̥dare | 207 |
idaṁ bākya śuṇi badaẏanti mantrī ye sañjaẏe
śuṇa ho sābadhāne ambikā tanaẏe | 208 |
tohora āgare muṁ ẏehā bañchāibi
gata yuddhara bāratā thokāẏe kahibi | 209 |
birāṭara nandana ye śveta nāma boli
sehu senāpati hoiba ye pāṇḍaṁbaka baḷe kāli | 210 |
bahuta yuddha se hoiba dhr̥tirāṣṭa
aneka aprā~jaẏe hoiba tora thāṭha | 211 |
mahārāṣṭa deśara rājā nāma bīrabāhu
tini ahibrata yoddhā gheni paḍiba raṇe sehu | 212 |
arabinda deśara rāā paramānanda
sāta sahara pāridaṇḍa gheni paḍiba kāli yuddha | 213 |
dkṣiṇa kośaḷa rājā nāma ripubhaṅga
naba lakṣa yoddhā gheni paḍiba raṇaraṅga | 214 |
kaḷiṅga deśara rājā nāma bajraketu
pañchaṣaṭhī sahasra yoddhā tule tāku hoiba mr̥tu | 215 |
biḍoḷakṣa deśara rājā bīra maṅgaḷanaumi
pāñcha lakṣa yoddhā tule paḍiba raṇa bhūmi | 216 |
kanāuja deśara rājā karuṇākara
tini sahasra pāridaṇḍa tule hoiba apahāra | 217 |
kañchaṇa deśara rājā aṭai candradhvaja
naba sahasra yoddhā tule samare paḍiba mahārāja | 218 |
mandara deśara rājā aṭai birūpākṣa
tāra tule yoddhā paḍibe nabalakṣa | 219 |
ẏeteka yoddhāṁka tule aneka pādānti
asaṁkṣepa saini paḍibe aneka pāridaṇḍa nr̥pati | 220 |
pañchadaśa ghaḍi paryyante kāli hoibāka samara mahāgāḍha
pāñcha yojana pariyante mānagobindai paḍiba paẏeḍa | 221 |
tu ye pachārilu rājā sañchapi kahili
ẏesaneka samara jāṇa hoibāka kāli | 222 |
śuṇa manu rājana ho sañjaẏera mahiṁmā
satyayuge sehu se śūdreka nāme brahmā | 223 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa hr̥daẏaku sañjaẏa dibya cachu
gata āgata jāṇantā tu kimpe na gacchu | 224 |
ẏesaneka samara kathā kahante sañjaẏe
gālabara nandana sugyānī aṭai svaṁẏe | 225 |
śvetara pratagyāṁ yahuṁ śuṇile deba dharme
senāpati kariṇa ārambhile raṇe | 226 |
aneka aḷaṁkāra kaleka bhūṣaṇa
timiri bidāraṇa maṇi hr̥dare kaleka ābharaṇa | 227 |
śrībhmaje bāhuṭi ratna mukuṭa śire śobhā
hiraṇakara tule hīrā birājai ati ābhā | 228 |
kr̥ṣṇa yehne abatāra parijātaka haraṇe
tesaneka śobhābana se diśai śveta mahā raṇe | 229 |
arjuna boile yujheṣṭhiṁka mukha chāhiṁ
ẏehāku senāpati karante kicchi pirojana nāhiṁ | 230 |

div.note:
gatāgata kathā tu ki na jāṇi ye achu | (ña, tha, na)
gata āgata kathā se jāṇaiṁ kichu kichu | (jha, ṇa)
pirojana–praẏojana |

lg.l: gobinde boile tu kicchi na jāṇu phālaguni
aneka dhaṁsilāni ẏe kauroba saini | 231 |
ẏe yebe senāpati hoithāntā kāli
kaurobe brati yāi thaānte ki kāli chāli | 232 |
āpaṇe ratharu ye ohlāile jagannāthe
śribhmaje mukuṭa bānddale śveta kumārara māthe | 233 |
śvetakumārakaiṁ bahuta puruṣārtha kale deba hari
śvetara chamure ghana ghana śaṅkha phuri | 234 |
aneka maṅgaḷe ye khaṭanti banitā
debagaṇe dundubhi ye bajānti apramitā | 235 |
śveta praṇapatya śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁka padmapāde
kaurobabaḷa jiṇimi svāmī tohora prasāde | 236 |
mohora chamure rahi yuddha karantu bhīṣma droṇe
ratha bāhibāku debu sārathi hāde jaṇe | 237 |
gobindaṁka chamure ubhā hoicchi sātukī
boile sāratipaṇe yāa śvetara tahiṁki | 238 |
keśabamka āgyāṁẏe se caḷilā mādhabi
muṁ yebe śvetara rathe sārathi hoibi | 239 |
mohora chamure se ye kariba satyabrata
sāṁgrāme na jiṇile na bāhuḍai mora ratha | 240 |
śuṇiṇa sānanda ye sudeṣṇāra baḷā
sātukīra kaṇṭhe nei lambāilā ratnamāḷā | 241 |
mohora sārikṣe sārathi pāilaiṁ tote
trailokye sāmaratha acchi kehu mote | 242 |
tuhi yebe sārathi paṇe sāmaratha
kauroba saini ye hoibe rāsāṁgata | 243 |
sātukīki sambodhanā kari basilā yāiṁ ratha
śuddha saṣṭika jāṇi birājai śveta ratha | 244 |
śveta śaṅkha goṣīra ye kāpāḷa chokhāra aśva chāri
āpaṇe nei ava yocile madhuhārī | 145 |
bīrabeśa aḷaṁkāra hoiṇa birāṭi
sannidhye praḷamvita kalā dharmarāẏe yujheṣṭhi | 146 |
śata sahasra daṇḍabata hoilā pariṇāmi
sabonṅ śubhe āgyāṁ mote dia deba svāmī | 147 |
aneka kalyāṇa bāñccchā kale dharma sute
kaurebanta jiṇiṇa bābu abhimāna pheḍa mote | 148 |
dadhibana sumari caḷa yā anakūḷe
rathare bije kara bābu sudeṣṇāra bāḷe | 149 |
rathe bije kalā yahuṁ sudesṇāra bāḷa
caṇḍa putre āge miḷi paḍhanti maṅgaḷa | 150 |
āgare arjuna nandighoṣa ratha sāji
kr̥ṣṇa sārathi rathe śohai chāri bājī | 151 |
caḷai ratha gagane bhūmipatha teji
śeṇā pacchī prāẏe ye uḍanti chāri bājī | 152 |
nandighoṣa bāma ḍāhāṇe dhr̥ṣṭadyamana śrīkhaṇḍī
śvetara tule uttara śaṅkha ratha maṇḍi | 153 |
caḷanti daẏebara bārāsa mahā teji
ākāśa ṣepanti se pabana gati bājī | 154 |
kāḷebara gadā gheni bi kodara raṇamanchi |
bāuna bāuna gadā gheni pāṇḍaba sāmarathā | 155 |
bhīmasenara tule acchi kumāra durddaṣa
añjanaprabhī bīra ghaṭa ye uktaṭa bhīmasena baccha | 156 |
śveta hāthī ẏeka ārehina madhye dharmarāẏe
dr̥pada birāṭa jamāghr̥ṣṭa ye bijaẏe | 157 |

div.note:
{bhīmara piṭhi raṣā kumara durddaṣa gariṣṭha
añjanaprabhī ābara ghaṭa ye uktaṭa | (tha,ñja,na)}

lg.l: aneka sambhare bijaẏe kaureba saini
ākāśa ucchuḷūcchi mukharāba dhuni | 158 |
samadaṇḍa gheni hoile nikaṭa
kuru pāṇḍaba baḷa sabu hoileka bheṭa | 159 |
bhīṣmaṁkara chamure ye rahita ke pāri
yesaneke gaja yūtha āborai keśarī | 160 |
kāḷāanaḷa jāṇiṇa bhīṣmaṁkara cacchu beni
dekhiṇa tarāsile ohobaḷa saini | 161 |
tarjanti garjanti ye kaureba bīre
re re kāra nāde paśile samare | 162 |
baḍhil raṇa raṅga bhīṣma arajuna
karṇṇara tule yujhai bīra bhīmasena | 163 |
pañchaṣaṭhi yoddhā gheniṇa dr̥pate
āge ogāḷile bhāradvādaśaṁkara sute | 164 |
semadatta mahārathī pratagyāṁ kalā thāṭhe
tāhāra chamura āsi miḷile birāṭe | 165 |
birāṭara nandana śveta mahārathī
śudda saṣṭika rathe keśarī lāṅguḍa uḍānti | 166 |
harahara uḍanti pātāṅga śatr̥jitā biradhū
ohobaḷa praśaṁsanti jībana tora sādhu | 167 |
śvetara pratagyāṁ dekhiṇa hāde kr̥pa āchāryye
śvetara chamure guṇa ghryuṣṭa nāda kari bije | 168 |
śvetara kumarakaiṁ dekhi kr̥pa āchāryya kopa murtti
pāñcha sāta nārāja dhari se bidhale taḍati | 169 |
añchabiṁśa nārāja bidhale kr̥pa mahārathī
caḷanta nārāja ye kāḷānaḷa mūrtti | 170 |
puṇi pañchaḍhriṁśa nārāja gheniṇa ye kr̥pe
ātreṣi bidhale śveta kumarakaiṁ mahā darpe | 171 |
dradasita kumāra kr̥paṁka bāṇa dekhi
bidhalā nārāja ye uprodha upeṣi | 172 |
śveta boilā muṁ jāṇicchi tumbha baḷa
bidhaacchi nārāja kr̥pe sambhāḷa sambhāḷa | 173 |
pachāru pachāru se birātara suta
hāboḍā śareka semāilā mahāmatta | 174 |
anibonṅāraṇa śara ye ghora nāde paḍilā
kr̥paṁkara ratha ye bhāñji cūri hoigalā | 175 |
lohadaṇḍa ratha ye hoilā masīguṇḍā
samaste praśaṁsanti śveta samare raṇa ṣaṇḍā | 176 |
āreka ratha ārehi se sudebaṁkara nāti
śateka nārāja se bidhale tataṣaṇānti | 177 |
dekhai śveta kumara nārāja paḍante
pañchāśa śara bābala bidhalā kopa citte | 178 |
yesaneka ākāśu paḍai nirighāta
yuṇa bhagna galā ye kr̥paṁkara ratha | 179 |
pādagati hele kr̥pa bhāroimalla mahārathī
samara upeṣi sehu ye hoile birathī | 180 |
kopeṇa dhāiṁlāka sudeṣṇāra baḷā
kareṇa kumara gheni acchi khaṇḍā phaḷā | 181 |
rāhura teja prāẏe se birāṭa kumara
ātreṣi keśa yāi dhailā kr̥pa āchāryyakara | 182 |
kopeṇa kumara ye māranteṇa kr̥pāṇa
dekhilā hr̥dagate tāraśrībatsa lāñcchana | 183 |

div.note: pañchama śara bābala bidhalā bāhu darpe | (ṛḍha,tha,na,ñja)

lg.l: beda bipra dekhiṇa ye chaḍilā tāra bāḷa
boilā brāhmaṇa tu ho bipra ye chāṇḍāḷa | 284 |
kebaṇa bhābiṣya thāpita tohora pūbonṅe
brāhmaṇa hoi samare paśu kimpe ẏebe | 285 |
śveta boilā paḷā yā samare na thāa hāde kr̥pa
brāhmaṇa nohile sinā khaṇḍanti tora darpa | 286 |
birathī hoi paḷāẏe ananta rūṣiṁka śiṣi
dekhile aśastamā ye ratheka caḍhi āsi | 287 |
kr̥pa boile bābu re mohora dukha dekha
hoili birathī ye pāile mote rakha | 288 |
kr̥paṁkara tule pāñcha sahasra yodhī
anuṣaṇe nārāja śveta āboriṇa bidhi | 289 |
yesane paṁku phaḷa paḍanti bāta ghāte
yoddhāṁkara śira cchiḍi loṭai bhūmi gate | 290 |
ẏekā nārājake paḍanti śate śate rathī
rakatare kardana ye hoilā basumatī | 291 |
pāñcha sahasra rathī nohile kehi ubhā
bicitra samara karai asambhabā | 292 |
tārāgaṇa madhye yehne candramā pāẏe śobhā
dekhi kari aśastamā ṭekilā ratha prabhā | 293 |

div.note: ẏeḍe bidyābanta hoi tu sañāgrāme paśu ẏebe | (tha,ma,ñja,)

"brāhmaṇa hoi samare paśu kimpe ẏebe |"
trahi pāṭha pare tha,na,ñja, re bhinna pāṭha–
yebeṇa samara tumbhe kala he sambhabonṅe |
brāhmaṇa śahasra dhārī hoilā kimpe ẏebe |
kr̥paṁka caraṇe praḷamvita karai śveta bīra
yāa he brāhmaṇe tumbhe samara na kara |
dekhiṇa aśastamā ratheka chaḍi āsi | (ka,na,tha,ṅa)

lg.l: sahasreka śara ye gheniṇa bīra droṇī
śvetara uparaku bidhale bege ṭāṇi | 294 |
jaḷūjuḷā poka yesane uḍanti gagane
śūnya bhehi śaramāne ye paḍanti anuṣaṇe | 295 |
aśastamāṁku praśaṁsā karai birāṭi
praśaṁsā kari nārāja biddhalā cauṣaṭhi | 296 |
aśastamāra śara cchedilāka śveta
puṇihiṁ aśastamā bidhale śasra ahibrata | 297 |
rathīki ahibrate sārathīṁki ahibrate
chāri aśvaṁku biddhale nārāja śate śate | 298 |
mahācchatrī aśastamā samare mahāyodhi
apramita nārāja se śvetakaiṁ biddha | 299 |
sārathī aśvaṁkara ye nirūna dekhi śveta
sehi puṇa nārāja bidhalā pāñcha ahibrata | 300 |
beni śara paritāḷa helā mahābaḷa
bahani uṭhilā jāṇi tiraṇa sañjāḷa | 301 |
puṇi śate bāṇa gheniṇa śveta rīra
ghāẏe bhagna galā aśastamā rahubara | 302 |
āna rathe yāiṁ ārehile droṇī
śateka gaja yoddhā goḍāi śveta hāṇi | 303 |
gadā mudugara ye guruja śābeḷi mūṣaḷī
ccheḷa, catra, konta, lāṁkiā nārāja teja jhaḷi | 304 |
śaṁgkha,śveta,uttara, kumāra abhimanu
samare ẏeka yoga hele chāri tanu | 305 |
yesane anaḷa dahai tiraṇarāśi
huanti kurubaḷa samareṇa jhāsi | 306 |

div.note:
{yesane anaḷa dahai pañchaśikhā
dahanti kurubaḷa saini aini alekhā | (ṅa,jha,gha,ṛha,)}

lg.l: ẏe chāri rathīẏe dhāmanta ẏekamūrtti
ki abā kāḷānaḷa pracaṇḍa bahati | 307 |
agniśikhā nārāja ye bidhanti kare dhari
uṭhai bahani ye pracaṇḍa jāḷābaḷī | 308 |
nārāja jāḷāre ye na bahai pabana
paḷābanti yoddāmāne ye tarasta hoiṇa | 309 |
daṇḍa bhagna dekhi dhāmanti droṇa guru
dekhina abhimanyu ogāḷilā durūṁ | 310 |
droṇaguru dekhile ye arjunara śiṣi
samare abhimanyu anaṅga paṭāntara diśi | 311 |
jhalakanti ratna ye baiḍuryya maṇi
rathare birājanti timira bidāraṇa jāṇi | 312 |
śrībhmaje kumārara anaṅga sāriṣeṇa dhanu
droṇe praśaṁsā kale sādhu sādhu re abhimanya | 313 |
ẏeteka pratagyāṁ tora cauda baraṣu
bidyā na sādhiṇa tu samare kiṁpe paśu | 314 |
āto ho āto ho bāḷuta tote āmbhara samara na śohai
agyāna kāḷe tote samara na gacchai | 315 |
abhimanyuku chaḍi droṇe ratha ghenigale āgasari
śvetara chamure droṇe miḷile dhanu dhari | 316 |
pratagyāṁ sācchā kari se sudeṣṇāra baḷā
droṇakaiṁ nārāja bidhalā cchatriẏa achārgaḷā | 317 |

div.note: ẏe pañcharathī dhāmanti atibega ẏeka dr̥ṣṭi | (ṅa,jha,ḍha)
samare abhimanyu aṅgārapannaṅga prāẏe diśi | (gha,ṅa,jha,ñja,ḍha,tha,na)

āḍe hua bāḷuta tanaẏe baẏasa tora ẏemata nohai
gyāa kāḷe tote samara na śohai | (ka,ṭa)

agyāna kāḷe tote samara na śohai | (ka,ṭa)
bāḷuta āgyāna tu re yuddeṇa na māri
bitsadroha kale ta yaśa dharma hāri | (ñja,tha,na)

lg.l: nārāje daśanti yehne jaḷada meghamoḷi
kareṇa ẏeka dhanu dhariacchai udita ārdrābaḷī | 318 |
aśastamā birathi droṇaguru dekhi
bidhale nārājanta guru śvetakaiṁ oprodha upeṣi | 319 |
aśastamā tule pāñchaśata rathī thile
śvetara prahāre śate aśi yoddā ye paḍile | 320 |
durddaṣa māilā ye beni sasra rathī
abhimanyu māilā ye nabaśata rathī hāthī | 321 |
ẏeteka yoddā se paḍileni samare
droṇa śveta beni lāgilā samara mahāghore | 322 |
sahasre śara śveta bidhalā droṇaṁku
puṇi chāriśata bidhalā se chāri aśvaṁku | 323 |
hāthara byagra tāra dekhita nuāri
drona bidhale nārāja sahasre ye chāri | 324 |
puṇa pañchaṣaṭha nārāja dhanure pūrei
ātreṣi guru ye bidhale tuhāi | 325 |
ahibrateka nārāja ye bidhale lohaśara tīṣamunā
śvetara nārāje se bhedilā droṇaṁkara sehnā | 326 |
bhīradvādaśaṁka nandana ye paraśurāma baradātā
ẏe bhūamaṇḍaḷe ke acchai jiṇantā | 327 |
pāṇḍabe kaurebe yāhāra bidyāreṇa cchatrī
se guru chamure ẏebe yujhai śveta rathī | 328 |
abiṣaṇe nārāja bidhale droṇe gheni
nidāgha kāḷe yehne pracaṇḍa cahani | 329 |
hāthara byagra gati dekhita ka pāri
troṇaru nārāja kāḍhi bidhale reṣa bhari | 330 |

div.note: sañsāra dahana yehne praḷaẏa bahani |(tha,ñja,na)

lg.l: yesane tuṣāre gagana adhaktāra
tesaneke gaganuṁ jāṇi paḍe droṇaṁkara śara | 331 |
śveta kumāra ye puṇa adr̥śyai
dekhiṇa śvetabīra arkaśara ātreṣi bidhai | 332 |
droṇaṁkara śara ye aṭai timiri
śvetara bāṇe se hoile apahāri | 333 |
śvetara nārāja yahuṁ pr̥thibī yāka ghoṭi
droṇe praśaṁsā karanti sādhu sādhu re birāṭi | 334 |
bāruṇāśara gheni droṇa guru bege peṣi
bajrābaḷī bāṇe śveta tāhā ye bināśi | 335 |
nidrāgha bāṇa dhari ye peṣile guru droṇe
pr̥thīre thilā yoddāẏe mucchā gata yānti teṇe | 336 |
kopeṇa droṇa guru ye rāsāṁgata śara peṣi
kāḷānaḷa bāṇe tāhā śveta kumāra bināśi | 337 |
lāgheba śare guru nuārile jiṇi
baḍabānaḷa samāne debaśara guru ādhyāna kale ṭāṇi | 338 |
paraśurāma jagata jiṇile yeuṁṇa bāṇe
samānare peṣi tāhā na peṣi itara jane | 339 |
trailokya kampai yeuṁṇa śara tīṣe
dharmaku laṁghile guru samara bimukhe | 340 |
śahasraṁkari śikhā ye kāḷānaḷa bahani
dekhiṇa trosile ye ohobaḷa saini | 341 |
bidhanteṇa nārāja ye āsai garaji
ākāśuṁ nirghāta ki paḍilā gaḷagāji | 342 |
bahani teja dekhi paḷābanti baḷa
sātukī boilā śveta sambhāḷa sambhāḷa | 343 |

div.note: barṇṇānaḷa nāme deba śahasra ādhyāna kale aṇi | (ka,ṅa,jha,ḍha,na)
aṣṭāṅge tāhā peṣi na peṣi kiñchita samare | (jha,ḍha)

lg.l: tora pratagyāṁ dekhi yujheṣṭhi debe toṣa
bhāratha yudde tora bāhāku kale āśa | 344 |
śveta boilā tu sāhā hoi basithāa mora rathe
āu ki āja kaurobe yibe se jībante | 345 |
ẏe śahasra dekhi tumbhe samaste kala bhaẏe
ẏe mote diśuacchi juḷūjuḷā poka prāẏe | 346 |
śveta kumāra boilā dekha ho sārathi
ẏehiṣaṇi jāta hoiba anaḷa prati prati | 347 |
marutā śara bidhalā birāṭara suta
anaḷa āsanteṇa ghoṭilā mahābāta | 348 |
pāṇḍaba thāṭaku ye āsuthilā agni bāṇa
pabana bighāte se neuṭilā tataṣaṇa | 349 |
sahasraśikhā hoi paḍilā leuṭi
anaḷe dahana galā droṇaṁkara ratha goṭi | 350 |
kauroba thāṭhare paḍilāka yāiṁ jhāsa
aneka ratha dahana tahiṁ hoilāka anaḷa | 351 |
pabane diguṇa jaḷai bahati
asambhāḷa hoiṇa dhāmaiṁ kurupati | 352 |
biśeṣe aḍhāi pahara hoicchi dinakara
ābara apramiḍha agnira parakhara | 353 |
kauree agni āse, pāṇḍabe pacchakati
pabana bahante bahani diguṇa teja mūrtti | 354 |
bhājaṇa samadaṇḍa paḷābanti ẏekamukha
gaja aśva pādānti paḷānti pāiṇa baḍa dukha | 355 |
phaḷā āḍheṇī ye guruja lāṁkiā

chāḍiṇa yoddāmāne paḷāile kehi kāhākaiṁ
nohileka sāhā | 356 |

div.note:
śveta boilā mote sāhā jagannāthe |
āja kaurebe kadhe śira gheni yāānti kemante | (ñja,tha,na)
āṛḍheṇī–āḍaṇi,ḍhāla |

lg.l: saini paḷābante bhīṣme hoile ẏe ẏekā
pāṇḍaba baḷa baḍhante bhīṣme bhīmaku kale śaṁkā | 357 |
pāṇḍaba sundara bīra br̥kodara bege uṭhi
bhīṣmaṁkara rathare gadā nei piṭi | 358 |
bhāñjiṇa bhīṣmaṁka rahubara hoilā khaṇḍa khaṇḍa
haẏe sārathiẏe paḍi hoile samiguṇḍa | 359 |
maṇināga nāme hāthīẏe ārehi
pacchaghuñchā dile gāṅgabe śahasra dhanure pūrei | 360 |
nārāja bidhu bidhu pacchaghuñchā dei āsi
beni kośa paẏeḍa āpaṇā thāṭhare āsi paśi | 361 |
beḷa abasāne śrameṇa mahāṣudhā
yugate bhagnabaḷa agnira teja bādhā | 362 |
śahasra dhari bīre nuāranti chāḷi
mukheṇa hātha bhari śaraṇa rakha boliṇa phukāri | 363 |
bhīṣasena śrīkhaṇḍī dhr̥ṣṭa ye dyumanu
śaṅkha,śveta,uttara,durddaṣa, ghaṭaḍaktaṭa,abhimanya | 364 |
nirddaẏā nirāpaṣa aṭanti bāḷa buddhi
śaraṇa boile se goḍāi duguṇe śara bidha | 365 |
paḍanti yoddāẏe asañkhyā rathī hāthī
aneka aśva yoddā saṅge apramita pādānti | 366 |
tera kośa paryyante sainahiṁ paẏeḍa paḍilā
mr̥tupiṇḍa rakate karddana hoilā | 367 |
pacchara saini dhāmanti kara toḷi
tāhāṁkara baḷe ye medamedā māṁsa houacchi dhūḷi | 368 |
akaḷita saini paḍile baḷa thāṭha
rahile pāṇḍabe yāiṁ hastinā nikaṭa | 369 |

div.note: dantare tiraṇa gheni boḷanti rakha boli | (ñja,tha,na)

lg.l: yamunā nadīre saini paḍileka ḍeiṁ
ke indrapraśasteṇa paśile luchā dei | 370 |
dinakara nātha ohāḍe hele hāde meru
pāṇḍabe naile ye yamapraśasta rājyaru | 371 |
āditya asta yāiṁ beni ghaḍi rāti
dhr̥tirāṣṭa samīpe bhīṣma droṇa ye miḷanti | 372 |
samaste praśaṁsanti śvetara mahiṁmā
sādhu matsapati birāṭa mahātamā | 373 |
śubha sulaṣaṇa kari se putraku jātakalā
trailokya saṁsāraku adhika hoilā | 374 |
sāṁgrāme jiṇantā se sudeṣṇāra baḷā
kaureba sainaṁku se bahuta dukha dilā | 375 |
naba yojana paẏeḍa paḍilā apāra
rathī sārathi pāde hoile sabu cūra | 376 |
tadanta na yāi deba sainara nidhana
rūdhire medinī ye hoilā karddana | 377 |
bhīṣma droṇa aśastamā tini rathīnta jiṇi
ẏekā śveta kumāra ye nanthilā saini | 378 |
dharmeṇa se bidhātā āṇilā jīāi
kahanti bhīṣma droṇe śvetara baḍāi | 379 |
śuṇiṇa dhr̥tirāṣṭa hoile tabada
niśvāsa pakāiṇa se hoile ciṣāda | 380 |
dhr̥tirāṣṭa boile sādhu sādhu re sañjaẏe
susādhu paṇḍita tu sugyānī buddhimaẏe | 381 |
kāḷi yā sañchapi kahilu niśākāḷe
prataṣe phaḷilā tāhā dekhiḷi beni ḍoḷe | 382 |

div.note: pāṇḍabe naile ye indrapraśasta rājyaru | (gha,jha,ṭa)
dhr̥tirāṣṭa samīpe bhīṣma droṇa driyodhana ye minti | (ka,gha,ccha,jha)

lg.l: droṇe boile se sañjaẏe mahāgyānī
bhuta bhabiṣya barttamāna jāṇai se tini | 383 |
āmtā baikulye driyodhana mahārāgī
kāhāku kopabhara kāhāku sannidhyuṁ parityāgī | 384 |
karkaśa madhu piṅgaḷa duṣṭa hāde prakr̥ti
kāhākaiṁ samāsyā nāhiṁ bismaẏe mahāmati | 385 |
bhumire bhmaja tāḍi adhare danta chāpi
apaṇḍa ta paṇe rājā aprāṁjaẏe kopī | 386 |
rema ulusāi karatāḷa mārai jānu
bāhāṣpoṭa dei kampāi nija tanu | 387 |
dhuāsana durjaẏe ye durbenda durmukha durānta
dr̥bāḷa dr̥mana dr̥janakaiṁ rāiṇa sodaranta | 388 |
dhika mora baḷabīryya dhika mora bhāi
tumbhanta āśa kariṇa niṣṇaḷa mora dehī | 389 |
mahā mahā rathīẏe aṭanti bhīṣma droṇa
nirekha kari mora saina marāile puṇa | 390 |
mānagobinda boilā samara mora nohu
nagre ghoṣaṇā diāa rājāmāne ye yāhā rājyakaiṁ yāu | 391 |
bhīṣma na thāu ye droṇahiṁ na thāu
kr̥pahiṁ na thāu bhūrisabonṅāẏe ẏethuṁ yāu | 392 |
nagre ghoṣaṇā diāilā rājā mānagobinda
laṣe rājā yāntu gheni ye yāhāra sainabr̥nda | 393 |
sakaḷa sainamāne nicinte ṇa thāa
rājāmānanta āśa nāhiṁ mora deha | 394 |
saṁsāre apachāti nohu mora nāma
aneśvata bhāi gheni muṁ karibi sāṁgrāma | 395 |
karmakaiṁ nirepi bolai dhr̥tirāṣṭi
ādihuṁ mote na boilā ki yujheṣṭhi
janamukhe muṁ ye pāiḷi apacchāti | 396 |
apaṇḍi ta paṇe muhiṁ ẏehā kali manda
saṁsāra lokitaku ārambhiḷi ẏeḍe dvanda | 397 |
bahuta indure na marai mañjārī ẏekaiṁ
bahuta ajāyūthe ki jiṇihoi byāghrakaiṁ | 398 |
bahuta biṣaẏāre nāśayānti prāṇī
apāra yubatī ki puruṣabaḷakaiṁ pāranti jiṇi | 399 |
bahuta gāba ẏekā nāśanti ki ṣṭa
muhiṁ abā na jāṇi bahuta kali ruṇḍa | 400 |
bahuta lochāẏe marucchanti anamite
mohora bonṅśahiṁ mariba bahutaṁka apachāte | 401 |
chāgaḷa pala jāṇi hoilā mora thāṭha
ẏekā mattabyāgha hoilā birāṭara chāṭa | 402 |
mohora thāṭha hoilā kadalī bana goṭisẏe
ẏekā mattagajeka se kalā dhūmāntamaẏe | 403 |
lg.note: hāthī upare thāi dekhai mora thāṭha
lg.l: naba yojana pariyante paḷāite na pāile bāṭa | 404 |
yesaneke keśarī ghauḍai gajayūtha
sehi sarūpe mohora saini hoile bhaganasta | 405 |
nohai nohai ẏehānta lopya nohai re dhuśā
indra āśrita kari na pāili baraṣā | 406 |

div.note: ādihuṁ ẏekathā mote kahuthile yujheṣṭhi | (jha,gha,ṅa,jha)
sañsāra lobha kari ārambhili ẏeḍe dvanda | (ka,ṭa)
bahuta biṣa khāi nāśayānti prāṇī | (kha,ccha)
terakośa pariyante paḷāite na pābanti bāṭa (ka,ccha,ḍha)

{nohai kicchi ẏehānta nāśa na karare dhuśā
kandara āśre kari na pāili bharasā | (ka,jha,ṭa,ḍha)}

lg.l: śukhilā araṇya hoile mohora saini
birāṭara nandana holāka kāḷānaḷa bahani | 407 |
pracaṇḍa pabana mote hoilā sātukī sārathi
mote hoilā durddaṣa niceṁ laṁkāgaḍara gati | 408 |
aneka jhiṁghāsi trodha karai kurupati
rāreṇa sabhāru uṭhile droṇa mahārathī | 409 |
droṇe boile śuṇa ho mānagobinda
kāhāra bacana na kari tu ārambhilu dvanda | 410 |
rāma rābaṇara pūbonṅa hoilāka yudda
rāmalaṣaṇaṁku indrajita kalā nāgapāśe badha | 411 |
laṣaṇara baṣasthaḷe paḍilāṭi śakti
gataprāṇa hoi sehu upāẏeṇa pāile jībati | 412 |
beśyā prasaṅge hāde śirī nāśa yāiṁ
taskara prasaṅge baḍhile dharmayaśa harai | 413 |
regara prasaṅge nāśa hoai baḷabapu
rāga prasaṅgeṇa ye adabhūte hoẏe ripu | 414 |
yātrā prasaṅge nāśayānti kuḷastirī
kubuddhi prasaṅgeṇa abhāba saburi | 415 |
yadyapi śirī āṣya baḍhai sampada
āṣya śrī sampada nāśa yāiṭi kuṭumve arjile bibāda | 416 |
athabā ẏetebeḷe yadi pāru apasari
upariki buddhi śikha thokāẏeka hāri | 417 |
mānagobinda boilā guru he hoicchi ki ẏemanta
tumbhanta ghuñchi yebe hoila nisata | 418 |
droṇe boile rājā tu jhiṁghāsi boilu boḷi
āmbhara sāṁgrāma rājā tu dekha kijā kāḷi | 419 |
yadyapi śvetara prāẏe hoibe sahasre rathī
mohora chare ke pāibaṭi jībati | 420 |
athaā samare yebe nuārai māri
samare śahasra chaḍibi satya satya ye mohori | 421 |
dusaha pratagyāṁ yahuṁ kale droṇa mahārathī
dhr̥tirāṣṭaṁ sanni dhe pāṇḍabe acchanti | 422 |
bhīmasena boilā guru he tumbha pratagyāṁ karuṁ karuṁ
ẏeka sodare āsi lāgilā ẏete dūruṁ | 423 |
pratagyāṁ ẏeka kalenāhiṁ ki,bhīṣma mahārathī
daśa sahasra yoddā pāḍuthibi niti niti | 424 |
ājara yudde ta jaṇeheṁ nuārile māri
pratagyāṁ sāchā?? dekhilu ye nohile prāṇe hāri | 425 |
bhīmasena boilā yebe cchatrīṁkara bacana nikaḷaṁka hoiba
mahataṁkara bacana yebe biarthaku yiba | 426 |
brāhmaṇa hoiṇa yebe kahibaṭi mithyā
pāpaṇāra stirī yebe na kariba raṣā | 427 |
rājāra mukhe yebe āsiba anīti
putrahoi yebe mātā pitāre abhagati | 428 |

div.note:
}bhīmasena boilā guru he tumbhe pratagyāṁ kimpe karu
tumbhara mandapaṇe nāśagalu ẏeka sahodaruṁ | (tha,na,ñja)

lg.l: 426|1 "bhīmasena boilā yebe cchatrīṁkara bacana nikaḷaṁka hoiba |"
ẏeteka carita yebe hoiba biḍamvaṇa
ẏethiru ariṣṭi jāta hoiba ye puṇa |
chatrīṁkara bacana yebe niṣphaḷa hoiba
samara beḷe yebe śahasradhārī piṭhi deba |
se chatrī samare paḍile moṣa gati nāhiṁ
kaurebe paḍai se nisate āśā bahi |
lg.note: āpaṇāra satya yebe na kariba raṣā | (cha,ṭha,ṅa,jha,ḍha
lg.l: adabhūta bhābe yebe upujiba ariṣṭi
kipāiṁ indra debatā karibāka br̥ṣṭi | 429 |
kacchapara muṇḍa yehne gopya hoi prasarai
teheneka hoilā sinā bhīṣmaṁkara pratagyāṁiṁ | 430 |
bātuḷa yehne yāhā boilā boilā
yahiṁthilā thilā, yāhā khāilā khāilā | 431 |
yābata kāḷaku ta ẏe kathāhiṁ rahilā
bhīṣmaṁkara pratagyāṁ ye temanta hoilā | 432 |
jaẏa tu saṁsāra ballabha bāsudeba
tuhi se jāṇu sinā nātha bhāba ye abhāba | 433 |
brahmaṇa hou ki se śūdrahiṁ hāde hou
taba laẏe na thile jībanaku kāraṇa acchi kāhuṁ | 434 |
gyāne agyāne bā sabye ki asabye
triyā bā akriyāre cintaba bāsudebe | 435 |
sacchi??tta asa??tta deba tuhi se karāi
jātahiṁ karāi bhābahiṁ karāi abhāba hoile marāi | 436 |
daṣiṇa maudadhi tīre ye br̥ṣa kaḷpabaṭe
candra bhāgā tīrtha ye koṇāraka nikaṭe | 437 |
puruṣottama ṣetra ye koṭiẏe tīrtha gheni
basiḷe hari baḷarāma subhadrā ye tini | 438 |
na yā nānā tīrtha nigama dūra panchi??
jañjāḷa pramāde na paśa śrījagannāthaṁkara dekhante | 439 |
śrī jagannātha nāma karasi ui??ra
lobha moha sañsāru nare huasi bege pāra | 440 |
sakaḷa tīrthe prāṇī buḷi se marai
nāhiṁ tahiṁ kāraṇa yebe nāma na bhajai | 441 |
lg.note: anamite anīti yebe uyujiba araṣṭi | (gha,ṭa)
chāri meghe yebe na karibe jaḷabr̥ṣṭi | (tha,ñja,na)
lg.l: sakaḷa tīrthaṭi gobindara nāma
ẏethi upare āu nāhiṁ nā kicchi dharma | 442 |
gati mukati ye gobindara nāma
ye nāma sumarante na thāi dukha śrama | 443 |
yama na daṇḍai yeuṁ nāma dhaile
na thāi rega byādhi mukhare boile | 444 |
na kāṭai sarpāghāta ripu bhaẏa ādi
śrījagannātha parasanne sakaḷa riyu siddi | 445 |
puruṣaṁkara uttama yeṇu śrī puruṣottama nāma
paramānanda svāmī adhama uddāraṇa | 446 |
dasiṇa maudadhi taṭe tora bāsa
nīḷādri rūpa se brahmapraḷaẏa prakāśa | 447 |
bije nīḷakandare caturddā rūpa goṭi
nīḷa kaḷpabaṭa taḷe saṅgama hoicchi tirtha koṭi | 448 |
paramānanda puruṣa ye paraloka budhu
jāṇi se na māḍalā kāḷa kr̥tānteka darpasidhu | 449 |
nirmaḷa nirākuḷa ẏe daṣiṇa dvārikā
agyāna agatiki kāraṇa ẏehi ẏekā | 450 |
yahiṁ ẏehi se nārāẏaṇa biśrāma karai daṇḍe
yābata candra arke se hoai tīrtha khaṇḍe | 451 |
āpaṇe janamile bāḷūta rūpa dhari
paradārā ramaṇe atīa anyāẏa ācari | 452 |
idaṁ bākya amr̥ta ye mama hr̥dagate
nārāẏaṇa nāmataka bicaḷita nohoi yemante | 453 |
yeuṁṇa āgyāṁẏeka mote dileka heṅgaḷā
kr̥pāajaḷa nāndinī hr̥dare mama hārā | 454 |
lg.note:
{yeuṁṇa āgyāṁẏeka mote dileka aṅgirā | (gha,jha,ñja,tha,na
yeuṁṇa āgyāṁ ẏeka mote dileka girijā (ka,cha))}
lg.l: ajapā apaṇḍita muṁ akarmaṇya aṭai
śrīcaṇḍī sāreḷāra bāchā kari ẏemāna bheṭāi | 455 |
yeuṁṇa bhāratha ḷekhana, khaḍi na jāśaiṁ lekhā
kisa muṁ paṇḍita kisa mora bhākhā | 456 |
yete dūre paśiḷi muṁ tete dūra antakaḷi
ke lekhā kari gaṇipārai gaṅgā kuḷara bāḷi | 457 |
kaṅkherapūra bāsī śrīcaṇḍī sāreḷā debī
muhiṁ tāhāra putra ye sāreḷā dāsa kabi | 458 |
yābata jībaṁkarahiṁ se jagannāthahiṁ mūḷa
tāhāra talaẏe muṁ bhābai baṣasthaḷa | 459 |
se jagannātha svāmīṁkara caraṇārabinde
se keśara cumvai muṁ hoiṇa makarande | 460 |
se svāmīra caraṇe śaraṇa muhiṁ nitye
teṇu kari hoili muṁ parama paṇḍi te | 461 |
śrīpadma caraṇe ārādhi mora sebā
śūdramuni sāreḷa dāsaku mukati gati debā | 462–1732
lg.head: {@pañchama dibasa yudda@}
lg.l: baibasuta manu pucchākale śuna he agasti
śrī biṣṇu purāṇa mahābhāratha ẏe cinti | 1 |
pāñcha dibase āsi bhīṣmapabonṅa kathā
kahasi prathame mote paṇḍita mahāgyāṁtā | 2 |
lg.note: makaranda–madhu o madhupa, dui artha hutra | traṭhāre makaranda artha madhupa |
pañchama dibasa yudda ārambhare (kha) re adhikāpāṭha:-
śūṇa baibasuta manu ẏethu anantare
pāṇḍababaḷa bāhuḍi gale nija pure | 1 |
rātra huante pāṇḍaba hasti nā aile
driyodhana saṅgatare sabhāre basile | 2 |
lg.l: śuṇa ho mahārājā baibasuta manu
dri yodhanaku bahuta aprāṁjaẏe paḍilā hāde caturtha dinuṁ | 3|
bahuta samara kalā śveta ẏekā rathe
kaurebanta paẏeḍa paḍilā nabayojana pariyante | 4 |
naba sahasra rājā batiśa ahibrata rathī
pāñchalaṣa yoddā ye tinilaṣa mattahāthī | 5 |
paẏeḍa paḍilā ye asakata yudda
sainahiṁ paḍilā naba ye pārāẏudha | 6 |
pāñcha yojana dīrgha aḍhāi yūṇa prati
pāñchatāḷa ucchargeṇa paḍile rathī hāthī pādānti | 7 |
yamaprastha boḷi sarasvatī nadī kūḷe
pāṇḍabe rahile yāiṁ bāñchābaṭa taḷe | 8 |
pāṇḍabe kaurebe rahile ẏeka yoge
bañchileka raẏaṇī prīti ẏekasaṅge | 9 |
aruṇa prakāśa yahuṁ sañgyāca ballabha
pañchujanya śaṅkha śadda kale bāsudeba | 10 |
hari arjuna ye hoile ẏekaṭhāba
nandighoṣa sāhanta kamaḷāballabha | 11 |
lg.note: bhīṣma droṇa sahite sakaḷā pātra mantrī
lg.l: nānā kathāmāna se kuhākuhi huanti | 3 |
rātra daśaghaḍi yahuṁ hoilā prabeśa
āstāna mauḷilā caḷile yejhā bāsa | 4 |
ye yāhā mandire nicinte śoile
thāṭha saina ādi ye samaste nāśgale | 5 |
ẏethu antare puṇa pāhilā rajanī
debatāṁka āḷare śubhilā śaṅkhadhuni | 6 |
sārile nityakarma ye radhana bhejana
yuddaku yibāku puṇa kale āgamana | 7 |
tridaśa debatāẏe śuṇile śagkhadhuni
sādhu sādhu pāṇḍabe boli bolanti padmayoni | 12 |
srāhāna nityakarma sāriṇa bega bega
ye yāhāra samadaṇḍa gheni hoile beni bhāga | 13 |
bājai bīratūra ṭamaka niśāṇa dāuṁṇḍi
bīra beśa aḷaṁkāra hoi ye yāhāra ratha maṇḍi | 14 |
tarjunti karjanti ḍākanti nāma dhari
sāja re sāja re boḷi bājai bīra bherī | 15 |
nandi ghoṣa rathare śrīkr̥ṣṇa sārathi
śrīkare gāṇḍiba dhanu dhari se bicitrabīryyara nāti | 16 |
bhīmasenara rathe sārathi bijaẏe
biśvābasuṁkara se aṭai kaniṣṭha tanaẏe | 17 |
bhāgyabara sārathi ye nakuḷara rathe
sahadeba rathe sārathi hoile anāgate | 18 |
yujheṣṭhiṁkara rathe sārathi śākalya brāhmaṇe
prabīrara nāti se maṇḍoḷe ẏekajaṇe | 19 |
dhr̥ṣṭadyumanara rathe sārathi aruṇateja
dr̥padara rathe sārathi makaradhvaja | 20 |
jambhanada nāme sārathi ye birāṭara rathe
sātukī sārathi śveta kumārara rathe | 21 |
harisāgara pure haridaḷana boli daṣa
se sārathi paṇe ratha bāhai durddaṣa | 22 |

div.note: ākāśe śūbhilā keśaba śaṅgadhuni | (ka,gha,ṭa,ṭha)
dharmasutaṁka rathe sārathi sañkri ṣaṭa brāhmaṇa | (tha,ñja,na)
jaẏasena nāme sārathi birāṭara rathe | (ñj,tha,na)

lg.l: subhadrā nandana ye kumāra abhimanyu
ketana sārathi umābasuṁka ratanu | 23 |
dr̥padara nandana mahārathī śrīkhaṇḍī
samartheka sārathi tāhāra ratha maṇḍi | 24 |
hiḍimvikīra nandana ghaṭauktiṭa mahābaḷī
tā rathe sārathi aṭai kr̥ṣṇābaḷī | 25 |
śagganāme rathī ye birāṭara suta
caitana sārathi bāhai tāra ratha | 26 |
uttara kumāra ye sudeṣṇāra baḷā
tāhāra rathe sārathi aṭai sasrakaḷā | 27 |
ghaṭauktaṭa nandana añjanaprabhā bīra
thāra sārathi dibākara śabara | 28 |
jārāsadha nandana sahadeba jaẏasena
kumbha nikumbha sārathi aṅgirāṁka nandana | 29 |
bhīṣmaṁkara rathe ye anumata sārathi
kaṁka indra putra aruṇara paṇanāti | 30 |
chatriẏabara sundara bhāromalla karṇṇa
śoṣaka kāḷasarpa tāhāṁka sārathi bidyamāna | 31 |
droṇaṁkara rathe ye niṣāda sārathi | (cha,ṭha)
droṇaṁkara rathe ye baśvakesana sārathi (ṭa,gha)
23|2 umābasuṁkara tanu–umābaira tanu pāṭhadekhāyātre |
aśastamāṁkara rathe ẏekajaṭā sārathi
gorekhaṁkara nandana se matsaindraṁka paṇanāti | 34 |
śalyaṁkara rathe ye sārathi mahādeba
kuṣmāṇḍa rūṣiṁka nandana se anaṅga sadāśiba | 35 |
anaḷa asuṁka nandana birecana nāme basu
bhūrisabonṅāṁkara rathe se sārathi paṇe āsuṁ | 36 |
mahlāra deśara rājā aṭai baḷaketi
somadatta mahārathīṁkara rathe se aṭai sārathi | 37 |
dāhḷika mahārathī se kaṇaẏaude rathe
astukarā sārathi ye br̥ndāarka daibate | 38 |
kurukuḷa maṇḍana rājā mānacatrabratī
tāhāra rathe ye kumuda sārathi | 39 |
rābaṇara ratha se bāhai sabonṅkāḷe
driyodhana rathe sārathi hoilā mahābhāratha yudda beḷe | 40 |
brathara nandana se kumāra manumatha
ahaniśi sārathi sehu dhuśāsanara ratha | 41 |
gāḷabara nandana ye nr̥pati sañjaẏe
se sārathi hoiṇa dhr̥tirāṣṭa ratha bāhe | 42 |
sidhu deśara rājā ye aṭai jadyaratha
tāhāṁkara rathe anupāma manumatha | 43 |
karṇṇāṭa deśara rājā hāde karṇṇakeśī
tāhāra ratha bāhai kāmāṣī nāme dāsī | 44 |
kāṇī deśara rājā nāma kāmeśvera
bhaireba sārathi ye tāhāra rathara | 45 |
lg.note: kumbhaṁkara nandana se anaṅga sadāśiba (gha,ṭa)

mahḷāra deśara gajā aṭai bajraketi | (ṅa,jha)
mandāra deśara rājā aṭai mandakeśī | (ñja,tha,na)
bhagadattara nandana ye kumāra manamatha | (ñja,jha,ṇa)
tāhāṁkara rathe anupama manuratha | (ṅa,cha,na)
lg.l: māḷaba deśara rājā aṭai kr̥tabarmā
tāhāra rathe sārathi maḷaẏāniḷa maha tamā | 46 |
nirjhara deśa rājā ye aṭai gaṇapati
bajrāṅga boḷiṇa ye tāhāra sārathi | 47 |
aḷamvuṣā boli kari ye ẏekai rāṣasa
driyodhana maitra se baḍāi biśvāsa | 48 |
kurutānteka boliṇa ye tāhāra sārathi
aḷāẏadhara sārathi ye dhānukī kuśaketi | 49 |
ẏemante aneka rathī ye aneka sārathi
sañchapi kahibāku lekhante apramiti | 50 |
acchanti mahā mahā rathī mahā mahā rāẏe
ṭhika ṭhika muṁ kahiḷi thokāẏe | 51 |
rathīmānaṁka upare arjuna śiremaṇi
tāhāra rathe sārathi deba catrapāṇi | 52 |
bijaẏe pāṇḍabe se samara raṇabhūmi
birāṭara nandana ye baḷabantā mahārathī śvete
pāṇḍabe mukuṭa nei bādhale tāra māthe | 54 |
samara śabada ye śubhai yugati
birāṭara nandana ye śveta mahārathī | 55 |
śrīkhaṇḍī dhr̥ṣṭadyumana śaṅkha uttara palāṇi
ohobaḷa madhye śveta kumāra āgiāṇi | 56 |
kaureba thāṭhe āgiāṇi bhīṣma mahārathī
tāhāṁkara chamure śveta miḷilā taḍati | 57 |
bhīṣme boile tu re bāḷūta agyāna
tohora tule kāhiṁ mo samara bidyamāna | 58 |

div.note: kurutāṅga boliṇa ye tāhāra sārathi | (ṅa,ṛḍa,ḍha,jha,gha)
dhānukī–dhanurddārī |

lg.l: sāṁgrāme tote jiṇile kisa pauruṣa
samare sāna puanta māile baḍa doṣa | 59 |
śuṇiṇa kumāra ye kopare parajaḷi
bhīṣmakaiṁ nārāja se bidhalā jāḷābaḷī | 60 |
adabhūte śara br̥ṣṭi ye hoilā gaganuṁ
praśaṁsanti gāṅgabe ye śāẏantanura tanu | 61 |
sādhu sādhu mahiṁmā re sudeṣṇāra suta
kebaṇa bidyaguṇe tu re ẏeḍeka sāmaratha | 62 |
śvetakaiṁ āḍe kari bhīṣma mahārathī
arjuna chamure āsi miḷile taḍati | 63 |
sātukī sārathi ye bāhai turaṅga
ratha bāhi kalā nei karṇṇa bīra āga | 64 |
rādhebara nandana ye bhāreimalla karṇṇa
śvetakumāra tule samara kalāḷa ādhāna | 65 |
luhāra śara ye śaṅkha cila pacchī
apāra kāḷaru se śara karṇṇa dhanure pūroi acchi | 66 |
agniśara jāṇiṇa se pañchaṣaṭhi koṭi
gatarāge tāhā karṇṇa ẏekāghāntike kalā br̥ṣṭi | 67 |
medinī āluamaẏe diśilā mahājyoti
pañchabāṇe śveta se śarakaiṁ pakāilā bikoti | 68 |
puṇa śaṛheka nārāja gheni tīṣamunā
ātreṣi bidhalā karṇṇa śveta kumāra bajrasehnā | 69 |

div.note: śvetara uparaku bīra karṇṇa bidhalāka yoci | (ñja,tha,na)
"ātreṣi bidhalā karṇṇa śveta kumāra bajrasehnā"

lg.l: padapare ñja, tha, na pothire bhinna pāṭha:-
yuṇa śateka nārāja ye bidhalāka śveta
karṇṇara śaramāna sabonṅa galā hata |
puṇa sataṣaṭhi nārāja biddhalā bīra śveta
reme reme bhedilā ye karṇṇara hr̥dagate | (ñja,tha,na)
69|1 tīṣamunā sthānare bajra munā pāṭha dekhāyātra |
āsanteṇa nārāja dekhilā śveta dūre
karṇṇara śatebāṇa cchedilā tīṣa śare | 70 |
kāmyeka śara se prahāra kalā śveta
ghāẏeṇa bhāreimalla hoilā aceta | 71 |
yesaneke paśanti bamvare uḍaṅge
karṇṇara śarīre śara bhedile ati bege | 72 |
sambhāḷa karṇṇa boḷi śveta karai pucchā
asāṣṭame karṇṇa ye paḍigalā mūrcchā | 73 |
sārathi ratha gheni galāka apasari
sehnā phuṭi karṇṇara śarīra rūdhire jarajari | 74 |
karṇṇara paḷābante bhājileka saini
karṇṇakaiṁ māra boḷi thāṭhe śubhilāka dhuni | 75 |
karṇṇara tule thile ye pañchāṇoi sahasra rathī
bhāñji le saine kehi na rahile kati | 76 |
jābaḍe uṭhile birāṭara tini putre
ẏekamukhe nārāja bidhale apramite | 77 |
pañchāuna sahasra rathī ogāḷile ẏe tini kumāraṁku
aniryāpa bāṇ ye bidhale tāhāṁku | 78 |
paḍanteṇa āsi śara ākāśa panchi ye na diśi
amābai dine yehne adhāra hoẏe niśi | 79 |
aniryāpa śara dekhiṇa birāṭi
sūcimunā nārāja kopeṇa kalā br̥ṣṭi | 80 |
ratha gaja aśva ye phuṭile saboṅayodhī
reme reme nārāja paḍile sabonṅa bhedi | 81 |
paḍate gaḷi rudhira jharajharita remābaḷī
śarīra biāśai mandāra puṣya bhaḷi | 82 |
rudhira br̥ṣṭi hoi samaste paḍile nimañji
pādānti baḷa dekhi paḷāile bhāñji | 83 |

div.note: uḍaṅga–sarpa |

lg.l: goḍāi bidhanti ye birāṭa tini putre
nārājara ghāẏe loṭanti rathī hāthī sahite | 84 |
dhr̥ṣṭadyumana śrīkhaṇḍī ye bege āsi
dekhiṇa droṇe tāhānta nārāja baraṣi | 85 |
uttara kumāra tule dhuśāsanara samara
śrīkhaṇḍī miḷilā yāi aśastamāra āgara | 86 |
dekhiṇa kopabhara bhāradvādaśaṁkara nāti
śrīkhaṇḍīki ghoṭilā ye mandara jāṇi mūrtti | 87 |
aśastamā boilā re paḍilu mora mukha
tote māile yiba śāẏantanura dukha | 88 |
pachāruṁ pachāruṁ se droṇaṁkara baḷā
ātreṣi nārāja ye bidhalā mahākhaḷā | 89 |
aḍale nārāja ye tiḷa mañji buṇilāra prāẏe
sehnā phuṭi bhebhilā ye śrīkhaṇḍīra kāẏe | 90 |
śuṇa ho caitana śrīkhaṇḍīra rathī paṇa
reme remeke nārāja gucchi hoiacchi ẏeṇe karai raṇa | 91 |
gadhabonṅā nārāja ye śrīkhaṇḍīki tuḷākarṇṇa dilā
se śara gheniṇa śrīkhaṇḍī aśastamāku māilā | 92 |
yeteka nārāja aśastāmā thile yoci
gadhabonṅā śare tāhā cchedi yāuacchi | 93 |
aśastamā yocithile tini sasra bāṇa
tāhā cchediṇa ye cchedilā dhanu troṇa | 94 |
peṣante nārāja aśastamāra bāma bhmajeṇa galāka nikiḷi
āpaṇāra dhanu śasra aśastamā nuārilā sambhāḷi | 95 |
aśastamā birathī dekhiṇa sārathi
ratha ghenigalā ye samara upekhi | 96 |
aśastamā bhāñjanteṇa ye paḷāile sabonṅa baḷa
goḍāiṇa śrīkhaṇḍī ye bidhai achārgaḷa | 97 |
94|2 śrīkhaṇḍī chedilā tāhā pāñchaśara māriṇa | (tha,ñja,na)
goḍāi pādagati hoiṇa śrīkhaṇḍī
yoddāṁkara upare nei piṭilāṁ bhūṣaṇḍi | 98 |
yeklā prahārake paḍanti ye daśa biṁśa tiriśa
karai kutūhoḷa se padmābatīra śiṣa | 99 |
gaja aśva sārathi paḍile bhūmigate
bhāñja le kurubaḷa ye na rahanti kadācite | 100 |
bhīṣma arjunanara ye samara mahāgoḷa
bāṇa jāḷābaḷī jāiṇi ye baraṣāra kāḷa | 101 |
hāthakaiṁ hātha ye dekhābanti beni
tiḷa pramāṇe nārāja bidhanti bege gheni | 102 |
birāṭara nandana ye śveta mahābaḷī
nārāja bidhabāre dhanu tā kuṇḍaḷī | 103 |
ohobaḷa madhye se baḍāi baḷantā
samare sambhabonṅa sehu abicchanne na yāi gaṇitā | 104 |
bāhai turaṅgama sārathi mādhabi
droṇaṁ chamure ratha ṭeki bāṇa parābhabi | 105 |
bhīradvādaśaṁka nandana aṭanti bidyāguru
indra śaṁkā karaiṭi yāra dhanu dharu | 106 |
śvetakaiṁ dekhi yucchā karanti guru droṇe
ẏe mahī maṇḍaḷe droṇaguru muhiṁ ẏekājaṇe | 107 |
bāḷūta bhābe tu re kicchihiṁ na jāṇuṁ
dvanda anartha tu re ẏekata prāẏe maṇuṁ | 108 |
śveta boilā ẏebe semāna chaḍa guru
chāgaḷa prātrame ki ṭāḷi hoai meru | 109 |
kāḷacatra prāẏe droṇaṁkara buḷai beni ākhi
bidhale nārāja guru uprodha upekhi 110 |
śatemunā śakati kāḷāntaka prāẏe
kopeṇa bidhale bhāradvādaśaṁkara tanaẏe | 111 |
lg.note: kautuka yudda karai se padmābatīra śiṣa | (tha,ñja,na)
lg.l: dekhina śveta bīra bidhalā śara goṭi
cchaichāḍe droṇaṁkara ratha galā phāṭi | 112 |
puṇa śvetakumāra bidhai tīṣamunā
ghāẏeṇa bhedilā se droṇaṁkara sehnā | 113 |
nārāja bhedante dekhile droṇa senāpati
sūryyābrateka bāṇa se bidhale tataṣaṇānti | 114 |
nidāgha śara se ye kāḷānaḷa prāẏe
ratha ghoṭi byāpilā śveta kumārara kāẏe | 115 |
amiẏa nārāja ye śveta kumāra dhari ṣepi
tribhmabana byāpilā ye nārāja kāmarūpī | 116 |
beni śara bheṭi madhye paritāḷa kari
śuṇaghr̥ṣṭa nāde ye abanī acchi pūri | 117 |
yesane gagane udaẏe ārdrobaḷī
tesana sādriśe dhanura teja parikaḷi | 118 |
tiriśi nārāja gheniṇa bidyāguru
ghoṭilā nārāja śvetara aṅgaru | 119 |
puṇa śateka nārāja pūroiṇa droṇe
sātukī sārathiki bidhale tataṣaṇe | 120 |
chāri aśvakuhiṁ biśāśate śara
kopeṇa koḍiẏe śara bidhale guru śveta rathara upara | 121 |
droṇaṁkara śara paḍilā mahāraṇe
kopeṇa peṣilā śveta kāḷacatra bāṇe | 122 |
aneka na rāja ye peṣithile droṇa guru
catrara bighāteṇa se nāśilāka dūruṁ | 123 |
khaṇḍa pirīṣa nārāja droṇa gu ru ye prahāri
mudugara gheni tāhā śveta kumāra nibāri | 124 |
lg.note: khaṇḍagiri nārāja droṇa guru ye prahāri | (ka,kha,ṅa,ñja,tha,na)
lg.l: sahasra munā nārāja bidhile droṇa senāpati
kiraṇa nārāje śveta kumāra bikoti | 125 |
aruṇa kiraṇa jāṇi śara teja ye bikāśi
droṇaṁkara nārāja śveta kumāra bināśi | 126 |
kope śveta bidhalā hāboḍā śara gheni
droṇaṁkara rathe paḍi jhalakilā bahani | 127 |
puṇa śveta kumāra śara bidhalā gaḷagāji
śahasra bighāte droṇara rathagalā bhāñji | 128 |
āna ratha ārohiṇa bhāradvādaśaṁkara bāḷā
samare nārāja bidhale guru śahasra kaḷā | 129 |
droṇaṁkara śvetara asañkhyā samara
kahante na sarai debamānabe agocara | 130 |
dusaha samara ye hoilā raṇaraṅga
rūdhire br̥ṣṭi ye hoilāni beni aṅga | 131 |
śarada kāḷe yehne garjaiṭi indra
ubhaẏa baḷa yoddāẏe hoile biṣāda | 132 |
śara bidhai śrābaṇa mās yesaneka baraṣai pāṇi
cchatrībara sohoḍi śveta kumāra cūḍāmaṇi | 133 |
jijaẏe samare pāṇḍaba sāmarathā
kahante na sarai bhīmasena putra kathā | 134 |
koṭiẏe yoddā gheni hiḍimvikīra āmtājā
samare paśilā se asura kuḷa rājā | 135 |
biśeṣe asura aṭanti kāmarūpī
svarga mañha pātāḷa bhmabana tini byāpī | 136 |
tarjanti garjanti dhari bulāiṇa phiṅgi
tuṇḍare dhariṇa giḷānti ati begi | 137 |
lg.note: bajrābaḷī śara śveta māilā gaḷāgāji | (ñja,tha,na)
udare dhariṇa giḷanti ati begi | (ṅa,ja)
lg.l: aśvanta dhariṇa phiṅganti śūnyakhaṇḍa
uparaku tale bistāranti tuṇḍa | 138 |
aneka nārāja ye bidhanti kaurebe
tuṇḍa bistāriṇa tāhā giḷanti dānabe | 139 |
asura durāntaka bhañjāile saina
dekhiṇa dhāiṁlā se kumāra dhuśāsana | 140 |
saturi saturi bhāra gadā gheni beni hāthe
sadhyākāḷe yesane diśanti parabate | 141 |
re re kāra śabada kariṇa dhuśāsana uṭhi
gadābara bulāi piṭilā ghaṭaukaṭara piṭhi | 142 |
garjiṇa uṭhilā se hiḍimvi kīra bāḷa
paḍanteṇa gadā se pātilā baṣasthaḷa | 143 |
ghaṭauktaṭa upare gadābara paḍi
agni nirghāta ki paḍuacchi jhaḍi | 144 |
hiḍimvi kīra nandana dhuśāsana gadāghāta meṇṭi
bīrabara koṭhāra gheniṇa bega kari piṭi | 145 |
gādhārī nandanara paḍilā hr̥dagate
mohagalā dhuśāsana ghaṭauktaṭa bighāte | 146 |
moheṇa paḍilā yahuṁ bīra dhuśāsana
asipatra gheniṇa se dhāiṁlā bahana | 147 |
ṣaṇake cetilā se dhr̥tirāṣṭara baḷā
asambhāḷa hoiṇa se samaru paḷāilā | 148 |
āre āre boḷiṇa dhāmaiṁ ghaṭa ye uktaṭa
aha raha dhuśāsana āreka bāre bheuṭa | 149 |
lg.note: raha raha dhaśāsana āreka bāre bheṭa | (tha,ñja,na)
lg.l: ghaṭauktaṭa boilā tote ẏehiṣaṇi māranti re dhuśā
tohora redhirakaiṁ dropatīra baḍa āśā | 150 |
daṣiṇa bhmaja tora opāḍibe bhīmasena
dropatī keśa pakhāḷibe bidyamāna | 151 |
