paḷā yā dhuśāsana lūca hasti nā pure
āubeḷe na paśibu mahābhāratha yuddare | 152 |
bhīṣma arjunara samara ye kathā
lāghaba śaramāna ye peṣanti apramitā | 153 |
śvetara samara ye droṇaṁkara tule
dinakara nātha āsi madhyasthāne bije kale | 154 |
bhāradvādaśaṁkara nandana ye samare hoile bimukha
nārāja bidha bidha guru pāileni baḍa dukha | 155 |
śvetakaiṁ guru jiṇi nuārile kebeheṁ
deba śahasra guru bidhaleka samara sandehe | 156 |
kuhukā nārāja pūreiṁ bidhile droṇa guru
sūryyābrateka śara māri nibārilā śveta dūruṁ | 157 |
puṇa agni bāṇeka ye peṣile droṇa guru
jaḷadhārā bāṇe śveta tāhā ninārilāka dhūruṁ | 158 |
agnira teja yuhuṁ hoilā nirūna
praśaṁsanti droṇe śveta jībana tora dhanya | 159 |
puṇi sabonṅat śara bidhile guru droṇe reṣe
garjiṇa pathare ye āsanti ākāśe | 160 |
śveḍha dekhilā se pāṣāṇa śiḷābr̥ṣṭi
ajra śare tāhā cchedilā birāṭi | 161 |
droṇ praśaṁsanti śveta re jībana tora dhani
keuṇa laṣaṇe jātakalā tote tohora jananī | 162 |
moghā śareka ye puṇa peṣile guru droṇa
śveta nibārilā tāhā pabanā śareṇa | 163 |
pabanara bighāte ye uḍile meghamāḷe
asambhaba pratagyāṁ kalā birāṭara bāḷe | 164 |
pannagā śareka se māile droṇa guru
pr̥thī pūrilā ye sarpe dhāmanti dhari pheru | 165 |
khagabara nārāja śveta māilā paritāḷi
dekhiṇa sarpamāne bimvare gale gaḷi | 166 |
sāṁgrāma karante beḷa tini ye prahara
sāṁgrāmare bumukha ye hoile sabonṅa bīra | 167 |
nahuta praśaṁsā yahuṁ hoilā śvetaku
bāḷūta kumara jiṇuacchi ye droṇaṁku | 168 |
śuṇiṇa guru se kampanti garu kope
kāḍhile debaśara troṇuṁ garu mahātāpe | 169 |
brahmāśara boḷi ye apāḷaṭaka bāṇa
pāśupata bābala ye mahākāḷa ābara nārāẏaṇa | 170 |
rudraśara amohaśara bajraśara ābaa manabhedī
ẏeteka śaramānaṭi yāhāku yeṣiba abaśya śira cchedi | 171 |
ẏe śahasramāna peṣanti kaṣṭhora sandohe
apālaṭaka śara ẏe na bāhuḍanti kebeheṁ | 172 |
kiñchita yudde nuārile ẏe śaramāna yeṣi
sāmānya cchatrīki ẏe śara na ākreṣi | 173 |
athabā sāna occha hoile yebe māri
pratagyāṁ nāśayāi cchatrīpaṇaku dūṣaṇabrahmahatyā doṣa sari |174 |
jana mukhe lajjā apagcchati pāile yahuṁ droṇaguru
ākāśv debe dhikāra karanti brahma śahasra dharuṁ | 175 |
kotiẏe agni teja yebaṇa brahmaśara
bhaẏeṇa śūnyaloke ye hoile antara | 176 |
dekhiṇa trāsile ohobaḷa saini
triyurāntaka prāẏe diśile droṇe brahmaśara gheni | 177 |
gobinde ḍākile ye nandighoṣe thāi
brahmaśaa kale droṇe re sātukī śvetaku āṇa bāhuḍāi | 178 |
śaṇiṇa sātukī ye ghuñchāilā ratha
nāāẏaṇaṁka āgyāṁre rathe neiṁ kalā gaganagata | 179 |
śveta boilā sātukī kalu hīnakarma
kimbhūta arthe mote cchaḍāilu sāṁgrāma | 180 |
janamukhe apachāti baṇamukhe apayaśa
chatrīkuḷe dūṣikī mote boḷibeṭi kisa | 181 |
sātukī bolā droṇa brahmaśara kalā
nārāẏaṇa debanta śaṁkāhiṁ lāgilā | 182 |
śveta boilā ẏekathā nohoi sātukī
bahana ratha bāhā mohora droṇaṁkara tahiṁki | 183 |
maraṇaku nisata ki chatrīpaṇa kale
yaśa apayaśa chatrīra karama mahābhāratha samare paśile | 184 |
śuṇiṇa raha bāhuḍāilā mādhabi
droṇaku ohomukhe śveta nārāja prābhabī | 185 |
brahma śahasra se koṭiẏe kiraṇa bahati
sātukī rathuṁ ḍeiṁ paḍilāka jhāti | 186 |
nārāja bidhuthilā rathare birāṭi
tiḷa pramāṇe nārāja karuthilā br̥ṣṭi | 187 |
śvetara śaramāna dahija hoilā samasta
baṣasthaḷe paḍilā yāiṁ mahābrahma asra | 188 |
koṭiẏe kiraṇa nārāja mahābrahma teja
śvetara ??? hoilā dahijya | 189 |
lg.note: chatrīkule śuṇile mote karibe upahāsa | (jha,ḍha,gha,tha,na,ḍha)
yaśa apasaśa huai sāṁgrāme paśile | (tha,ñja,??)
lg.l: teraghaḍi sampūrṇṇa ye dinakara nātha
birāṭa nandana śveta ye hoilā nipāta | 190 |
ākāśa mārgare thile ye debaloke
droṇaṁku dhikakāra ye kale br̥ndāarke | 191 |
śveta nidhaa boli śubhilā samare
jaẏeśaṅkha bajāi caḷile kurubīre | 192 |
sātukī agrate matsyādhipa karai pucchā
mohora śveta kumārara kihani bāratā | 193 |
sātukī boilā ho tehora putra śveta
droṇe tāhāku samare kaleka nipāta | 194 |
āhā nandana boliṇa rāẏe paḍigalā mūrcchā
etanā pāi ye kāndai sumari putra kathā | 195 |
bābu re sohaḍa sundara putra tu abhaẏe baḷabantā
bāiśi baraṣare yeḍeka śakatā | 196 |
mote maraṇa kimpā nohilā tohora mukha chāhiṁ
kebaṇa samudre paśibi jībane kāryya nāhiṁ | 197 |
kuḷara maṇḍana bābu anāthara nātha
bhārathe ajapa kathāre pratagyāṁ ruhāilu bahuta | 198 |
aneka trodha ye pāṇḍaba saini
śvetara thāānte kaurobe ki yāānte prāṇa gheni | 199 |
śaṅkha uttara śoka kahita ki pāri
keṇe katiki galu bhāi anātha āmbhanta kari | 200 |
aneka trodha se kale anusari
mr̥tupiṇḍa na pāile thāṭhe loḍi kari | 201 |
beḷa abasāne ye deba madhuhārī
rahile pāṇḍabe bāruṇābanta nagarī | 202 |
lg.note: rahile pāṇḍabe bāruṇābanta giri |
lg.l: srāna bhejana se nāhiṁ jāṇa kicchi
birāṭaku prabodha karanti śirībacchi | 203 |
yeuṁ deba māyādhara parama paṇḍita guru
yāhāra bacana śuṇante sakaḷa śoka haru | 204 |
gobinde boile birāṭa śoka kisa arthe
chatrīki trodha hāde karibā nohai kadācite | 205 |
śveta tohora sinā āja paḍilāka raṇe
dekha puṣyaka bimāne basāineucchanti debagaṇe | 206 |
deba dundubhi ye bājai tāhāra agrate
khaṭanti biḷāsuṇīẏe tāṇḍaba ye nr̥tye | 207 |
amara bidyādharī dhāmanti begi begi
kubera ratnamāna karāucchnti lāgi | 208 |
birāṭaku rathare ye basāi śrībatsa
ākāśare sarūpa dekhāile prataṣe | 209 |
dekhiṇa santoṣa ye birāṭa nr̥pati
chāḍilā śoka abasthā phiṭilā manubhrānti | 210 |
sādhu sādhu mahābhāratha yuddara mahimā
sādhu raṇayagyaṁ se karanti yeuṁṇa mahātamā | 211 |
jībanahiṁ bonṅaśahiṁ tāhāṁkara sādhu
koṭiẏe tīrthara phaḷa labhanti mahābhāratha yudduṁ | 212 |
ananta koṭi tirtha gaja aśva dāna ye aśvamedhi
nityakarma upabāsa mantra japa bidhi | 213 |
annadāna basradāna tiḷadāna jaḷadāna godāna
raṇayagyaṁ dānaku kehi nohai samāna | 214 |
nānā pātaka yebe hoithāi bonṅaśe
āpaṇe tarai koṭiẏe puruṣa gheni basai svargabāse | 215 |
lg.note: chāḍilā trodha cintā phitilā manu bhrānti | (gha,ṭa,dha)
lg.l: āpane uburai oṭiẏe puruṣa uddārai
kuḷare baḷaṁka thile samasta chaḍaiṁ | 216 |
āho sugyaṁjane tumbhe aṭa asradhārī
raṇayāgaku dhāmanti yehu satya hāde ācari | 217 |
raṇayāgaku koṭi avamedha yāga nohe sama
basai svagathāna na daṇḍai kāḷayama | 218 |
śvetara parā hoi upuyiba yāhāra bonṅśe
kotiẏe puruṣa tāhāra basibe svargabāse | 219 |
chatrī hoi yebe āna jātire abatari
nānā prakāre ye dāna dhyāna thiba kari | 220 |
bahuta pāpa thile dānare ṣaẏa yāi
chatrīpaṇa dāna dhyāna duhiṁnti sari hoi | 221 |
jaẏa tu jamadagni nandana praśurāma
reśukāra garbhma jāta kāḷa kr̥tānteka yāhāra nāma | 222 |
lalāṭe candracūḍa mukuṭa śireṇa śītāṁśu
bāmabhmaje ajaṅga dhanu ḍāhāṇe yāhāra praśu praśu | 223 |
bijekarṇṇakaṭāra kaumudī badhacitā |
ajaṭa darpa gañjana nātha bāma kadheṇa paitā | 224 |
āhāreṇa abhabī mahā mantreṇa bhegī
amr̥ta beni kuṇḍaḷa karṇṇe paramānanda yogī | 225 |
bīra bitrame dekhi nuārai beni ḍoḷe
kākutsa bonṅśa nāśa galā yāhāra kopānaḷe | 226 |
tini bhāi mātāra ye śira kamaḷa kāṭi
lalāṭe śobhita yāhāra śoṇita citā goṭi | 227 |
svāmī jamadagniki cinaẏabhābe prīti
tinibhāi mātānta jībadāna tataṣaṇānti | 228 |
lg.note: {añjana pābaka bāma kadheṇa triguṇa paitā | (jha,ḍha,cha,na)}
{bāmakadhe śohai ye nabaguṇa paiḍhā | (kha,ṅa,ñja)}
kaṣṇarī gadha citā, kauṣṇabha maṇi citā,kaumudī bardhan citā pāṭha dekhāyātra |
lg.l: upāẏeṇa yāhāra mantra mantra upāẏeṇa yāhāra ahasranta
upāẏeṇa sacarācara buhantā bidhāta | 230 |
pitāra nimanteṇa sahasrārjuna śira chedi
kintu mane dhari rājāmānanta bibādī | 231 |
mantraguru debaguru chatrīguru śahasraṁkara guru
samasta āpāda khaṇḍai śrī praśurāma sumaru | 232 |
jāḍhaguru antaguru madhyaguru mahābrahmi
ẏekoiśa bāra pr̥thī nichatrī kalu sacarācara bhūmi | 233 |
ẏekā koṭhārake ye samasta prābhabi
redhara tarpaṇe ye toṣilu bhairebī | 234 |
sañsārara ṭhākura ye debatāṁkara daibatā
ananta koṭi brahmāṇḍaku bhārābhara harantā | 235 |
pariharaṇa yāhāra kr̥ṣṇāñja chala goṭi
byāghra carma laṅguḷa yāhāra kaṭire mekhaḷā kāchaṭi | 236 |
padmanidhira ballabha adr̥ṣṭiki yāra buddhi
ẏekā nārajake ye nabadīpā sapata sāgara pārai sādhi | 237 |
rakata kumuda locana to rūpabarṇṇa śyāma kaḷā
baiśākha māse yehne jaḷada meghamāḷā | 238 |
biśvābasunta tārilu ye gaja kacchapa bibāde
chatrīpaṇa icchili muṁ ye praśurāmaṁka prasāde | 239 |
abhinaba jaḷadhara sundara dibya ruci
ajapā sādhana nātha kaḷapa kaḷapa sañchi | 240 |
āẏara jyotira dhanura suṣamunā
śūnya rudrapada akaṇṭeka kapaca bajrasehnā| 241 |
lg.note: duṣṭa niśodhana yāhāra nāma goṭi | (jha)
pariharaṇa–paridhāna
kapaca kabaca |
lg.l: svāmi bistāra daśana ūrddva piṅgaḷa beni ākhi
tribhmabana loke trāsile tāhā dekhi | 242 |
svāmī kahante agocara praśurāma abatāra
duṣṭaṁkara pramāde khaṇḍi madībhāra | 243 |
trailokya sañchita nātha brahmāṇḍa śiromaṇi
paramagati prārthanā kalā yeuṁṇa mahāmtāṇī | 244 |
gaḷita sudhārasa yāhāra badana goṭi
mama puṇya baḷe ye yāili tāhāṁkaiṁ muhiṁ bheṭi | 245 |
yaśa sampada diai yeuṇa piṅgaḷācchā
mana bacana karttabye ye mahābrahma bāci | 246 |
tāmvu badana ye amr̥ta yāra dr̥ṣṭi
kahili mahābhāratha kr̥ṣṇa caraṇe bheṭi | 247 |
pra ẏabatī ballabha tuḷūsāra nija pati
śūdramuni sāreḷa dāsa praśurāma caraṇe bhagati | 248–3080
śuṇa baibasuta baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti
yuddaku cchaḍa dibasa kathāra saṅgati | 1 |
kauraba pāṇḍabaṁka baḍāi murāṭa
sambhare ubharile ohobaḷa thāṭha | 2 |
lg.note: kahili mahābhāratha kr̥ṣṇa caraṇe loṭi | (ṅa,cha,jha,ṛḍha)
śrīẏādebīra baḷḷabha tuḷūsāra nija pati | (gha,jha)
piṅgaḷācchī–piṅgaḷāṣī
lg.l: baṛḍhiṁlā raṇaraṅga bhīṣma ye arjuna
parigha śahasra māna gheni bidhale abicchanna | 3 |
śvetara prānte se nr̥pati birāṭa
śaṅkha uttarakaiṁ gheni ubhārile thāṭha | 4 |
pañchāḷa saini gheni dr̥pada mahīpāḷa
śrīkhaṇḍī dhr̥ṣṭadyumana gheni beni bāḷa | 5 |
jārasadhaa nandana magha deśara nr̥pati
teiśi ṣauṇībaḷa tule aśimarbhmata hāthī | 6 |
gaja yoddā tuleṇa paciśa pāraẏadha
kaḷiṅgasena tule lagilā mahāyudda | 7 |
udemaṇḍaḷa rājā bhānumaṇḍaḷa nr̥pati
nijhara deśa rājā nāma gaṇapati | 8 |
ẏehāra tule kale aneka samara
kr̥tabarmāra tule nr̥pati kāmeśvara | 9 |
pañchāṇa deśara rājā anaṅga nr̥pati
tājāra tule yudda kale bhīma cakrabratī | 10 |
mahlāra deśara ye aneka nr̥pati
tāhāra tule samara paṇḍu rājāra nāti | 11 |
hiḍimvikīra nandana ghaṭa ye ukaṭa
aḷamvuṣāra tule samara murāṭa | 12 |
aḷaẏadha añjanaprabhāca samara
lekhante na sarai se kahante agocara | 13 |
samare prabeśa ye pāṇḍaba bīra bhīma
kāḷadaṇḍa gheni yehne ātreṣai yama | 14 |
lg.note: śvetara paḍante se nr̥pati birāṭa | (kha,ñja,gha,ṛha??)
jārāsadhara nandana sahadeba nr̥pati | (kha,ka,ñja,ccha,na)
kr̥ta??rmāra tule nr̥pati kāśīśvara | (kha,ṛha,ṇa)
lg.l: bāḍana bāḍana bhāra gheniṇa gadā hāthe
samare ke paśiba brikodara dekhante | 15 |
yeteka yoddāẏe paḍanti tāra mukhe
dekhant yamadaṇḍa se maranti prataṣe | 16 |
droṇa mahārathī bhāradvādaśaṁkara suta
tāhāṁkara tule samara karanti dropata | 17 |
dhr̥ṣṭadyumana ye aśastamā tule
samara sambhabonṅa se ākāśa ghoṭile | 18 |
bhīṣmaṁkara samara kahite ke pāri
remeke arjunakaiṁ śate bāṇa māri | 19 |
paṇḍura nandana se kaicchā jagajjeṭhī
bāṇa bidhuacchi bhīṣmaṁku śare śare ghoṭi | 20 |
aneka samara baḍhilā mahāreḷa
dinakara ardda āsi hoilāka beḷa | 21 |
makara māsa ananta nāme ādityara mahājyāti
anaḷa kiraṇa jāṇi nārājaṁka teka kānti | 22 |
śare śare paritāḷa huanteṇa beni
śiśira br̥ṣṭi jāṇi jhalakai bahani | 23 |
samare bimukha hoi se kurudeba nāti
troṇaru kāḍhile gāṅgeba aniryyāpa śakati | 24 |
troṇu kāḍhilā beḷe śahasra ẏekai mūrati
hāthare gheninte hoilā biṁśa mūrtti śakti | 25 |
dhanu gunare śakati basāile yetebeḷe
pañchāśa mūrtti śakati āsi hoilā tetebeḷe | 26 |
ātreṣi gāṅgabe ucchuḍante mahārekhā
dhanuguṇe purei ucchuḍante hoilā pañchastārī śākhā | 27 |
lg.note: samare apasaranti brikodara rūpa dekhante | (ka,ṭha)
aneka sambhabonṅe baṛhilā mahāgoḷa | (ṭha,ñja,tha)
lg.l: ātreṣi chaḍante se hoile mahā bhīṣmamūrtti
dhanuru bāhārante hoilā śateka śakati | 28 |
yadyapi debatāhiṁ hou ki asurahiṁ hou
ẏe śakati ba~chāibāku sāmaratha acchi kehu | 29 |
śate koṭi nidāgha āditya jyoti jāṇi
trāsena ghuñchile se ākāśe dinamaṇi | 30 |
dekha ho mahimāṁ ẏe bhīṣma gaṅgāra tanaẏe
tri purāntaka parāẏe bhīṣmaṁkara kāẏe | 31 |
yetebeḷe bāhāra hoilā aniryyāpa śakati
ẏekā śahasra hoicchi koṭiẏe kiraṇara jyoti | 32 |
dekhiṇa ghuñchile se kaureba saini
chaḍa yojane mānagobinda rahilā saina gheni | 33 |
pāṇḍaba baḷa saini paḷāile ghuñchi
yekā mātra bhārei malla arjuna rahiacchi | 34 |
chaḍa yojana māḍi paḷāile sabonṅa baḷa
beni ratha mātra rahiacchai acaḷa | 35 |
gibinde boile bābu śuṇa phālaguni
sañsāra dahana śara bidhale bhīṣma gheni | 36 |
pāṇḍaba baḷa tora na bratibe kehi
ẏehiṣaṇi sañsāra hoia hāde dahi | 37 |
sthābara jaṅgama kīṭa pataṅga ādi kari
ājara yuddare sabonṅe hoibe apahāri | 38 |
ẏethaku pratiśasr acchiṭi ki pātha
samāsyā na dei pātha hoilā mauna brata | 39 |
arjunara aśakya yahuṁ jāṇile debarāja
ẏehiṣaṇi nandighoṣa hoiba dahija | 40 |
hr̥dagate cintile deba nāraẏaṇa
dhātikāre prabeśa hoilā āsi cakra sundri śeṇa | 41 |
dhyāneṇa āgyāṁ tāku dile catrapāṇi
bhīṣmaṁkara śateśara śakati pākāa bege hāṇi | 42 |
arjuanaṁku agocara nohilā yugate
nandighoṣa ratha dhvaje thāi tāhā dekhile hanumante | 43 |
hanumanta praśaṁsai pāṇḍabe jībana tumbha dhani dhani
prāṇahuṁ adhika kari nārāẏaṇa tumbhanta acchanti gheni | 44 |
adr̥śyeṇa catra paḍilā śūnyagati
dandana hoilā śateśara śakati | 45 |
māriṇa catra se yahuṁ galā antarddāne
dekhiṇa gāṅgeẏa hātharu ye chaḍile dhanu troṇe | 46 |
ratha ghuñchāi bhīṣme driyodhane bheṭi
pāṇḍae śaraṇa yāi paśa ho dhr̥tirāṣṭis | 47 |
yadyapi śaraṇa na paśibu abā
rājya chaḍi paḷāi jībana rakha tora bābā | 48 |
mānagobinda boilā kumbhūta kāraṇa kathā
prastāba bākya kaha bujhibā sabonṅathā | 49 |
śuṇiṇa gāṅgabe kahante sampāde
pāṇḍaba baḷa dahija karibi boḷi anuryyāpa śāreka peṣilu hāde ||
brahmā rudra indra kubera yama ādi paban
e śara kāhāra baḷe nuhaṁi niśodhana | 50 |s
prathame dahantā se nandighoṣa ratha
chāri aśva hanumanta ābara kr̥ṣṇa pātha | 51 |
tadante dahantā pāṇḍaba saini
yujheṣṭhi ādi chāri bhāiṁka prāṇa gheni | 52 |
lg.note: }bhīṣmakaṁra śateśara śakati pakāa bege hāṇi pare"
(tha,ñja,na) pothire adhika pāṭha |
lg.l: sudraśena catra hari śrīkare
prahāra kale nei bhīṣmaṁka śara upare |
arjuna baḷe se śakati nohe bibāraṇa
cakra gheniṇa tāhā cchedile nārāẏaṇa | 54 |
śrikr̥ṣṇa yebe śahasra dhari paśile samare
kisa samara karibu tu pāṇḍabaṁka saṅgare | 55 |
ananta koṭi abatāre se ye asura niśodhana
tāhāra tule samara tumbhara kisa pirejana | 56 |
śuṇiṇa birasa ye rājā mānacakrabratī
baḷarāmakaiṁ sumaraṇā kalāka taḍati | 57 |
āsana kampante tāhā jāṇile mūṣaḷi
dhātikāre bijaẏe kale kuruṣetre deba haḷī | 58 |
kaurebe praṇapatya hele baḷamakaiṁ dekhi
sanasta yoddāẏe yāna bāhāna upeṣi | 59 |
kāmapāḷa caraṇe samaste pariṇāmi
tohora śaraṇe āmbhe pāṇḍaba dvandi svāmī | 60 |
kr̥ṣṇa ye tohora chuiṁle pāda beni
boile bhāratha yudde śahasra dharibi svāmī | 61 |
boile ye jagata doṣa khaṇḍaṇa nimante
ohobaḷa thāṭhe pātrapaṇe thibi nandighoṣa rathe | 62 |
boile saṁgrāme yebe śahasra muṁ dharai
se janne tora pādapadmare hāraiṁ | 63 |
sāpaṇe cakra dhari samare paśile debarājā | 64 |
bhe deba pāṇḍabanta hakāra āṇa tu āpaṇa
kr̥sṇaṁku pañcharājya muhiṁ karibi samarpaṇa | 65 |
sahasre pāṇḍabe hele nāhiṁ nā mora bhīti
kimarthe jagannāthe muṁ hoibi aprīti | 66 |
tu ye gadāguru moraru mora mastake hātha dilu
kāḷe kāmapāḷa mote rakhi ta nuāriḷu | 67 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa āśrake mohora pañchurājya ye nele pañcubhratha
bhe rāma tote āśre kari muṁ hoiḷi anasta | 68 |
samasta kaurebe mukhe hātha bhari trāhi trāhi boḷi
anāstaku śaraṇa dia boḷi śutile gaḍaghāli | 69 |
kaurobamānanta anāsta dukha dekhi
rakata kumuda prāẏe birājai rāmara beni ākhi | 70 |
ḍāhāṇe mūṣaḷa bame bajralaṅgaḷa
mahā yogeśvara nātha se kādamvarī pāne mati yāra bhoḷa | 71 |
meru tulya mauḷi ye śobhita saptapheṇī
kopeṇa garji dhāmanti rāma kr̥tānteka jāṇi | 72 |
bhaẏeṇa śūnabhmabana tejile debaloke
trāseṇa kampile ye sakaḷa brandāarke | 73 |
kāḷacatra jāṇiṇa bhramai beni ḍoḷa
āpaṇe samare deba bijaẏa kāmapāḷa | 74 |
mahā pratāpe svāmī hākanti baḷadebe
āre āre kr̥ṣṇa āre āre re pāṇḍabe | 75 |
yesane nirghāta khasi paḍai ākāśuṁ
pr̥thibī kampai baḷadebaṁkara āsuṁ āsuṁ | 76 |
ratha dhvaje thāiṇa hanumanta boilā
sambhāḷa arjuna re baḷarāme bije kalā | 77 |
gibinde dekhile nandighoṣa rathe thāiṁ
haḷa mūṣaḷa gheni rāma āsuchanti dhāiṁ | 78 |
gobinda mukha chāhiṁ bolai brikodara
svāmī kebaṇa carita ẏe samare paśile nīḷāmvara | 79 |
gadā bulāiṇa samare paśile kāḷadaṇḍa pāṇi
garjai pāṇḍaba, keśarī darpa jāṇi | 80 |

div.note: kopeṇa garja dhāmantu rāma kāmyeka m?? jāṇi | (ka,ñja,tha,naṭa,)

lg.l: śatr̥ku saṁpakṣa ye tāku mora kisa bhaẏe |
rāmara mūrtti dekhi kopita dhanañjhaẏe | 81 |
nārāẏaṇī śara dhariṇa phālaguni
āgabhare rahilā dhanu ṭaṁkāra jāṇi | 82 |
hiḍimbikī nandana ghaṭautkaṭa mahācaḷī
dhāmanti asure ye kare śāḷa śiḷa toḷi | 83 |
ratharu ḍeiṁṇa ye paḍile jagannāthe
bhīmasenaku koḷāgrata kale beni hāthe | 84 |
chāḍa krodha brikodara rāmaṁku krodha karite nohaiṁ
nīḷāmbare bibābī āmbhanta na yogāi | 85 |
mohora śapathaṭi tumbhe kehi ye na baḍha
ratha yānabāhānanta teji samaste śahasra chaḍa | 86 |
koṭi koṭi siṁghara yāhāra parākrama
tāhāṁkara tule āmbhara kisa ye sāṁgrāma | 87 |
āmbhara baḷe ki handa baḷarāmaṁkara tule
hastinā haḷamune tāḍile tāhāṁkara bāhubaḷe | 88 |
yeḍaṁ deba raṅgā abatāre kutūhoḷi
jagujana mohana nātha nāma banamāḷī | 89 |
samasta bodhakale jagamohana rūpeṇa
śānti karāi bijekale deba nārāẏaṇa | 90 |
bhīma arjuna ye chaḍile sarbe cira
biśahasrahoi praḷamba kale deba dāmodara | 91 |
puṇa puṇa praḷamba nārāẏaṇa pāṇḍabanta gheni
niuchaḷi kari deba binaẏe daini | 92 |
dekhiṇa kāmapāḷa bacana prakāśi
haḷa mūṣaḷa bulāiṁ kopeṇa rāma trāsi | 93 |
mathāẏe beni kara dile deba toḷi
binaẏa bhāba gheni ẏacchanti banamāḷī | 94 |
gobinde boile puṇa puṇa pariṇāmi
anamitekopa kāhākaiṁ karu debasvāmī | 95 |
tu deba bhagata matsaḷa ẏagapati
doṣa anarūpe bichāri bihibānā śāsti | 96 |
badaẏanti kāmapāḷe śuṇa ho bāsudebe
tu kimpā śahasra dhailu kurukṣetra bhūmi ṭhābe | 97 |
āja muhiṁ karibi hari pāṇḍabe śarabr̥ṣṭi
kaurobanta pheḍibi muhiṁ parama araṣṭi | 98 |
hārikāẏe tu ye niẏama kalu mora deha chuiṁ
boilu sāṁgrāme śahasra na dharai | 99 |
ẏetebeḷe kimpāiṁ sāṁgrāma kalu śahasra dhari
bhīṣmaṁku śahasra kalu pāṇḍabanta ābori | 100 |
gobinde boile deba bichāri kopakara
bhīṣmaṁkara tule muṁ na kali samara | 101 |
tu deba aparate kalu mote abā
nicaẏe kari ẏebe kaurobanta pachāribā | 102 |
muhiṁ dvārikā pure niẏama kali ẏāhā
satya laṁghele muṁ hoibi dorehā | 103 |
pāṇḍabanta tora kopa kebaṇahiṁ arthe
bajra muṣaḷa gheni deba śira ccheda mote | 104 |
ẏete boli hari rāma caraṇe daini
tahuṁ bāhuḍi bije nīḷāmbara kr̥ṣṇa pāṇḍabanta gheni | 105 |
droṇe bije kariachanti ratha caḍha
chāmure kāmapāḷa droṇaṁku pachāri | 106 |
āho droṇe bhīṣmaṁka tule samara kale dekhilaki hari
tu dekhilu ki ho guru kaha satya kari | 107 |
baḷarāmaṁka āge kahanti guru droṇe
muhiṁ na dekhili samara kale nārāẏeṇe | 108 |
āho karṇṇa tu ye thilu samare āgiāṇi
dekhilu ki samara kale catrapāṇi | 109 |
karṇṇa boilā kemante kahibi anamite
muhiṁ na dekhili śahasra nārāẏaṇaṁkara hāthe | 110 |
tahuṁ kr̥pa aśastamā śalyaṁku pachārile
somadatta bhurisarba dhuśāsanakuhiṁ pucchākale | 111 |
baḷarāmaṁka agrate kahile sabhiẏeṁ
bāsudebaṁka kare śahasra na dekhilu kebeheṁ | 112 |
driẏādhana agrate pachāranti baḷarāma
tuhi dekhiluki kr̥ṣṇa kalā ẏe sāṁgrāma | 113 |
baḷarāmaṁka mukha chāhiṁ bolai managobinda
muhiṁẏeka dr̥ṣṭi kari chāhiṁthāi kr̥ṣṇara nāhiṁ dvanda | 114 |
āmbheheṁ dekhilu kebeheṁ nārāẏaṇa samara na kalā
anamite ke kahiba mānagobinda boilā | 115 |
ẏe mahābhāratha yuddhe ke kahiba mithyā bācā
gyāna thāuṁ thāuṁ narakaku ke karu deba bāñcchā | 116 |
bho deba nīḷāmbara droha kalaiṁ muhiṁ toto
kr̥ṣṇa hāthe śahisra muṁ na dekhili chaḍa dibasa pariyante | 117 |
śuṇiṇa bismaẏe ye hoile haḷāẏudha
āho bhīṣma tu dekhilu ki śasra dhari keśaba kalā ẏuddha | 118 |
bhīṣme boile tu deba bihantā bidhātā
toho chamure deba ke kahiba mithyā 119 |
aniryāpa bāṇa muṁ ātreṣi bikṣilli
kr̥ṣṇa yuddha karibā muṁ naẏane na dekhili | 120 |
bho deba yeuṁṇa śakati muṁ māilaiṁ arjunaku
brihmā indra rudra kehi sāmaratha nohi tāhā nibāribāku | 121 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa bitrake kehi tāhā nuāranti nāśi
sudriśena catreṇa se śahasrata huai bidhvaṁsi | 122 |
śuṇiṇa baḷadeba kopeṇa parajaka
bhīṣmaṁkara mukha kope chāhiṁle deba haḷī | 123 |
mānaba yuddhe deca śahasra kimphe tu binddhalu baḷe biḷī
ẏete boli baḷadeca bhīṣmaṁku pakāile peli |
ārabeḷe ẏemāna akarma kebeheṁ na karibu bhīṣma mahābaḷī | 124 |
rāgeṇa parakhara debaṁkara bahai niśvāsa
ātreṣi kāmapāḷa dhaile bhīṣmaṁkara keśa | 125 |
bulāi kāmapāḷa piṭante nei haḷe
dhātikāre gobinde dhaile tāṁku koḷe | 126 |
svāmī trailokyara nātha brahmāṇḍa śiromaṇi
bhīṣmaṁku anamite kopa kehme karu debasvāmī | 127 |
dekhuṁ dekhuṁ aputrika ajātika mahā pāpī
tohora hāthe male mukati hoiba adyāpi | 128 |
ẏe charakaiṁ kimpe kopa kara kāmapāḷa
āpaṇe śrīkare chaḍāi dile bhīṣmaṁkara bāḷa | 129 |
diyrodhana sumarilā tohore ye beḷe
samare sodaranta ẏe na māiḷi bhale | 130 |
bhīṣmaṁku tejyā kari rāma kr̥ṣṇa beni
tuleṇa pāṇḍaba ẏe bhīma phālaguni | 131 |
mānagobinda agrate badaẏanti deba haḷī
ẏekaiṁ sodare tumbhe na karibā dvanda kaḷī | 132 |
kuru pāṇḍabe ẏebe karāuṁ ẏeka bheṭa
duikhaṇḍa paḍā dia yujheṣṭhi hou tuṣṭā | 133 |
tu ta pañchu kaṭake lakṣe yojane aṭu ādhipati
hasi kari paḍā duikhaṇḍi dei yujheṣṭhiṁki karāa tripuḍha | 134 |
baḷarāmaṁka bacane bolanti kaurobe
tohora bāhāku āśre kaḷi bujhiluki baḷadebe | 135 |
madhyastha paṇe ki muṁ sumaraṇā kaḷi tote
ẏeteke hīnabīryya maṇilu ki mote | 136 |
śañkha dhuni śabada kari kaurobe leuṭi
hastinā pure rājā bijaẏe dhr̥ḍhirāṣṭi | 137 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa arjuna ye deba baḷarāme
indrapraśasthe bije kale puruṣa uttame | 138 |
baḷarāme boile śuṇa tu acyuta
mahābhīratha yuddha kara samāpata | 139 |
pāṇḍabe rakṣā galeni nā tohora buddhi
nicaẏe nāśibu tu kauroba sampradhi | 140 |
bhīṣme yebaṇa śara kaleka ādhyāna
tohora bitrake ke nibāriba āna | 141 |
pāṇḍabanti kaṣaṇa paḍiba yeebeḷe
tu puṇi śahasra dhari bikṣabu abaheḷe | 142 |
mote sumaruthiba māna ye gobinda
tohora mohora puṇa heuthiba dmanda | 143 |
sambhāḷa ẏe samasta samarpiḷi tuku
muṁ yāuacchi mahābhāratha yuddha saribā pariyante prāga ye tīrthaku | 144 |
kahiṇa caḷanti ye rebatī ramaṇa
samasta tejyā kariṇa gale praẏāga tīrtheṇa | 145 |
jaẏa tu kāmapāḷa rebatī prāṇanāhā
surasiddha munimāne bandanti caraṇe yāhā | 146 |
paramānanda puruṣa nātha abhaẏe parama ẏogī
kaugeba bibāde tu hastināpura bhīñgi | 147 |
lg.note: parama bodha puruṣa tu sarba baḷa parityāgī | (ña, tha, na)
barṇṇānaḷa samare tu kuṇuḷāpura rīñjhi | (ka, ṅa)
lg.l: ambā kadambā praḷambā da naba hāde tini
ẏehānta māriṇa deba uddharilu medinī | 148 |
śuddha saṣṭika śarīra mauḷi sapata peṇi
garjanti uḍaṅge ye pabana darpa jāṇi | 149 |
śrībr̥je bajra muṣaḷa bāme bajra lāṅgaḷa
kādambarī pāne svāmī sarbadā mati boḷa | 150 |
birājanti candracuḍa mukuṭa kuṇḍaḷī
chaḍadaśa locana birājanti deba haḷī | 151 |
trailokyeśvara puruṣa tu ajapā manta siddhi
abadhuta muhrā mātāṅgī rupeṇa nirodhi | 152 |
svāmī parama puruṣa tu ye sādhilu ujāṇi
ṭeki chandilu ye aparṇṇā mūḷe āṇi | 153 |
kāminī kandarpa nātha abhaẏe mekhaḷā
praḷaẏa uddhāraṇa nātha prasanna dhabaḷā | 154 |
ẏegeśvara puruṣa nātha tu saẏaḷa jana cintā
kr̥takarmī bhābe tu bihantā bidhātā | 155 |
koṭiẏe tīrthakaiṁ yebaṇa svāmī muḷa
koṭiẏe tīrtha gheni puṣkara saṅgama yāhāra pādataḷa | 156 |
muhiṁ dīna dukhī ye aṭai sāroḷā dāsa
śrībaḷarāma caraṇa kamaḷe bhakati baḍāi mora āśa | 157 |
rohiṇī nandanaṁka pādapadma sebi
badaẏanti mudramuni sāroḷā dāsa kabi | 158–3238 |
lg.note:
“ẏehānta māriṇa deba uddharilu medinī” pāṭhapare (ña, tha, na)
pothire adhikā pāṭha:–
muṣṭika dhenikāsura nāśilu ye tuhi
aneka datya māri uddharilu mahī |
ṛaḷahaḷa naẏana birākanti parajaḷi (ña, tha, na)
kr̥takarmeṇa bhībaku mahā baḷabantā | (ṭa, ṭha)
lg.head: {@bhīṣmaṅkara saptama dibasa yuddha@}
lg.l: ẏethu anantare ye baibasuta manu
brahmabettī agasti ye kumbhaṛaṣara tanta | 1 |
chaḍa dibasa antareṇa ghora samarara kathā
śrī mahābhāratha ẏe bhīṣmapabīra bāratā | 2 |
yahuṁ baḷarāma praẏāga tīrthe bije
pāṇḍabanta gheni jaintāẏe bijaẏe debarāje | 3 |
nityakarma bidhāna debārjana sāri kacanti muṇohi
samasta yoddhāẏe bhīṣmaṁkara mahiṁmā ye kahi | 4 |
timiri bidāriṇa udaẏe dinamaṇi
prabhīte driyodhana thāṭha ye palīṇi | 5 |
bhīṣma mukuṭa bānddhaṇa hoile senāpati
hoṇa karṇṇa śalya kr̥pa sājile samadaṇḍa mahārathī | 6 |
tola damālu ṭamaka niśāṇa bherī bādye
samadaṇḍe mānagobinda samareṇa bije | 7 |
samudra machane yehme samasta brandāakre
samare prabeśa hoile yoddhāmāne ẏekuṁ yeke | 8 |
nandighoṣa rathe ye bijaẏe banamāḷī
arjunakaiṁ gheni deba samare yāiṁ miḷi | 9 |
śveta hāthī upare bijaẏe dharma sute
ohomukha hoiṇa ubhīriḷe gaja aśva rathe | 10 |
kare ajaṅga dhanu dhariṇa gāṅgabe
rathe ārohiṇa pathe bheṭile pārthibe | 11 |
guṇaghoṣa śabade kampai pr̥thibī
bājai bijighoṣa dāuṇḍi damālu dundubhi | 12 |
dhāmanteṇa yoddhāẏe gagane uḍai dhūḷi
ākāśe adr̥śya hoile aṁśumāḷī | 13 |
dekha ho mahārājā bhīṣmaṁkara mahimā
biśvābasu sārikṣe yāhāra gārimā | 14 |
śrībhr̥je śobhībana dhanu yeajaṅga
ātreṣi nārāja arjunaku binddhale gāṅgeba | 15 |
luhāra pañchuśara se nārāja tīkṣamunā
ākarṇṇa pūroi binddhante phuṭilā arjuna bajrasehā | 16 |
puṇa pañchadaa bajramunā bāṇa gheni
hākiṇa gāṅgeba ye peṣileka phālaguni | 17 |
puṇa pañchāśata puroi nārāja
bindhanteṇa bhīṣma dekhile debarāja | 18 |
puṇa puṇa gāṅgeba pūroiṇa śara
biśāśate nārāja binddhale aśvaṁka upara | 19 |
āsante nārāja śūnya bhr̥bana ghoṭi
pañchaṣṭhi bāṇe tāhā chedilā kirīṭī | 20 |
bhīṣmaṁkara nārāja ye chedilā saboṅṅsācī
puṇa puṇa dhanurjaẏe gāṇḍima āmañchi | 21 |
medinī daladalita dhanura guṇaghoṣe
yesaneke baḷā ke uḍanti ākāśe | 22 |
puṇi bhīṣma peṣi le ye koṭhāra āẏadhe
kodāḷa śara peṣi pārtha tāhā chedilā mahāyuddhe | 23 |
puṇa gāṅgeba ye sahasre śara dhari
arjuna uparaku abicchanne bāṇa māri | 24 |
kaṁkapacchī nārāja parigha tīkṣamunā
bhedai phālaguni gāṅgebara bajrasehmā | 25 |
arjuna nārāja ye cchedile śāẏantani
puṇa sahasre nārāja puroi binddhalā phālaguni | 26 |
anibāraṇa śara ye ghenile gāṅgeba
peṣile arjuna uparaku chaḍi matigarba | 27 |
puṇa parigha nārāja gheni bhīṣma mahārathī
arjuna uparaku binddhale tatakṣaṇānti | 28 |
kaumodakī śahasra gheniṇa phālaguni
bhīṣmaṁka uparaku binddhalā beḷa tini | 29 |
gaṅgāra nandana ye dekhile tāhā dure
chedile nārāja yekāmyeka pañchuśare | 30 |
samaraṇe bijaẏa kumāra śrīkhaṇḍī
aśastamā tule raṇaraṅge maṇḍi | 31 |
biśāśate nārāja pūgoi aśastamā
ohobaḷa ghoṭilā ye bhīrata kuḷa brahmā | 32 |
caubiṁśa nārāja gheniṇa dr̥padara baḷā
aśastamā uparaku binddhalā nārāja mahākhaḷā | 33 |
puṇa puṇa nārāja pūroi cauṣaṭhi
bindhanteṇa aśastamā śrīkhaṇḍī ratha ghoṭi | 34 |
śrīkhaṇḍī binddhalā ye paśupatra bāṇa
yesane nidāgha kāḷe āditya kiraṇa | 35 |
droṇaṁkara nandanadekhile tāhā dhūce
aśastamā chedilā tāhā nidrāgha anaḷa śare | 36 |
beni śahasra bājiṇa ye hoilā paḍitāḷa
uṭhilā bahani ye gagane mahājāḷa | 37 |
parbatā śahasreka binddhale gheniṇa aśastamā
bindhante kampile ye ākāśe bedabrahmā | 38 |
lg.note:
anibāraṇa śara ye ghenile gāṅgabe |
arjuna uparaku binddhale śara mattagaboṅe (ña, tha, na)
mahāgora teja tāra ki karatāra kiraṇa | (ña, tha, na)
lg.l: paboṅgete garjiṇa ye āsanti pracaṇḍa
bhījile pāṇḍaba baḷa ghoṭilā brahmāṇḍa | 39 |
ratha gaja saina heuchanti masiguṇḍi
samare śabada śubhai rakha rakha he śrīkhaṇḍī | 40 |
dr̥pada nandana samareṇa kaicchā jagajmeṭhī
bajra śara peṣi parbatā śara kāṭi | 41 |
bajra śara paḍilā ye nirghāta prāẏe garji
samasta paboggtamāna paḍigalā bhāñjhi | 42 |
durāpada samara hoilā beniṁkara
madhya thāne āsi bije kale dibākara | 43 |
asambhaba samara lāgilā garu bādhā
ohobaḷa sainiki lāgilā baḍa kṣudhā | 44 |
bijekarṇṇakaṭāra gheniṇa gāṅgeba
dhanure basāile nārāja sadāśiba | 45 |
sahasre koṭi kiraṇa tejanta parakāśi
digāmbara loke dekhi ākāśeṇa prāsi | 46 |
teja dekhi naẏena ye bujile samasta
rathe thāiṁ arjunara kampai beni hātha | 47 |
bhr̥ja kampanteṇa ye kampai tāra kāẏe
nandighoṣa ratha kampai dekhanti debarāẏe | 48 |
nandighoṣa ratha caka lāgilāka pr̥thī
ulukāpāta jāṇi kampilā basumatī | 49 |
pātāḷe kampi le ananta bāsukī
debatāmāne bhaẏe palāile śaṁki | 50 |
bijekarṇṇakaṭāra paḍilā dhātikāre
beni ahibrate yoddhā paḍile sehiṭhāre | 51 |
rakateṇa kardhina hoilā basudhā
raṇa jaẏa kari bhīṣmebhīrata kuḷasiddhā | 52 |
kaẏeśaṅka śabada kariṇa kauroba saini
bāhuḍai mānagobinda nija baḷa gheni | 53 |
pāṇḍeba pāñchāḷa ye krodheṇa ākuḷa
śokeṇa abasthā ye samaste bikaḷa | 54 |
prabeśa pāṇḍabge yāiṁ jaẏantā bhr̥bane
bisarai phālaguni baikulya pañchumane | 55 |
srāhāna debārina nitya karma sāri
sādhu sādhu gāṅgeba boli thāṭhare abadhārī | 56 |
aneka ranta gheni mānagobinda rājā
bhīṣmaṁka sammidhe miḷi kalā pādapūjā | 57 |
sañjhaẏe boilā śuṇimā dhr̥tirāṣta
ẏekā bhīṣme niśodhile pāṇḍaba baḷathāṭha | 58 |
jībana tāṁka dhani chatrīpaṇa dhani
ākāśe praśaṁsā yāhānta karanti padmayoni | 59 |
bhīṣma prāẏe hoi yebe thibe pāña rathī
kabadvīpa jiṇi se pāranti mahāchatrī | 60 |
ājara yuddha rājā debānta āgocara
bhāsilā bheḷā tora bhīṣme kaleka uddhāra | 61 |
ẏebe jāṇilu tāṁkara pāṇḍabaṁku nāhiṁ daẏā
pāilu pañchu rājya rājā hoilu nirbhaẏā | 62–3300 |
lg.head: {@bhīṣmaṅkara aṣṭama dina yuddha o agmiṅka ṭhāru cīra prāpti@}
lg.l: mantrīra bacane rājā dhr̥tirāṣṭa
daṇḍa sāja āgyāṁ dilā hoi tuṣṭa | 1 |
lg.note: ākāśe praśaṁsā karanti yāhāku sasrayoni | (ṅa, jha)
lg.l: śrīhaste arghya gheni rājā kurupati
aneka puruṣārthe binaẏa bhagati | 2 |
sājanti kauroba baḷa ratha gaja maẏemattī
pāhānti saina baḷa na yāi gaṇitā | 3 |
makara māsa śukaḷa pakṣa aṣṭamīra tithi
daṇḍa gheni samare bijaẏe mānacatrabratī | 4 |
nindighoṣa ratha sājile deba hari
rathare yocile āṇi śveta aśva chāri | 5 |
debadatta śaṅka pañchujanya śañka bāje
śubhalagna beḷe raṇa madhye kale bije | 6 |
nidāgha āditya jāṇi bhīṣmaṁkara murati
gagane birājanti śahasraṁkara jyāti | 7 |
śrībhr̥je bhīṣmaṁkara nausahasra baḷa dhanu
brahmāṇḍa kampuacchi bhīṣmaṁkara sahasra āmañchanu | 8 |
medinī daladalita bhīṣmaṁkara dhanu dharu
brahmā tharahara guṇaghoṣa śabadaru | 9 |
sahasreka nārāja puroi gāibe
kopeṇa binddhale yahiṁ pātha bāsudeba | 10 |
puṇi gāṅgabe sahasre nārāja guṇare pūroi
kapiketana dhvajaku ye binddhale niṭhiāi | 11 |
bolanti keaba ye śuṇa phālaguni
sahasre nārāja bhīṣme binddhale kare ghena | 12 |
puṇi binddhale yebeni sahasra bāṇa
puṇi hanumantakaiṁ binddhale śate bāṇa | 13 |
hāthara byagratā ye kahita ki pāri
ākāśe adr̥śya hoile gagana bihārī | 14 |
nārāẏaṇaṁka agrate pucchai kirīṭī
dinakara nātha astagale ki mahāniśā ghoṭi | 15 |
śuṇiṇa kichi bacana na phurai debarāẏe
boile samare bimukha kiṁpe hoilu dhanurjaẏe | 16 |
āho arjuna aniryāpa śara bhīṣme ye binddhale
teṇu kari āditya debatā asta prāẏeka diśile | 17 |
kapiketana dhvajaku binddhale śasra tini
upare upare tāhā chetilā bīra phālaguni | 18 |
arjunaku binddhale nārāja tini ahibrata
bābala śare tāhā chedilāka bīra pātha | 19 |
samare paśilā bhīma pāṇḍaba sundara
bhīṣmarupa prakāśilā jāṇi nāśakara | 20 |
adhare danta chāpi gagane śira lāgi
dekhi kaugoba baḷa paḷāile bhāṅgi | 21 |
saini paḷābante ye dekhilā śakuni
bhīmasenakaiṁ ogāḷilā tinilakṣa yoddhā gheni | 22 |
bhīmasena sānanda ye śakuniki dekhi
bakapala dekhi yehme dhāmaiṁ śeṇāpacchī | 23 |
gadābara bulāi ye bhīmasena uṭhi
bhīra darpamarddana gadā nei ratha upare piṭi | 24 |
ātreṣiṇa prahāra ye kalāka mahābaḷī
bhāñjhiṇa rathamāna ye heuchanti dhūḷi | 25 |
rathī sācathi aśva ye sahite
samasta masiguṇḍā hoile gadābara ghāte | 26 |
kopeṇa dhāmaiṁ ye dekhiṇa gajayūtha
beni hāthe beni gadā gheni pabanara suta | 27 |
duhiṁki dui hāthe bulāi pracaṇḍa
piṭanteṇa samaste hoile masiguṇḍa | 28 |
lg.note: bhīṣmarupa prakāśilā nr̥siṁgha prakāra | (dha, ṭha)
lg.l: māriṇa saini ye kalā sarba śeṣa
paḷāilā śakuni hoiṇa arddha niśvāsa | 29 |
bhīsena ḍāka diai māmuṁ raha raha
buddhi upāẏe thile kahapaḍiri sandeha | 30 |
bulāi brikodara gadāẏe rathe piṭi
bijra prahāra jāṇi ratha guṇḍā hoi uṭhi | 31 |
gāndāra deśa nr̥pati āgohiṇa gaje
bhīmasenakaiṁ binddhalā parigha nārāje | 32 |
gāma aṅga pāḍilā ye pāṇḍaba kuḷa jenā
bhāṅgilā parigha nārāja hoilā sarba cūnā | 33 |
gadā br̥lāi se pāṇḍaba kopānaḷe
dhātikāre piṭilā se mattanāga kumbhastaḷe | 34 |
dāruṇa prahāre ye paḍilā mattahāthī
paḷābai śakuni ye hoiṇa pādagati | 35 |
pādake kṣepilā ye pabanara bāḷa
dhāiṁ yāi dhailā se śakunira bāḷa | 36 |
dakṣiṇa kare gadā bāma kare śakunira keśa
āṇṭhu pāḍi bukure basi karai jhaṁgāsa | 37 |
bhīmasena boilā māmuṁ tu ye mote khuāilu bisa laḍu
jatugare bhari āmbhanta parā poḍi loḍu | 38 |
puṇihiṁ bhiāilu hāde kapaṭa paśā
pāṇḍabaṁka pāiṁ tohora ẏedeka kimpā hiṁsā | 39 |
aneka abastā tohora pāilu māmuṁ pūrbe
tohore se kaurobe ẏeḍeka matta garbe | 40 |
hakāra kaugobaṁku tote ke agchi rakhantā
sumara ho śakuni tora iṣṭa ye debatā | 41 |
lg.note: āṇṭhumāḍi mukha chāhiṁ karai jhiṁgāsa | (ka, ṅa)
lg.l: daśanaha bikāśaṇa garjai māruti
āja tora śoṇita pāna karibi bakṣasthaḷa bikoti | 42 |
śakuni nidhana boli yahuṁ śubhalāka dhuni
mānagobinda uṭhilā durānteka bacana śuṇi | 43 |
saturi saturi bhāra kare gadābara
dhuśāsana bheṭilā āsi bhīmasenara āgara | 44 |
dhuśāsana miḷilā yahuṁ bhīmara agrata
dekhiṇa pābeni duguṇa trodha citta | 45 |
bīra bitrama dhuśāsana kare gadā dekhi
dhāmaiṁ brikodara śakuniki upekṣi | 46 |
bhīmasena chaḍante paḷā1e śakuni
goḷe paśilā yāiṁ kauroba saini | 47 |
dhuśāsana durjaẏa ye paḷānte taraste
samasta goḷa hoilā gaja aśva rathe | 48 |
dhāmanteṇa uḍilā caraṇara dhūḷi
timiri ghora andhāra na diśile aṁśumāḷī | 49 |
bāraṇa na galā ke para ye āpaṇā
gahaḷa dhandoḷe hoile sarbe baṇā | 50 |
keṇe indraprastha keṇe hastinā jaintā bāruṇā
na diśai patha kehi nohile gaṇanā | 51 |
jhaṇa jhaṇānti śasramāne yoddhāẏe piṭāpiṭi
śahasraṁka paḍitāḷe agni jaḷi uṭhi | 52 |
ẏekaku ārake prahāra karanti gadā
bhāñjhiṇa aneka saini hoileka padā | 53 |
rathaṁkara āḍabhagma gajaṁkara pāda cheṭā
aśvamānaṁkara mukha batra nikhuṇa nāhiṁ thāṭhā | 54 |
lg.note: aneśvata brātha genichanti gadābara | (kha, ṭha)
lg.l: aśveka ārohiṇa nakuḷa kumāra
śalyaṁkara tule kalā samara mahāghora | 55 |
aneka śahasra binddhale śalya mahārathī
nakuḷa sehmāẏeṁ paḍi hoile bikoti | 56 |
kopeṇa nakuḷa ye binddhalā nabaniśi konta
chatra prāẏe kari se toḷilā śalyaṁkara ratha | 57 |
rarthu ḍeiṁ paḍile ye śākalya deśa rājā
bahuta samara hoilā mātuḷa bhagmījā | 58 |
bulāi ratha phiṅgi piṭilā hāde nakuḷa kumāra jenā
beni yojane paḍi ratha sārathī hoileka cūnā | 59 |
śalyaku nakuḷa kare bahuta kaṭāḷa
raṇa bhagma kari dhailā śalyaṁkara bāḷa | 60 |
dekhiṇa kichi na phurai mahārathī śalya
birathī hoile ye bhāroi kuḷa malla | 61 |
bāma kare nakuḷa śalyaṁkara keśa dhari
ḍāhāṇa kare dharichi bijekarṇṇakaṭārī | 62 |
nakuḷa boilā māmuṁ ho iṣṭa debatā sumara
nicaẏa āji tote peṣibi yamapura | 63 |
tāhā dekha dhāiṁlā sahadeba mantrī
mātāṁkara sahādara bhrātha ẏe āmara mātuḷa aṭanti | 64 |
ẏehānta upekṣā svāmī karibā nakuḷe
prāṇa gheni thāānu ẏe samara śekṣa kāḷe | 65 |
sahadebaṁka bacane chaḍilā śalyaṁkara keśa
paḷābanti mahārathī asambhāḷa keśabāsa | 66 |
lg.note: chatrābr̥de kari se toḷilā śalyaṁkara ratha | (ka, ṭa)
raṇaraṅge dhāiṁ dhailā śalyaṁkara bāḷa | (gha, jha, ñha, ṭha, ṛha, tha
lg.l: kaṇaẏa maṇḍaṇi ratha ārehi sahadeba
aśastāmāṁka tule samara ghora ẏeba | 67 |
mādrīra nandana se ye mantrī cūḍāmaṇi
bhūta bhibiṣya barttamāna gyāṁtā se samasta acchi jāṇi | 68 |
samare anabonṅāra se aṭai aśastamā
śahasraku pratiśasra se ye jāṇai mahātamā | 69 |
śare śara bidhābidha heucchanti beni
beni śara hāboḍante jhalakai bahani | 70 |
nakuḷa ẏekā dhuśāsana tule bahuta hāde thāṭha | 71 |
gādharī nandana kare beni gadā
ohobaḷa maṇḍile se samare mahāsiddā | 72 |
beni baḷabantā se chatriya mahāmalla
pāṣāṇa jhaḍai śuṇi duhiṁkar?? bola | 73 |
nakuḷa boilā svāmī śuṇimā dhuśāsana
ẏeka sodare āme hoilu anyoanya | 74 |
dropatīra keśa ākreṣilu kurusabhī taḷe
ẏetekāḷa pariyante debīra keśa hoicchi mukuḷe | 75 |
ẏe tora daṣiṇa bhmaja opāḍibe brikodara
śoṇita nauḍibe nei dropatīra śira | 76 |
tora redhire dropatī keśaku pakhāḷi
tebe se keśa badhana karibe pāñchāḷi | 77 |
bhīmasena ṭhākuṁkara ẏesaneka dr̥ḍhabrata
teśu se mr̥tu nāhiṁ ẏe mohora hātha | 78 |
gādhārī nandana śuṇi kopaṇa parajyaḷi
cauṣaṭhi cauṣaṭhi bhāra gadā beni bulāilā toḷi | 79 |

div.note: aśastamāṁka tule samara hoiba | (kha,ñja,ṭa,jha)

lg.l: ẏesaneke ghora adhāra diśai ulukāpāta
aneka dūre paḍile gaja aśva ratha | 80 |
māhrīra nandana bulāi nabaniśi konta
dhuśāsanara upare ye piṭilā baḷabanta | 81 |
nakuḷakaiṁ gadā piṭilā raṇaṣaṇṭā
bhāñji ṇa nakula ratha hoilā masiguṇḍā | 82 |
birathi hoilā se ye madanāra baḷā
konta dhari dhāmaiṁ se chatrī achārgaḷā | 83 |
dhuśāsana ratha upare nei konta piṭi |
benikhaṇḍa hoi tāra tamvā ratha galā phāṭi | 84 |
dhuśāsana birathi dekhi aśastamāẏe gale ghuñchi
dekhiṇa sahadeba ye na bolai kicchi | 85 |
nakuḷa sahadeba ẏekayoge caḷi
samara karanteṇa chare kehu ta na miḷi | 86 |
baḍāi durāpada samara mahāghora
beḷa madhyathāne āsi diśai yehne niśākāḷa | 87 |
durddaṣara tule samara kr̥pa ye āchāryye
bahuta samara se hoilā beniṁkara madhye | 88 |
drona dr̥pada beni hoilā sāṁgrāma
adharma sāṁgrama kale chaḍi nija dharma | 89 |
ohobaḷare paḍile aneka hāthī rathī
aneka pāridaṇḍa rājā aneka pādānti | 90 |
bhīṣma ye adhāra śara kale br̥ṣṭi
dibasa diśilā adhāramaẏe sr̥ṣṭi | 91 |
aparāpara loke hoile anyoanyi
para āpaṇā boli nuārile cihni | 92 |
keṇe udita keṇe āditya hoilā asta
kehi bāraṇa na galā samara hoilā apramita | 93 |
kāhāra kati paḍile se kete kete yodhī
bāraṇa na galā samara nohilā niredhi | 94 |
ohobaḷaku ye aṇṭi lāni yidda
rathī paḍilaka batiśa parāẏadha | 95 |
aśi sāgara ye paḍile gaja senā
aśva yoddāmāna na galā gaṇanā | 96 |
ke tāhā gaṇima pādānti kete kete
rudhira bahilā pañchatāḷa uccharga tiniyūṇa paryyante | 97 |
ṣudhā pipāsā hoilā samare hoilā arddarāti
candra debatāhiṁ astagalā samare aśānti | 98 |
yugate māgha māsa ghoṭilāni kuhuḍi
śite ratha ratha yoddāẏe nuāranti asra dhari | 99 |
sainara kaṣṭa se dekhiṇa mahāpabhma
arjuanaku boile ho samara āja rahu | 100 |
śaṅga dhuni śabada se kale yahuṁ bāṇī
rahilā samara ye aḍhāi prahara raẏaṇī | 101 |
rathīmāne se ye rathare nidrā yānti
hāthīṁkara upare yādāẏe loṭati | 102 |
kebaṇa yoddāẏe śutile maḍānti ābbori
aśvaṁkara kāṭhiāṇi rāute ghumānti koḷa kari | 103 |
ẏesana samaẏe sañjayaku pucchai rājā dhr̥tirāṣṭa
ẏesana rātra hoilā kimpe na bāhuḍile thāṭha | 104 |
sañjaẏe boile śuṇa amvi kāra suta
ubhaẏa baḷaku samara na aṇṭilā saina paḍile bahuta | 105 |
bhīṣme ye māile ghora adhāra śara
dibase diśilā se baḍāi adhaktāra | 106 |

div.note: rathīmāne ye raṇare nidrāyānti | (tha,ñj,ana)
aśvaṁkara jina dhari rāute ghumānti koḷa kari | (tha,ñja,na)

lg.l: ubhaẏa baḷa saini hoile sabonṅa baṇā
bāraṇa na galā ke para ke āpaṇā | 107 |
baḍāi goḷa āja hoilā samara
aneka ratha gaja paḍile beni ye thāṭhara | 108 |
bhīṣme ye abhimāna pāile bahuta
samare māri nuārile daśa sahasra ratha | 109 |
māri nuāri bhīṣma samara na chaḍai
rātra ardda hoilā ranaraṅga na baḍhai | 110 |
sañjaẏa agrate kahai dhr̥tirāṣṭa nr̥pati
sādhu sādhu re arjuna tohara jībati | 111 |
sehi droṇa guru tahuṁ śikhile sabonṅe bidyā
kebaṇa laṣaṇare tu hoilu bidyāre ẏeḍe siddā | 112 |
sañjaẏe boile śuṇa ho śāẏantanura nāti
droṇaṁkara bidyāẏe kāhiṁ arjuna ẏeḍe chatrī | 113 |
satya yugare ye śveta rājā yāga kalā
āchāryyapaṇe yagyeṁ baśiṣṭhaṁku barilā | 114 |
se baśiṣṭhaṁkara samvarttaka droṇa dui meghe śr̥ba ye proṣaṇī
ghr̥ta samodr̥ṁ mūsaḷa dhārā pramāṇe ghr̥ta baraṣile āṇi | 115 |
ẏe bidhi caubiṁśa baraṣa baraṣile mahāyāge
baiśyānara debatā ghr̥ta khāilā atyanta sarāge | 116 |
mandāagni hoile se lu dubudu byādhi
indraṁku māgile se na dile mauṣadhi | 117 |
brahmā indra rudra kubera candra sūryyaṁku toḷāilā
satya tretā dvāpara yugahiṁ hoilā | 118 |

div.note: ābarttaka samvarttaka droṇa puṣkara chārimeghe
surā ye proṣaṇī | (gha,cha,jha)
baiśyānara debatā ghr̥takhāilā atyanta lobhe | (kha,ṅa,gha,jha,ṭa,ḍha)
toḷāilā–prārthanā kālā |

lg.l: ẏetekāḷa pariyante oṣadhi māgile na dile asakanda
agni debatā śarīru na galā ludubuda | 119 |
khr̥pa brāhmaṇeka hoi daridra abasthā
arjunaku boilā muṁ bhiṣuka aśakatā | 120 |
mo tahuṁ daridra nāhiṁ āḍa āna jaṇa
mātā picā badhu sodara āhiṁ kicchu āna | 121 |
jannahuṁ daridra ābara apāra kāḷahuṁ regī
āhāra maithuna nidrāhiṁ samasta parityāgī | 122 |
tu ye kaicchā jagaccheṭhī bhārathe bhāroi malla
tohora prasanne byādhi hoiba mohora bhala | 123 |
śūrabanta sundara tu kaicchā jagaccheṭhī
trailokye sārthuka bābu tohora nāma goi |124 |
tohora prasanne mora samasta kaṣṭa saru
parama gati pāibi muṁ tu mora prāṇaguru | 125 |
arjuna boilā he māga dvijacara
yemante āregya hoiba tohora śarīra | 126 |
satye manāiṇa māgile baiśyānara bahati
upara hātha kari jaḷa dilā bicitrabīryyara nāti | 127 |
bābu khāṇḍea bane acchi āregya mauṣadhi
tāhā khāi bhala hoiba mora apāra kāḷara byādha | 128 |
arjuna boilā tumbhe śuṇa he brāhmaṇa
tu mote āsi ta kalu dusaha kaṣaṇa | 129 |
nirañjana sañchilā khāṇḍaba bana kaḷpataru
ūṇoiśa śata yojana tā bāseba raṣākaru | 130 |
apāra sāṁgrāma ye karibe mohora pitā
muhiṁ na jāṇi satya kali tumbhe ta baiśyānara debatā | 131 |

div.note: tu bābu jagumohana bhārathe bhīrei malla | (ka,ccha)

lg.l: kirāta rūpe muṁ ye bulai ghora bane
āsabe samara muṁ karibi keghne śahasra bihune | 131 |
agni debatā boile ho thāa ẏe banara
āja rātraja madhye āṇidebi debatāṁkara śahasra sāra | 132 |
arjuna ruhāi caḷile bahati
brahmāṇḍa bhedi yāiṁ miḷile baikuṇṭha bārasvatī | 133 |
biṣṇuṁku māgile nandighoṣa ratha
śaṅkha śveta goṣīra kāmapāḷa chāri aśvanta | 134 |
manabhedī nārāẏaṇa śahasra ādi kari
nīḷacatra sahite ye dile deba hari | 135 |
prabeśa hoile yāiṁ niśabada kapiḷāse
rudraṁku manāi māgile śasra se āregya biśuāse | 136 |
pāśupatra rudra śara pināka nāme dhanu
prasanne agniki samarpi dile pañchamanu | 137 |
pābonṅatīṁki māgile aṣaẏa trośa beni
kapiḷāsuṁ bāhāra hoile ẏetaka śasra gheni | 138 |
brahmāṁku sahita dileka bedapati | 139 |
brahmāṁku māgil se brahma ye śakati
brahma śara sahita dileka bedapati | 140 |
bijaẏe baiśyāna nandighoṣa rathare
sapata brahmāṇḍa buḷai se ṣaṇamātre atīẏa parakhare | 141 |
indraku māgile indraśara bajra ye śakati
pabonṅatā śara dile hemabanta nr̥pati | 142 |
nirghātaku māgile meghāśara bāṇa
bajrasūci agniśara dile tataṣaṇa | 143 |
lg.note: agni debatā boile ho thāa ẏe pabonṅatara | (ṭa,cha,ka,kha)
baikuṇuru ẏeteka gheni bāhāra digamūrī | (ka,gha,jha,ṭa)
chāri meghaku māgile meghāśara bāṇa | (ñja,tha,na)
lg.l: ādityaṁku māgile ye catra sūryyābartta
hemaśara bāṇa dile candra daibata | 144 |
kubera ṭhāru ratnābaḷī gadā māgi
tẏekarātre trapata brahmāṇḍa bulanti begi bekhi | 145 |
pabanā śara māgile pabana debatāṁku
kāḷa phāśa māgiāṇile yama debatāṁku | 146 |
baruṇa debatānta māgi ghenile jaḷaphāśi
ananta nāgaṭhāru āṇile nāgaphāśi | 147 |
kauśika śara dile aśvi nī kumāre
pr̥thībhedī śara dile puruṣa astukāre | 148 |
sañjaẏe kahilā rājā śuṇimā dhr̥tirāṣṭa
tridaśa debatāẏe jāṇanti agniṁkara kaṣṭa | 149 |
debatānta māgile ārogya nimantaku
sānandeṇa debatāẏe śasra dile baiśyānara debatāṁku | 150 |
kautuke ghaḍikara madhye māgi āṇile śaramāna
chāmure prabeśa āsi hoile phālagunya | 151 |
parama kalyāṇa gheni āregya huasi bīra pātha
ẏe śahasramāna tote hou ye parāpata | 152 |
arjuna ārehilā nandighoṣa rathe
khāṇḍaba bana dahana kalā pārtha agniṁka nimante | 153 |
ūṇeiśa śata yojana khāṇḍaba bana sthaḷī
aśi sahasra chāriśata br̥ṣa ye uguḷi | 154 |
ṣudra ṣudra br̥ṣamāna ke karuṁ gaṇitā
samasta dahana kale agni ye debatā | 155 |
aneka sāṁgrāma karile maghabāne
samara na sarilā rātra tini dine | 156 |
lg.note: {arjunaku samarpele debaśasramāna}
agniṁki praṇamya kale ye bīra phālagunya | (ñja,tha,na)
parama kalyāṇa houtote trijībī hua pātha | (ñja,tha,na)
lg.l: gadhabonṅa yaṣa kinnara suragaṇanta saṅge gheni
arjunaku samare hārile sasrayoni | 157 |
sukheṇa agni debatā āpyana kale mauṣadhi
nikaḷaṁka hoilā ye lu du bu du byādhi | 158 |
śoṣaka kāḷasarpa bimvare gopyathilā
dahana kāḷare se paḷāiṇa calā | 159 |
ākāśe rahilā tārāṣī nāme pacchī
agnirāja br̥ṣamātra se toṭāre rahiacchi | 160 |
bhmañjiṇa santiṣa hoile baiśyānara
arjunakaiṁ boile māgasi bege bara | 161 |
tohore śānti hoilā mohora tini yugara byādhi
kañchita debi hoiba tohora sabonṅa kāryya siddhi | 162 |
arjuna boilā svāmī kisa māgibaiṁ tote
jāṇiṇa anugraha karasi deba mote | 163 |
aneka sānanda ye hoile bahati
yete śahasra dili tote hou parāpati | 164 |
taḷa hātha kariṇa pātilā phālaguni
upara hātha kari dileka baiśyānara bahani | 165 |
śahasranta dei agni debatā santoṣe boile
brahmā biṣṇu rūdra indra hele na jiṇum boile | 166 |
ẏe ye aneka kālara byādhi śānta hoile tohore
koṭi brahmāṇḍa jiṇimāku sāmartha hoa tu samare | 167 |
lg.note: "agnirāja br̥ṣamātri se toṭāre rahiacchi |" pace
(ñja,tha,na)re adhikā pāṭha:-
aśvatatha palāśa ye tāmtracūḍa caṛhei
debadāru kaḷpabaṭa ābara bratai |
pāḷadhūā br̥ṣa ye ābara śāhāḍā
aṣṭa padārtha rahile agni debatā na kale pīḍā |
lg.l: sañjaẏe boilā ho śuṇimā dhr̥tirāṣṭa nr̥pati
teṇu kari arjuna hāde jiṇai sabunti | 168 |
tu ye boilu ẏekā droṇaṁkara bidyā
agiṁkara prasāduṁ arjuna ẏeḍebaḍa yoddā | 169 |
aṣṭa dibasa āsi samara hoilā
bhīṣmaṁkara pratagyāṁ ta niṣphaḷeṇa galā | 170 |
āura sāṁgrāma ta acchai beni ye dibasa
ẏeteke dhr̥tirāṣṭa tote hoiba ki yaśa | 171 |
sañjaẏa kahante ye prasara hoilāka rāti
daṇḍa sāja boḷi āgyāṁ dilāka kurupati | 172 |
rājāra āgyāṁẏe ye sājile samadaṇḍa
ghora nāda śabade kampai bhūakhaṇḍa | 173 |
sājanti yoddāẏe ratha gaja ye turaṅga
maṇḍanti kaṇaẏamaẏa ratha aśvanta yocanti bega bega | 174 |
dinakara nātha ye udaẏe īśāne
aruna sārathi gheni bijāśai lohita barṇṇe | 175 |
saṁgyāṁra ballabha ye saẏala jana cintā
arka daita niśodhana nātha bihantā bidhātā | 176 |
meghanāda mahānāda kāḷimegha garjanā
bhūriśrabā br̥ddaśrabā uchaiśrabā ẏe sapta aśvasehnā | 177 |
ẏe saptaaśve tohora ratha ẏeka cake
koṭiẏe brahmāṇḍa bhramaṇi ẏekā dibasake | 178 |
śanya sañbhabha nātha surubhi kaṇaẏa hastā
digamvara puruṣa hoi saẏaḷa jana cintā | 179 |
māgai abhyarthī muṁ binaẏa mora nitye
bhagatamatsaḷa svāmī prārthanā karai tote | 180 |
lg.note: koṭiẏe brahmāṇḍa ghoṭanti ẏekā dabase | (cha,ṭa)
lg.l: prabhāte udaẏe nātha udegiri sabonṅate
meru pradaṣiṇa pacchime deba aste | 171 |
paramānanda puruṣa jagata jana guru
ādi anta madhya deba tuhi se cintākaru | 172 |
jaẏe jaẏe deba abhaẏe bara dātā
surasidda munigaṇe yāhāku bhagatā | 173 |
svedaḷa aṇḍaja jarāẏaja uddija chārikhāni
śūnyeṇa jāta kari samasta niribāṇi | 174 |
svāmī bhajili ahaniśi muṁ tumbhara padmapāde
mukati icchili nātha tohora parasāde | 175 |
śrī bḥāṣkara debatāṁkara caraṇe daini
parama gati icchilā lā śrī sāreḷa dāsa muni | 176–3486 |
lg.head: {@bhīṣmaṅkara nabama dina yudda o duryyādhana nikaṭaru@}
lg.note: arjuna dvārā anargha maṇi mukuṭa ānaẏana
lg.l: bilaṁka deśara rājā baibasuta manu
agastiṁka padmapāde binaẏe dainu | 1 |
anugraha nātha svāmī prataṣe brahmabetta
praḷaẏa bañchāite yebaṇa maharūṣi śakatā | 2|
bāḷuta kāḷe svāmī kheḍara kutūhoḷe
bārānidhi gaṇḍūṣa kalu tohora yogamantra baḷe | 3|
asañṣepa mahābhāratha ẏe adr̥ṣṭi aśr̥ti
ẏe sañsāra jananta dilu mukati hāde gati | 4|
kisa samara hoilā bhīṣmaṁkara nabadine
ẏehā sañchapi mote kahibā mahāmunye | 5|
badaẏanti mahātamā mahā brahmabetti
sārthuka jībana rājā baibasuta manu śotā | 6 |
aṣṭama dibasa antareṇa pāṇḍaba saini
bhīṣmaṁku jiṇimāku śubhai thāṭhare śaṅkhadhuni | 7 |
sājanti nandighoṣa ratha trailekyara nāhā
dhātubāda puruṣa se trailokye cintucchanti yāhā | 8 |
se svāmī rathe bije sārathi paṇe śaṅkhacatradhārī
ākāśe khepanti śaṅkha goṣīra haẏe chāri | 9 |
dibya abatāre bije bicitrabīryyara nāti
caḷanti pāṇḍacabaḷa pacchima mūrati | 10 |
bājai bijighoṣa bīra ye dāuṇḍi
aneka ratna se yoddāẏe rathe chanti maṇḍi | 11 |
purbonṅaṇa pāṇḍaba baḷa pacchime kaurebe
āgiāṇi thāṭhare bijaẏe gāṅgabe | 12 |
caurāśisahasra baḷa śrībhmaje ajaṅga nāme dhanu
samare sahasrarjunara prāẏe diśantis śāẏentanura tanu | 13 |
khāṇḍaba bana dahane yehne agni debatā| teja diśi
sehi sāriṣe arjunara teja ye prakāśi | 14 |
pratagyāṁ sāmaratha se chaḍile uprodha
chatrībr̥tta rakhibāre ārambhile yadda | 15 |
ohobaḷa sāṁgrāme ye arjuanakaiṁ dekhi
bidhale nārāja bhīṣme uprodha upekhi | 16 |
lohāra pañchuśara śaṅkhacilā pacchī hāde tīkhamunā
ākreṣi bidhile bhīṣme arjuanara bhedilāka sehna | 17 |
bāsabara nandana ye kaicchā jagajeṭhī
bistāri pañcha nārāja ye sehu kalā br̥ṣṭi | 18 |
śahasraku śahasra ye hoi paḍitāḷa
mandāagni jhalakilā jāṇi baḍabā anaḷa | 20 |
lg.note: mahānaḷa jhalakilā jāṇi banānaḷa | (ṅa,na)
lg.l: puṇihiṁ bhīṣma ye bidhale daśabāṇa
yesane baḷāhake ṣepanti gagana | 20 |
bāsabara nandana bidhalā daśa śara
bhīṣmaṁkara nārāja samasta hoilāka cūra | 21 |
gaṅgāra nandana ye sahasre śara peṣi
ākāśa ghoṭilā yehne nārāja baraṣi | 22 |
abichanne nārāja ye bidhale yuṇa puṇi
hāthara byagre ye arjuna tāhā hāṇi | 23 |
beni yoddāẏe nihanti ke kāhāre ocha
ohobaḷa sāṁgrāme duheṁ aṭanti samakaccha | 24 |
droṇe dr̥pade ye baḍhalā samara
dhuśāsana durddaṣara samara mahāghora | 25 |
sahadeba śakuni ye sāṁgrāme ohobheṭa
jāṇanti gata āgata ye samare gariṣṭha | 26 |
laṣmaṇa kumāra tule ye samare abhinya
āho baḍhilā raṇaraṅga bāḷūta beni tanu | 27 |
nakuḷara tule samara karai durjaẏe
asaṁṣepa samara ye abheda beni kāẏe | 28 |
kaṇaẏa ratha ārehi dhr̥ṣṭa ye dyumana
aśastamāra tule karai sāṁgrāma | 29 |
somadattara tule samara śrīkhaṇḍī
bāḷa āditya prāẏe duhiṁkari ratha maṇḍi | 30 |
ādrābaḷī sāriṣe dhanu duhiṁkari hāthe
pr̥thī adhāramaẏe hoilā duhiṁkari śahasra bighāte | 31 |
lg.note: jāṇanti gata āgata ye samara paẏeṭha | (kha,ṛha)
diga adhāra hoile duhiṁkari śara ye bidhante | (jha,ñja,ṭa,thna),
lg.l: pañchaṣaṭhi nārāja gheniṇa somadatte
bidahnte ghoṭilā yāiṁ śrīkhaṇḍīra rathe | 31 |
śateka nārājanta gheni dr̥padara baḷā
somadattara śahasramāna cchedi pakāilā | 32 |
jāḷābaḷī nārāja gheniṇa se bīrasenara suta
śrikhaṇḍīki bidhilā gheni nārāja ahibrata | 33 |
pratikaccha nārāja gheniṇa puṇa peṣi
somadatta upare nārāja khareṇa baraṣi | 34 |
bajramunā śara ye bidhalā somadatta
sehnā phuṭi bhedilā se śrīkhaṇḍīra rātra | 35 |
yesaneke uḍaṅge paśanti bimvare
abheda bhedilā ye śrīkhaṇḍī śarīre | 36 |
piḍanti nārāje dropada kumāra remābaḷi
śarīra phutiṇa ye śoṇiḍha nikiḷi | 38 |
ghāẏeṇa asāṣṭama paḍilā se padmābatīra bitsi
hākanti somadatte tote ke āja karu rakhi | 39 |
hākanti somatrame re hoibu mattahāthī
keśarī chamure ki thāi tāhāra jībati | 40 |
aneka pratagyāṁ ye jaleka somadatta
moha teji pāñchāḷeśvara hoilā saceta | 41 |
samare jiṇi somadatta mane kare heḷa
garjeṇa śrīkhaṇḍī ye uṭhilā mahābaḷa | 42 |
gadhabonṅā śahasra ye dilāka tuḷākarṇṇa
rāgeṇa śrīkhaṇḍī tāhā kalāka ādhāna | 43 |
lg.note: trīḍanti nārāne dropada kumāra re??mābaḷi | (ka,ṅa,cha,ṭa,na)
jībati–jībana arthare |
lg.l: prāṇateja bahani prāẏe teja tā bikāśi
yebaṇa śahasra teje prabhāta hoẏe niśi | 44 |
ākāśa kampai yebaṇa śahasra bidhante
br̥ndāarka loke kampanti gaganagate | 45 |
ākāśe adr̥śya hoile karatāra
dhanuru gadhabonṅā śahasra hoilā bāhāra | 46 |
śahasrakaiṁ āgyāṁ dilāka bīra ye śrīkhaṇḍī
somadatta rājāra śira pakāa bege khaṇḍi | 47 |
āgyāṁ pramāṇe se nārāja bege ghoṭi
dekhi laṣeka nārāja somadatta kalā tahiṁ br̥ṣṭi | 48|
ohobaḷa thāṭhaku bikāśilā deba śahasra teja
somadatta śahasramāna hoilā dahija | 49 |
somadatta agrate gadhabonṅā śahasra ghoṭi
ratha haẏa pāilā ye somadatta dekhi
kadaḷī patra prāẏe śarīra kampi lā bujiṇa beni ākhi | 51 |
badhabonṅā śahasra yāi paḍilā hr̥dagate
piṭhi katiki nikiḷilā se paḍilā acete | 52 |
jamvyudatya nāśa gālā yebaṇa gadhabonṅā śare
mānaba mātraka kāhiṁ barttibe nirbhare | 53 |
śrīkhaṇḍīra bighāte somadatta nāśagalā
pāñchasahasra rathi asī śrīkhaṇṭīki beḍhilā | 54 |
abiccanne nārāja sabuṁkari hāthe
dharma upeṣā kari bidhale ẏeka rathe | 55 |
naṣatraṁka madhye yehne diśai niśāpati
tesana sāriṣe diśe śrīkhaṇḍīra jyoti | 56 |

div.note: ratha haẏa sāratha dahija hoilā agni br̥ṣṭi | (cha,jha)
dharma upeṣā kari bidhale kopacitte | (ṅa,ccha)
{ẏekāye śrīkhaṇḍī tahiṁ daśai sehimati | (jha,ṭa)}
ẏete saina madhyare śrīkhaṇḍī tesaneka jyoti | (ñja,tha)

lg.l: nārāẏaṇa śobhī yesane samudra manthane
sehi sādriśe diśai padmābatīra nāne | 57 |
śukhilā kāṭha yehne prajjyaḷita honti
thāṭhe bikāśilā ẏekā śrīkhaṇḍīra jyoti kānti | 58 |
śrībhmaje śobhā yāhāra dhanu ajaṅga sāriṣe
yoddā hoi ke rahiba samara parikacche | 59 |
yadyapi beḍhile ye pañchāśasahasra rāẏe
śrikhaṇḍīki diśile se ajāyūtha prāẏe | 60 |
bicitra nārāja ye gheniṇa pañchāḷa
kaureba thāṭhaku se dhūmaketu ṣaẏe kāḷa | 61 |
ẏeka śara bidhanteṇa pañchuśar phuṭi
ahibrateka nārāja ẏekāghāntike karai br̥ṣṭi | 62 |
ohobaḷa thāṭhe samaste kahanti ye śrīkhaṇḍīra mahiṁmā
sādhu bidyāguru se tuḷākarṇṇa mahātamā
meru tattulyāre yāhāra gārimā | 63 |
aneka prasanna hoi śrīkhaṇḍīki dile bara
śahasra mantra kahilā se śrīkhaṇḍīki apāra | 64 |
tuḷākarṇṇa prasādeṇa śrīkhaṇḍī mahāyodhī
sāṁgrāme yoddāẏe kehi nuāranti sādhi | 65 |
nārāja bidhantaṇa na yāi yāra śūnya
sāṁgrāma bimukhe paḍile aneka rathī hāthī saina | 66 |
aneka nārāja ye bidhanti chatrīmāne
abheda kapace yehne na bhedanti tīṣamune | 67 |
lg.note: {śukhilā kāṭha yehne dahai bahani}
thāṭhare bikāśilā śrīkhaṇḍīs tesaneke jāṇi | (ka,na)
aneka śahasra mantra jāṇanti cchatrīmāne | (ñja,tha,na)
lg.l: 59|2 parikaccha–samakaccha, pratikactha?? |
śahasra thambhana jāṇaiṁ se tuḷajarṇṇara bidya
teṇu kari śrīkhaṇḍī ye samare mahāyoddā | 68 |
anibāraṇa śahasra jāṇai se dopadara baḷā
apālaṭaka śahasra tāra samare rudrakaḷā | 69 |
yesaneke cūtaphaḷa khaḍai bāḍhaghāte
paḍile aneka rathī śrīkhaṇḍī bighāte | 70 |
śroṇita nadī bahilā śrīkhaṇḍīra yudde
pañchāśasahasra rathī paḍile sāta ghaḍira madhye | 71 |
raṇa bhagna hoi kaureba baḷa bhāñji
ẏekāẏe ye śrīkhaṇḍī dhāmaiṁ gaḷagāji | 72 |
raṇaraṅge bijaẏe ki kāḷa yama debatā
chatrī hoi chāmure ke nāhiṁnā rahantā | 73 |
bhīṣmaṁkara agrate yāiṁ kahile chāragaṇe
kaureba baḷa niśodhana hoile tohora śaraṇe | 74 |
śuṇiṇa kopānaḷa se bhāratha kuḷa mahāmalla
sañchaẏe hoilā mote kr̥tabarmāṁkara bola | 75 |
kopeṇa gāṅgabe ye chaḍile dharmabāṭa
āja nicaẏe dahiba pāṇḍaba baḷa thāṭha | 76 |
nīḷabāṇa bhmajabāṇa se gaṅgā debīra dilā
se dui śara ye bhīṣma troṇaru kāḍhilā | 77 |
mahābraṣṭi kāḷe yehne garjai deba indra
nirghāta śabada prāẏe śubhai bhīṣmaṁkara guṇanāda | 78 |
kāḷa antakāḷe yehne bikāśai bahati
tesaneka śikhā ye dui śahasraṁkara jyoti | 79 |
nīḷabāṇa ye se prataṣe dea hari
bhmajabāṇa sehu se prataṣe rūdra abatari | 80 |

div.note: apālaṭaka śara se ye samare ādhyāna kalā | (jha,gha,ḍha)
kāḷa antakāḷe yehne birājai rabira jyoti | (ṅa,jha)
dui śahasraṁkara śikhā lāgilā ākāṇe mahājyoti | (ñja,tha,na)

lg.l: yugate harira aṭanti ẏeka āmtā
kautuke nārāja rūpa dhaile se beni mahātamā | 81 |
saṁsāra praḷaẏa se karibāra nimante
nīḷabāṇa bhmajabāṇa hoile beni asre | 82 |
yadyapi brahmā indra candra sūryya digapāḷa
se śara peṣile abaśya purei tāṁka kāḷa | 83 |
se śahasraku pratiśara na jāṇe phālaguni
dharma laghile gāṅgabe se beni śahasra ghei | 84 |
śahasraṁka teja ye ulukāpāta jāṇi
ākāśe gopya gale gagana cūḍāmaṇi | 85 |
trāseṇa ghuñchile ye pāṇḍaba saini
bhīṣme rakha rakha boli śubhalā mukha dhuni | 86 |
nandighoṣa rathaku bikāśilā śahasraṁkara teja
ṣaṇaka mātrake ratha niki hoiba dahija | 87 |
arjuna boilā svāmī śuṇumā bāsudeba
bhīṣmaṁkara śahasra mote baḍai asambhaba | 88 |
naba dibasa pariyante hoilā sāṁgrāma
ẏemanta śara muhim na dekhiḷi śrīpuruṣottama | 89 |
svāmī praḷāẏānta jāṇi bhīṣmaṁkara śara dekhi
ẏeghānti pāṇḍabanta rakhi nuāribu padmaākhi | 90 |
arjuna mukharu ẏeheneka durāpada bāṇī śuṇi
mane mane bichārile deba catrapāṇi | 91 |
bichāranti gobinde arjuna bhaẏe kalā
sāṁgrāma sarilā ta pāṇḍaba baḷa nāśa galā | 92 |

div.note: se śahasraku samāna se nohai arajuni | (ñja,ṭa,tha,na)
hari arjuna rakha boli śubhilā mukha dha ni | (ñja,tha,na)

lg.l: ẏe śahasra bañchāibāku kāhār nāhiṁ buddhi
nicaẏe dri yodhana rājāku prāpata ẏe samprādhi | 93 |
mohora śahasra na dhaile ẏetebeḷe
pāṇḍabeta nāśa yibe bhīṣmaṁkara kopānaḷe | 94 |
nīḷabāṇa bhmajaāṇa dekhi pāṇḍaba baḷa ghuñchi

tini yojana antare yāiṁ rahile ẏekā nandighoṣa ratha
rahiacchi | 95 |
kaureba saini ye gale apasari
tini yojana antare rahile kaureba daṇḍadhārī | 96 |
ẏekā bhīṣma arjuna rahile duhiṁkari rathe
sudri śeṇa catra kare dhaile jagannāthe | 97 |
nandighoṣa ratharu gobinde abatari
nāḷabāṇa bhmajabāṇa rahile kr̥ṣṇa drochanāẏe | 98 |
adhare dachāpi catra dhāriṇa śrīhaste
dhātikāre uṭhile yāiṁ bhīṣmaṁkara rathe | 99 |
dekhiṇa trāsile śāẏantanura āmtajā
śrīhariṁki dekhi bhīṣme śahasra kale tejyā | 100 |
rathare thāiṁṇāṅgabe hoile pariṇāmi
jagatabhūta nātha kimarthe kopa kala svāmī | 101 |

div.note: ẏe śahasra meṇṭi bāku nāhiṁ kāhāra buddi | (gha,ñja,tha,na)
nīḷabāṇa bhmajabāṇa dekhi pāṇḍaba baḷa ghuñchi |
tini yojana antare ye hoile ẏekaloci |

lg.l: ẏekā hoiṇa ye nandighoṣa rahiacchi
se rathare basicchanti jagannātha bibatsi | (gha,jha,ñja,tha,na)

div.note: "jagatabhūta nātha kimarthe kopakala svāmī |" pare

lg.l: ’jha,ḍha, re ādhikā pāṭha:-
yadyarthe deba śahsa kali muṁ prahāra
catra dhari prabhma ccheda hāde mohora śira |
(abaśiṣṭa) parapr̥ṣṭāre
tu yebe sāṁgrāmakaiṁ icchākalu deba prahu
tohora sāṁgrāma kale kaurebe bratibe āra kāhuṁ | 102 |
rāgeṇa catra dhari ye ātreṣile catrapāṇi
sañchaẏe bhīṣma tote āja pakāibi hāṇi | 103 |
nīḷabāṇa bhmajabāṇa ẏe harihara ẏeka āmtā
ẏe śara peṣante ākāśe kampai bedabrahma | 104 |
svārga teji paḷābanti samasta br̥ndaarke
ṣīredraśāhī hoile sakaḷa debaloke | 105 |
yama debatā sañjībanī pura teja rahilā cchaḍadaśa yojane
pātāḷe gopyagale se bihantā purumāne | 106 |
nabandina pariyante hoilā sāṁgrāma
ẏetebeḷe āsi tu chaḍilu kimpe dharma | 107 |
kaḷikāḷa antare ye kaḷaṁkī abatāra
kaḷaṁkī nārāẏaṇa ẏe bāṇa bahai nija kara | 108 |
satyayugahuṁ ẏehā ye brahmā ṣīredre thile thoi
jāhnabī ẏe śahasra tote dilāka chorāi | 109 |

div.note: pūbonṅaṣṭhāra abaśiṣṭāṁśa–

lg.l: ẏe tohora catra pāibāra arthe
nīḷabāṇa bhmabāṇa bidhili jagnāthe |
cheda cheda śira mora na karasi heḷa
ẏe tohora sadaẏe kale dekhibaiṁ baikuṇṭhaṁ āḷa |
puṇa puṇa gāṅgabe caraṇe pariṇāmi
labhai aramagati catre cheda deba svāmī |
bhīṣmaṁkara mukharu karuṇa bāṇī śuṇi
daẏā basilā hr̥de deba catrapāṇi |

div.note: {bhīṣaṁkara mukha chāhiṁ bolanti catrapāṇi}
tohora śira kamaḷa chedibi ẏehiṣaṇi | (ñja,tha,na)

lg.l: ye deba śahasraku tu kimpāiṁ bharasu
mānaba yudde kimpe deba śahasra peṣu | 110 |
bhīṣme boile hari kopa sañharibā mote
tebe se satya bacana kahibaiṁ tote | 111 |
gobinde boile tu ye deba śahasra bāhuḍā
mantrabaḷe bhīṣme bāhuḍāile śahasra yoḍā | 112 |
nārāẏaṇaṁka bacane bhīṣme śahsraku dhyāẏe cinti
bāhuḍāi saṁharile nīḷabāṇa bhmabāṇa duhinti | 113 |
bhīṣme boile hari tu mote na kalu pratkāra
catre kimpe chedana na kalu mora śira | 114 |
ādihuṁ baikuṇṭha bhmabanaku kalaiṁ muhiṁ icchā
nīḷabāṇa bhmajabāṇa māiḷi tohora catraku kari bāñchā | 115 |
mukati cintāmaṇi tu mote sadaẏe na kalu
mote na māriṇa kimpe catra saṁharilu | 116 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇo boile tu aṭu mahāgyānī
baikuṇṭha bhmabanaku tote yujheṣṭhiṁki yibi gheni | 117 |
bhīṣme boile hari tohora mote ẏeḍeka sadaẏe
yugate bhagati tote nohili debarāẏe | 118 |
bhīṣmaṁka sadaẏe kari badaẏanti debarāja
tohoreṇa bhīṣme ho acchi mote aneka kāryya | 119 |
bhīṣme boile tu bhagatabatsaḷa biśvabāsa
muhiṁ hīnajana tote karibi kāryya kisa | 120 |
gobinde boile pāṇḍabe mohora pañchubhūta āmtā
tāhāṁkare biādī tu nuhasi mahāmtā | 121 |
bhīṣme boile hari tohora caraṇe daini
āja rātre ijekara mohora tahiṁki pāṇḍabanta gheni | 122 |

div.note: nīḷabāṇa bhmajabāṇa peṣi samare teṇu kali kaṣā |(kha,gha)

lg.l: yebe pāṇḍabanta tu icchi lu parama ye pada
kāli prabhāte muṁ kahibi mohora mr̥tubheda | 123 |
bhīṣme boile hari ājahuṁ ta mohora sarilā samara
daśa sahasra rathī pāḍabi āja mote
kopa na karibu dāmvodara | 124 |
gobinde boile ye tohora icchā
kara āja samara tora pūru manobāñchā | 125 |
bhīṣmaṁku dr̥ṛha karāi caḷanti acyute
bije jagannātha yāiṁ nandighoṣa rathe | 126 |
śahasra nirūna dekhi dhāiṁle duibaḷa
puṇi raṇaraṅga lāgilā ye mahāgoḷa | 127 |
caturddaśa ghaḍi āsi hoilāka dina
samare mahāśrama pāileni ohobaḷa saina | 128 |
bhīṣmaṁka kathā hari kahante arjunaku
samara chaḍi arjuna chāhiṁlā jagannāthaṁka mukhaku | 129 |
ẏeheneka samaẏe koṭiẏe kiraṇa bāṇa bidhale bhīṣma mahārathī
daśasahasra rathī pāḍile tataṣaṇānti | 130 |
samara karante ye āditya astagale
ohobaḷa thaṭha sehi kuruṣetra maṇḍaḷe rahile | 131 |
srāhāna sadhyā nityakarma se sāriṇa kurupati
aneka aḷaṁkāra gheni bhīṣmanta binaẏe bhagati | 132 |
makara śuklapaṣa nabamīra dina
br̥hṣpati bāra puṣyā naṣatra bidyamāna | 133 |
taitiḷa nāme karaṇa āẏaṣmāna nāme yoga
nabamī daśadaṇḍa bhega uttareṇa daśamī tithi bhega | 134 |
pāṇḍabanta gheniṇa deba cakrapāṇi
sahadebara tule karanti bhāḷeṇi | 135 |
lg.note: samara karuacchi pātha sābadhyāna śrīkr̥ṣṇara kathāku | (ka,cha,ṅa,ṭa,)
lg.l: gobinde boile mohora āge kahileṭi biśvāsa
coile muṁ kāḷi samare śara chaḍibi abaśya | 136 |
bhīṣme boile deba ājara raẏaṇī
mohora tahiṁki bijekara deba pāṇḍabanta gheni | 137 |
chāli sahadea ẏebe bhīṣmaṁka basāku
ẏekānte mr̥tubheda se kahibe āmbhaṁku | 138 |
sahadeba boile svāmī bhīṣma bhaṇḍilāṭi tote
ẏemante mr̥tubheda se na kahiba kadācite | 139 |
driyodhana sabhāku se yāāntu kirīṭī
mānagobindanta māgantu anargha maṇi mukuṭa goṭi | 140 |
sahadeba bacane kahanti bāsudeba
pannagā abhiṣeka mukuṭa se arjunaku kimpe deba | 141 |
karapatra yoḍiṇa bolai sabonṅasācī
mukuṭa debāku svāmī prastābeka acchi | 142 |
mānagobinda rājāra ghoṣayātrā kāḷe
citrasena gadhabonṅa ye driyodhanaku bādhanemā beḷe | 143 |
muṁ puṇi bibādī hoilā citrasene
bandhanu mukta kari āṇili driyodhane | 144 |
rāge lakṣe yojanaru chaḍidilā citraratha
ākāśa bhmabanuṁ muṁ bānddhali śarapantha | 145|
se śarapanthe ye mānagobida gaḍi gaḍi āsi
kaṇaẏa giri pabonṅta taḷe paḍilā nirāśī | 146 |
aneka binoẏī mote kalā anurāga
boilā arjuna re bara mote māga | 147 |
muhiṁ boili driyodhana caraṇe pariṇāmi
anarghamaṇi mukuṭa kāryya beḷe debāka mote svāmī | 148 |
lg.note:
ghoṣayātrā kāḷe–gopāḷa mānaṅkrara ẏeka yātrā biśeṣa
samaẏare |
lg.l: svāmī anugraha kariṇa mote boilā kuru rājana
māgile mukuṭa tote debaiṁ re arajuna | 149 |
se kāḷe satya mote kalā driyodhana
mahataṁkara bāchā laṅghita hoiba kesana | 150 |
gobinda arajuna sahadea tini
āstāne bije nārāẏaṇa paṇḍabanta gheni | 151 |
bāruṇābanta nāme yebaṇa śaiḷa
tribeṇī saṅgama tahiṁ bijaẏe mahīpāḷa | 152 |
āstāne bijaẏe mānagobinda yujheṣṭhi
āstānara tale praḷambita hoilā kirīṭī | 153 |
dekhiṇa parama haraṣa helā rājā māna ye gobinde
bābu bhāroi malla kimbhūte kalu bije | 154 |
arjuna praṇapatya kariṇa pāde bege uṭhi
dhāiṁ yāiṁ koḷa tāku kalā dhr̥tirāṣṭi | 155 |
mānagobinda boilā śuṇimā arjuna
kimarthe prārthanā kahasi bahana | 156 |
mānagobinda boilā māga ye tohora manaicchā
satya satya mohora debi tu karibu yāhā bāñcchā | 157 |
arapatra yoḍiṇa ye bolai phālaguni
anargha maṇi mukuṭa debā ājara raẏaṇī | 158 |
raẏaṇī prabhāte āmbhe debāka āhuḍāi
ẏe mohora satya tribāra svāmī hoi | 159 |
śuṇiṇa upahāsa kale śalya karṇṇa droṇa aśastamā
bāhlika durmukha durjaẏa dhuśāsana kr̥pabrahmā | 160 |
śakuni boilā ho na jāṇa tumbhe kicchi
arjuna māgilā e prastābeka acchi | 161 |
lg.note: āstāne bijaẏe ye rāja dhr̥tiāṣṭi | (kha, gha, ṭha, jha, ḍha)
lg.l: śalye boile mantrī pūbonṅra satya thile
jībana akīrtti puruṣa bāchā bicaḷita hoile | 162 |

mānagobinda boilā śuṇasi kirīṭī
guṇasāgara bhāi mora bandhu prāṇara sākhāgoṭi | 164 |
driyodhana boilā bābu ghoṣayātrā kāḷe
citrasena gandhabonṅ ye bānddha nelā baḷe | 165 |
thile bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇa śalya bhūrisabonṅā maharathā
samaste paḷāile kehi mote nohile rakhantā | 166 |
sahodraku chaḍilā pātha mohora nimante
ẏehākaiṁ bhaẏa kari mote chadilā citarathe | 167 |
kalā upugāra ye na sumaranti hr̥de
sañchaẏe se prāṇī narakagati pāi hāde | 168 |
yadyapi arjuna mote māgibāka toṭi
ẏehikṣaṇi chedidebi mohora śira kamaḷa goṭi | 169 |
pannagā nārāẏaṇa se mānacatraratī
anargha maṇi mukuṭa kāṛhi dilāka tatakṣaṇānti | 170 |
koṭiẏe māṇikya yeuṇa mukuṭe acchi lāgi
koṭiẏe pāde lakṣmī tahiṁ bijaẏe saubhāgī | 171 |
se maṇira teje raẏaṇī nāhiṁ bhoga
gheniṇa pāṇḍabe ye caḷile ati bega | 172 |

lg.l: sahadeba boile deba ājara pāhānti
bhīṣmaṁka tahiṁki yibā prasara nohu rāti | 173 |
ohobaḷa thāṭhe na māḍai nida
samarakuhiṁ icchā se anubrate kheda | 174 |
rātra thāuṁ bhīṣma ye nityakarma sāri
debaghare paśi nirākāra śāsra paḍhi | 175 |
anargha maṇi mukuṭa ye arjuna śire bānddha
diaṁghara dvāre bhīṣmanta praṇapatya pārtha mahāyodhī | 176 |
gobinda sahadebe lāgichanti kāche
nāsāre sūtālāi cchiṁkile śrībacche | 177 |
leuṭiṇa gāṅgaabe ye chāhiṁle dvāraku
mukuṭa dekhi boile ciraāṣya hou tuku | 178 |
puṇihiṁ cchiṁkile deba ye śrīpati
mo āiṣa gheni brata boile bhīṣma mahārathī | 179 |
puṇihiṁ cchiṁkante deba ye acyute
bhīṣme boile pañchurājya prāpata hou tote | 180 |
bhīṣmaṁka mukharu hari ẏesanaka dr̥ḍhaākya śuṇi
paṇḍabanta gheni bhitare bijaẏe catrapāṇi | 181 |
kr̥ṣṇaṁka badana chāhiṁ bolanti gāṅgeba
māẏādhara puruṣa tu ẏehā kaluki bsudeba | 182 |
svāmī anargha maṇi mukuṭa dekhi abhaẏe bāñcchali
driyodhana praẏe maṇi kalyāṇa muhiṁ kali | 183 |
gobinde boile tumbhe mahata dhārmika
bāñcchāsiddha hoibanā kṣatiṁkara bākya | 184 |
lg.note: nāsikāre kuśabhari chiṁkile jagannāthe |(gha, ḍha)
siddha hou arjunaku tohora dr̥ḍhabākya |(ña, tha, na)
lg.l: arjuna boile tumbhe ye boila pañchu kaṭakare hua ẏeka chatrī
tumbhara hāthe śahasra thile pāṇḍabaṁkara kisa ye jībati | 185 |
bhīṣme boile bābu tote pūbonṅra kathā kahuṁ
somabonṅśe ādhipati śāẏantaku mahāprahu | 186 |
gaṅgākaiṁ prīti se baḍhāile kūṭe
lakṣe batiśa sahasra baraṣa pariyante ghara kale kapaṭe | 187 |
gaṅgā boile thibi śāẏantanu tora ghara
gāṅgī boile brata pūriba mohora | 188 |
iśvara prāẏe maṇi māḷā dei barili tumbhaṁku
paścānte rajaruṣi boli muṁ jāṇilaiṁ tuku | 189 |
śibara gharaṇī miṁ na dekhili śibaṁku
īśvara boli kari bhaṇḍilu āmbhaṁku | 190 |
kapaṭe rājaruṣi tu gharakalu gheni mote
gāṅgī boli bharstranā tu na bolibu kadācite | 191 |
śāẏantanura bīryye gaṅgā debīra raje
gaṅgātahuṁ jāta hele ṣaḍa ye ātmaje | 192 |
gaṅgā boile śibanta bheṭibi āra kāhiṁ
śāẏantanu ruṣiṁku muṁ bikr̥ta karāi | 193 |
roṣeṇa maharuṣi ye gāṅgī bolu mote
ẏehānta teji śibantamuṁ bheṭibi yemante | 194 |
ẏeteka bichāri gaṅgā anādi siddhanārī
śāẏantanu āge nei prathama putra māri | 195 |
garbharu gaṅgā yebaṇa putra karai janama
śāẏantanu āge nei śira karai chedana | 196 |
chaḍagoṭi putra ye janama kale dhabaḷamukhī
śāẏantanu āge nei kāṭile śiragoṭi | 197 |
lg.note: tumbhara hāthe śahasra thile pāṇḍabe kāhiṁ brati |(ka, gha, ṛha)
lg.l: tathāpi gāṅgī boli na boile śāẏantanu
rodana karanti dukhe byākuḷe pañchumanu | 198 |
gāṅgī na bolanti gaṅgāṅku kariṇa muhāṁsa
māẏā moha lāgi chaḍile gaṅgāra sakaḷa doṣa | 199 |
rātra dibā ramana karanti gaṅgāṅku śāẏantanu maharuṣi
bhojane śaẏane srāhāne sandhyākāle gaṅgāṅku koḷāgrata kari basi | 200 |
śāẏantanura bīryye gaṅgā debīra raje
saptama garbhe ye upujile ātmaje | 201 |
saptama putrara śirakamaḷa chedante
dekhiṇa kopa kale śāẏantanu apramite | 202 |
āre āre gāṅgī pāpiṣṭhi hīnajana pāmerī
chaḍaputra nāśilu lo bāḷuta hatyā kari | 203 |
sāta garbhara putra goṭi ẏe prāṇara sākhā mora
somabonṅśa rakṣā hoithāu kinā medinīra | 204 |
lg.note:
“bhojana śaẏane srāhāne sandhyākāḷe gaṅgāku koḷāgrata
kari basi |” ehi pada pare adhikā pāṭha :–
āho ẏehipari aneka abasthā dilāka śāẏantanuku jāhnabī
bhr̥tyara praẏe khaṭithānti śāẏantanu gaṅgāre priẏa bhābi |
chaḍaputra yahuṁ māri pakāile hoiṇa garbhadhārī
dekhi kari kicchi na boile śāẏantanu satya ye ācari |
sapatame janama muṁ hoile yetebeḷa
śāẏantanura dekhante chedai mo śirakamaḷa |
dekhiṇa rāga saṁhari nuārile śāẏantanu
ālo gāṅgī kete putraṁkara hatyā ghenu |
saṁskr̥t mahābhāratare bhīṣma aṣṭama garbha kathā lekhāacchi kintu
sāraḷā dāsa saptama garbha boli lekhichanti |

“somabonṅaśa rakṣā hoithāu kinā medinīra” ehi pada pare
kha o ṭa pothira adhikā pāṭha :–
gaṅgā bolanteṇa thile śāẏantanu ghare
gāṅgī boilāku brata pūrilā tāṁkare |
lg.l: dhātikāre gaṅgā mote pakāile koḷaru
rāgeṇa boile jīile jīuṁ maleheṁ se maru | 205 |
bho kr̥ṣṇā mahata bacana ki hoiba anamitu
tahuṁ hāde mohora ye hoilā icchāmr̥tu | 206 |
lobhe śāẏantanu ye dhaile gaṅgāṅku
gaṅgaẏe boile śāẏantanu chuiṁla kimpe muku | 207 |
yetebeḷa paryyanta mote na boilu bhracchnā
muhiṁ tohora bhāriyā tetebeḷa sinā | 208 |
yetebeḷuṁ gāṅgī boli tu boilu ye mote
brata pūrilā guru patnī tora muṁ hoili yugate | 209 |
mukuiṁ koḷāgrata tu kalu kisa arthe
śira cchedana hoa tu ẏehāra putra hāthe | 210 |
bābu śāpa deiṇa se antarddhāna hoile jāhnabī
muhiṁ pitāṁkara caraṇe thāi nitye sebi | 211 |
biśvābasuṁkara nandana gandhabonṅ somadāsa
chāri kanyā tāhāṁkara pure baḍhanti abiḷāsa | 212 |
ambā ambikā ambāḷikā ambubati
mote barile se jyeṣṭhākanyā rūpabantī | 213 |
muhiṁ bibhāku yāuacchi hoiṇa barabidhi
mote dekhiṇa pitā hoile baḍa trodhi | 214 |
muhiṁ pachārili kimpe trodhakara pitā
tadanta kari kaha mote ẏethira bāratā | 215 |
lg.note:
bho kr̥ṣṇa mahataṁka bacana hoiba ki āna
teṇu kari icchāmr̥tu muṁ kalai bahana |(ña, tha)
chārikanyā tāra ye baḍhanti abināśa |(jha, ḍha)
trodhakara–śoka kara |
lg.l: śuṇiṇa śāyantanu boile gaṅgārā śāpa dilā acchi mote
muhiṁ śira chedana hoibi tohora putra hāthe | 216 |
āho arjuna pitāra bacane muṁ chaḍiḷi barabeśa
tohora mr̥tu yebe bhāriyā mohora kisa | 217 |
pitāra bacane muṁ dārā upeṣiḷi
bibhāhiṁ nohiḷi muṁ śuṅgāra na icchili | 218 |
amvākaiṁ ye thili muhiṁ bari
pradāna nohile kehi mohore bhaẏe kari | 219 |
dārā sañhari se nuāciālā yubatī
mohora duāre āsi mote hoilā
bahuta binaẏa bhagati | 220 |
muhiṁ tāhāku yetebeḷe kahilaiṁ tame
prāge jhāsite se loḍilā mohora nāme | 221 |
haḷiorāma baḷiorāma nīḷarāma praśurāma thile
bonṅaśaku stirītyā lāgaiṁ boli jhāsite na dile | 222 |
puṇi mukuiṁ samarpaṇa kaleka praśurāme
mohora nāsti karante tāhāṁkara mohora
hoilā sāṁgrāme | 223 |
aneka yudda kale mo tule se bhāi chāri
śatedina sāṁgrāmare hāri mote gale apasari | 224 |
tahuṁ amvākanyā hoilā nirāśa
bhīṣmaṁku jiṇiba boli praẏāge dilā jhāsa | 225 |
lg.note: pitāra bacane mu dārā sañharili | (ka,ṅa,cha,ṛha)
dārāhiṁ saharili ye na icchili yubatī | (gha,ñja,jha)
{mohora yuraku ailā yubatī}
mohora pādare se binaẏe bhagati |(ñja,tha)
lg.l: bāñchātīrtha sehu, kehu ye na kalā
dropada rājāra ye santati hoilā | 226 |
kaureba baḷa bhaintā aṭai dropatī
śrīkhaṇḍī rūpe se amvākanyā sehi agniru utapatti | 227 |
āho arjuna śrīkhaṇḍīki āgakara ājara raṇe
tāhāku dekhile śahasra chabi baḷabīryya hīne | 228 |
drone nāśayibe dhr̥ṣṭadyumanara hāthe
karṇṇa nāśayibaṭi arjunara śaraghāte | 229 |
yujheṣṭhiṁka kope dahi hebe śalya
bhīma marddibaṭi kaureba pala | 230 |
sahadebara hāthe mariba śakuni
nikaṇṭaka rājya tu labhabu phālaguni | 231 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa sārathi paṇe yāhāku kale raṣā
āumānaṁkara hāde kaiṣā aṭe mithyā | 232 |
muhiṁ yebe jiṇi nuārili daśadina yudde
āura kaurebanta ke rakhiba raṇa madhye | 233 |
ẏemanta kathā huanteṇa prasara hoilā raẏaṇī
jagabandana nātha kaleka śaṅkha dhuni | 234 |
jayu tu keśaba abatāra gomukha
caturpāda rakhu yāhāra narasiṁgha rūpa prataṣa | 235 |
lg.note:
sehu bāñchā, arthāḍh,bhīṣmaṅkū cibāha karibāra ye bāñchā,kehu;
kauṇasi cyakti,tīrtha na kalā; sādhana kalā bā kehu kauṇasi
upāẏa na hebāru se dr̥ pada rājāra santati hoilā |

lg.l: nīḷendī puṣyabarṇṇa yāhā mahākāẏa ṣaṇṭa
ẏekakhure gopya hoilā nabakoṭi brahmāṇḍa | 136 |
gomukha keśaba chāri caraṇa goṭi
uttara daṣiṇa pūrbonṅa pacchima tahiṁki phaḷa chārigoṭi | 137 |
nīḷa śveta ṣīra dadhi ghr̥ta ye labaṇa
mukutā pramāṇe paẏa yāhāra lamvita remeṇa | 138 |
ākāśe br̥ndāarke naṣatra remābaḷi
bārānidhi agni koṇe gosiṁha daita darpa daḷi | 139 |
namo namo gomukha keśaba mahāprahu
paramragati labhabi tora nāma kahuṁ kahuṁ | 140 |
svāmī priẏabatī bhāriyā yāra koḷe kamaḷā
yamadaagni mandire yāhāra hr̥de canamāḷā | 141 |
svāmī śūdramuni sāreḷā dāsa binaẏe bhagati
śrī gomukha jeśabaṁku hr̥de bhābai muṁ nityaprati | 142 |
śuṇimā sādhujane mohāra kāhāṇī
śūnye śabada bhedili na śuṇi na jāṇi | 143 |
parama pada dāyinī abhaẏe piṅgaḷāṣī
tāhāra prasanne muṁ atuṭa dharma icchi | 144 |
śate aśvamedha phaḷa śrī mahābhāratha śuṇante
yāhā se kahile muni parāśaraṁkara sute | 145 |
jaṅkherapura bāsuinī prasanna geṅgāḷā
se mohora hr̥daẏeṇa bhūṣaṇa tuḷasī ratnamāḷā | 146 |

{gomkha jeśaba chāri caraṇare śaraṇa
uttara daṣiṇa yāhāra naṣatra remābaḷi | (ca,ṅa,ṭha)
‘ mahākāẏa ṣaṇḍa–baḷaṣṭha ṣaṭa rūpa |
yāhā–yitra,ye |
lg.l: nirmaḷa nikaḷaṁka yāhāra mukha goṭi
munipada bākye muṁ tāhākaiṁ bheṭi | 147 |
kr̥pada nandinī ye brahmāra koḷe utapatti
sabitāra bākye debī narmadā sarasvatī | 148 |
gopyāna bhīgīrathī canda bhāgā nadī
citroptaḷāuṁ se ye īśānya bhāge bhedi | 149 |
parama sādhabī se saẏaḷa jane cantā
yāgeṇa yogeśvarī abhaẏe baradātā | 150 |
nirmaḷa bhūbane jamvu dvīpara īśānye
paraśurāma pāṭaṇā kaṭaka se kanakābatī nagra bidyamāne | 151 |
kuśaketu brahmā sañchita yeuṁṇa kuśasthaḷī
yoginī baḷa gheniṇa tahiṁ bāḷūta rūpeṇa kheḷa bāḷī | 152 |
kaḷikāḷa bidhvaṁsinī go sāraḷā nāma caṇḍī
bidantā bidhātā se ye apāda dukha khaṇḍi | 153 |
se debīṁka talaẏe hr̥dagate mama dhyāna
śūdramuni sāreḷā dāsa mahābhāratha kathana | 154 –3740|
lg.head: bhīṣmaṅkara śaraśayyā
lg.l: baibasuta manu pucchā kaleka agasti
bhīṣme ye mr̥tubheda kahile makara śukaḷa paṣa nabamī pāhānti | 1 |
sañjaẏe kahile ho śuṇa rājā dhr̥tirāṣṭa
bhīṣmaṁkara mr̥tu ẏebe hoilā nikaṭā | 2 |
bhīṣmaṁkara doṣa nāhiṁ putra tora kalā manda
arjune anargha mukuṭa dilā na jāṇi kuṭacchanda | 3|
se mukuṭa śire bādhaṇa galkā dhanurjaẏe
diaṁghara bhitare yāiṁ bhīṣmanta kalā binaẏe | 4 |
aneka ratna aḷaṁkāra arjuna kāẏe maṇḍi
praḷamvita hoi śutilā bāhāra ẏeruṇḍi | 5 |
mukuṭa dekhi bhīṣme mānagobinda prāẏe maṇi
dvāra kācche lāgiṇa cchiṁkile deba catrapāṇi | 6|
bhīṣme boile āmbhara āṣya gheni brata
śatr̥ māri pañchu kaṭake hua ẏekacchatra | 7|
sañchaẏe jāṇile bhīṣme pāṇḍabaṁkara ’ka’ṭi
bheda kahi boile tote prāpata hou sr̥ṣṭi |8|
āho dhr̥tirāṣṭa ājara samare śrīkhaṇḍī hoiba rathī
tāhākaiṁ dekhi bhīṣme śahasra chaḍibe hoibe birathī | 9 |
bhīṣme nāśa gakeṭi samara sarilā
hoilu biarthī kāryya tohora niṣṇuḷa hoilā | #10 |}
yemante majkara śuklḷa daśamīra dina
br̥haṣṭatibā ra krittikā naṣatra uttāre rehiṇī naṣatra bidyamāba | 11 |
se dina bei thāṭhe rahicchante sarasvatī nadī kūle
prabhātare saja ye hoile beni baḷe | 12 |
kuḷara pitāmaha bhīṣmaṁkara mr̥tubheda niẏata
gyānījana prasannakaiṁ kr̥ṣṇa māyā ẏe mihileka citta | 13 |
bho dhr̥tirāṣṭaājara yudde śrīkhaṇḍīṁki āga kari
raṇa goḷa hoiba kahita ko pāri | 14 |
śara sadhāna kari ṣaẏa yibe śāẏantani
teṇu se jaṇime pāṇḍaba baḷa saini | 15 |
śrikhaṇḍīra hetu ẏe bhīṣma āja ye paḍibe
icchāmr̥tu gāṅgeba śaraśayyā karibe | 16 |
bhīṣma nāśagale sāmgrāma ta sarilā
hoilu aputrika pārāśara yāhā boilā | 17 |
śuṇa ho manurāẏe badaẏanti agasti mahāmunya
śrī mahābhāratha bhīṣma samara daśadina | 18 |
lg.note: kācche–ati nikaṭare |
lg.l: buhaspatibāra rehiṇī naṣatra sampa rṇṇe
dui thāṭha nidrā teji uṭhile bahane | 19 |
nityakarma sāriṇa rājā driyodhana
maṇi mukuṭa nei thoilā sannidhye arajuna | 20 |
prasanna badane kuruindra na boile kicchi
teṇe bāhuḍi nandighoṣe bijaẏe sabonṅasācī | 21 |
pūbonṅa pāṇḍabe pacchime kaurebe paṭoāri lāgile beni baḷa
aneka dāna dike bhīṣme sabonṅmaṅgaḷa | 22 |
mahā samprādhire bijaẏe śāẏantani
pacchiāṇi hoi caḷilā rājā kr̥rumaṇi | 23 |
droṇe kr̥pe karṇṇa śalya yadyaratha
śakuni dhuśāsanara tule mānagobindara aneśveta brātha | 24 |
ratha gaja aśva piṭhire yoddāẏe bije kari
hāthe dhanu dhari ẏekamukha hoile yāiṁ kari | 25 |
ratha gaja aśvanta ye sājale samadaṇḍa
ghora bādya śabada kampai bhūakhaṇḍa | 26 |
ākāśuṁ baje jkale deba ugara mahāmuni
bedamantra pothi kare bīṇādaṇḍa gheni | 27 |
nāradaṁku dekhiṇa binaẏa kale ānande kururājā
drona karṇṇa śalya kr̥pe samaste nāradaṁku kale pūjā | 28 |
nabamīra dina śeṣe samara bicase
bhīṣmaṁka praḷamvita hāhim se nāradaṁka pāśe | 29 |
nārada hasile bhīṣmaṁkara mukha chāhiṁ
śeṣakāḷe prāṇīṁki ye kathā gocara hoiba kāhiṁ | 30 |
bhāratha yudda dekhu samaẏe thāu brati
uḷara śreṣṭha aṭanti tāṁkara thibāhiṁ se yugati | 33 |
ẏete kahi nārada hoile antarddāna
bhīṣmaṁka āge yāiṁ kahai driyodhana | 34 |
bho bhīṣma amaṅgaḷa ta mot diśai baḍa manda
tumbhanta pramāda paḍaba boḷi āja boile nārada | 35 |
badaẏanti gāṅgabe bābu tumbhe ho gaṇitā
kāhāra beḷe meṇṭaṇa ye hoi karmara ghaṭitā | 36 |
mātā raja pitā bīryye saṅgama teyebeḷe
bihantā puruṣe lekhana tāhā karanti kapāḷe | 37 |
jaẏaśaṅkha bādya kariṇa gāṅgabe
rathare basile yāiṁ sumari bighnarāja mādhabe | 38 |
manumatha sārathi ye bāhai turaṅga
caḷanti rāthī yoddāẏa ati beguṁ bega | 39 |
aiśānye pāṇḍabe ye pacchime kaurebe
nandighoṣa ratha ye sājile bāsudebe | 40 |
gobinde boile tu ho śuṇa phālaguni
śrīkhaṇḍiki senāpati kari bege āsa gheni | 41 |
arjuan boile bho deba bhīṣmaṁkara kahante
nayuṁsaka śrīkhaṇḍīku mukuṭa bādhabā kemante |42|
svāmī yātrā yoge ayātrika lokanta kebeheṁ na bari
kāle pramāda paḍai śuṇimā deba hari | 43 |
lg.note: badaẏanti gāṅgabe bābu sabiheṁ gaṇitā | (ka,ṭa)

(jha,ṅa)re adhikā pāṭha:-
ẏe kathāmānanta bhaẏe bhagati na kara kurumaṇi

"svāmī yātrā yoge ayātrika lokanta kebeheṁ na bari" |
pāṭha pare ’gha’ pothira pāṭha kebaḷa goṭitra pothi
