lg.l: yātrākāḷe yebe chāhimyāiṁ aputrika mukha
hārai sāṁgrāme ye pāi bahuta dukha | 44 |
yātrākāḷe yebe yāgiṁki dekhile
kāryya nāśa yāiṭi barehā rūṣi kahile | 45 |
yātrākāḷe yebe chāhiṁba naṭa mukha
abaśya kāryyahāni hoai padmamukha | 46 |
yātrākāḷe ye dekhiba bidhabā hāde nārī
abaśya bighna paḍai bujhi bā deba hari | 47 |
yātrākāḷe yebe dekhiba keśa mukuḷa
abśya kāryya nohai śuṇa debakīra bāḷa | 48 |
yātrāḷe yebe cchiṁkanti putra āī
pramāda paḍai deba meṇṭaṇa na yāi | 49 |
yātrākāḷe yebe redana karanti nārīgaṇa
abaśya mr̥tu hoai nā yāi meṇṭaṇa | 50 |
yātrākāḷe yebe mañjarīki dekhi
yābaśya pramāda paḍai na yāi upeṣi | 51 |
abaśya nāśayāi ye gamante sāṁgrāmā
abaśya nāśayāi ye gamante sāṁgrāma | 52 |
kapāsiāra nāma dharante niredha
ẏe kathāna muni kariucchanti biredha | 53 |
athabā jaṇu ki raṇe hārilehiṁ hāri
nisata paṣa mote na boḷa murāri | 54 |
ẏe yete kathāmāna kahiḷi bichāri
ẏemānake bigna paḍai śuṇimā deba hari | 55 |
svāmī nisata hoi kāryya karanti ye tejyā
tāhāṁkara jīrana asārthu debarājā | 56 |
lg.note:
svāmī nisata hoiṇa ye karanti abā kāryya
tāhāṁkara jībana ki sārtha ka debarāja | adhikāṁśa pāṭha |
mañjārī–birāḍi |
lg.l: svāmī kūṭa kapaṭe ye karanti sāṁgrāma
chatrī kuḷaku dūṣana buḍai sabonṅa dharma | 57 |
aneka maṇāi kari kahanti śrīpati
tathāpi sanamata na kalā bicitrabīryya nāti | 58 |
sahadebakaiṁ ṭhāridile basudebara bāḷe
mukuṭa bādha tu nei śrīkhaṇḍīra kapāḷe | 59 |
bhīṣma arjuan ẏeṇe samara mahāghora
teṇe senāpati kale śrīkhaṇḍīku yujheṣṭhi ṭhākura | 60 |
aneka aḷaṁkāra bhūṣaṇa tāra kāẏe
khecarī bibāna sāriṣe ratha ye goṭāẏe | 61 |
kr̥ṣṇa megha sādri śe tāra chāri bājī tāji
br̥ndāarka bhmabanaku ṣepanti gaḷagāji | 62 |
sātukī sārathi ye śrīkhaṇḍīra rathe
bāhai se turaṁgama pacana āpāte | 63 |
sūryya maṇḍaḷa sāriṣe śrīkhaṇḍī ratha caḷi
āsanteṇa rahubara śalye yāiṁ ogāḷi | 64 |
samare abhaẏe se śrīkhaṇḍī mahāyodhī
cchatrībara sohoḍa se tuḷākarṇṇa bidyā sādhi | 65 |
pabonṅata nikiḷai yāhāra nārāja bidhante
ke tāhā sahiba ho mānaba janna mātre | 66 |
bahuta samara se kale rāẏeguru śalya
bhāratha yudde se aṭanti mahāmalla | 67 |
nirghāta prāẏeka ye śubhai gunanāda
ohokuḷa buḍalā ye bādyara śabada | 68 |
bhīṣme samara karanti arjunara tule
ākāśa adhaktāra houacchi bhīṣmaṁkara śar badhale | 69 |
78|2 dekhiśa pāṇḍaba baḷa hoile baṣādā | (ñja,tha,na)
ẏekābeḷe śate śate nāraja bhīṣme kope bidha
patiśare arajuna pakāilā tāhā cchedi | 70 |
digamvare kampanti bhīṣmaṁkara śahasra gahane
ākāśe kampanti samasta br̥ndaarkamāne| 71 |
gahaḷa dhandoḷa ye gaganaadhaktāra
ākāśe raṇmi buḍile ye deba karatāra | 72 |
yesane anaḷa dahai tiraṇa rāśi
arjuna śahasramāna bhīṣma ye jhiṁghāsi | 73 |
atireka bāṇa ye bidhanti aniryyāpe
ābara yoddā ke rahiba bhīṣmaṁkara paratāpe | 74 |
kopeṇa gāṅgabe ye samare bimukha
pīḍita mahāṣudhā śarīre mahādukha | 75 |
śarīra asāṣṭame gaṅgāra nandana mahākope
rudrā śareka bhīṣme bidhale garutāpe | 76 |
bikaṭa danta ye bikarāḷa ghora rūpe
bijekarṇṇakaṭāra caraṇ gagana ṣepe | 77 |
birājai śahasra ye śudda saṣṭika teja jāṇi
jale diśanta yehne śudda arkamaṇi | 78 |
mahābhārā kampilā se nārāja āsante
yoddāẏe antara hoile lucile hāde rathe | 79 |
śrīkr̥ṣṭa chāṁhile ye arjunara mukha
bhairabā śahasra bhīṣmakalā bābu arjuna ẏehā rakha | 80 |
tu yebe śahasra sambhāḷi nuāribu re bīra pātha
hanumatakaiṁ boiḷibā se gopyāna karu ratha | 81 |

div.note:
{debatāmāne kampanti bhīṣmakaṁra śahasra gahane |
ākāśare āditya hoile gopyāne | (ṅa,jha,)}
arjunara śaramāna bhīṣmadeba nāśi | (gha,ṅa,cha,jha)
hanumataku boile tu pātāḷe gopyāpyakara ratha | (ṭa,ghna,)

lg.l: nārāẏaṇa bacane ye bīra phālaguni
āsti nāsti na kahi se hoilākā tuni | 82 |
gobinde boile bābu sambhāḷa bīra hanu kapi
bhairabā śahasre niki samaste hoi tāpi | 83 |
pr̥thī ghoṭilā ye mahārudra teja
ẏehiṣaṇi āmbhe nāśayibā sacarācara hoiba dahija | 84 |
ẏethakaiṁ pratikaccha śahasra na jāṇai sabonṅasātī
tohora buddi baḷare bābu pāribā ẏethu beḷe bañchi | 85 |
yehā śuṇi añjinā tanāẏe buśvarūpe byāpi
dhvaje thāi nandighoṣa ratha pātāḷakiu chāpi | 86 |
kaṇaya giri samāne yebana nandighāṣa
hanumata chāpante se hoilā adr̥śya | 87 |
hāboḍa na pāi se rudaśara kāśī
śūnya hoi lajjāẏe galā kapilāsabāsī | 88 |
dhātikāre toḷilā hanu ratha basāiṇa aṅgaṣṭhi
pātāḷa bhmabanuṁ nandighoṣa ratha uṭhi | 89 |
rudraśara peṣi bhīṣme hoicchanti nicinta
śahasraku talaẏe kari nirāpanti pāṇḍabanta | 90 |
bhāḷanta bhīṣme bhalā ṣindra kahili arjunaku āja rāti
ẏe śahasra bighāte pāṇḍabe ki pāibe jībati | 91 |

div.note:
{gobinda boile tu śūṇa hanumata
bhairabā śahasra peṣile bhīṣme hoi kopacitta | (dha,ṭha)}
pr̥thī ghoṭi āsai bhairabā śahasra | (dha,ṭha)
tohora buddibaḷe ẏe beḷeka pāribuki rakhi | (ka,kha,cha,ñja,ṭa,tha)
śūnye yāi rahilā se kapiḷāsa svargabāsī | (ñja,tha,na)
mahātaḷa bhūmiru ye nandighoṣa uṭhi | (ñja,tha,na)
ẏe śahasra ghāte ki pāṇḍabe chanti āu brati | (kha,ñja,tha,na

lg.l: yeka laẏe kari bhīṣme nicaḷa beni ākhi
kr̥ṣṇara darpe pāṇḍabanta ki hoiba āja rakhi | 9 |
ẏemanta samaẏare arjuna dhātikāre
bidhalā bāsebi ye gadhabonṅā tīṣa śare | 93 |
paḍante bhīṣma ratha haẏa hoileka sabonṅacūnā
dhanu troṇa chediṇba se bhedilā bhīṣmaṁkara bajrasehnā | 94 |
rathabhagna hoante bhīṣme hoile uttanāśāhī
asāṣṭama aceta mohe bhīṣme paḍileka mahī | 95 |
ṣaneke mohi teji pāile se jība | 96 |
puna āna ratheka yoci āṇilā sārathi
dhātikāre rathe bijaẏe bhīṣma mahārathī | 97 |
dhātikāre uṭhiṇa bhīṣme beni kare dhaile bhūṣaṇḍī
dekhile chokhāra turaṅgama cati āga doicchi śrīkhaṇḍi | 98 |
puṇihiṁ bhīṣme ye bichārile mana
yātrābeḷe ailu keuṇa laṣaṇa | 99 |
yātrākāḷe ayātrika lokanta dekhile
dharmanāśa yāiṭi anakūḷa ārambhile | 100 |
athabā bañchita yeuṇa jana ẏehā
yama debatā binu tāku āna nāhiṁ sāhā | 101
lg.note: kr̥ṣṇara prasāde pāṇḍabe nuhaṁnti nirimākhi | (ñja,tha,na)
bidhalā sabonṅasācī hāboḍā ye śare | (ñja,tha,na,ṭha)
moheṇa mucchāgata gale bhīṣme paḍileka mahī | (tha,ñja,ṭa)
mohi teji bhīṣme ṣaṇe pāileka ceba | (ka,jha)

{hāboḍā śara bāji mūcchita bhīṣmaṁkara kāẏe
moha tejiṇa bhīṣma ṣaṇke cetanā pāẏe | (ñja,tha,na)}
hāboḍa śahasreka ye bidhale pārthibā
mohe paḍile se hoiṇa aceba | (ṅa,ṛha)
dekhile age ratheka caḍhiachai śrīkhaṇḍī | (ṅa,ṭa,ṭha)
lg.l: trikaṇṭaka śara hāde bhīṣmaṁku bidhalā śrīkhaṇḍī
madana ārate bhīṣmaṁka se śarīra tripaṇḍi | 102 |
madane ghāri hoilā ye bhīṣmakaṁca bayu
aamvā sundarī śrīkhaṇḍī tahiṁki ye riyu | 103
kasta rī rekha jāṇi bhīṣmakaṁra remābaḷi
śrikhaṇḍīra ṇārāja ghāte śarīru mahārata gaḷi | 104 |
naẏana ṇāsikā karṇṇa tuṇḍa phuṭi
baraṣilā nabadvāra chaḍilā sabonṅaghāṭi | 105 |
janaantu bighāte yehne hoi sarpa
abicchanne mahārasa gaḷante bhāñji lā bhīṣmaṁkara darpa | 106 |
kuṣi hr̥dapañjara kara caraṇa aṅguṣṭhi
iaṁḷā, piaṁḷā, śiśumunā ẏe samasta dvāra phuṭi | 107 |
pīḍilā anaṅga ye mātilā candrakaḷā
tuṭilā baḷa darpa hoile bheoḷā | 108 |
yesaneke śarīra ramai rati rase
bhīṣmaṁkara śarīra hoilā tesana sādr̥śe | 109 |
śarīraku prābhabai loḍe reta gaḷile
sabhābe sarase ye gamai cañchaḷe | 110 |
nau sahasra baraṣa yebaṇa acaḷa bindu
amvāra draśana mātrake tuṭilā sabonṅabindu | 111 |
bhīṣmaṁkara asāṣṭame bhajile sabonṅa saini
samara rahu boli ye śubhalā ghora dhuni | 112 |
śuṇa baibasuta manu badayunti agasti
yaṣṭhi khaṇḍi harāi adha yesaneke bartti | 113 |
kaureba baḷara ye bhañji lā murāṭa
bidhabā āmtā parā ye hoile kuruthāṭha | 114 |
lg.note: teśu śira cchiḍigalā bhīṣmaṁkara kadha| (kha,gha)
yaṣṭhi khaṇḍi harāi adha hoẏe yehne prati | (cha,jha,ṭa)
lg.l: dhāmanti kaurebe ye bhīṣmaṁka sannidhāne
dekhile gāṅgabe ye birasa budyamāne | 115 |
bhīṣmaṁkara abasthā ye dekhiṇa dhr̥tarāṣṭi
daṣiṇa hātha nei dilāka lalāṭa pāṭi | 116 |
bho pitā yamadaagni nandana parśurāme
yāhākaiṁ bhajile dusaha sāṁgrame | 117 |
yāhāra dhanu dharante kampai nasakanda
tote kisa boḷibi ho karma mora manda | 118 |
ādihuṁ bho pitā yebe kahithāntu mote ẏehā
pāṇḍabe bitādī nuhanti tohora asāhā | 119 |
bhīṣmaṁku koḷe dhari se mānacatrabrati
karṇṇa śalya droṇa śakuni dhuśāsana samaste re banti | 120 |
sañjaẏe bidura tule bijaẏe dhr̥tirāṣṭa
ẏesamaẏe puanta mora dilu ẏeḍe kaṣṭa | 121 |
tu uẏehā sañchaẏe kari kimpe na hilu āgahuṁ
bhaciṣya gyāṁtā nohai jāṇibi bā jāhuṁ | 122 |
boilu ye samare kr̥ṣṇa arjuananta māri
pañchurājye tote ẏekāṅge karibi adhikārī | 123 |
muhiṁ tohora bacanaku ye āśa kali pitā
mahataṁka bacana ẏebe hoiā anyasthā | 124 |
svāmī kaureba bonṅaśaku tu prāṇara mauṣadhi
kebeheṁ na chaḍilā mora gaḷūta kuṣṭhabyādhi |125 |
bhūrisabonṅāẏe koḷa kari dharile bhīṣmaṁku
hr̥dare bhmaja dei ye āborile tāhāṁku | 126 |
ẏesaneka carica āgahuṁ yebe jāṇu
ẏehu kuru sāgare kimpe ẏehā ādyahuṁ na bakhāṇu | 127 |
dropadara nandana śrīkhaṇḍī yebe tote ẏeḍe ripu
tiraṇa parāẏe kari kāṭanti tāra bapu | 128 |
bhūrisabonṅāẏe boile ho taba karttabya ẏeḍeka hoilā
śaśāra prātrame ẏebe siṁgha nāśagālā | 129 |
ẏebeheṁ āgyāṁ desi samare māribi śrīkhaṇḍī
tiraṇa pramāṇe māyeṁsa kāṭika khaṇḍi khaṇṭi | 130 |
kahuṁ kahuṁ bhūrisabonṅāẏe ??ile mahatrodhi
diga adhāra hoilāta na phurai buddhi | 131 |
ẏeḍeka ārambha pātilu kimpe āṇi
br̥ṣaku uṭhāiṇa ẏebe kāṭilu niśuṇī | 132 |
bhīṣme boile se aṭai stirījana
tāhāku kemante nāśa karibi sāṁgrāma | 133 |
mohora darpe nāśa na yāi śrīkhaṇḍī
samasta sañchilā hari pāṇḍba kuḷa maṇḍi |134 |
bhīṣme boile āmbhe nāśahaluṁ śrīkhaṇḍīra samaruṁ
dhr̥ṣṭadyumana hāthe nāśayibe droṇaguru | 135 |
bhīmasena nipātiba dhr̥ytirāṣṭara śateka tanaẏe
karṇṇa nāśa yibeṭi arjuanara śara ghāẏe 136 |
yujheṣṭhira samara nāśayibe rāẏeyuru śalye
śaṁkuni nāśayiba sahadeba kopānaḷe | 137 |
kr̥pa aśastamā ta samare abaraṇi
bhīūrisabonṅā bāhlika somadatta ẏehānta ke bā gaṇi | 138 |
bābu mānagobinda tuy ẏebeheṁ kara buddi
bāsudebanta gheni tu ẏebe kathākara sadha | 139 |
āho driyodhana pitā śāẏantanu mora mātā hāde jāhnri
ichāẏe mr̥tu mohora bāñchāẏe tri jībī | 140 |
mote jiṇimāku pāṇḍabaṁkara kisa buddi
ābara prapata kāhiṁ tote hoibāka rājyabidhi | 141 |
lg.note: abaraṇi–ye baraṇa hoināhi,animantriḍha |
lg.l: puṇa badaẏanti gāṅgeba ye śuṇa mānagobinda
pāṇḍabaṁkara tule tumbhe na kara dvanda bāda | 142 |
chāḍimela tohora lobha moha āmtārāga
yugate sodara se pāṇḍabe acchi bhāga | 143 |
mānagobinda boilā tāta ẏe nohai yugate
ẏeka sīmā na diaiṁ śarīre prāṇa thibā pariyante | 144 |
śuṇiṇa maunabrata ye doile gāṅgeba
pratagyāṁ kari pratibākya ye dilāka rādheba | 145 |
karṇṇa boilā bhīṣme kahiḷa yeuna bāṇī
śarīra kampai mohora tumbhara cākya śuṇi | 146 |
baḍhilu kaureba thāṭhe pāṇḍabe tora prīta
mr̥tubheda kahilu tu pāṇḍabanta paridina rāti | 147 |
rājya buḍāibāku kalu tu driyodhanaku
tu ẏebe dharma chadilu dharma hāde na chaḍai ẏehāku | 148 |
tote āśakari āmbhe apasari thiluṁ
aneka saini senānta tuhi se nāśa karāilu | 149 |
āho bhīṣma lāghaba yudda sarilā ājahuṁ
ẏebe se,ānagobinda pañcha kaṭake hoiba mahāprahu | 150 |
karṇṇa droṇa aśastamā śalya kr̥pa thānte
tu se na dekhibu pāṇḍabe bratanti kemante | 151 |
bhīṣme boile āmbhe chaḍantu śarīra
āura aṣṭa dibasa rahi dekhibuṁ samara | 152 |
bhīṣme boile bābu tu śuṇa kururājā
ẏeṭhāba goṭire mote kara śaraśayyā | 153 |
lg.note: tiḷārdde bhūmi na debi jībana thibā paruyante | (ñja,tha,na)
#151|2 tu naẏane dekhibu pāṇḍabe bratanti kemante | (tha,na,ñja,ṭha)}
#152|1 bhīṣme boile āmbhe na chaḍibu śarīra | (tha,ñja,na)}
paridina–paari dinā
lg.l: āgyāṁ ramāṇare se mānacatrabratī
susañja śejyā dilāja tuḷāra supti | 154 |
bhīṣmaṁku śaẏana karāile kara toḷi dhari
mahārasa jharante śarīra hoilā jaḍi | 155 |
bhīṣmaṁku śuāi kaurebe gale nija thāne
rātra ardde pāṇḍabanta gheni nije janārddane | 156 |
makara māsa śukaḷa paṣa daśamīra rāti
pāṇḍabe bheṭile yāiṁ bhīṣma mahārathī | 157 |
dekhile bhīṣmaṁkara nabama abastā
yujheṣthi koḷa kari boile ẏehā se kalu pitā | 158 |
kuṭamva lokanta karāilu ẏeḍe śāsti
keuṇa yaśa arjebaṭi rājā kurupati | 159 |
bhīṣme boile hari tote praḷamva karibāku
kara caraṇa na caḷai gocara nāhiṁ muku | 160 |
bhīṣmaṁkara abastā dekhi prasanna hoile śrīpati
bara māga gāṅgeba tribāra mora satya | 161 |
tu mahārathī ẏehi maṇḍaḷaca madhye
ke tote jiṇibāku sāmaratha hoibāka yudde | 162 |
mohora bacaneṇa pāṇḍabaṁkara hite
ẏeheneka abastā tote daiba ghaṭasūtre | 163 |
māga ho bhīṣma tote cirāntana yeuṁṇa kathā
tuhi se mānantā ye muhiṁ se diantā | 164 |
bhīṣme boile deba mora gyāne nāhiṁ āna pāpa
aputrika doṣa laṣaṇa mora khaṇḍibāḷa tāpa | 165 |
śvāmī raṇayāga kari maranti yebe dekhiṇa tora mukha
sabonṅa pāpa khaṇḍanti pābanta baikuṇṭhe baḍa sukha | 166 |
sehi mahāyāga ta mote nohilā prāpata
aputrika doṣuṁ pāra mote ho jagannātha | 167 |
lg.note: saṁpāti–suśayyā,komaḷa śayyā |
lg.l: ẏe ye svāmī bratarājā aṭe puṇya ẏekādaśī
ẏethe prāṇa bisarjile mukati huanti, rūṣīkeśi | 168 |
hari aneka jhiṁghāsa ye karṇṇa kalā mote
śarīra rakhili śrī mahābhāratha samara saribā pariyante | 169 |
gibinde boile mohora bhagate bratanti yebaṇa jane
se tora dharmaputre huanti ẏekathā mora dr̥ḍha bacane | 170 |
idaṁ pratibākya ye badaẏanti dea rūṣīkeśi
ye mote bhagata se tohora aṭanti śiṣa | 171 |
makara māsa śukaḷa pasa aṣṭamīra tithi
bhīṣma aṣṭamī nāma ẏe tohora dibārāti | 172 |
mama bhagate yebaṇa nare citta śuddha
se bhīṣmara nāme gotra dhari de rathibe śrīdda | 173 |
keśaba boile bhīṣme praẏāge śrādda kale yete phaḷaśrati
se puṇya labhantu jane ye tote hoibe bhagati | 174 |
āho bhīṣa makara māsa śukaḷa paṣa ye daśamī
ẏe bratadharma tote dilu se svāmī āmi | 175 |
bhīṣma boile hari ẏe bratadharma mora boli boile
kehi na karibe ẏehā mohora brata hoile | 176 |
gobinde boile mota bratarājana saṁkaḷpa yebaṇa jana
prathame ẏe brata kale pāḷibe jane āna | 177 |
ẏe bhīṣma daśamī yebe karibe prathame
tebe se prāpata tāku ẏekādaśī dharme | 178 |
lg.note: {gayāśrādda kale yeteka phaḷagra,ti}
se pūṇya bhibe nare ye tote bhagati (ka,cha,
āmi–muñ |
lg.l: ājahuṁ bhīṣmaṣṭamī, bhīṣmanabamī,bhīṣmadaśamī,bhīṣma,ẏekādaśī,bhīṣmadvādaśī,
ẏe pañcudharma dila tote badaẏanti rūṣīkeśi | 179 |
āho bhīṣma caubiṁśa ẏekādaśīki ẏehu ẏekādaśīhiṁ mūḷa
tohora nāma saṁkete ẏehā pāḷantu sakaḷa | 180 |
tu se chatrībr̥tti tejilu mora koryya arthe
sacarācara dharmaputra hoi mukati karibe hāde tote | 181 |
bhīṣme boile deba labhiḷi muṁ parama gati
nicaẏeṁ cirantana dharma mote yāci dilu ho śirīpati | 182 |
bhīṣme boile hari pāṇḍabe mora putra
pāile saṁpada ẏebe arajile parama artha | 183 |
bhīṣme boile deba śuṇa mo bacana
ẏe mahābhāratha dekhile chaḍibi jībana | 184 |
ābara āñṅkā mote debāka bhagabāna
pāṇḍabanta gheni mote apoḍā bhūmire karāibu dahana | 185 |
ẏebe ẏemanta āgyāṁ mote debā debādhideba rājā
arjuanaku bola mote karāu śaraśayyā | 186 |
ẏe śaraśayyā taḷe bahiba rakata sātatāḷa
arjuna śaraśayyāre thāi muṁ dekhibi samara | 187 |
bāṇa jāḷābaḷīre heba śarīra ṣinna mora
ẏethaku arjuna mote deba jaḷadhāra | 188 |
aneka mr̥tupiṇḍe ye bahiba rakata nadī
yoginī baḷa preta piśācīẏe ẏe thibe samaste sampādi | 189 |
lg.note: ajahuṁ bhīṣma daśamī,bhīṣma ẏekādaśī,bhīṣma dvādaśī,bhīṣma,traẏodaṇī,bhīṣma,caturddaśī |
lg.l: bābu supāti śayyāẏe śuāile māḍiba baḍa nidrā
rāṣāsuṇī piśācuṇīmāne bramaṇe bhāñji be mohora mudrā | 190 |
bābu ẏe niśācarīmāne mote na pīḍanti yemante

tahiṁki cintā kari śaragayyā goṭiẏe karidia nidrā
yehne na māḍiba mote | 191 |
āho caitana bhīṣmaṁkara mana ye jāṇile pārtha mana bhedi
bhīṣmakaiṁ śaraśayyā goṭiẏe sajāḍile śare śara chandi |192 |
pr̥thīra taḷe śara ṣaḍtāla bhedanti
uparaku tiniḍhāḷa uccharge chandāchandi hoanti | 193 |
śiraku simāsthāna ye bhmajaku āboriṇa
simasthānaku kaṣeśara gaṇḍasthaḷaku aśisahasra | 194 |
beni laṣa nārāja beni ye bhmajaku
pañchakoṭi nārāja ye baṣasthaḷaku | 195 |
beni pādaku ye beni marbhmateka śara
mahāśūnye thāi ābori rahilā na paḍilā taḷa | 196 |
bhīṣme ye śaraśayyāku baleka manīṣā
śūnyare rahiḷā bhīṣmaṁka śarīra nārāja bharasā | 197 |
mahākāẏa śarīra sabu nārājare cchandi
caḷi ta nuārai śareṇa śara bādhi | 198 |
nicaḷa hoi bhīṣme rahile ẏehirūpe aṣṭarātra
śaraśayyāre bhīṣme ye pāile suārtha | 199 |
bhīṣme boile sādhu sādhu re phālaguni
para mana jāṇantā mahimā tora dhani | 200 |
para mana jāṇai ye se karai paramārtha
parameka cintā para loka kāryya hita | 201 |
mama āṣya gheni tu bratare sabonṅasācī
ciraāẏeẏiṣa houṁtote cirāntā–na hou lacchī | 202 |
lg.note: aṣṭāṅka śarīre ye nārāja chandāchandi | (tha,ñja)
lachī–laṣmī |
lg.l: parama kalyāṇa hou tora pūru manabāñchā
pañchukaṭake bhegakara rahu hora kaṣā | 203 |
bara deiṇa gāṅgeba ye aneka triputi
kuru pāṇḍabe raṇabhūmi ābori rahile bhīṣmaṁkara kati | 204 |
śarajāḷāẏe bhīṣmaṁka śarīra kalā jāḷā
mānagobindanta jaḷa māgile bhīṣma mahābaḷā| 205 |
laṣebhāra pāṇi niuḍāile kurubīra
kadācite jāḷā śānti nohilā bhīṣmaṁkara śarīra | 206 |
arjunaku boile bābu āmbhanta jaḷa desi
meghāśara gheni pārtha ākāśa gaṅgākaiṁ peśi | 207 –3947
lg.note:
{labha tu aneka śirī mama kailāṇa tote bāñchā
ẏekamane pañchusthaḷī bhegyakara tu kaicthā?? | (jha,ṅa)}
kaṣā–pratiñṅka,kīrtti |
lg.head: {@bhīṣmaparbara adhikā pāṭha@}
320 pr̥ṣṭhā 1072 pāṭha pare "dha" pothire:-
lg.l: śrīkhaṇḍī dhr̥ṣṭaketu ye hoilā sāṁgrāma
bhīṣme sāṁgrāma kale hoiṇa abiśrāma | 1 |
sañjaẏa bolanti ho dhr̥tirāṣṭa rāṇa
daśa dina yudda karile gaṅgāṅka nandana | 2 |
droṇa arjunara sāṁgrāma heuacchi
abhimanyu aśastamā paḍilā pañchā pañchi | 3 |
caitana rājā tule śakunira yuda
citrasena bikarṇṇara lāgilā bibāda | 4|
bhīmasena karṇṇa beni karucchanti raṇa
dhuśāsana durddaṣa samara anyeanya | 5 |
driyodhana tule yudda karanti yujheṣṭhi
śagka ulukara hoilāka ariṣṭi | 6 |
śrīkhaṇḍī bhāṣma āge hoilaka ubha
ṣudhārtti yesaneke miṣṭānne kare lobha | 7 |
rāhura teja jāṇi bhīṣmanta ākarṣi
nārabaḷa dekhi yehne binatā putra grāsi | 8 |
ḍākai pacharu pārtha śara bidha re śrīkhaṇḍī
tora pacche muhiṁ acchi nandighoṣa maṇḍi | 9 |
sāhā pāi mārai se dr̥pada tanaẏe
bhīṣaṇa śara paḍe megha br̥ṣṭi prāẏe | 10 |
ẏemanta dekhi bhīṣme śrīkhaṇḍī praśaṁsanti
stirīḷiṅga hoi tora ẏeḍeka śakati | 11 |
ẏeḍe baḍa aṭu tuhi cchatriẏa mahābaḷā
mohora hetu tote daiba nirmāṇilā | 12 |
bhīṣmaṁku bolai yahuṁ pāṇḍaba dhanurjaẏe
dekhi niṣata hoile bhīṣma mahārāẏe | 13 |
muṁ tote sañpaṣa tu na karasi bhaẏe
bhīṣma nāśile āmbhara heba raṇa jaẏe | 14 |
bhīṣma aśastamā ẏe dui mahārathā
harihara brahmāra ẏe chedi pāranti mathā | 15 |
droṇa kr̥pāchāryye nr̥pati kurunātha
chatrībara sāmaratha khaṭanti jagata | 16 |
driyodhana boilā ye bhīṣma mukha chāhiṁ
uprodha yudda svāmī karuccha kisa pāiṁ | 17 |
daẏāpaṇa chaḍi ẏebe pāṇḍabanta māra
tumbhe parā kurubaḷe aṭa dhanurddara| 18 |
bhīṣme boile rājā he sarūpa kahuṁ tote
yudde baḷīyāra kehu kaha mo agrate | 19 |
laṣeka yoddā āmbhe māilu daśadine
aśva gaja jete male ke karu kaḷane | 20 |
arjuna jiṇi tote rājya debāpāiṁ
ẏe kathā bolucchu ki kaha re kurusāiṁ | 21 |
āja ẏadde āmbhe māribu pāṇḍacanta
daiba keuṁ kathā karicchi tā na jāṇi tadanta | 22 |
ẏeteka boliṇa se dhanure khūrpa daśabāṇa sadha
dr̥ṣṭigocara acchi śrīkhaṇḍī mahāyodhī | 23 |
śuṇa ho aśastamā boile gaṅgāsuta
āja mora na caḷai kimpāiṁ karapatra | 24 |
ratha dhvaje basilāṇi mora gr̥dhra pacchī
dekha mora naẏanaru lotaka bahr̥acchi | 25 |
dekha ho troṇe mora nārāja nāhiṁ kicchi
bajra guṇa mora dhanuru cchiṇḍicchi | 26 |
tuhāi bidhai śrīkhaṇḍī bhīṣmaṁka uparaku
goṭi goṭi bidhai se marma sthānaṭhāku | 27 |
śrikhaṇḍīki paccha kari dhāmaiṁ kirīṭī
pāṇḍaba yoddāmāne aile sabonṅa ghoṭi | 28 |
śrīkhaṇḍīki āga kari arjuna thāi pacche
nirghāta bāṇa bidhe bajrara sāriṣe | 29 |
br̥ṣṭi parāẏe śara se paḍe bhīṣmaṁkara aṅge
bikarāḷa hoiṇa uṭhileka gāṅgabe | 30 |
pāśare thilā tāṁkara rājā driyodhana
bege āgyāṁ dilā chāre gādhārī nandana | 31 |
samare arjuna ye ātroṣe bhīṣmaṁku
hakāri āṇa mora bhāi ye mānaṁku | 32 |
āgyāṁ pāiṇa ḍagara bega hoi galā
śatebhāi karṇṇa ādi rāiṇa āṇilā | 33 |
droṇa kr̥pa sahitare rājā bhagadatta
arjune beḍhile se gheniṇa śahasranta | 34 |
beni baḷa bheṭante se bājilā raṇagoḷa
māra māra ḍākare ye ārai dhandoḷa | 35 |
praḷaẏa kāḷe yehne sāhera laharā
benibaḷa thāṭha ye temanta diśilā | 36 |
śara ātayāteṇa ye hoilā adhāra
bhīṣmaṁkara teja tahiṁ yesane dinakara | 37 |
anibonṅāraṇa yoddā se gaṅgāra kumara
nimiśeke kāṭile śate rājāṁkara śira | 38 |
puṇa sātabāṇa bidhale se tuhāi
hāthara byagra tāṁkara bacane nohe kahi | 39 |
lg.note: āraṇi–yudda |
lg.l: sātalaṣa yoddā se kāṭile tataṣaṇa
bhārathe sama nāhiṁ ẏe bhīṣmaṁka samāna | 40 |
dekhiṇa ajuna ye hoilāka rāga
bāhile turaṅgame deba ye śrīraṅga | 41 |
cindai nārāja se subarṇṇa tīṣamunā
chaichāḍe bhedilā bhīṣma sārathira sehnā | 42 |
abhimanyu pañchāḷa kumare bege dhāiṁ
bhīṣmapare bāṇamāna bidhale niṭhāi | 43 |
arjuna baiṣṇabā śara dhari bege bidha
marmasthānamānanta bidhai manabhedī | 44 |
puṇa bidhai se śara jāḷābaḷī
bhīṣmara de?? ye se kāṭilā nireḷi | 45 |
kehi na dekhanti pārtha bidhuacchi śara
bhīṣmaṁkara deha goṭi rudhire jarajara | 46 |
yuṇihiṁ chaḍabāṇa arjuna bidhalā
bhīṣmaṁkara hāthuṁ dhanu cchedi pakāilā | 47 |
kopeṇa bhīṣma puṇa āna dhanu dhari
se dhanu cchede pātha benikhaṇḍa kari | 48 |
trodhe bhīṣme chāhiṁleka anaḷa naẏana
āgare śrīkhaṇḍīki ye dekhile āpaṇa | 49 |
ẏe samaẏe arjuna aneka bāṇa bidha
gaṅgāra nandana ratha hoilāka rudha | 50 |
ẏeṇe bāṇamāna bahuta paḍe dehe
tāhā na māniṇa śara bidhacchanti kohe | 51 |
aneka beḷa arjuna cchedalāka tanu
rāgeṇa khaṇḍā dhaile gaṅgādebī tanu | 52 |
agniśikhā jāṇi tāṁka kare karabāḷa
hārtharu cchedilā tā bāsaba dulāḷa | 53 |
puṇa dhanu dharante tā cchedilā arjuna
bhīṣmaṁku ābori ye acchanti kuru saina | 54 |
ẏemanta samaẏare arjuna śara māri
marmathaḷe paḍilā se nohilā nibāri | 55 |
nāgaṁkara biṣa prāẏe nārājaṁka jvāḷā
tāhā bañchāile se ye śāẏantanu baḷā | 56 |
mane bichāra tahuṁ karanti bhīṣmadeba
arjuna chamure śasra dhari ke rahiba | 57 |
ki laṣaṇe pātha hoicchi dhanurddara
yāhāku samare se hāracchi purandara | 58 |
prasanne bara yāku deicchi sadāśiba
trailoke tāra tule samartha ke heba | 59 |
ẏete boli bhīṣme dhaile kare dhanu
bhūṣaṇḍīki ye bidhale ākarṇṇu | 60 |
sātaśa yoddā ẏekā bāṇake ye māri
pādānta hāthībaḷa ke pāru raṣā kari | 61 |
lohāra śara puṇa bidhale triśikhā
pratiśare nibārile pātha ye triśikhā | 62 |
bhekhilā byāghra yehne ṣepai cchaḷipala
tesana sāriṣe aṭai bhīṣma mahāmala | 63 |
yamara āge yehne na rahe pāpīloka
bhīṣma āge na rahanti bidhale śarayāka | 64 |
śrīkhaṇḍīki āga yahuṁ kalā bīra pātha
apālaṭa śara goṭi dhailāka hātha | 65 |
rasāna patra phaḷa aṭai tīṣamunā
dhente bhedilā ye hr̥daẏe bajrasehnā | 66 |
lg.note: bhūṣaṇḍī–śarabiśeṣa |
lg.l: bhīṣmaṁkara dehare paḍante yāiṁ śara
baikulya hoilā teḍe chatrīṁka śarīra | 67 |
ākuḷa hoante ye gaṅgāṅka tanaẏe
āgare dekhile bije śrīkhaṇḍī ubhā hoẏe | 68 |
hāsya kari śrīkhantīki na māranti bāṇa
sta rīmātra saṅge kisa mohora ye raṇa | 69 |
ẏemanta bicharante gaṅgāra nandana
apramita śara ẏeṇu bidhai arjuna | 70 |
hemamaẏe śaragoṭi aṭe mahājā??
troṇaru bācchi pātha bidhalā śaramāḷa | 71 |
śara paḍante ye na diśe bhīṣmakāẏe
ratharu ḍhaḷiṇa ye paḍile bhīṣmarāẏe | 72 |
bhīṣma paḍanteṇa saina ye paḷāẏe
kāḷānaḷa rupa dhariacchi pātha dehe | 73 |
dekhiṇa cchicchatra hoile kurubaḷa
goḍāiṇa pāṇḍabe kale mahāgoḷa | 74 |
sādhu sādhu chatrī goṭi aṭu dhanurjaẏe
tohore sādhya hele ye bhīṣma mahārāẏe | 75 |
bana jantu kheidai yesane keśarī
temanta goḍāile kaureba baḷa māri | 76 |
kare dhanu dhari droṇa mahābaḷa
kaurebanta ogāḷile chatrīẏa śārddūḷa | 77 |
droṇe ḍākanti āre paḷāa kisa pāiṁ
māra ho pāṇḍabanta kicchi bhaẏa nāhiṁ | 78 |
bhīṣma paḍanteṇa paḷāẏe kurupati
karṇṇara āgare yāiṁ miḷilā taḍati | 79 |
ẏemanta dekhi karṇṇa hoile trodhamana
sanidhye miḷile yāiṁ guruṁka nandana | 80 |
bālamika bhagadatta ātaṅga mahāmtā
aḷamvuṣā dānaba ābara kr̥pabrahma | 81 |
samasta senā tule ābara kuru saina
bhīṣmaṁka abhābare kaleka redana | 82 |
bhīṣme śrīkhaṇḍī mukha chāhiṁ anubrate
ratharu ḍhaḷiṇa se paḍile bhūmigate | 83 |
sabonṅa guṇe sundara sulaṣaṇī bāḷī
śrikhaṇḍī mukha dekhi bhīṣmaṁkara dhātu gaḷi | 84 |
pāṇḍibaṁkara ānanda,rebai driyodhana
bāhāsphoṭa māriṇa nācai bhīsena | 85 |
bhīṣme nāśagale mariba kurupati
rīratūra bādyamāna utsuke bajānti | 86 |
kuru pāṇḍabe ye samara chaḍile
bhīṣmaṁkar pāśe yāiṇa samaste beḍhile | 87 |
bhīṣmaṁkara dehare ye śara se acchi bhedi
icchāmr̥ta yāhāra samare dr̥ḍha bidhi |88 |
ākāśe thāi yudda dekhuthile deba
śabada śubhalā prāṇa na chaḍa gāṅgabe | 89 |
uttarāẏaṇa kāḷa nodoi hāde jāṇa
dhauryya baḷa kara kāḷa barttamāna | 90 |
ākāśaru bhīṣme ẏe bacana śuṇi
ceti basi uṭhile bīraṁka śiremaṇi | 91 |
gaṅgā paṭhiāi ye dile brahmarūṣi mānanta
bhe rūṣi māne mora putraku kahibā bārata | 92 |
daṣiṇāẏana rātra uttare uttarāẏaṇa parabeśa
prāṇatyāja hoile pāiba svargabāsa | 93 |
lg.note: bālamika–bāhlika |
lg.l: sehi yudda ṣetre na maru yudda kāḷe
uttarāẏaṇe prāṇa chaḍiba sekāḷe | 94 |
śuṇiṇa rūṣimāne haṁsa rūpa hoi
bhīṣmaṁku aẏana ye kahile bujhāiṁ | 95 |
śuṇiṇa bhīṣme haraṣa muniṁkara bāṇī
tumbhe yāhā kahila muṁ acchi tāhā jāṇi | 96 |
yemanta kahiṇa bāhuḍi gale brahmamuni
gaṅgānta kahile tumbha putra mahāgyānī | 97 |
śuṇiṇa jāhnabī ye ānandamaẏe citta
ẏethu anantare śuṇa yāhā helā kurunātha | 98 |
se beni baḷa se samara chaḍile
dhanu troṇa chaḍi sabonṅe bhīṣmaṁku beḍhile | 99 |
bhe pitāmaha kala ẏesanaka kr̥tya
śoka asambhāḷe ye bolanti dharma suta | 100 |
arjuna mukha chāhiṁṇa bhīṣmadeba boli
sādhu sādhu dhanurjaẏe chatriya mahābaḷī | 101 |
bhe kurunātha mohora deha na caḷai
nārāja jāḷā mote bikaḷa karai | 102 |
pāda pāṇi mohora na caḷai āu
dehara pīḍā mora kehu abā sahu | 103 |
śuṇiṇa kurupati debāṅga basra dilā
susañcha śayyākara boḷi karṇṇaku boilā | 104 |
netara mucuḷā goṭi brahmājāti hīrā
bidr̥ma pagaḍa māṇikya chārikhurā | 105 |
hemara pātiā susañcha parijharā
śunyare khañjāacchi candrātapa ṭerā | 106 |
lg.note:
{pagaḍa–baṛḍabaḍa guḷā |
bidr̥ma–pohaḷā}
ṭerā–paradā |
lg.l: daṣiṇa pagaḍire lāgicchi yantra tāra
binā bāte pabana bahai sadhīra | 107 |
ẏemanta palaṁka goṭi niyojile karṇṇa
driyodhana bole ẏethe karasi śaẏana | 108 |
bhīṣme boile bābu re nohai ẏemanta
ghaṭāntara kāḷaku ẏe ye aṭe biparīta | 109 |
bhe bīra pātha muhiṁ karibi śaẏana
ardda ākāśare ye hoiṇa uttana | 110 |
śuṇiṇa sabonṅasārī dhariṇa dhanu hāthe
tinibāṇa pātha ye basāi śara pathe | 111 |
bajra sāriṣe bāṇa subarṇṇa pacchī barṇṇa
tikāṭhiā ākāra ye śara tini muna | 112 |
ātreṣiṇa śara pareiṇa bidha
merukīḷā jāṇi ātreṣiṇa sadha | 113 |
śaramuni pacchī palaṁka ākāra
svargare praśaṁsā ye karanti dekhi sura | 114 |
bhīṣme pratibāca adhā svargare palaṁka
kemante yibā āmbhara na caḷai aṅga | 115 |
śuṇiṇa sabonṅasācī hāndoḷā śara māri
bhīṣmaṁku ṭekilā kara caraṇa beni dhari | 116 |
tāḷeka upare se śuāilā nei
dhāra dhāra hoi tahiṁ maḷaẏa bahai | 117 |
driyodhane chāhiṁṇa bolanti bhīṣma bīra
dehagoṭi jāḷā huẏe dia mote nīra | 118 |
agnira tāpa prāẏeka lāgai dehajāḷā
subāsa jaḷa dia gādharīra baḷā | 119 |
subāsa nīra ratna jharīre pūrei
driyodhana dilā āpyāna narasi gosāiṁ | 120 |
tāhā dekhiṇa gāṅgabe hoile asantāṣa
ẏeteke jaḷe āmbhe ye nohibu santoṣa | 121 |
āre arjuna tahiṭi cchatrīṁka moṣapāna
ẏe jāḷā anarūpe diasi jaḷadāna | 122 |
śuṇiṇa arjuna ye tīṣaśara bidha
ākāśa gaṅgāku se phuṭilā manabhedī | 123 |
subāsa śītaḷa ye karpūra bāsakara
bhīṣma mukhe paḍe jhara jhara hoi nīra | 124 |
susañcha jaḷa ye bhīṣme kariṇa āpyāna
praśaṁsā kaleka dhanya dhanya ce arjuna | 125 |
bhṣme pratibāca kurukuḷa nr̥pabara
dekhiluṭi ki pāthara mahimāṁ apāra | 126 |
yāhāre prasanna hoicchanti bhagabāna
mo mana jāṇi ẏebe bihilā jaḷadāna | 127 |
mo bole driyodhana chaḍa tumbhe yudda
pāṇḍabe priya hele rahiba sampada
ṣame bañchathāntu ẏebe tohora śatebhrātha | 128 |
bhīmasenara śarīre acchiṭi kopa jāṇa
yujheṣṭhi nakuḷa sahadebara nāhiṁ māna | 129 |
kadāpi dharmasuta na kare tote trodha
yuddare sabonṅaśa tora na karaa badha | 130 |
dekha prataṣe tu arjuna mahimāṁ
brahmā indra rudrara ye na rakhe baḍimā | 131 |
manuṣya baḷe jiṇi nohai pāṇḍabaṁku
akāraṇe nāśa tu na kara bonṅśaku | 132 |
arjuana bāhu baḷe debanta jiṇilā
khāṇḍaba bana dahane śakrahiṁ harilā | 133 |

div.note: moyayāna–pradhāna |

lg.l: śatadhanu bibāde kr̥ṣṭanta jiṇilā phāluguni
āmbhara bola na māni nohan agyānī | 134 |
chāḍa chaḍa hiṁsā bābu apamāna gabonṅa
pāṇḍabe sodara tora tāhāṁka acchi bhāga | 135 |
driyodhana bolai ẏehā se nohai kadācite
karṇṇa bole ẏehā kimpe boile gaṅgasute |136 |
karibaiṁ yudda muhiṁ maitrara cchaḷe
śuṇi mauna bhele ye bhīṣma mahābaḷe | 137 |
puṇi boilā bhīṣme muṁ tumbhara kathā śuṇi
śarīra kampāna kadaḷī patra jāṇi | 138 |
baḍhala kaurebe pāṇḍabe tumbha prīti
mr̥tubheda kahidilā kāḷira pāhānti | 139 |
kuṭe buḍāidilā māna ye gobindaku
ẏete aparādhī tumbhe chaḍilā dharmakū | 140 |
adhara kampāi tumbhe pratagyāṁ karithila
ẏeḍe biśvāsaghātakā ẏebe āsi mala | 141 |
ẏehā śuṇi bhīṣma debe boile bacana
bhārate bhārei malla tu parā aṭu karṇṇa | 142 |
āho thāṭhare accha ta senāpati paṇe
jāṇimā pāntabanta kemante jiṇu raṇe | 143 |
samara śeṣayāẏe āmbhe ẏetheṁ thibu
icchāmr̥tu āmbhara cintale maribu | 144 |
bho karṇṇa rahilu tu rājānta abori
kemante pāṇḍabanta jiṇimuṁ śasra dhari | 145 |
āho rādheba tu kalu yete darpa
tote arjuna ye aṭai kāḷasarpa | 146 |
reṣe pratagyāṁ kare mānacatrabratī
bole bhīṣme āśre kari labhiḷi ẏete gati | 147 |
ẏete boli tahuṁ caḷilā nija sthāna
pāṇḍabanta gheniṇa caḷile janārddana | 148 |
makara śukaḷa paṣa ye daśamīra rāti
sedina pāṇḍabe bheṭile bhīṣma mahārathī | 149 |
dekhile sedina bhīṣma mr̥tura abasthā
yujheṣṭhi pratibāca ẏehā kala mote pitā | 150 |
kuṭamvayāka mora dilā ẏete śāsti
kete yaśa arjilāṭi mānacatrabratī | 151 |
bhīṣme boile sāṣa tote nārāẏaṇa
mānagobindara nice na rahai prāṇa | 152 |
śakuni tāra acchi kuḷaṣaẏe mantrī
maitra tāra aṭe karṇṇa mahācchatrī | 153 |
madhupiṅgaḷa aṭai māna ye gobinda
na mānilā mohora bacana karuacchi dvanda | 154 |
kaṇakaḷpa yebe se diantā yujheṣṭhiṁki
kimpāiṁ samara āu huantā ẏeṇiki | 155 |
āhe jagata svāmī mote kara pāra
ẏe sañsāra aṭe tohora khela ghara | 156 |
bhīṣmaṁkara abastā se dekhiṇa śrīpati
boile bara māga debaiṁ yugati | 157 |
tu ho mahārathī ẏe mr̥tu maṇḍaḷe
tote yudda kari ke jiṇima mahītaḷe | 158 |
mora bhakti gheni pāṇḍabaṁkara hite
icchāẏe paḍilu tu arjuna śara ghāte | 159 |
māga māga bara bhīṣa cirāntana kathā
debaiṁ nice ẏehā nohiba anyathā | 160 |
bhīṣme boile mora kalā nāhiṁ pāpa
aputrika laṣaṇa mora aṭai sarūpa |161 |
raṇayāga mote ye hoicchi prāpata
aputrika laṣaṇaru mukta kara ho ja??nnātha | 161 |
ẏe ye pabitra puṇya aṭe ẏekādaśī
ẏethe prāṇatyāga hele baikuṇṭha pure basi | 162 |s
ẏe ye pabitra yuṇya aṭe ẏekādaśī
ẏethe prāṇatyāga hele baikuṇṭha pure basi | 163 |
hari he aneka jhiṁghāsa kalā mote karṇṇa
śarīra rakhili, kehne se jiṇima arjana | 164 |
gobinde boile mora bacana yebe sata
saṁsāra dharmarājā tote hou ye prāpata | 165 |
makara śukaḷa paṣa ẏekādaśī tithi
bhīṣmaṁkara rahilā ẏe jagatare khyāti | 166 |
ye jana ẏehi ẏekādaśī kare brata
se jana tumbhara se hoiba dharmaputra | 167 |
ẏe saṁsāra madhyare acchai yeuṁ puṇya
se tote prāpti hou gaṅgā debī nāna | 168 |
nikaḷaṁka puṇya prāpti hoibāka tote
tribāra satya kari boile jagabhūte | 169 |
tote kañchire yāhā dili āji
kotikaḷpe brahmā yāhā na pāile bhaji | 170 |
anya ke pāi se bhaktiyoga gheni
paraṁbrahma sarūpa se bhīṣma mahāgyānī | 171 |
aputrika doṣa goṭi ki chara aṭai
yāhā pāile bhīṣme tā saṁsārare nāhiṁ | 172 |
keuṁ yoge abā manāiṁ bāsudeba
saṁsāra puṇya jūra kaleṭi gāṁgeba | 173 |
gobinda boile ho bhīṣma mahārāṇa
baikuṇṭha labhibuṭi chaḍile tora prāṇa | 174 |
bhīṣme boile svāmī pāṇḍabe mora putra
tāhānta tu raṣā karithibuṭi padmanetra | 175 |
arjune boile ẏe samara śeṣa yāẏe
rahilā mohora prāṇa ẏe śaraśayyāẏe | 176 |
kabadha paḍibe bhāsiba rakta nadī
nācibe yognīgaṇa bhūta preta ādi | 177 |
ẏe śayyāre yemanteṭi na māḍiba nidrā
rāṣasī pichāśī yemante na māḍibe śayyā | 178 |
niśācaramāne bābu na pīḍibe yemante
temanta śaraśayyā kara tu bābu mote | 179 |
bhīṣmaṁkara bacane se śara mahākhaḷā
gāṇḍabe basāilā se bāsabara baḷā | 180 |
mantriṇa boilā tu gr̥ha prāẏe hebu
pr̥thīki chaḍiṇa tāḷeka, tinitāḷa pātāḷe bhedithibu | 181 |
yuṇa manabhedī ye peṣai phālāguni
boilā gr̥ha caupāśe jagithibu puṇi | 182 |
āreka śara tahiṁ ye bidhalā arajuna
supāti śeya goṭi kalāka tahiṁ jāṇa | 183 |
beniśata bāṇa se bidhalā uparaku
pañchāśasahasra bāṇa bidhe chāri ye digaku | 184 |
upara piḍhā kalā marbhmateka śara
śūnye rahile bhīṣme ye tāḷeka upara | 185 |
śara śayyāre bhīṣme rahile aṣṭarātra
śayyāku diśuacchi ye brahmāṇḍa jagata | 186 |
bhīṣme boile bābu śuṇa re phālaguni
mo mana jāṇi tu mahimāṁ tohora dhani | 187 |
mama āẏaṣa gheniṇa tu bratare sabonṅasācī
catubaga phaḷa labha yāhā mane bāñchu | 188 |

div.note:
padaṭhāru 126 pada paryyanta kebaḷa "dha" pothiru

niā yāiacchi |

lg.l: ẏe pañchukaṭakare huasi rājana
śiraccheda hou re tora hāthe bīrakarṇṇa | 189 |
baradei gāṅgabe hoile tri puti
pāṇḍabanta gheniṇa se caḷile śirīpati | 190 |
tri purāsura airi namāmi sadāśiba
debādhi debarāja āgyāṁ ke laṁghiba | 191 |
kiñchita bhaktire prabhma deucche bara
yuga yugāntare sehu hoḍacchi amara | 192 |
dhabaḷa śarīra to nāṭyarasa bheḷe
kare cirājai tora tīṣa ye triśūḷe |193 |
pinākī paśupatra ye aṣaẏa tr̥ṇīra
adhaka binśane svarge rahilā bajradhara | 194 |
arddanārīśvara kr̥tānta darpa bhañjā
ḍibi ḍibi ḍamvaru bāje mahābājā | 195 |
tāṇḍaba nr̥tya nohe tumbhara na thile
kḷakūṭa khāi tumbhe pārakala heḷe | 196 |
ahirāja kariaccha gaḷāre uttarī
karpūra bibhūtire śarīra toṣa kari | 197 |
dudurā gaiśa puṣya campā nāgeśvara
bela padma bakuḷare hr̥de lamve hāra | 198 |
apñchamukha tumbhara he aṭe trilocana
sadānanda puruṣa tora br̥ṣabha bāhan | 199 |
triguṇe badhan to nohiacchi aṅga
anuṣaṇe meḷa tora yognīgaṇa saṅga | 200 |
kiñchita bhagate dia abhaẏe ye bara
sabonṅadā kāḷe gaṅgā bahiccha tumbhe śira | 201 |

div.note:
gaiśa–gaẏesa, traka prakara haḷā gccheṭa traka pākhuḍiā phula |
supuṣpā, (ḷeucas plant)

lg.l: bhālare candra tora jaṭāmadhye thāi
sura sidda muni tora caraṇe sebai | 202 |
bho svāmī nirākuḷa parama pe yogī
tohora sebākārī sabonṅadā niregī | 203 |
ghora araṇyare tohora aṭe bāsa
śuddabhūmi aṭe tora nāma kapiḷāsa | 204 |
cauda koṭi saṁge tohora śibagaṇa
dukhabhārā nāśu deba bhramiṇa saṁsāreṇa | 205 |
antaryyāmī nātha he tumbhe śūḷadhara
ḍākile ḍāka śuṇa thile tumbhe dūra | 206 |
naraku tāraṇa deba aṭa he deba kāśī
līḷāgati kari ccheda he kāḷaphāśi | 207 |
akarmā dānī karme na thile bara deu
sadānanda puruṣa yu nirāśa na karāu | 208 |
ẏe sacarācare acchanti yete deba
tumbhara mahimāṁku ke sāmānya hoiba | 209 |
bandai mahāmāẏā go haraṁka gharaṇī
parama baiṣṇabī tuhi saṁkaṭa tāriṇī | 210 |
daita nisūdanī ghorātta nāśinī
sabonṅa suḷaṣaṇī go maṅgaḷa dāẏinī | 211 |
kāmāṣī kāmaseṇā go himabanta ghare
janmiṇa bijekala jaṅgerapura grāmare | 212 |
se dbīra caraṇe mohora nitye āśa
badaẏanti śūdramuni sāreḷa caṇḍī dāsa | 213 |
idaṁ mahābhāratha bhīṣmapabonṅa yudda
idaṁ śaraśayyā kale kurupatira trodha | 214 |
akūḷa samodrare ye bhāṣilā kurupati
droṇe ẏebe yudde hoibe senāpati | 215 |
ẏe ye bhīṣma pabonṅa hoilāka śeṣa
badaẏanti śūdra muni śrī sāreḷa caṇḍī dāsa | 216 |
jaẏa tu ayoni sambhūta abhaẏe bāluṁkā
sañsāra nāśantā deba tuhi sidda ẏekā | 217 |
śudda saṣṭika śarīra nirākuḷa he nikaḷaṁka
niśākara mauḷi nātha jaẏa tu triamvaka | 218 |
agākara jaḷa sāgara sañsāra agocare māẏā
samasta gopyakalu nātha ẏe tohora ẏeka kāẏā | 219 |
bhegeṇa rega svāmī regeṇa paramāda
sabonṅga sampada tejilu nātha icchilu yogapada | 220 |
nirākāra puruṣa nikaḷaṁka kāẏā goṭi
niṣata karmaru mote uddara ho dhūrjaṭī | 221 |
kāminī puruṣa nātha kāminī arddakāẏe
kāma niredheṇa nātha sadāẏeṇa sadaẏe | 222 |
naẏana pañchudaśa nātha abhaẏe kuṇḍaḷī
girijāra rasaraṅge samartha deba śūḷī | 223 |
sarjjana jana rañjana hr̥dagate japāmāḷā
bhaireba rūpa dhari pātilu mahākhaḷa | 224 |
śrībhma pinākī ye khaṭvāṅga paśupatra
śireṇa dhabaḷī pracaṇḍa suliḷirta gaṅgā trinetra | 225 |
guruṁka upare tumbhe parama ye guru
debādhi iśvara he mahimāṁ tora meru | 226 |
triyura dhaṁsilā yehu kautuka kheḍe
adhaka nibārilu baḍāi sampoḍe | 227 |
yogeṇa yogeśvara parama jagujitā
candrabhedī nātha tu parama pade śakatā | 228 |

div.note:
{śrībhmaje pinākī paraśu patra khaṭvāṅga |
śireṇa dhabaḷī pracaṇḍa śūḷa lāga | (jha,ṛha)}

lg.l: svāmī samodra mantha??ne jāta kāḷakūṭa bhaṣi
āpaṇe dukhabhāgī saẏaḷa jana rakhi | 229 |
namo namo nīḷakaṇṭha nīḷāmvara sarūpī
yābata candrārke deba tohora kāyā acchi byāpī | 230 |
naraka tāraṇa se yāhāra nāma goṭi
muhiṁ tāhānta talaẏe kali pañchadaśa brahmāṇḍa koṭi | 231 |
yoge yogeśvara nātha gyāna upagata
sādhana puruṣa svāmī abhaẏe biśvanātha | 232 |
matnīra kope ye daṣara yāga bhaṅgā
mahā brahmahatyā deba tuhi se digabijā | 233 |
surasidda muni yāhāra caraṇe bande
muhiṁ tāhā icchili deba parama sānande | 234 |
sadyajāta bāmadeba aghora tatayuruṣa īśāna
pannagabhūṣaṇa nātha kaṭā mekhaḷā bidyamāna | 235 |
somapāna mantre saẏaḷa jana cintā
sabonṅa lokara badhu sabonṅa sañchā karantā | 236 |
j1aẏa tu digamvara yābata candracūḷa
taba bhagata arthe nātha srijilu saẏaḷa | 237 |
praḷaẏe uttāraṇa nātha abhaẏe bhabānī
śudramuni sāreḷā dāsara ghenimā daẏinī | 238 |
āho budhajanamāne mora na ghenimā doṣa
ihajanne na paḍhili gatajanne abhyāsa | 239 |
janneṇa murukha apaṇḍita na jāṇaiṁ muṁ kicchi
kiñchite sadaẏe mote kale piṅgaḷācchī | 240 |
jāta anta madhye yāra abasāna nāhiṁ
parama gati icchili caraṇe tāra dāhi | 241 |
badaẏanti agasti bhīṣmapabonṅara ye kathā
biṣṇu purāṇara madhye aṣṭādaśa pabonṅara bāratā | 242 |
kehu he yibaṭi gaṅgā bālira lekhā
baḍabā anaḷe kehu kāṭha deba yokhā | 243 |
kr̥pājaḷa nandinī go prasanna heṅguḷā
hr̥dagate cintili muṁ śrīcaṇḍī sāreḷā | 244 |
maruḷa āsanī mā go jaṅgerapura bāsī
bhaba bhaẏa duṣukr̥ta samasta bināśi | 245 |
aneka jannara ye aneka pāpa khaṇḍi
durgati tāriṇī go sāreḷa nāme caṇḍī | 246 |
mahābhāratha bhīsmapabonṅa daśa dibasa antare
muhiṁ tāhā lekhibi mā go tohora prasannare | 247 |
narmadā sarasvatī caraṇe mora sebā
śūdramuni sāreḷadāsaku prasanne mukati gati debā | 248–39791
bhīmasyāpiraṇe bhaṅgā munerapi matibhramaḥ |
yadi śuddamaśuddiṁ bā mama doṣā na bidyate |

div.note: brahmapua śāradā presre śrī śyāmasundara pāṛhīṅka dvārā mudrita | 1964 |
